T02TD1874E:1b-1: shr'i gu hya sa m'a dza s'a dha nam siddhi sam bha ba ni dhi n'a ma /
T02TD1874E:1b-3: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs dngos grub 'byung ba'i gter zhes bya ba /
T02TD1874E:1b-4: [dd] dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1874E:1b-5: zab gsal gnyis med dag pa'i bdag nyid kyis //
T02TD1874E:1b-6: bdag dang gzhan don phun sum tshogs pa'i sku //
T02TD1874E:1b-7: dpal ldan chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgya la ;
T02TD1874E:1b-8: / rgyal sras rgyu dang bcas pa rab 'byung zhing //
T02TD1874E:1b-9: rtag sogs rgyu 'dras khams kun rab bkang nas //
T02TD1874E:1b-10: ji srid bar du don mdzad rgyun mi 'chad //
T02TD1874E:1b-11: khyab bdag rdo rje sems dpa' de dang ni //
T02TD1874E:1b-12: de yi sras rnams la yang phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1874E:1b-13: khams gsum rgyu dang mi rgyu kun khyab pa //
T02TD1874E:1b-14: snying ga'i dbus bsam de la brtan sogs skye //
T02TD1874E:1b-15: chos bdag khros pas kyang ni mi gnon pa //
T02TD1874E:1b-16: mi shigs thig le gang yin rtogs par mos //
T02TD1874E:1b-17: blo dang ldan pa rnams kyis padma kha 'byed pa //
T02TD1874E:1b-18: rmongs pa sreg byed snying gi mun pa sel mdzad pa //
T02TD1874E:1b-19: yon tan dag pa'i mkha' la rgyu zhing 'jigs bral mdzad //
T02TD1874E:2a-1: ma dam pa rnams kyi zhal snga rgyal gyur cig / dpal ldan gsang 'dus mtsho chen las //
T02TD1874E:2a-2: bla ma'i brgyud rim gru gzings kyis //
T02TD1874E:2a-3: yid bzhin nor bu rnam pa gsum //
T02TD1874E:2a-4: sman pa'i zhabs kyis rnyed pa'o //
T02TD1874E:2a-5: de rnyed dpe mkhyud spangs byas te //
T02TD1874E:2a-6: 'di ni thun mong cig shos kyi //
T02TD1874E:2a-8: phan phyir bdag gis brtsam par bya //
T02TD1874E:2a-9: gzhung gzhan spangs te bla ma'i brgyud rim gyis //
T02TD1874E:2a-10: dpal dang ldan pa'i mnyam 'dus sgrub pa'i thabs //
T02TD1874E:2a-11: dam pas gsol ba btab phyir rab brjod cing //
T02TD1874E:2a-12: dad pas ci nus bdag gis bshad par bya //
T02TD1874E:2a-13: de la kha cig ni yang dag pa'i man ngag dang bral ba rnams ni dam pa ma yin par mkhas par grags pa rnams la bla ma nyid du khas blangs nas de'i lam la zhugs te /
T02TD1874E:2a-14: dka' thub dang smyung ba dang /
T02TD1874E:2a-15: brtul zhugs la sogs pas don dam pa gcig po la dpyod cing /
T02TD1874E:2a-16: 'di snyam du bdag gi rgyu'i 'khrul 'khor la sogs pa dang lhan cig tu skyes kyang /
T02TD1874E:2a-17: de rnams kyis stong pa'i dngos po ni yod de /
T02TD1874E:2a-18: de tsam zhig brtags pas mngon du byed kyang /
T02TD1874E:2b-0: dngos po la don dam par zhen pas stong pa nyid mi shes te grol ba dang rgyang ring du @2b 'gyur ro //
T02TD1874E:2b-2: stong pa nyid ni ma shes pas //
T02TD1874E:2b-3: kun la 'das pa des mi shes //
T02TD1874E:2b-4: dngos dang dngos med rnam 'jigs pas //
T02TD1874E:2b-5: stong pa nyid ni shes par bya //
T02TD1874E:2b-7: yang kha cig dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad zin kyang /
T02TD1874E:2b-8: dam pa ma yin pas de'i lam la zhugs te /
T02TD1874E:2b-9: bdag la sogs pa dang bral ba'i phung po dang skye mched dang /
T02TD1874E:2b-10: khams rnams mi rtag pa la sogs par 'jig cing /
T02TD1874E:2b-11: sdom pa'i snod la brten te /
T02TD1874E:2b-12: zhugs pa la sogs pa'i lam gyi phyung po la sogs pa la grol nas lhag ma dang bcas pa dang /
T02TD1874E:2b-13: lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa mngon du phyed do //
T02TD1874E:2b-14: 'di yang ma rig pa dang 'brel pa'i phyir 'bras bu phyir ldog pa can zhes bya ste /
T02TD1874E:2b-16: rtsa ba'i rnam shes log gyur nas //
T02TD1874E:2b-17: lhag bcas lhag ma med gyur pa'i //
T02TD1874E:2b-19: mngon du rgyu ba med pa yi //
T02TD1874E:2b-20: ma rig bag chags dang 'brel phyir //
T02TD1874E:2b-21: rnam par snang mdzad gang chen mtshos //
T02TD1874E:2b-22: de la thugs rjes gzung ba'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:2b-23: dpal ldan go cha'i 'od zer dang //
T02TD1874E:2b-24: phyag gis dbu la reg mdzad nas //
T02TD1874E:2b-25: de yi ro myong zlog mdzad de //
T02TD1874E:2b-26: yang dag lam la 'dzud par mdzad //
T02TD1874E:2b-27: ces gsang ba'i rim pa phye ba las gsungs so //
T02TD1874E:2b-28: yang kha cig ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen dam pa dang phrad du zin kyang /
T02TD1874E:2b-29: de rnams kyis brgyud rim mkhyud pas //
T02TD1874E:2b-30: sbyin pa la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa bcu bskal ba mi nyung bar bsags nas /
T02TD1874E:2b-31: sa'i de bzhin nyid du mngon du byed cing rim gyis sa bcu mngon du mthar thug par byed do //
T02TD1874E:2b-32: de'i sprul pa'i sbyor bas dga' ldan gyi gnas nyid du skye ba len pa dang /
T02TD1874E:2b-33: gling la sogs pa la gzigs par mdzad nas yum gyi lhums su 'jug pa dang /
T02TD1874E:2b-35: gzhon nu rol pa mdzad pa dang /
T02TD1874E:2b-37: btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang nas byung ba dang /
T02TD1874E:2b-39: dka' ba spyad pa ston pa dang /
T02TD1874E:2b-40: de'i tshe bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis sngon rang nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i man ngag rang rig chos kyi sku mngon du byed pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD1874E:2b-41: til gyi gong bu bzhin du ched du longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur bstan te /
T02TD1874E:3a-0: @3a * // ye shes kyi phyag rgya gnang nas /
T02TD1874E:3a-1: snyoms par 'jug pa'i cho gas rtsa ba'i ye shes dmigs pa dang bral ba /
T02TD1874E:3a-2: sbyor ba gnyis kyi bdag nyid sngon dang phyis kyi sbyor ba mngon du byas te /
T02TD1874E:3a-3: bdud btul chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la sogs pa mdzad do //
T02TD1874E:3a-4: don de lta bu'i snod dkon par gzigs nas /
T02TD1874E:3a-5: snga bar mdzad de sangs rgyas pa'i tshul so sor mthong bar mdzad do //
T02TD1874E:3a-6: bla ma chen po'i zhal nas ji skad du /
T02TD1874E:3a-7: ci'i phyir sh'akya thub pa yis //
T02TD1874E:3a-8: grangs med par du tshogs bsags kyang //
T02TD1874E:3a-10: ci yang ma yin ting 'dzin gnas //
T02TD1874E:3a-11: de tshe bde gshegs kun gyis kyang //
T02TD1874E:3a-12: thal byung blo chags de bzlog ste //
T02TD1874E:3a-13: nam mkha'i dbyings ltar rnam dag pa'i //
T02TD1874E:3a-14: zab gsal gnyis med rab bstan te //
T02TD1874E:3a-15: nam phyed dus su rgyal ba ltar //
T02TD1874E:3a-16: de nyid bsgoms pas tho rangs su //
T02TD1874E:3a-17: skad cig gis ni yang dag rtogs //
T02TD1874E:3a-18: byang chub snying por zhugs byas nas //
T02TD1874E:3a-19: dpung chen bdud rnams rab bcom ste //
T02TD1874E:3a-20: sems can gzung bar bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:3a-22: de nas bzung ste don mchog 'di //
T02TD1874E:3a-23: skal ba ldan pa 'ga' zhig la //
T02TD1874E:3a-24: zhal nas zhal dang snyan nas snyan //
T02TD1874E:3a-25: brgyud de nges pa'i don bstan pa'o //
T02TD1874E:3a-27: de bas na sangs rgyas thams cad sangs rgyas pa'i tshul 'dis shes par bya'o //
T02TD1874E:3a-28: gal te lam gzhan gyis sangs rgyas pa srid na ni /
T02TD1874E:3a-29: de'i bla ma dang bcas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1874E:3a-30: de bas na 'bras bu sku gsum ni gcig kho na ste de'i lam ni sngags kyi spyod pa 'di'o //
T02TD1874E:3a-31: ji skad du rnam par snang mdzad byang chub pa'i rgyud las /
T02TD1874E:3a-32: sangs rgyas dus gsum las byung ba //
T02TD1874E:3a-33: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can //
T02TD1874E:3a-34: gzhal med ye shes thob pa ni //
T02TD1874E:3a-35: rdo rje sngags kyi don sgom yin //
T02TD1874E:3a-37: sngags kyi spyod pa la mos pa de dag kyang bzhir shes par bya'o //
T02TD1874E:3a-38: kha cig ni phyi'i gtsang sbra la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1874E:3a-39: bdag gi de kho na nyid la sogs pas lhag pa'i lha mnyes par byas pas mngon par mtho ba'i dpal nyams su myong bar byas nas /
T02TD1874E:3b-0: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par byas @3b nas sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang thob par 'dod do //
T02TD1874E:3b-1: yang kha cig ni phyi'i gtsang sbra la sogs pa bya ba dang bya ba ma yin pa spangs nas /
T02TD1874E:3b-2: mtshan ma dang bcas pa dang /
T02TD1874E:3b-3: mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis mngon par mtho ba'i dpal nyams su myong nas /
T02TD1874E:3b-4: tshogs gnyis bsags nas sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang thob par 'dod do //
T02TD1874E:3b-5: yang kha cig ni gtsang sbra la sogs pa smad cing nang gi rnal 'byor dam tshig sems dpa' dang /
T02TD1874E:3b-6: phyi rol gyi ye shes sems dpa' phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan pa mnyes par bya ba la sogs pa'i rim pas rang gi lha mnyes par byas pas mngon par mtho ba'i dpal nyams su myong nas /
T02TD1874E:3b-7: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par byas nas sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang thob par 'dod do //
T02TD1874E:3b-8: de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis de lta bu la mos pa'i gdul bya gzud pa'i phyir thabs gsungs pa ste /
T02TD1874E:3b-9: phyag rgya chen po'i lhan cig byed pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T02TD1874E:3b-10: phyag rgya chen po'i lhan cig byed pa ni 'di lta ste /
T02TD1874E:3b-11: gang dag sems ji lta ba bzhin du brtag pa'i thabs la /
T02TD1874E:3b-12: brtson 'grus 'bar ba dang ldan pa rnams kyis bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pas skad cig re re la yang snod dang bcud dang lam dang 'bras bur bcas pa sbyong bar byed cing /
T02TD1874E:3b-13: rnal 'byor dang phyag rgyal brten nas tshe 'di nyid las rab dang rab kyi mthar phyin par 'gyur ba la som nyi med pas bla na med pa'o //
T02TD1874E:3b-14: de ston par byed pa'i gzhung ni dpal ldan 'dus pa ste /
T02TD1874E:3b-16: chos phung brgyad khri bzhi stong dag /'dus phyir snod yang dam pa'o //
T02TD1874E:3b-17: rmongs pa'i mun nag sal bas na //
T02TD1874E:3b-18: sgron ma'i mchog ni 'di yin no //
T02TD1874E:3b-19: rta rgod lta bu'i sems 'dul bas //
T02TD1874E:3b-21: rnam shes glang chen yan lta bu //
T02TD1874E:3b-23: rnal 'byor mchog tu nges pa yi //
T02TD1874E:3b-24: dam sdom can gyi tshong 'dus so //
T02TD1874E:3b-25: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen po las //
T02TD1874E:3b-26: sgrol byed gru ni chen po'o //
T02TD1874E:3b-27: mngon mtho nges legs khang bzang gi / steng du phyin byed them skas so //
T02TD1874E:3b-28: rnam rtog las byung nyon mongs kyi //
T02TD1874E:3b-29: grong khyer 'joms shing grol ba yi //
T02TD1874E:4a-2: bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang chen pos //
T02TD1874E:4a-3: nye bar bstan pa'i mdo sde dang //
T02TD1874E:4a-5: kun gyi phyi ma gsungs pa ni //
T02TD1874E:4a-6: don rnams de ru gtan la phab //
T02TD1874E:4a-9: dga' dang rtsod pa med pa dang //
T02TD1874E:4a-10: srung ba dang ni dran pa dang //
T02TD1874E:4a-11: bag yod pa yis brtson bya'o //
T02TD1874E:4a-12: de lta bu'i gzhung de la rtog pa mngon du gtong ba'i nyan pa po rnams khas len pa'i yan lag dang /
T02TD1874E:4a-13: gleng gzhi phun sum tshogs pa'i rnam par bshad pas /
T02TD1874E:4a-14: gang zag gzhan yid brtan du rung bar bya ba ni bsdus pa'i don du bshad pas der zhes bya'o //
T02TD1874E:4a-15: ye shes las sprul pa'i 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa rnams la rgyud kyi don ji ltar bstan pa yang der shes par bya ste /
T02TD1874E:4a-16: de'i phyis 'byung ba'i don rje btsun rnams kyis snod du rung par byas pa'i gang zag la rgyud kyi don ji ltar bsdus te bstan pa de sgrub thabs kyi rim pa 'dir rgyas par bshad par bya'o //
T02TD1874E:4a-17: de la dang po snying rje'i stobs las skyes //
T02TD1874E:4a-18: byang chub sems ldan sbyin pa la sogs brgyan //
T02TD1874E:4a-19: dpal ldan 'dus pa'i 'khor lor cho ga bzhin //
T02TD1874E:4a-20: dbang bskur gnang ba thob pas rim 'di bya //
T02TD1874E:4a-21: gang zhig dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs sogs //
T02TD1874E:4a-22: gang rung gnas su stegs bu grub bzhi pa //
T02TD1874E:4a-23: tsandan mchog sogs byugs nas bde ba'i stan //
T02TD1874E:4a-24: rdo rje skyi la mo krung 'dug bsam gtan bya //
T02TD1874E:4a-25: dang por tho rangs nyi dbus su //
T02TD1874E:4a-26: steng sogs kyis dag mthing ga'i h'um //
T02TD1874E:4a-27: 'od zer gyis mthong yul dmigs te //
T02TD1874E:4a-28: snying rje la sogs bsgom par bya //
T02TD1874E:4a-29: 'od zer gyis gsal sangs rgyas dang //
T02TD1874E:4a-30: bla ma la sogs mdun du dmigs //
T02TD1874E:4a-31: gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa yi //
T02TD1874E:4a-32: mchod pa'i sprin spro phyag kyang 'tshal //
T02TD1874E:4a-33: gang zhig thogs med dus nas srid pa'i chu rgyun la //
T02TD1874E:4a-34: rtog pas rnam par bsgoms pa'i sdig pa ma lus rnams //
T02TD1874E:4a-35: thugs rje cher ldan khyod kyi mdun du yang //
T02TD1874E:4a-36: gsam [*bsam] du dmigs pa gsal te bshags par bgyi //
T02TD1874E:4a-37: sangs rgyas dang ni byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T02TD1874E:4b-0: 'phags pa gzhan @4b rnams kyi yang dge ba gang //
T02TD1874E:4b-1: ma lus bdag gis de dag yi rangs nas //
T02TD1874E:4b-2: bla med yang dag byang chub phyir bsngo'o //
T02TD1874E:4b-3: spros med thugs ni zla ba lta bu ste //
T02TD1874E:4b-4: mtha' yas don du thabs kyi sku chen po //
T02TD1874E:4b-5: rtag tu bdag gi yid dang dbyer med pa //
T02TD1874E:4b-6: bde bar gshegs ba rtag tu skyabs su mchi //
T02TD1874E:4b-7: rtog pa kun las nges par grol ba yi //
T02TD1874E:4b-8: dam pa ma lus kun gyi phun tshogs rten //
T02TD1874E:4b-9: dngos po kun gyi ngo bo gcig pa po //
T02TD1874E:4b-10: chos la bdag ni rtag tu skyabs su mchi //
T02TD1874E:4b-11: bcings pa ma lus rnam par spangs pa yi //
T02TD1874E:4b-12: dpal ldan snying rje mchog gis rab drangs pa ;
T02TD1874E:4b-13: / rab tu dga' la sogs pa rab gnas pa'i //
T02TD1874E:4b-14: 'dul ba'i dbang po'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1874E:4b-15: bsam pa dag pas rnam smin dag pa yis //
T02TD1874E:4b-16: sgrib pa'i bag chags ma lus kun bcom ste //
T02TD1874E:4b-17: mi 'phrog pa yis brgyan pa'i sems kyis kyang //
T02TD1874E:4b-18: byang chub tu sems ni bskyed par bgyi //
T02TD1874E:4b-19: sras dang ldan pa'i bde bar gshegs pa yi //
T02TD1874E:4b-20: thun mong lam ste pha rol phyin pa bcu //
T02TD1874E:4b-21: rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid yid kyis ni //
T02TD1874E:4b-22: da ltar 'dir ni bdag gis bstan par bya //
T02TD1874E:4b-23: sdug bsngal la gnas sems can rnams //
T02TD1874E:4b-24: snying rjes yang ni dmigs byas te //
T02TD1874E:4b-25: byang chub sems ni dpag med pa //
T02TD1874E:4b-26: rin chen bdag gis bsam par bya //
T02TD1874E:4b-27: rang bzhin med phyir stong pa nyid //
T02TD1874E:4b-28: rgyu med pas na mtshan ma med //
T02TD1874E:4b-29: rjes su dpag pa dang bral bas //
T02TD1874E:4b-30: smon med nyid du nges pa'o ;
T02TD1874E:4b-31: / aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sv'a bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD1874E:4b-32: sngags des bdag gzhan dngos po kun //
T02TD1874E:4b-33: gcig byas de nyid gsum mtshan ma //
T02TD1874E:4b-34: dgyes mdzad yas mar sbrengs pa yi //
T02TD1874E:4b-35: mdun gyi mkha' la bsam par bya //
T02TD1874E:4b-36: stong las nyi dkyil h'um nag las //
T02TD1874E:4b-37: rdo rje zer 'phros phyi rol bcad //
T02TD1874E:4b-38: 'og dang phyogs mtshams steng spros pas //
T02TD1874E:4b-39: sa gzhi ra ba bla rer bskyed //
T02TD1874E:4b-40: bhr'um 'khor rtsibs bcu 'od zer drag / pad nyid khro bo 'khor lor bsgom //
T02TD1874E:4b-41: de dbus h'um mdzad rtag pa sogs //
T02TD1874E:5a-3: nam mkha'i dkyil du padma dang //
T02TD1874E:5a-4: sna tshogs rdo rje bsam par bya //
T02TD1874E:5a-5: de dbus zla steng bhr'um las skyes //
T02TD1874E:5a-6: 'khor lo bhr'um mtshan las byung ba //
T02TD1874E:5a-7: rig ma dang bcas snang mdzad las //
T02TD1874E:5a-8: gyur pa'i khang ba brtsegs pa bsgom //
T02TD1874E:5a-9: gru bzhi la sogs yon tan ldan //
T02TD1874E:5a-10: sna tshogs padma bcu dgu'i steng //
T02TD1874E:5a-11: nyi ma'i gdan ni bdun dag dang //
T02TD1874E:5a-12: zla ba'i gdan ni bcu gnyis bskyed //
T02TD1874E:5a-13: de nyid gsum gnas sems pa pas pas //
T02TD1874E:5a-14: bde gshegs rnams kyis de la gzigs ;
T02TD1874E:5a-15: / rang gi khams su shes rab thabs //
T02TD1874E:5a-16: dbyangs yig bde ba'i yi ger 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:5a-17: dbu rtse las byon ye shes sems //
T02TD1874E:5a-18: 'dres gyur rten babs zla gnyis gyur //
T02TD1874E:5a-20: gcig tu gyur pa bsam pa'o //
T02TD1874E:5a-21: de las h'um dkar las byung ba //
T02TD1874E:5a-22: rdo rje rtse lnga me shel gzugs //
T02TD1874E:5a-24: h'um bcas ldan pas nga rgyal bya //
T02TD1874E:5a-26: de las 'phros pa bde gshegs kyis //
T02TD1874E:5a-27: 'gro ba sangs rgyas nyid du byas //
T02TD1874E:5a-28: slar 'dus thugs kyi rdo rje las //
T02TD1874E:5a-29: btsud nas bdag la nga rgyal bya //
T02TD1874E:5a-30: aom ya th'a sarba ta th'a ga ta sta th'a aa ham /
T02TD1874E:5a-31: sa bon gsang gsum rdo rjer gyur //
T02TD1874E:5a-32: gcig gyur rdo rje sems dpa' mchog /'gro kun ro mnyam gcig pa po //
T02TD1874E:5a-33: kun du bzang po bsgom par bya //
T02TD1874E:5a-34: sku dang dbus zhal zla nor 'dra //
T02TD1874E:5a-35: g-yas gnag g-yon ni dmar po la //
T02TD1874E:5a-36: rin chen sna tshogs rgyan ldan pa'i //
T02TD1874E:5a-37: phyag gnyis rang snang shes rab 'khyud //
T02TD1874E:5a-38: g-yas gnyis rdo rje ral gri ste //
T02TD1874E:5a-40: mtshon byed mtshan ma dbu rgyan la //
T02TD1874E:5a-41: mi bskyod pa yis brgyan par bsgom //
T02TD1874E:5a-42: de nas 'dod chags chen po yis //
T02TD1874E:5a-44: sbyor pa'i sgra yis rang lus la //
T02TD1874E:5a-45: rnam snang la sogs gzhug par bya //
T02TD1874E:5a-46: de ni spyan ma la sogs dang //
T02TD1874E:5a-47: gzugs la sogs pa yul gyi bdag / rnam pa dgu ni spro byas nas //
T02TD1874E:5b-0: rang gi shes rab @5b nyid la thim //
T02TD1874E:5b-1: shes rab de yi pad dkyil du //
T02TD1874E:5b-2: bde las sprul pa'i 'khor lo bskyed //
T02TD1874E:5b-3: gzigs gyur 'gro ba ma lus pa //
T02TD1874E:5b-4: snod du rung phyir gzhug par bya //
T02TD1874E:5b-5: rang gi sa bon 'od zer gyis //
T02TD1874E:5b-6: nam mkha' khyab pa'i bde gshegs rnams //
T02TD1874E:5b-7: zla ba lta bur zhu byas pas ;
T02TD1874E:5b-8: / de rnams dag phyir dbang bskur bya //
T02TD1874E:5b-9: de yi stobs kyis de dag rnams //
T02TD1874E:5b-10: bde dang yid bde thob pa dang //
T02TD1874E:5b-11: tha mal phung sogs bshigs pa'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:5b-12: zla ba lta bur zhu ba'o //
T02TD1874E:5b-13: de la mig la sogs pa rnams //
T02TD1874E:5b-14: ksham dzam kham gam skam sam gyur //
T02TD1874E:5b-15: de bzhin gzugs la sogs pa rnams //
T02TD1874E:5b-17: sa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin dag / lam mam pam tam du ni gyur //
T02TD1874E:5b-18: gzugs sogs phung po'i bdag nyid rnams //
T02TD1874E:5b-19: bum a'am dzam kham h'um du gyur //
T02TD1874E:5b-20: de las mtshan ma de yis mtshan //
T02TD1874E:5b-21: de rnams sa snying la sogs par //
T02TD1874E:5b-22: khams kun 'das par byas nas su //
T02TD1874E:5b-23: dris shing rtogs phul mi smra 'dug / de ni padma'i gzhal yas nas //
T02TD1874E:5b-24: phyi rol phyung nas bstod nas ni //
T02TD1874E:5b-25: sna tshogs pa yi gzugs kyis so //
T02TD1874E:5b-26: rang rang khams su 'phros bar bsam //
T02TD1874E:5b-27: de nas par ma'i sems can rnams //
T02TD1874E:5b-28: skar ma lhung zhing zhal zhugs nas //
T02TD1874E:5b-29: rdo rjer phyung nas padmar gnas //
T02TD1874E:5b-30: shes rab chags pas de zhu byed //
T02TD1874E:5b-32: yab yum byang chub sems su zhu //
T02TD1874E:5b-33: de las byung ba'i spyan la sogs //
T02TD1874E:5b-34: glu yis bskul nas thim par byed //
T02TD1874E:5b-35: sems can khams na gnas kyi dbang phyug khyod ni rdo rje'i thugs //
T02TD1874E:5b-36: dga' ba'i yid 'ong don chen 'dod pa bdag la bskab [?] tu gsol //
T02TD1874E:5b-37: mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na //
T02TD1874E:5b-38: sems can yab chen gnyen mchog bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol //
T02TD1874E:5b-39: rdo rje sku khyod bka' yi 'khor los sems can kun la phan //
T02TD1874E:5b-40: sangs rgyas don du byang chub mchog tu rab tu phan par gzigs //
T02TD1874E:5b-41: mgon po gal te bdag ni de ring gson par mchis bzhed na //
T02TD1874E:5b-42: spyod pa dri med kun du bzang pos bdag la dgyes par mdzod //
T02TD1874E:6a-1: ste kun la phan zhing thugs brtse pa //
T02TD1874E:6a-2: 'jig rten dag gi dgos pa'i don mdzad pa la rtag tu brtson //
T02TD1874E:6a-3: mgon po gal te bdag ni de ring gson par mchis bzhed na //
T02TD1874E:6a-4: spyod pa dri med kun du bzang pos bdag la dgyes par mdzod //
T02TD1874E:6a-5: khyod ni rdo rje 'dod pa dam tshig mchog gi phan yon che //
T02TD1874E:6a-6: yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gdung mchog mnyam pa nyid gzigs la //
T02TD1874E:6a-7: mgon po gal te bdag ni de ring gson par mchis bzhed na //
T02TD1874E:6a-8: yon tan rin chen mang po'i gter gyur bdag la dgyes par mdzod //
T02TD1874E:6a-9: klu 'di yis ni don byas nas //
T02TD1874E:6a-10: zhu ba phun sum tshogs bral ba //
T02TD1874E:6a-11: zla nyir gyur te yi ge h'um //
T02TD1874E:6a-12: rdo rje sngon po cung zad gdengs //
T02TD1874E:6a-13: des mtshan bshes gnyen zhu byas pas //
T02TD1874E:6a-14: sku dang zhal dbus mthing ka'i mdog / g-yas dkar g-yon ni dmar po la //
T02TD1874E:6a-15: dam pa dang po'i mtshan mar ldan //
T02TD1874E:6a-16: dam pa ma yin rnam rtog rnams //
T02TD1874E:6a-17: stong pa nyid du bsam byas te //
T02TD1874E:6a-18: mya ngan 'das pa zhen spang phyir //
T02TD1874E:6a-19: chos kyi dbyings su byin gyis brlabs //
T02TD1874E:6a-20: aom dharma dh'a tu sv'a bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD1874E:6a-21: sa snying rdo rje nam mkha' dang //
T02TD1874E:6a-22: dbang phyug sgrib sel kun bzang rnams //
T02TD1874E:6a-23: kshim la sogs pa'i rim pa yis //
T02TD1874E:6a-24: mig la sogs par dgod par bya //
T02TD1874E:6a-25: de bzhin snying mgrin mgo zla la //
T02TD1874E:6a-26: h'um a'a:aom las skyes pa yi //
T02TD1874E:6a-27: lte bar thugs rdo rje sogs bskyed //
T02TD1874E:6a-28: de rnams thugs ka nas byung ba'i //
T02TD1874E:6a-29: gzugs kyi rdo rje sogs 'od kyis //
T02TD1874E:6a-30: ma lus rdo rje bsam mchod nas //
T02TD1874E:6a-31: byin gyis brlab phyir gsol ba btab //
T02TD1874E:6a-32: dpal ldan thugs ni rdo rje 'chang //
T02TD1874E:6a-33: rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas //
T02TD1874E:6a-34: ded bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su //
T02TD1874E:6a-35: rdo rje thugs can mdzad du gsol //
T02TD1874E:6a-36: phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
T02TD1874E:6a-37: rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas //
T02TD1874E:6a-38: deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su //
T02TD1874E:6a-39: rdo rje thugs can mdzad du gsol //
T02TD1874E:6a-40: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta tsitta badzra sv'a bh'a wa badzra a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD1874E:6a-41: chos kyi gsung lam dpal dang ldan //
T02TD1874E:6b-0: rdo rje @6b mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas //
T02TD1874E:6b-1: deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su //
T02TD1874E:6b-2: rdo rje gsung dang 'dra bar mdzod //
T02TD1874E:6b-3: phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
T02TD1874E:6b-4: rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas //
T02TD1874E:6b-5: deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su //
T02TD1874E:6b-6: rdo rje gsung can mdzad du gsol ;
T02TD1874E:6b-7: / aom sarba ta th'a ga ta w'a ka badzra sv'a bh'a wa a'atma ko nyaham /
T02TD1874E:6b-8: dpal ldan sangs rgyas sku 'chang ba //
T02TD1874E:6b-9: rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas //
T02TD1874E:6b-10: deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su //
T02TD1874E:6b-11: rdo rje sku dang ldan par mdzod //
T02TD1874E:6b-12: phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
T02TD1874E:6b-13: rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas //
T02TD1874E:6b-14: deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su //
T02TD1874E:6b-15: rdo rje sku can mdzad du gsol //
T02TD1874E:6b-16: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya badzra sv'a bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD1874E:6b-17: ye shes sems dpa'i sa bon gyi //
T02TD1874E:6b-18: 'od kyis phyogs bcu'i mgon po bskul //
T02TD1874E:6b-19: de yi 'od zer las byung ba'i //
T02TD1874E:6b-20: spyan la sogs pa mchog rnams kyi //
T02TD1874E:6b-21: bdud rtsi lnga yis chus gang ba'i //
T02TD1874E:6b-22: dum pas dbang bskur bkra shis sgra //
T02TD1874E:6b-23: rda drung dril sogs rol mo'i sgra //
T02TD1874E:6b-24: dbu rgyan rdo rje 'chang ldan bya //
T02TD1874E:6b-25: de bzhin zla ba gnyis la sogs //
T02TD1874E:6b-26: 'gro ba'i dbang bskur ma gtogs pa //
T02TD1874E:6b-27: thams cad sngon bzhin bshes gnyen dang //
T02TD1874E:6b-28: gzugs kyi khyad par shes byas nas //
T02TD1874E:6b-29: byin gyis brlab cing mig la sogs //
T02TD1874E:6b-30: sa snying sogs bkod rdo rje gsum //
T02TD1874E:6b-31: gnas gsum mtshan las dbu rgyan la //
T02TD1874E:6b-33: mgo snying lte ba gsang rkang par //
T02TD1874E:6b-34: aom h'um sv'a aa h'a rnams sam //
T02TD1874E:6b-35: cha shas ngo bo nyid kyis ni //
T02TD1874E:6b-36: sangs rgyas lnga yis dgang bar bya //
T02TD1874E:6b-37: h'um las rdo rje chu skyes ni //
T02TD1874E:6b-38: rtse lnga 'dab brgyad bsam par bya //
T02TD1874E:6b-39: aom las nor bu ge sar bskyed //
T02TD1874E:6b-40: phat kyis gnyis kyi lam 'gogs pa'o //
T02TD1874E:6b-41: mtshan nyid lnga dang ldan bsams nas //
T02TD1874E:6b-42: bde mchog myong bar bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:6b-43: rang gi shes rab la zhugs nas //
T02TD1874E:6b-44: dbang po gnyis sbyar rjes chags byas //
T02TD1874E:6b-45: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nu r'a ga badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD1874E:6b-46: sbyor ba dang po'i ting 'dzin no //
T02TD1874E:7a-2: / sangs rgyas 'khor lo mkha' khyab pa //
T02TD1874E:7a-3: zhal zhugs zhu gyur rdo rjer phyung //
T02TD1874E:7a-4: bad gnas zla ba lta bu'i gzugs //
T02TD1874E:7a-5: de las sa bon h'um bcu dgu //
T02TD1874E:7a-6: mi bskyod pa yi 'khor lo mchog / gsal bar bsams nas 'gro ba kun //
T02TD1874E:7a-7: phan phyir rim gyis dbyung bar bya //
T02TD1874E:7a-8: badzra dhrik gis rab bskul la //
T02TD1874E:7a-9: gong ma lta bu'i mi bskyod pa //
T02TD1874E:7a-10: sangs rgyas mdzad pa byas nas su //
T02TD1874E:7a-11: 'dus nas bdag la zhugs par bsam //
T02TD1874E:7a-12: dzi ni dzik gis rnam snang dbyung //
T02TD1874E:7a-13: dkar nag dmar po phyag drug pa //
T02TD1874E:7a-14: 'khor lo ral gri rin chen pad //
T02TD1874E:7a-15: 'dus nas shar gyi zla bar bsam //
T02TD1874E:7a-16: ratna dhrik gis rin chen dbyung //
T02TD1874E:7a-17: ser nag dkar po phyag drug pa //
T02TD1874E:7a-18: rin chen ral gri 'khor lo pad //
T02TD1874E:7a-19: 'dus nas lho yi nyi mar bsam //
T02TD1874E:7a-20: a'a ro lik gis 'od dpag med //
T02TD1874E:7a-21: dmar nag dkar po phyag drug pa //
T02TD1874E:7a-23: slar 'dus nub kyi nyi mar bsam //
T02TD1874E:7a-24: pradzny'a dhrik gis don yod grub //
T02TD1874E:7a-25: ljang nag dkar po phyag drug pa //
T02TD1874E:7a-26: ral gri 'khor lo rin chen pad //
T02TD1874E:7a-27: 'dus nas byang gi nyi mar bsam //
T02TD1874E:7a-28: dang po rang gi rig ma 'khyud //
T02TD1874E:7a-29: rgyan kun brgyan pa'i na bza' dang //
T02TD1874E:7a-30: rin chen sna tshogs dbu rgyan can //
T02TD1874E:7a-32: mo har tis spyan ma dbyung //
T02TD1874E:7a-33: sku yi rdo rje dang 'dra ba //
T02TD1874E:7a-34: 'khor lo ral gri rin chen pad //
T02TD1874E:7a-35: slar 'dus shar lhor zla bar bsam //
T02TD1874E:7a-36: dve sha ra tis m'a ma k'i //
T02TD1874E:7a-37: thugs kyi rdo rje dang 'dra ba //
T02TD1874E:7a-38: autpala ral gri rin chen pad //
T02TD1874E:7a-39: 'dus nas lho nub zla bar bsam //
T02TD1874E:7a-40: r'a ga ra tis gos dkar mo //
T02TD1874E:7a-41: gsung gi rdo rje dang 'dra ba //
T02TD1874E:7a-43: 'dus nas nub byang zla bar bsam //
T02TD1874E:7a-45: rin chen dbang phyug dang 'dra ba //
T02TD1874E:7a-47: slar 'dus byang shar zla bar bsam //
T02TD1874E:7a-48: aom a'a:h'um gis lha mo drug / go rims bzhin du dbyung bar bya //
T02TD1874E:7a-49: gzugs kyi rdo rje rnam snang 'dra //
T02TD1874E:7a-50: me long ral gri rin chen pad //
T02TD1874E:7a-51: sgra yi rdo rje mi bskyod 'dra //
T02TD1874E:7b-0: @7b pi wam ral gri rin chen pad //
T02TD1874E:7b-1: dri yi rdo rje rin chen 'dra //
T02TD1874E:7b-2: dung dang ral gri rin chen pad //
T02TD1874E:7b-3: ro yi rdo rje mtha' yas 'dra //
T02TD1874E:7b-4: snod dang ral gri rin chen 'khor //
T02TD1874E:7b-5: reg gi rdo rje don yod 'dra //
T02TD1874E:7b-6: gos dang rin chen 'khor lo pad //
T02TD1874E:7b-7: chos dbyings rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra //
T02TD1874E:7b-8: chos 'byung ral gri rin chen pad //
T02TD1874E:7b-9: me mtshams la sogs grva bzhi dang //
T02TD1874E:7b-10: shar sgo g-yas g-yon zla steng bsam //
T02TD1874E:7b-11: ya m'anta krita gshin rje'i gshed //
T02TD1874E:7b-12: mi bskyod lta bu phyag drug pa //
T02TD1874E:7b-13: tho ba ral gri rin chen pad //
T02TD1874E:7b-14: shar sgor khro dkyil nyi dbus dgod //
T02TD1874E:7b-16: snang mdzad lta bu phyag drug pa //
T02TD1874E:7b-17: dbyug pa ral gri rin chen pad //
T02TD1874E:7b-20: mtha' yas lta bu phyag drug pa //
T02TD1874E:7b-22: nub sgror nyi dkyil 'khor dkyil bsam //
T02TD1874E:7b-24: mi bskyod lta bu phyag drug pa //
T02TD1874E:7b-25: rdo rje ral gri rin chen pad //
T02TD1874E:7b-26: byang sgor nyi dbus khro dkyil bsam //
T02TD1874E:7b-27: de rnams rgod dang gdang su ba dang //
T02TD1874E:7b-28: mche ba gtsigs dang bzhad byed pa //
T02TD1874E:7b-29: dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brjes //
T02TD1874E:7b-30: stag lpags smad g-yogs dang ldan pa ;
T02TD1874E:7b-31: / gtum pa'i sbrul gyis brgyan pa yi //
T02TD1874E:7b-32: dang pos rig ma 'khyud pa dang //
T02TD1874E:7b-34: gtum po rab tu bsam pa'o //
T02TD1874E:7b-35: de ltar dngos po thams cad kyis //
T02TD1874E:7b-36: rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mthong nas su //
T02TD1874E:7b-37: sa bon 'od zer lcags kyu yis //
T02TD1874E:7b-38: gshin rje gshed bskul 'khor lo dgug / de dang lhan cig 'ongs pa'i bgegs //
T02TD1874E:7b-39: bskrad nas bsrung byas khro bo thim //
T02TD1874E:7b-40: bde bas rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor ni //
T02TD1874E:7b-41: mdun du dmigs la mchod par bya //
T02TD1874E:7b-42: dung gi chu yis bsang gtor dang //
T02TD1874E:7b-43: kun das kha bkang chus nye reg / ma chod yon snod kyis mchod yon dang //
T02TD1874E:7b-44: mtha' sogs dbye bas zhabs bsil lo //
T02TD1874E:7b-45: de bzhin khro bo gzhan bskul bas //
T02TD1874E:7b-46: 'od zer gyis ni gzhug pa dang //
T02TD1874E:7b-47: bcing dang rjes su dgyes bskyed nga //
T02TD1874E:7b-48: chos kyi dbyings su byin gyis brlab //
T02TD1874E:7b-49: mos bas mig la sogs pa rnams //
T02TD1874E:8a-0: @8a * // rdo rje gsum ni gnas gsum bkod //
T02TD1874E:8a-1: snga ma bzhin du dbang bskur bas //
T02TD1874E:8a-2: rigs kyi dbang bskur gzhag pa'o //
T02TD1874E:8a-3: sangs rgyas bzhi po mi bskyod pa //
T02TD1874E:8a-4: lha mo rang rang bdag pos brgyan //
T02TD1874E:8a-5: rnam snang mi bskyod snang mtha' yas //
T02TD1874E:8a-6: mi bskyod sgo srung mtshan ma'o //
T02TD1874E:8a-7: sa bon 'od kyis lha mo bkug / zhal zhugs zhu gyur rdo rjer phyung //
T02TD1874E:8a-8: pad nang lam mam bam tam dang //
T02TD1874E:8a-10: de yi 'od kyis bcu po dgug / rang rang sa bon la zhugs pas //
T02TD1874E:8a-11: nus dang ldan par rab byas nas //
T02TD1874E:8a-12: shes rab ba spu'i bu gar spro //
T02TD1874E:8a-13: 'od rtse gzugs rdo rje sogs ni //
T02TD1874E:8a-14: rang rang mtshan mas rnam mdzes pa'i //
T02TD1874E:8a-15: dri med rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i sku //
T02TD1874E:8a-16: sgyu ma lta bur spro bar bya //
T02TD1874E:8a-17: de bzhin phyi yi gdugs la sogs //
T02TD1874E:8a-18: 'od rtse las spro nam mkha'i khams //
T02TD1874E:8a-19: bkang ste bdag dang 'khor lo la //
T02TD1874E:8a-20: mchod par byas te mchod pa dang //
T02TD1874E:8a-21: mchod pa po dang mchod gnas gsum //
T02TD1874E:8a-22: rmi lam lta bur shes bya'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:8a-23: tha dad las ni grol byas nas //
T02TD1874E:8a-24: sngags kyis byin gyis brlab par bya //
T02TD1874E:8a-25: aom sarba ga ta th'a ga ta p'u dza badzra sv'a bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD1874E:8a-26: de nas brag ca'i sgra lta bur //
T02TD1874E:8a-27: sgra yul thams cad rab bsams nas //
T02TD1874E:8a-28: rdo rje dril bu bde dbyangs kyis //
T02TD1874E:8a-29: rang nyid lha yis bstod par bsgom //
T02TD1874E:8a-30: mi bskyod rdo rje ye shes che //
T02TD1874E:8a-31: rdo rje dbyings ni mkha' chen po //
T02TD1874E:8a-32: rdo rje gsum mchog dkyil 'khor gsum //
T02TD1874E:8a-33: gsang ba'i dbyings la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD1874E:8a-34: rnam par snang mdzad dga' chen po //
T02TD1874E:8a-35: rdo rje zhi ba dga' ba che //
T02TD1874E:8a-36: rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal mchog / ston pa rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD1874E:8a-37: rin chen rgyal po rab tu zab //
T02TD1874E:8a-38: rdo rje nam mkha' dri ma med //
T02TD1874E:8a-39: dngos nyid dag pas gos pa med //
T02TD1874E:8a-40: rdo rje sku la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD1874E:8a-41: rdo rje dpag med rgyal po che //
T02TD1874E:8a-42: mi rtogs nam mkha' rdo rje 'dzin //
T02TD1874E:8a-43: 'dod chags pha rol phyin pa brnyes //
T02TD1874E:8a-44: rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD1874E:8a-45: dag pa rdo rje gdon mi za //
T02TD1874E:8a-46: bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs pa //
T02TD1874E:8a-47: rang bzhin dag pa nyid las byung //
T02TD1874E:8a-48: rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD1874E:8b-0: rlung dang @8b me yi dkyil 'khor nas //
T02TD1874E:8b-1: padma bhandha ra bdud rtsi lnga //
T02TD1874E:8b-2: zla ba nyi mar yi ge lnga //
T02TD1874E:8b-4: rtag sogs bkug nas sa bon dgug / bzhu zhing bskol bas rlangs nas h'um //
T02TD1874E:8b-5: de byung rdo rje zhu byas nas //
T02TD1874E:8b-6: phreng ba'i rgyun du dbab par bya //
T02TD1874E:8b-7: aom gyis bsil bar byas nas su //
T02TD1874E:8b-8: lha rnams phyag tu spros byas la //
T02TD1874E:8b-9: lce h'um las byung rdo rje bkod //
T02TD1874E:8b-10: snying zla'i 'khor lo tshim par bya //
T02TD1874E:8b-11: dkyil 'khor rgyal ba mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02TD1874E:8b-12: ye shes sems dpa'i thugs 'od kyis //
T02TD1874E:8b-13: thub pa'i dbang pos kun rtog spangs //
T02TD1874E:8b-14: 'gro kun sangs rgyas nyid byas nas //
T02TD1874E:8b-15: sa bon la ni thim par bya //
T02TD1874E:8b-16: thugs ka'i mtshan ma nang gnas pa //
T02TD1874E:8b-17: nyi ma'i dbus kyi yi ge h'um //
T02TD1874E:8b-18: 'od zer rnam pa lnga ldan pa'i //
T02TD1874E:8b-19: tsa na'i 'bru tsam thig ler bsam //
T02TD1874E:8b-20: de yi 'od kyis gnas la sogs //
T02TD1874E:8b-21: rdo rje mchog gsum gsal byas nas //
T02TD1874E:8b-22: bzhag ste thig le lta bu ru //
T02TD1874E:8b-23: rang gi sems nyid zhugs par bya //
T02TD1874E:8b-24: de ma thag tu ting 'dzin gsum //
T02TD1874E:8b-25: grub pa rab tu bsam byas nas //
T02TD1874E:8b-26: de yi gsum pa las spro zhing //
T02TD1874E:8b-27: thig le yan chad gsal bar bya //
T02TD1874E:8b-28: gzhan pa pa spu las spro zhing //
T02TD1874E:8b-29: dkyil 'khor rten la sogs pa nas //
T02TD1874E:8b-30: khams kun bkang nas mtha' la bsdu //
T02TD1874E:8b-31: de rim yang ni spro ba sdu bya //
T02TD1874E:8b-32: yang ni sa bon 'od kyis ni //
T02TD1874E:8b-33: bde gshegs dgug gzhug zhu gyur nas //
T02TD1874E:8b-34: rdo rje'i lam nas phyung nas su //
T02TD1874E:8b-35: ze'u 'bru bum pa'i nang du dbab //
T02TD1874E:8b-36: de las rdo rje mthing ka che //
T02TD1874E:8b-37: nas tshad lte bar rin po che //
T02TD1874E:8b-38: yungs kar tshad tsam dbus su yang //
T02TD1874E:8b-39: rten bcas ting 'dzin gsum po bsgom //
T02TD1874E:8b-40: rdo rje rtse lnga lcags kyu yis //
T02TD1874E:8b-41: phyung ste sna rtser gnas par bya //
T02TD1874E:8b-42: rdo rje nang nas thur sel rlung //
T02TD1874E:8b-43: phyung ste gnas bya rnam pa gzhan //
T02TD1874E:8b-45: spro bsdu gong ma bzhin du bya //
T02TD1874E:8b-46: de la bzung pas stobs ldan na //
T02TD1874E:8b-47: brtan pa'i mtshan ma skye bar 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:8b-48: de skyes sprul pa 'phro ba ni //
T02TD1874E:8b-49: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T02TD1874E:9a-0: rnam pa sna tshogs phyag mtshan @9a * //
T02TD1874E:9a-2: / yang nas yang du spro bsdu bya //
T02TD1874E:9a-3: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dang //
T02TD1874E:9a-4: ye shes sems dpa'i sa bon las //
T02TD1874E:9a-5: gsang sngags bzlas brjod spro byed pa //
T02TD1874E:9a-6: rim pa'am ni cig car bya //
T02TD1874E:9a-7: aom sogs re re brjod skad cig / sku rdo rje la sogs 'khor lo ;
T02TD1874E:9a-8: / spros pas nam mkha'i khams bkang nas //
T02TD1874E:9a-9: yan lag bcu gnyis gsum ldan mos //
T02TD1874E:9a-10: aom sogs re re brjod skad cig / ma bskul gnyis dang gong ma ltar //
T02TD1874E:9a-11: dang pos phyung ste nam mkha' la //
T02TD1874E:9a-12: bkod nas gnyis pa gong ma ltar //
T02TD1874E:9a-13: mchod pa'i lha mo spro byas nas //
T02TD1874E:9a-14: 'khyud pa'i bde bas thub dbang rnams //
T02TD1874E:9a-15: bde chen dbang du gyur byas la //
T02TD1874E:9a-16: gsum pas nang du thim par bya //
T02TD1874E:9a-17: rdo rje dang ni gsal ba dang //
T02TD1874E:9a-18: lam byung chos kyi 'khor lo las //
T02TD1874E:9a-19: steng du g-yas g-yon gnyi ga las //
T02TD1874E:9a-20: drag dang dal bar shes par bya //
T02TD1874E:9a-22: gnas pa a'a: ste de nyid bzung //
T02TD1874E:9a-23: ye shes sa bon ngo bo ste //
T02TD1874E:9a-24: gzhi rnams gcig tu brtsi bar bya //
T02TD1874E:9a-25: nyis brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga las //
T02TD1874E:9a-26: bzhi bsdus brgya phrag dgu nyid do //
T02TD1874E:9a-27: de ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi rim //
T02TD1874E:9a-28: nyi khri chig stong dur brgya'o //
T02TD1874E:9a-29: phra myur rnams kyis ngal ba bsal //
T02TD1874E:9a-30: spyan sogs glu yis bskul byas nas //
T02TD1874E:9a-31: sngon bzhin 'khor lo mchod bya ste //
T02TD1874E:9a-32: sems kyi gzengs ni bstod bya ste //
T02TD1874E:9a-33: nyam chung spyi bor mtho gang tshang //
T02TD1874E:9a-34: zla steng aom gyi brlan pa yi //
T02TD1874E:9a-35: bdud rtsi cho ga bzhin phab pas //
T02TD1874E:9a-36: rdo rje gsum sogs tshim par bya //
T02TD1874E:9a-37: bam las byung ba'i bum pa bzang //
T02TD1874E:9a-38: zla gam phyed kyis kha bcad pa //
T02TD1874E:9a-39: thigs pa yid bzhin rin po ches //
T02TD1874E:9a-40: brgyan pa rkan gyi dbus su bsgom //
T02TD1874E:9a-42: aom ni lce yi rtse la bsam //
T02TD1874E:9a-43: de gzer rim pas dbab byas pas //
T02TD1874E:9a-44: nus dang ldan pas bkres skom gzhom //
T02TD1874E:9a-45: bkres skom la sogs nyon mongs la //
T02TD1874E:9a-46: rnal 'byor de ni kun brtsams nas //
T02TD1874E:9a-47: rdo rje thugs kyi bka' bzhin du //
T02TD1874E:9a-49: cung zad ngal sogs yul gzhan 'gro //
T02TD1874E:9a-50: gong mi'i cho gas brtan bya'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:9a-51: rdo rje gsum sngags ma zhen par //
T02TD1874E:9b-0: gsang sngags bzlas @9b brjod yang bya'o //
T02TD1874E:9b-1: ldang bar 'dod na sngags pa yis //
T02TD1874E:9b-2: mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang byas la //
T02TD1874E:9b-3: aom a'a:h'um nyid brjod byas la //
T02TD1874E:9b-4: de nyid gsum la 'khor lo bsdu //
T02TD1874E:9b-5: las kyi rgyal ba mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02TD1874E:9b-6: dpal ldan gsang ba 'dus pa yi //
T02TD1874E:9b-7: rig pa'i lta ba ma thob pa'i //
T02TD1874E:9b-8: sems can thugs rjes gzung ba'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:9b-9: smon lam 'di ni sngon du bya //
T02TD1874E:9b-10: dpal dang ldan pa'i mi bskyod mgon //
T02TD1874E:9b-11: rnal 'byor gyis thob dge ba gang //
T02TD1874E:9b-12: bde chen ye shes rang byung nas //
T02TD1874E:9b-13: sems can kun mkhyen sar 'god shog / gang zhig 'di mthong 'dod pa'am //
T02TD1874E:9b-14: gang zhig zhu bar 'dod pa des //
T02TD1874E:9b-15: thugs kyi dbang phyug grangs med pa //
T02TD1874E:9b-16: mgon po de ni mthong bar shog / nam mkha' mtha' klas phyogs bcu ru //
T02TD1874E:9b-17: sems can kun gyi don spyod la //
T02TD1874E:9b-18: ji ltar thugs kyi dbang phyug bzhin //
T02TD1874E:9b-19: bdag gis kyang ni spyod par shog / ji srid thog ma med pa nas //
T02TD1874E:9b-20: 'khor ba yi ni mthar thug par //
T02TD1874E:9b-21: de srid sems can phan pa nyid //
T02TD1874E:9b-22: sangs rgyas spyod pa bdag spyod shog / ji srid sangs rgyas sna tshogs rnams //
T02TD1874E:9b-24: de yi bstan pa'i don du ni //
T02TD1874E:9b-25: bskal pa'i bskal par byed par shog / rdo rje 'chang sogs gzugs kyis ni //
T02TD1874E:9b-26: bdag gis phyogs bcur sprul gyur cig / sngags kyi tshul gyis sems can rnams //
T02TD1874E:9b-27: de tshe bdag gis 'dul gyur cig / ting 'dzin las ni langs nas ni //
T02TD1874E:9b-28: lha yi nga rgyal dang ldan pas //
T02TD1874E:9b-29: spyod yul sems tsam shes byas la //
T02TD1874E:9b-30: rang gi lha yi gzugs su dmigs //
T02TD1874E:9b-31: yang na spyod yul de dag nyid //
T02TD1874E:9b-32: rang rang dag bas gnas pa'o //
T02TD1874E:9b-33: so so rang rig chos nyid pas //
T02TD1874E:9b-34: rnam snang mdzad la sogs par snang //
T02TD1874E:9b-35: yang na rdo rje 'dzin pa ste //
T02TD1874E:9b-36: rang yid dga' bar byed pa'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:9b-37: dbugs rtog spangs nas rab bsgoms nas //
T02TD1874E:9b-38: gsang ba chen po mchod pa'o //
T02TD1874E:9b-39: rang gi kha zas za dus su //
T02TD1874E:9b-40: snying khar 'khor lo rab bsgoms la //
T02TD1874E:9b-41: bdud rtsi sha yi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1874E:9b-42: gong ma lta bur sbyang byas te //
T02TD1874E:10a-1: po zhes bya ba ni byang chub chen po'i mtshan nyid dam par dngos po dang dngos po med pa rnam par spangs pa'i sems tsam ni 'dir gti mug ste /
T02TD1874E:10a-2: chos thams cad grub pa med pa'i ngo bor gyur pa'o //
T02TD1874E:10a-4: dngos po thams cad dang bral ba //
T02TD1874E:10a-5: phung po khams dang skye ched dang //
T02TD1874E:10a-6: gzung dang 'dzin pa rnams par spang //
T02TD1874E:10a-7: chos bdag med pa mnyan nyid pas //
T02TD1874E:10a-8: rang sems gzod nas ma skyes pa //
T02TD1874E:10a-9: stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no //
T02TD1874E:10a-11: de'i rig ni gti mug chen po'i rigs te /
T02TD1874E:10a-12: rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs dang rigs de las skyes pa rnams so //
T02TD1874E:10a-13: de'i mchog gi snying po'i snying po ni rigs kyi bdag po'i snying po'o //
T02TD1874E:10a-14: de bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi spyan sngar zhugs so zhes bya bar sbyar te /
T02TD1874E:10a-15: rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po dang gcig tu gyur pa ste /
T02TD1874E:10a-16: sku thams cad ni dkar po //
T02TD1874E:10a-19: g-yon pa ni dmar po ste /
T02TD1874E:10a-20: phyag g-yas pa na 'khor lo bsnams pa'o //
T02TD1874E:10a-21: spyan sngar zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa'i shar phyogs kyi cha la bzhugs par gyur pa ste /
T02TD1874E:10a-22: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na rdo rje'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD1874E:10a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ste /
T02TD1874E:10a-24: de 'byung bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che 'byung ba'i rdo rje dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs pa'o //
T02TD1874E:10a-25: yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rigs zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral ba'i mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi sngon gyi 'phen pa'i shugs kyis sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang chos dang mthun pa'i phyir yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i sgrar brjod do //
T02TD1874E:10a-27: dngos po 'di dag ma skyes pas //
T02TD1874E:10a-28: chos dang chos nyid spangs pa ste //
T02TD1874E:10a-29: nam mkha' lta bur dag med pa //
T02TD1874E:10b-0: de'i rig pa ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi sku dang @10b gsung dang thugs dang de'i rigs las skyes pa rnams so //
T02TD1874E:10b-1: rin chen dpal gyi phyag rgya chen po ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi phyag rgya chen po ste /
T02TD1874E:10b-2: de dang gcig tu gyur pa nyid ni yang dag par sbyor ba'o //
T02TD1874E:10b-3: de nyid ni nam mkha'i gnas te nam mkha' la gnas pas na nam mkha'i gnas zhes bya ste /
T02TD1874E:10b-4: nam mkha' ltar gos pa med pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes la nam mkha'i gnas zhes zer te /
T02TD1874E:10b-5: gang rin chen 'byung ldan gyi sbyor ba la gnas pas mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes thob par 'gyur bas na de ni nam mkha'i gnas zhes bya'o //
T02TD1874E:10b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku thams cad dang zhal dang po ni ser po'o //
T02TD1874E:10b-7: zhal g-yas pa ni nag po'o //
T02TD1874E:10b-8: g-yon pa ni dkar po ste /
T02TD1874E:10b-9: phyag g-yas pa na rin po che bsnams te /
T02TD1874E:10b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yas phyogs su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs so //
T02TD1874E:10b-11: yang bcom ldan 'das ji skad gsungs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas snying po phyung ngo zhes bya bar sbyar te /
T02TD1874E:10b-12: bsam pa dang bsam par bya ba gnyis su med pa so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags chen po ste /
T02TD1874E:10b-13: bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid do //
T02TD1874E:10b-14: de 'byung bar byed pa ni rdo rje ltar mi phyed pa ste //
T02TD1874E:10b-15: de skad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de la snyoms par zhugs so //
T02TD1874E:10b-16: dmigs pa med pa'i thugs rdo rje chen po ni rdo rje 'dod chags so //
T02TD1874E:10b-17: de'i rings ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD1874E:10b-18: 'jig rten dbang phyug gi rig pa'i bdag po phyag rgya chen po ni 'od dpag med kyi phyag rgya chen po ste //
T02TD1874E:10b-19: su thams cad dang zhal dang po ni dam po //
T02TD1874E:10b-20: zhag g-yas pa ni nag po'o //
T02TD1874E:10b-21: g-yon pa ni dkar po ste //
T02TD1874E:10b-22: bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag g-yas pa na padma bsnams pa'o //
T02TD1874E:10b-23: de nas bcom ldan 'das snga ma bzhin du thams cad mdzad nas thugs las phyung ngo zhes bya bar sbyar te /
T02TD1874E:10b-24: sems dang sems las byung ba gnyis su med pa'i bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad do //
T02TD1874E:11a-2: de yan chad ni sngon du bsnyen pa bya ba'i cho ga rgyas par bshad zin to /
T02TD1874E:11a-4: // / da ni slob ma rnams la dbang bskur ba'i cho ga bshad par bya'o //
T02TD1874E:11a-5: de la gang gis dbang bskur zhe na /
T02TD1874E:11a-6: dang por zhugs dang dang po pa //
T02TD1874E:11a-7: thams cad kun gyi slob dpon no //
T02TD1874E:11a-8: cung zad ye shes dbang gyur pa //
T02TD1874E:11a-9: nus dang ldan pa'i slob dpon no //
T02TD1874E:11a-10: ye shes dbang du gyur pa ni //
T02TD1874E:11a-11: sbyor ba rnyed pa'i slob dpon no //
T02TD1874E:11a-12: de rnams ci rigs mnyes byas nas //
T02TD1874E:11a-14: gang dag gi don du zhe na //
T02TD1874E:11a-15: dad ldan gtong phod brtson 'grus ldan //
T02TD1874E:11a-16: snod rung srog la mi lta ba //
T02TD1874E:11a-18: gnyis sam gsum gyi bar du zhus //
T02TD1874E:11a-19: sku gzugs bris dang lder so dang //
T02TD1874E:11a-20: glegs bam rdo rje la sogs dang //
T02TD1874E:11a-21: mchod rten la sogs gnas pa'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:11a-22: gnyis sam gsum gyi bar du zhus //
T02TD1874E:11a-23: gang dag sdig pa'i las dbang gis //
T02TD1874E:11a-24: mngon du'am rmi lam dag tu ni //
T02TD1874E:11a-25: lha 'khrug pa yis mtshan ma mthong //
T02TD1874E:11a-26: gnyis sam gsum gyi bar du zhus //
T02TD1874E:11a-27: mos dang brtan la dad pa can //
T02TD1874E:11a-28: gzhan la phan dga' mthong nas ni //
T02TD1874E:11a-29: ma zhus kyang ni de bos la //
T02TD1874E:11a-32: bum pa'i dbang gis rab sbyor bas //
T02TD1874E:11a-33: sa brgyad pa ru yang dag gnas //
T02TD1874E:11a-34: gang dag gsang ba'i dbang gis ni //
T02TD1874E:11a-35: dgu pa dang ni bcu par byed //
T02TD1874E:11a-36: shes rab ye shes dbang gis ni //
T02TD1874E:11a-37: rdo rje lta bur rab gnas pa'i //
T02TD1874E:11a-39: dang po bzhi par shes par bya //
T02TD1874E:11a-40: rab gnas ma byas gzugs brnyan la //
T02TD1874E:11a-41: thal bar brlag kyang 'bras bu med //
T02TD1874E:11a-42: sngags dang bral ba'i spyi sreg bzhin //
T02TD1874E:11a-43: lus nyon mongs pa kho nar zad //
T02TD1874E:11a-44: de bas ji srid gnas pa'i par //
T02TD1874E:11a-45: mchod pa'i rten du rung bya dang //
T02TD1874E:11a-46: 'khor los sgyur ba bzhin te dag / byin gyis brlab phyir brtsam pa'o //
T02TD1874E:11a-47: sngon bsags sdig pa dpag med rnams //
T02TD1874E:11a-48: skad cig gis ni zad byed pa //
T02TD1874E:11a-49: dkyil 'khor zhugs dang dbang bskur ba //
T02TD1874E:11b-0: de yis rab tu byed pa @11b nas ;
T02TD1874E:11b-1: / ye shes kyis kyang 'debs pa yi //
T02TD1874E:11b-2: cho ga zab mos sdig pa zad //
T02TD1874E:11b-4: gong gi yon tan ldan par mdzad //
T02TD1874E:11b-6: bdag nyid chen po de la gong du smos pas zhu ba gsol ba dang /
T02TD1874E:11b-7: khyod kyis spro bya rnams tshogs sam dri bar bya'o //
T02TD1874E:11b-8: des kyang kha cig ni tshogs /
T02TD1874E:11b-9: kha cig ni ma tshogs zhes gsol nas /
T02TD1874E:11b-12: lha yi 'khor lo bsgom byas la //
T02TD1874E:11b-13: tshogs 'phel bgegs ni zhi ba'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:11b-14: sngags kyi bzlas brjod byas pa yin //
T02TD1874E:11b-15: de nyid gsum par yi ge gzhug / yang na dbyung ba bar du gzhug / sgrub pa de'am phreng sngags sam //
T02TD1874E:11b-16: rig pa dang bcas bzla bar bya //
T02TD1874E:11b-17: du ma rab tu bzla ba'am //
T02TD1874E:11b-19: gzhan dag khri phrag bzla byas te //
T02TD1874E:11b-20: bsam ma dngos su bka' thob bri //
T02TD1874E:11b-21: gsum pa bsrungs nas 'dzab bya ba //
T02TD1874E:11b-22: cho ga bzhin te rang gis sam //
T02TD1874E:11b-23: sbyor ba dag gis dag byas nas //
T02TD1874E:11b-24: ri mo'i dkyil 'khor bri ba brtsam //
T02TD1874E:11b-25: lha khang grang nga ma skyed tshal gyi //
T02TD1874E:11b-26: byang shar mtshams ni ji lta bar //
T02TD1874E:11b-27: shar dang byang du dma' ba yi //
T02TD1874E:11b-28: mkhas pas sa ni btsal bar bya //
T02TD1874E:11b-29: der ni bcags sa brkos te //
T02TD1874E:11b-31: chus bkang mi g-yo g-yas su 'khyil //
T02TD1874E:11b-32: ma rung 'khyil ba'i phur bus gzhom //
T02TD1874E:11b-33: der ni sa bdag phyogs skyong ba //
T02TD1874E:11b-34: phyogs su bskyed nas sngon bzhin du //
T02TD1874E:11b-35: gtor ma byin brlabs dbul byas nas //
T02TD1874E:11b-36: sa gsol byas nas gshegs su gsol //
T02TD1874E:11b-37: ting 'dzin rim pa gsum pos ni //
T02TD1874E:11b-38: dkyil 'khor la sogs sta gon nas //
T02TD1874E:11b-39: mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang ba dang //
T02TD1874E:11b-40: gtor ma yon dang phyi mchod 'bul //
T02TD1874E:11b-41: spyin sreg gis ni tshim byas nas //
T02TD1874E:11b-42: gsol ba btab ste nam mkha' la //
T02TD1874E:11b-43: khung bu brko ba'i ched du yang //
T02TD1874E:11b-44: byin gyis brlab phyir dgod par bya //
T02TD1874E:11b-45: las kyi rdo rje slob ma yis //
T02TD1874E:11b-46: lto 'phye brtags nas 'jor gyis klog / mgrin pa lte ba pus mo tsam //
T02TD1874E:12a-2: tho pas bong ba dag dkrugs nas //
T02TD1874E:12a-3: zhib mor btags nas btsams nas su //
T02TD1874E:12a-4: shis pa'i phyir dang dge ba'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:12a-5: rin chen 'brus sman nang du gzhug / de sting sa gtsang gzhan las kyang //
T02TD1874E:12a-6: stegs bu khru gang dpangs brtsigs nas //
T02TD1874E:12a-7: dam tshig lnga yis rab byugs te //
T02TD1874E:12a-8: steng rgyan sogs pas mdzes bar bya //
T02TD1874E:12a-9: rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor ram //
T02TD1874E:12a-10: yang na bgegs dra'i rnal 'byor gyis //
T02TD1874E:12a-11: dbang bskur blangs nas bgegs kyi tshogs //
T02TD1874E:12a-12: bskrad pas nang nyid dag par bsam //
T02TD1874E:12a-13: aom bhu kham gi sngags kyis ni //
T02TD1874E:12a-14: mkha' la ri rab bskyed par bya //
T02TD1874E:12a-15: h'um lam h'um zhes rdo rje'i bdag / sa gzhir byas nas brtan par bya //
T02TD1874E:12a-16: aom mi di na'i badzri bha ba bandha h'um /
T02TD1874E:12a-17: sngon bzhin srung ba'i 'khor lo nas //
T02TD1874E:12a-18: rjes chags mtha' yi sbyor dang po //
T02TD1874E:12a-19: dkyil 'khor phyung ste mnyes mdzad pa //
T02TD1874E:12a-20: dkyil 'khor rgyal ba mchog bdag nyid //
T02TD1874E:12a-22: las kyi rgyal mchog sbyor bdag nyid //
T02TD1874E:12a-23: de yi dbang phyug mgon po ni //
T02TD1874E:12a-24: ting 'dzin gsum gyi mchog gyur yin //
T02TD1874E:12a-25: dpa' bo rdo rje dril 'dzin pas //
T02TD1874E:12a-26: thams cad dang ni bdag mnyam mo //
T02TD1874E:12a-27: rang bzhin gyis ni bdag go //
T02TD1874E:12a-28: rdo rje'i bdag nyid rgyal bskyed //
T02TD1874E:12a-29: 'khor lo'i dbus su gnas ba la //
T02TD1874E:12a-30: rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa yi //
T02TD1874E:12a-31: rtag sogs las kyi rdo rje yis /
T02TD1874E:12a-32: mchod nas dkyil 'khor gsol ba gdab //
T02TD1874E:12a-33: de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba'i //
T02TD1874E:12a-34: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas //
T02TD1874E:12a-35: chos kun bdag med pa yi chos //
T02TD1874E:12a-36: dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol //
T02TD1874E:12a-37: mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag rdzogs //
T02TD1874E:12a-38: mtshan nyid med pa thams cad spangs //
T02TD1874E:12a-39: kun du bzang po sku yi mchog / dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol //
T02TD1874E:12a-40: zhi ba'i chos mchog yang dag byung //
T02TD1874E:12a-41: ye shes spyod yul rnam spyod pa //
T02TD1874E:12a-42: kun du bzang po gsung gi mchog //
T02TD1874E:12a-43: dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol //
T02TD1874E:12a-44: sems can kun gyi sems chen po //
T02TD1874E:12a-45: rang bzhin dag pas dri ma med //
T02TD1874E:12b-0: kun du bzang @12b po thugs kyi mchog / dkyil 'khor snying po bshad du gsol //
T02TD1874E:12b-1: mi bskyod rdo rje khros byas nas //
T02TD1874E:12b-2: ma dang ta las rang gi mig //
T02TD1874E:12b-3: nyi zlar bskyed nas mig 'bras h'um //
T02TD1874E:12b-4: rdo rje las spros sprul par bya //
T02TD1874E:12b-5: rkang mthil ham las rdo rje bskyed //
T02TD1874E:12b-6: g-yas pa rdo rje g-yon pa dril //
T02TD1874E:12b-7: 'gying bag mche gtsigs h'um brjod cing //
T02TD1874E:12b-8: phyogs kun 'bar bar blta bar bya //
T02TD1874E:12b-9: g-yas brkyang g-yon brkyang zlum po dang //
T02TD1874E:12b-10: sa ga bzhi ste mi bskyod pa'i //
T02TD1874E:12b-11: rnal 'byor gyis ni phyogs bzhi ru //
T02TD1874E:12b-12: dang por rab tu brtsam pa'o //
T02TD1874E:12b-13: khro bo re res drug tu //
T02TD1874E:12b-14: phyogs bcu rnams su brtsams byas pas //
T02TD1874E:12b-15: 'khor los bgegs kyi tshogs rnams ni //
T02TD1874E:12b-16: bskrad par gdon mi za bar 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:12b-17: rus sbal stobs dang rdo rje gar dang rdo rje sgra //
T02TD1874E:12b-18: lcags kyu thabs dang ting 'dzin thabs dang mtha' yas thabs //
T02TD1874E:12b-19: gshin rje gshed kyi nga rgyal gyis gnas nas //
T02TD1874E:12b-20: shar gyi phyogs su rnal 'byor pas bya'o //
T02TD1874E:12b-21: rdo rje gdengs pa dang ni rdo rje 'jigs su rung ba dang //
T02TD1874E:12b-22: ral gri thabs dang phub kyi tshul dag dang //
T02TD1874E:12b-23: rdo rje skyil krung rnam par rgyal ba'i thabs //
T02TD1874E:12b-24: shes rab mthar byed kyis ni lho phyogs brtsam //
T02TD1874E:12b-25: rdo rje 'joms tshul dang ni rdo rje ro langs dang //
T02TD1874E:12b-26: rdo rje thabs dang ma dung gi thabs ngag dang //
T02TD1874E:12b-27: padmo'i 'dug stang gsum po che yi thabs //
T02TD1874E:12b-28: rta mgrin gyis ni nub kyi phyogs su brtsam //
T02TD1874E:12b-29: rkang pa ya gcig stang dang rdo rje tho ba dang //
T02TD1874E:12b-30: 'khor lo'i thabs dang sems dba'i skyil krung dang //
T02TD1874E:12b-31: sprin sgra dang ni gzhu yi thabs dang ni //
T02TD1874E:12b-32: bdud rtsi 'khyil pas byang phyogs nas brtsam mo //
T02TD1874E:12b-33: seng ge thabs dang rdo rje gdu bu dang //
T02TD1874E:12b-34: ba dan thabs dang thag mdung bskor ba'i thabs //
T02TD1874E:12b-35: bzang po'i 'dug stangs phur bu brdung ba yi //
T02TD1874E:12b-36: shar lho'i mtshams su 'dod pa'i rgyal pos brtsam //
T02TD1874E:12b-37: seng ge glal dang bud med sgyu 'phrul thabs //
T02TD1874E:12b-38: zhags ba'i thabs dang mchod spyin pa yi thabs //
T02TD1874E:12b-39: cog bu'i 'dug stangs dang ni ra ba'i thabs //
T02TD1874E:12b-40: lho nub mtshams nas dbyug pa sngon pos brtsam //
T02TD1874E:12b-41: rdo rje sgrog dang stobs po che gdengs dang //
T02TD1874E:13a-2: rtsi ba'i thabs dang mtshams bcing pa yi thabs //
T02TD1874E:13a-3: nub byang mtshams dang stobs po ches brtsam mo //
T02TD1874E:13a-4: bung ba 'phur stabs zhal bzhir byin brlabs dang //
T02TD1874E:13a-5: gtun shing thabs dang mda' 'phangs pa yi thabs //
T02TD1874E:13a-6: dpa' bo 'dug stangs bkra shis rgyal mtshan stangs //
T02TD1874E:13a-7: byang shar mtshams nas mi g-yo mgon pos brtsam //
T02TD1874E:13a-8: rdo rje gsor ba dang ni rdo rje mche ba dang //
T02TD1874E:13a-9: be con thabs dang thag pa'i 'khor lo'i thabs //
T02TD1874E:13a-10: phyir 'gyed pa dang phyogs bcing ba yi thabs //
T02TD1874E:13a-11: steng gi phyogs nas 'khor los sgyur bas brtsam //
T02TD1874E:13a-12: rdo rje sgeg pa dang ni rdo rje gad mo dang //
T02TD1874E:13a-13: mi 'jigs ba yi thabs dang phyag 'tshal ba yi thabs //
T02TD1874E:13a-14: phur bus gnas lngar gdab dang mtshon cha lnga yi thabs //
T02TD1874E:13a-15: 'og gi phyogs nas gnod mdzes kyis brtsam mo //
T02TD1874E:13a-16: de rnams kyis ni bgegs kyi tshogs //
T02TD1874E:13a-17: ru tr'i bi bo sha na dang //
T02TD1874E:13a-18: tshangs pa'i srin po gza' phur bu //
T02TD1874E:13a-19: gtso bo drug cu rtsa bzhi skrod //
T02TD1874E:13a-20: sku gsungs thugs kyi rdo rje can //
T02TD1874E:13a-21: sangs rgyas thams cad bdag la gson //
T02TD1874E:13a-22: bdag ni dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin //
T02TD1874E:13a-23: bka' yi 'khor lo rab sbyor bas //
T02TD1874E:13a-24: gal te gang gis bdag bka' 'goms //
T02TD1874E:13a-26: 'dod gsum bskyed lus bshig byed de //
T02TD1874E:13a-28: bgegs bsal bya phyir phur bu yang //
T02TD1874E:13a-29: stod ni khro bo smad zur gsum //
T02TD1874E:13a-30: bdud rtsi 'khyil par bsams nas su //
T02TD1874E:13a-31: dkyil 'khor dbus su gdab par bya //
T02TD1874E:13a-32: aom gha gha gh'a ta ya gh'a ta ya //
T02TD1874E:13a-34: k'i la ya k'a'i la ya /
T02TD1874E:13a-36: h'um h'um h'um badzra ka'i la ya //
T02TD1874E:13a-37: badzra dha ro a'a dzny'a pa ya ti //
T02TD1874E:13a-38: k'a ya wa'ak tsi tat badzra k'a'i la ya h'um phat /
T02TD1874E:13a-40: phyogs bcu bdud bcom slar 'dus nas //
T02TD1874E:13a-41: mtshams dang rab gru bcing bas //
T02TD1874E:13a-43: sa gnon phyag rgyas sa la man na //
T02TD1874E:13a-44: sa yi lha mo bton gyur nas //
T02TD1874E:13a-45: me tog sogs pas mchod nas ni //
T02TD1874E:13a-46: sbran phyir gsol ba gdab bar bya //
T02TD1874E:13a-47: skyob ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyis //
T02TD1874E:13b-0: spyod pa'i tshul @13b dang khyad par gyi //
T02TD1874E:13b-1: sa dang pha rol phyin pa la //
T02TD1874E:13b-2: lha mo khyod ni dpang por gsol //
T02TD1874E:13b-3: skyob pa sh'akya seng ge yis //
T02TD1874E:13b-4: ji ltar bdud kyi stobs bcom pa //
T02TD1874E:13b-5: de ltar bdag gis bdud bcom ldan nas //
T02TD1874E:13b-6: dkyil 'khor kun du bri bar bya //
T02TD1874E:13b-7: de skad gsol nas zhal gyis bzhes //
T02TD1874E:13b-8: de nyid du ni thim par 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:13b-9: bdag nyid kyis ni bsang gtor sogs //
T02TD1874E:13b-10: byas nas de ru nyal bar bya //
T02TD1874E:13b-11: mtshan mo gnyis pa'i cha dang por //
T02TD1874E:13b-12: dri zhim sogs kyis rab bskus la //
T02TD1874E:13b-13: me tog sil ma la sogs bkram //
T02TD1874E:13b-15: de ru ting nge 'dzin gsum mam ;
T02TD1874E:13b-16: / yang na lhag par mos pa yis //
T02TD1874E:13b-17: rten dang bcas pa dam tshig gi / dkyil 'khor rab tu dgod par bya //
T02TD1874E:13b-18: de nas bdag nyid spro bskyed la //
T02TD1874E:13b-19: ye shes 'khor lo bkug nas ni //
T02TD1874E:13b-20: byin brlabs mchod dang bstod pa dang //
T02TD1874E:13b-21: bdud rtsi myang bas mnyes par bya //
T02TD1874E:13b-22: bum pa nag nog med pa la //
T02TD1874E:13b-23: mchu 'phyang zhabs ni brtan pa dang //
T02TD1874E:13b-24: rdo rje'i chus byugs nyi shu gcig / yang na drug tu sta gon bya //
T02TD1874E:13b-25: mgul pa dar gyi cod pan mtshan //
T02TD1874E:13b-26: aa mra la sogs kha rgyan can //
T02TD1874E:13b-27: spos bsreg dri zhim chu yis bkang //
T02TD1874E:13b-28: rang rang sngags kyi bzlas pa'o //
T02TD1874E:13b-29: 'bru lnga sman lnga rin chen lnga //
T02TD1874E:13b-30: 'khor lo dri chu yon snod bsdu //
T02TD1874E:13b-31: mtshan ma lnga yis brgyan pa yi //
T02TD1874E:13b-32: rnam rgyal bum pa bdag pos bzla //
T02TD1874E:13b-33: rdo rje padmas btsir nas su //
T02TD1874E:13b-34: me tog dkar po de ru gtor //
T02TD1874E:13b-35: bdag gis slob ma thams cad la //
T02TD1874E:13b-36: dbang bskur mdzod cig gsol ba gdab ;
T02TD1874E:13b-37: / bdud rtsi 'khyil bzlas bum pa la //
T02TD1874E:13b-38: ku sha'i be ma por bcas ba yis //
T02TD1874E:13b-39: bdag gis slob thams cad la //
T02TD1874E:13b-40: bgegs bzlog gol zhes snyan gsan dbab //
T02TD1874E:13b-41: de rnams byin gyis brlabs byas la //
T02TD1874E:13b-42: thun gsum gtor ma phul nas kyang //
T02TD1874E:13b-43: mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang byas la //
T02TD1874E:13b-44: so so'i sngags kyis mnyes par bya //
T02TD1874E:13b-45: 'khor lo sngon bzhin mchod byas la //
T02TD1874E:13b-46: lag par pog por thogs nas su //
T02TD1874E:13b-47: pus mo btsugs nas thal sbyar bas //
T02TD1874E:13b-48: dkyil 'khor sogs la snyan gsan dbab //
T02TD1874E:13b-49: bcom ldan mi bskyod rdo rje yi //
T02TD1874E:14a-2: bdag gis snying rje'i dkyil 'khor ni //
T02TD1874E:14a-3: mgon po bri bar 'dod pa ste //
T02TD1874E:14a-4: slob ma rnams la phan phyir dang //
T02TD1874E:14a-5: khyed la mchod pa'i don du ni //
T02TD1874E:14a-6: de bas bcom ldan gus bdag la //
T02TD1874E:14a-7: byin rlabs gnang bar mdzad par rigs //
T02TD1874E:14a-8: dgongs shing bdag la sangs rgyas dang //
T02TD1874E:14a-10: 'bras gnas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T02TD1874E:14a-11: gang zhig gzhan yang sngags kyi lha //
T02TD1874E:14a-12: lha dang 'jig rten skyong ba dang //
T02TD1874E:14a-13: 'byung po byang chub ston pa rnams //
T02TD1874E:14a-14: sems can bstan la mngon dga' ba'i //
T02TD1874E:14a-15: gang zhig rdo rje'i ming can rnams //
T02TD1874E:14a-16: che ge bdag ni rdo rje che //
T02TD1874E:14a-18: ji ltar nyer spyod nus pa yis //
T02TD1874E:14a-19: 'gro dag don du bri bar bya //
T02TD1874E:14a-20: slob ma dang bcas bdag la ni //
T02TD1874E:14a-21: thugs rjes nye bar bzung nas ni //
T02TD1874E:14a-22: tshogs pa thams cad dkyil 'khor du //
T02TD1874E:14a-23: byin gyis brlab par mdzad du gsol //
T02TD1874E:14a-24: snyan gsan lan gsum du gsol nas //
T02TD1874E:14a-25: mchod pa la sogs rab sbyar nas //
T02TD1874E:14a-26: mtshams la sogs pa bcings nas ni //
T02TD1874E:14a-27: phyi rol byung nas slob ma gzung //
T02TD1874E:14a-28: shes rab chen po dga' chen po //
T02TD1874E:14a-29: nga rgyal med cing drin lan shes //
T02TD1874E:14a-30: rigs ldan yon tan dad pa che //
T02TD1874E:14a-31: gzugs mdog gzhon pa brgyan pa'o //
T02TD1874E:14a-32: gsang sngas kyi ni grub pa mchog /'dod pa rab tu ldan 'gyur na //
T02TD1874E:14a-33: dman pa'i rigs dang byang ngan dang //
T02TD1874E:14a-34: yon tan med kyang gzung bar bya //
T02TD1874E:14a-35: slob dang yid ches dang ldan dang //
T02TD1874E:14a-36: theg chen dga' ba'i bdag nyid dang //
T02TD1874E:14a-39: snod ldan 'khor ni bzhi po dang //
T02TD1874E:14a-41: snod dang snod min rab bsgrags la //
T02TD1874E:14a-42: bdag nyid rang gi nang du 'gro //
T02TD1874E:14a-43: ting 'dzin rdo rje chu skyes kyis //
T02TD1874E:14a-44: sbyang ba'i slob mas khang pa'i sgor //
T02TD1874E:14a-45: thal mo sbyar ba byas nas ni //
T02TD1874E:14a-46: tshig 'dis gsol ba lan gsum gdab //
T02TD1874E:14a-47: ston chen khyod la bdag dga' bo //
T02TD1874E:14b-0: brtan po byang chub chen po'i @14b lam ;
T02TD1874E:14b-1: / mgon po chen po bdag 'dod de //
T02TD1874E:14b-2: de nyid dam tshig bdag la stsol //
T02TD1874E:14b-3: bdag la byang chub sems kyang stsol //
T02TD1874E:14b-4: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang //
T02TD1874E:14b-5: skyabs su 'gro ba bdag la stsol //
T02TD1874E:14b-6: thar chen khang pa brtsegs pa ru //
T02TD1874E:14b-7: mgon pos bdag ni gzhug par mdzod ;
T02TD1874E:14b-8: / de ltar brjod pas bla ma yi //
T02TD1874E:14b-9: slob ma gcig ni gtsor byas nas //
T02TD1874E:14b-10: de sogs rnams la tshig 'di yis //
T02TD1874E:14b-11: gzhug phyir brod pa bskyed par bya //
T02TD1874E:14b-12: bu tshur shog cig theg chen gyi //
T02TD1874E:14b-13: cho ga sngags kyi spyod pa'i tshul //
T02TD1874E:14b-14: khyod la yang dag bstan par bya //
T02TD1874E:14b-15: tshul chen khyed kyis bsten par gyis //
T02TD1874E:14b-16: sangs rgyas dus gsum las byung ba //
T02TD1874E:14b-17: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can //
T02TD1874E:14b-18: gzhal med ye shes thob pa ni //
T02TD1874E:14b-19: rdo rje sngags kyi don bsgom yin //
T02TD1874E:14b-20: ci phyir dpag med sngags rnal 'byor //
T02TD1874E:14b-21: sh'akya seng ge sogs rab kyis //
T02TD1874E:14b-22: drag po chen po bdag gi tshogs //
T02TD1874E:14b-23: dpung chen de dag gzhom byas nas //
T02TD1874E:14b-24: 'jig rten rjes su rtogs nas su //
T02TD1874E:14b-26: de phyir blo ldan bu khyod kyis //
T02TD1874E:14b-27: thams cad mkhyen pa thob par gyis //
T02TD1874E:14b-28: de ltar bgyi zhes der 'dug nas //
T02TD1874E:14b-29: bla mas tshig gis byang chub sems //
T02TD1874E:14b-30: ma bskyed pa ni bskyed par bya //
T02TD1874E:14b-31: bskyed pa yin na 'phel bar bya //
T02TD1874E:14b-32: sdig pa bshags pa rjes yi rang //
T02TD1874E:14b-33: bsngo dang gsol ba skyabs 'gro dang //
T02TD1874E:14b-34: byang chub sems bskyed lam bstan dang /
T02TD1874E:14b-35: smon lam gdab pa sngon 'gro bya //
T02TD1874E:14b-36: 'khyil bzlas bsrungs nas gnas gsum du //
T02TD1874E:14b-38: aom h'um a'a: ni bkab byas la //
T02TD1874E:14b-39: rdo rje khu tshur dri chus byug / spyi bor me tog mdun du spos //
T02TD1874E:14b-40: mar me dri ni snying ga ru //
T02TD1874E:14b-41: las kun byed pa'i sngags bzlas nas //
T02TD1874E:14b-42: mchod pa'i don du spyin par bya //
T02TD1874E:14b-43: aa shva dtha dang au dum b'a ra ;
T02TD1874E:14b-44: / me tog rtse mo sor bcu gnyis //
T02TD1874E:14b-45: drang po dri zhim gyis byugs pa //
T02TD1874E:14b-46: dngos grub ltas phyir spyin par bya //
T02TD1874E:14b-47: ha cang ring min thung ba min //
T02TD1874E:14b-48: ku sha sngon po 'bus ma zos //
T02TD1874E:14b-49: rmi lam mi 'khrug bkar shis phyir //
T02TD1874E:14b-50: nyag ma gnyis ni spyin par bya //
T02TD1874E:15a-2: gtan tshigs de nyid kyi phyir /
T02TD1874E:15a-3: stong ba nyid kyi rang bzhin no //
T02TD1874E:15a-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so zhes bya bar spyar ro //
T02TD1874E:15a-6: mi zad pa rdo rje zhes bya ba ni sems dang sems las byung ba rnams rtag tu ro gcig par gnas pa ni mi zad pa'o //
T02TD1874E:15a-7: de nyid mi phyed pas na rdo rje ste //
T02TD1874E:15a-8: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la ni mi zad pa'i rdo rje zhes bya'o //
T02TD1874E:15a-9: dngos po 'di rnams ma skyes pas //
T02TD1874E:15a-10: zhes bya ba ni ji skad du bshad pa'i phung po la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1874E:15a-11: mi bskyod pa'i rigs kyi ngo bo nyid do //
T02TD1874E:15a-13: chos dang chos nyid med pa ste //
T02TD1874E:15a-14: zhes bya ba gsungs te/ gang gi phyir shes rab kyi stos kyis rnam par brtags par gyur na chos rnams dmigs su med de //
T02TD1874E:15a-15: des na de rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang tha snyad tsam ste rdzas su med do //
T02TD1874E:15a-16: chos rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du tshul ji ltar blta zhe na /
T02TD1874E:15a-18: nam mkha' lta bur bdag med pa //
T02TD1874E:15a-20: ji ltar nam mkha' ni rdzas thams cad kyi dngos po'i ngo bo nyid med pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang bdag med par blta bar bya'o zhes dpes nye bar bstan pa yin no //
T02TD1874E:15a-21: byang chub tshul zhes bya ba ji skad bstan pa'i byang chub kyi sems la thos pa dang bsam pa dang bsgom pa'i rang bzhin gyi shes rab ni byang chub kyi tshul yin bas byang chub kyi tshul te /
T02TD1874E:15a-22: des byang chub thob par 'gyur bas na byang chub kyi tshul zhes bya'o //
T02TD1874E:15a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rigs kyi ngo bo nyid do //
T02TD1874E:15a-24: de rnams kyi bdag med pa ni ji skad du bshad pa nyid do //
T02TD1874E:15a-26: de la dmigs pas mid de skad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de la snyoms par zhugs te bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD1874E:15a-27: chos rnams thams cad dngos med cing //
T02TD1874E:15a-28: zhes bya ba ni phung po la sogs pa dang yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rigs so //
T02TD1874E:15a-29: chos kyi mtshan nyid rnam par spangs //
T02TD1874E:15a-30: zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa'i chos rnams kyi rigs bskyed pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid ni chos kyi mtshan nyid de /
T02TD1874E:15a-31: de ltar bu'i chos kyi mtshan nyid de spangs pas don dam par ni chos rnams kyi skye ba'i rgyu med pas na skye ba med pa'o //
T02TD1874E:15b-0: skye ba med par @15b gyur pa de nyid kyi phyir dge slong dag gsum po 'di dag ni 'dus byas rnams kyi 'dus byas pa'i mtshan nyid yin no //
T02TD1874E:15b-2: skye bar yang shes par bya'o //
T02TD1874E:15b-4: gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba yang shes par bya'o gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba yang shes par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni chos kyi mtshan nyid de /
T02TD1874E:15b-5: chos rnams med pa'i phyir de med de //
T02TD1874E:15b-6: mo gsham bu sngo bsangs sam dkar po zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang 'dra'o //
T02TD1874E:15b-8: chos kyi mtshan nyid rnam par spangs //
T02TD1874E:15b-10: 'on rigs ji ltar skyed par byed ce na /
T02TD1874E:15b-11: bdag med chos las kun du 'byung //
T02TD1874E:15b-13: bdag med pa ni bshad zin to //
T02TD1874E:15b-14: de las kun du 'byung bas na //
T02TD1874E:15b-15: bdag med chos las kun du 'byung //
T02TD1874E:15b-18: gang dang gang gi gzugs kyis ni //
T02TD1874E:15b-19: sems can rnams ni gdul 'gyur ba //
T02TD1874E:15b-20: de dang de yi gzugs kyis ni //
T02TD1874E:15b-21: de'i don byab rdzogs par mdzad //
T02TD1874E:15b-22: ces bya ba ni mtshan nyid 'di lta bu'i sngon 'phen pa'i shugs dang ldan zhing dmigs pa med pa'i thugs rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos bdag med pa las kun du 'bung bas na de'i ske ba de yang sgyu ma lta bu 'khul pa tsam mo //
T02TD1874E:15b-24: rtag tu dri med thugs rje'i shugs las byung //
T02TD1874E:15b-25: smon lam grub pa mi 'gag chos nyid can //
T02TD1874E:15b-26: 'gro ba'i don sgrub lhur mdzad mtha' yas pa //
T02TD1874E:15b-27: thugs rje'i bdag nyid rtag tu rnam par snang //
T02TD1874E:15b-28: zhes ji skad gsungs pa lta bu'o //
T02TD1874E:15b-29: 'od zer 'bar ba rdo rje sgron ma zhes bya ba ni ye shes nyid sgron ma lta bu ste /
T02TD1874E:15b-30: ye shes kyi snang ba nyon mongs pa'i mun nag thams cad dang bral ba so sor rtog pa'i ye shes ni ye shes kyi sgron ma'o //
T02TD1874E:15b-31: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni ye shes sgron ma'i rdo rje zhes bya ste de la snyoms par zhugs pa'o //
T02TD1874E:15b-32: ma skyes pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bshad zin to //
T02TD1874E:15b-33: nam mkha'i gnas su sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1874E:15b-34: zhes bya ba ni rdzas thams cad dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid de bzhin nyid ni nam mkha'o //
T02TD1874E:15b-35: de nyid na gnas te gzhir gyur pa so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi lam gyi rnam blta bu gang yin pa de ni nam mkha'i gnas su spyor pa yin zhes bya'o //
T02TD1874E:15b-36: de ltar zhes bya ba'i sgra ni nges bar gzung ba'o //
T02TD1874E:16a-0: dngos po ni 'dod chags kyi rigs dang @16a * //
T02TD1874E:16a-1: bdag nyid mi bskyod shar bltas nas //
T02TD1874E:16a-2: slob ma snang mdzad bdud rtsi 'khyil //
T02TD1874E:16a-3: lte bar khu tshur g-yon bzung nas //
T02TD1874E:16a-4: nam mkha'i thig ni ma lus gdab //
T02TD1874E:16a-5: nam mkha' la gnas de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD1874E:16a-6: sems can don byed dus bab pas //
T02TD1874E:16a-7: gnas 'dir byon pa'i don ched du //
T02TD1874E:16a-8: thig gi sgra yis bskul bar bya //
T02TD1874E:16a-9: aom badzra sa ma ya s'u tra m'a ti kra ma h'um /
T02TD1874E:16a-10: gnod sbyin gshin rje brgya byin glu //
T02TD1874E:16a-11: phyogs su kha bltas phyogs bzhir gdab //
T02TD1874E:16a-12: me mtshams bden bral mtshams gnas nas //
T02TD1874E:16a-13: grva yi thig ni rab tu gdab //
T02TD1874E:16a-14: de nas tshangs thig sogs gcig tu //
T02TD1874E:16a-15: sum char byas la mtha' gnyis dor //
T02TD1874E:16a-16: dang po cha bzhir rab byas la //
T02TD1874E:16a-17: de yi dang po cha gnyis so //
T02TD1874E:16a-18: de yi gnyis pa gnyis pa bya //
T02TD1874E:16a-19: re re yang ni gnyis gnyis so //
T02TD1874E:16a-20: gsum pa'i dang pos cha chung gnyis //
T02TD1874E:16a-21: de nas yang ni cha chung gcig / de nas cha chung gnyis dor nas //
T02TD1874E:16a-22: cha chen gcig ni dor byas nas //
T02TD1874E:16a-23: cha chung gcig ni bcad pa'o //
T02TD1874E:16a-24: yang ni gnyis dor gcig bcad do //
T02TD1874E:16a-25: gnyis dor gcig bcad de steng du //
T02TD1874E:16a-26: cha chung gnyis ni dor bar bya //
T02TD1874E:16a-27: de nas cha chen gsum ni bcad //
T02TD1874E:16a-28: de steng cha chung gsum dor nas //
T02TD1874E:16a-29: yang ni cha chung gsum dor bya //
T02TD1874E:16a-30: lhag ma cha chung gcig lus pa'o //
T02TD1874E:16a-31: de nas thig skud gnyis 'gyur byas //
T02TD1874E:16a-32: tsandan phur bus dbus su gzugs //
T02TD1874E:16a-33: yang ni rang gi ra ba dang /
T02TD1874E:16a-34: phyi rol ra ba kun bskor bya //
T02TD1874E:16a-35: cha chen lnga ni rab bskor na //
T02TD1874E:16a-36: nang gi rdo rje ra ba ste //
T02TD1874E:16a-37: lha yi gnas la cha chung lnga //
T02TD1874E:16a-38: byas pa'i phyed gnyis ka bar 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:16a-39: phyi yi 'khor lo cha brgyad la //
T02TD1874E:16a-40: cha gcig sgo yi dbus bya'o //
T02TD1874E:16a-41: de tshad lha yi snam bu ste //
T02TD1874E:16a-43: de yi tshad kyi kha khyer sa //
T02TD1874E:16a-44: dra ba dra ba phyed pa dang //
T02TD1874E:16a-45: phreng bshal 'phyang ba'i snam bu dang //
T02TD1874E:16a-47: logs kyi phyi rol ya phugs te //
T02TD1874E:16a-48: de ltar ka ba la yang ngo //
T02TD1874E:16a-49: de phyed rin chen pha gu dang /
T02TD1874E:16a-50: tshon sna lnga yi sa mnyam mo //
T02TD1874E:16a-51: de bzhin 'khor lo ka sogs dang //
T02TD1874E:16a-52: rdo rje ra ba'ang de bzhin no //
T02TD1874E:16a-53: ya phugs steng du cha chen gsum //
T02TD1874E:16a-54: ta ra na yi sa ru 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:16b-0: cha chung drug la @16b padma dang //
T02TD1874E:16b-1: rdo rje ra ba bskor bar bya //
T02TD1874E:16b-3: bskor nas gcig ni nye 'khor las //
T02TD1874E:16b-5: thig skud chad na slob dpon 'chi //
T02TD1874E:16b-8: gru bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs bzhis //
T02TD1874E:16b-9: brgyan cing dar sham me tog dang //
T02TD1874E:16b-10: 'phan dang rgyal mtshan ba dan gyis //
T02TD1874E:16b-11: brgyan pa'i 'khor lo mthong bar bya //
T02TD1874E:16b-12: grva yi cha ni thams cad dang //
T02TD1874E:16b-13: sgo yi zur kun cha la yang //
T02TD1874E:16b-14: zla ba rin chen rdo rje dgod //
T02TD1874E:16b-15: gam pa'i ri sogs rab brgyan pa //
T02TD1874E:16b-16: chos kyi 'khor lo ri dgas gnyis //
T02TD1874E:16b-17: 'phan sogs kyis brgyan tva ra na //
T02TD1874E:16b-18: ji ltar mdzes shing bklubs par bya //
T02TD1874E:16b-19: sems can rnams kyi bsam dbang gi //
T02TD1874E:16b-22: khru ni bcu gnyis nyid du gsungs //
T02TD1874E:16b-23: de la khru bcu gnyis ni byang chub kyi sems la dga' ba'i rdo rje sgeg mo dang /
T02TD1874E:16b-24: gzugs dang yon tan gyi rdo rje phreng ba ma dang /
T02TD1874E:16b-25: chos 'chad pa'i rang bzhin rdo rje glu ma dang /
T02TD1874E:16b-26: sems can thams cad kyi don byed pa'i rdo rje gar ma dang /
T02TD1874E:16b-27: grags pa thams cad 'dus pa'i rdo rje bdug pa ma dang /
T02TD1874E:16b-28: byang chub kyi yan lag gi rdo rje me tog ma dang ;
T02TD1874E:16b-29: 'gro ba gzhan dga' bar byed pa'i rdo rje mar me ma dang /
T02TD1874E:16b-30: tshul khrims la sogs pa'i rdo rje dri chab ma dang /
T02TD1874E:16b-31: sbyin pa'i rang bzhin rdo rje kyo ba ma dang /
T02TD1874E:16b-32: snyan par smra ba'i rang bzhin rdo rje gsol ka ma dang /
T02TD1874E:16b-33: don mthun pa'i rang bzhin rdo rje pho nya ma dang /
T02TD1874E:16b-34: don spyod pa'i rang bzhin rdo rje 'bebs pa ma ste /
T02TD1874E:16b-35: de rnams rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD1874E:16b-36: de bzhin du sku'i dkyil 'khor la khru bcu drug tu gsungs pa ni /
T02TD1874E:16b-37: byang chub kyi sems brtan par byed pa'i rang bzhin rdo rje sems dpa' dang /
T02TD1874E:16b-38: thams cad 'gugs nus pa'i rang bzhin rdo rje rgyal po dang /
T02TD1874E:16b-39: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i yon tan rdo rje chags pa dang /
T02TD1874E:16b-40: gzi brjid bstod cing dga' ba'i yon tan rdo rje legs pa dang /
T02TD1874E:16b-41: chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ba'i rdo rje rin chen dang //
T02TD1874E:16b-42: gzi brjid gzhan las 'phags pa'i yon tan rdo rje gzi brjid dang /
T02TD1874E:17a-0: re ba yongs su rdzogs pa'i yon tan rdo rje @17a * //
T02TD1874E:17a-2: mdzum pas lung ston pa'i yon tan rdo rje bzhad pa dang /
T02TD1874E:17a-3: chos la dmigs shing so sor rtog pa'i yon tan rdo rje chos rab dang /
T02TD1874E:17a-4: sgrib pa yongs su gcod pa'i yon tan rdo rje rnon po dang /
T02TD1874E:17a-5: sku gsung thugs zad mi shes par kun la khyab ba'i yon tan rdo rje rgyu dang /
T02TD1874E:17a-6: gzhung gi chos rab tu sgrogs pa'i yon tan rdo rje smra ba dang /
T02TD1874E:17a-7: sems can smin pa dang grol bar byed pa'i yon tan rdo rje las rab dang /
T02TD1874E:17a-8: mi 'jigs pa sbyin zhing srung ba'i rang bzhin rdo rje srung ba dang /
T02TD1874E:17a-9: gdul dka' 'dul bar byed pa'i yon tan rdo rje gnod sbyin dang /
T02TD1874E:17a-10: rdo rje gsum bsdus shing dbyer med pa'i yon tan rdo rje sdud pa ste /
T02TD1874E:17a-11: de rnams rnam par dag pa'o //
T02TD1874E:17a-12: gsung gi dkyil 'khor la khru nyi shu gsungs pa ni /
T02TD1874E:17a-13: de rnams dang rdo rje'i rigs rnams sdud cing dam tshig gi phyag rgya byin gyis rlob pa'i yon tan sems ma rdo rje ma dang /
T02TD1874E:17a-14: rin po che'i rigs sdud cing dbang bskur ba'i byin gyis rlob pa'i rang bzhin yon tan rin chen rdo rje ma dang /
T02TD1874E:17a-15: padma'i rigs sdud cing chos kyi phyag rgya byin gyis rlob pa'i yon tan chos kyi rdo rje ma dang /
T02TD1874E:17a-16: las kyi rigs sdud cing las kyi phyag rgya byin gyis rlob pa'i yon tan las kyi rdo rje ma ste /
T02TD1874E:17a-17: de rnams rnam par dag pa'o //
T02TD1874E:17a-19: de rnams sa bcu rnam par dag pa ste /
T02TD1874E:17a-20: sa bcu ni ye shes lnga'i rten du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1874E:17a-21: ji skad du gsang ba'i thig le nor bu'i rgyud phyi ma las /
T02TD1874E:17a-22: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD1874E:17a-23: lam rnams dag ste rim pa bzhin //
T02TD1874E:17a-24: bcu gnyis bcu drug nyi shu ru //
T02TD1874E:17a-25: ye shes la ni ye shes gnas ;
T02TD1874E:17a-26: / thos dang bsam pa ngo bo ni //
T02TD1874E:17a-27: kyo ba la sogs rang bzhin no //
T02TD1874E:17a-29: thar chags sdug pa la sogs so //
T02TD1874E:17a-30: drod la sogs pa dang por sbyor //
T02TD1874E:17a-31: sgeg mo la sogs ngo bo'o //
T02TD1874E:17a-32: lhag ma nyi shu gnyis gnyis kyang //
T02TD1874E:17a-33: sa re ru ni rnam dag pas //
T02TD1874E:17a-34: ye shes rten du yang dag mtshams //
T02TD1874E:17a-36: rten du yang dag gyur pas na //
T02TD1874E:17a-37: rnam par dag pa mngon du bya'o //
T02TD1874E:17a-39: mdor na zab gsal gnyis med las //
T02TD1874E:17a-40: grub pa'i khyad par 'byung bas na //
T02TD1874E:17a-41: rigs dang tshad sogs nges med pas //
T02TD1874E:17b-0: khru gang @17b nas brtsams stong phrag brgya //
T02TD1874E:17b-1: rin chen lnga yi phye ma'am //
T02TD1874E:17b-3: s'a lu btags pa'i phye ma la //
T02TD1874E:17b-4: snga ma'i rim bzhin 'khor los dbab //
T02TD1874E:17b-5: bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs brjod de //
T02TD1874E:17b-6: gser sogs snod du bdug pa bsreg / gsal bar bsams nas gsang sngags 'dis //
T02TD1874E:17b-7: mngon par bzlas pa rab tu bya //
T02TD1874E:17b-8: badzra tsi tra sa ma ya h'um /
T02TD1874E:17b-9: rdo rje shugs kyis zhugs nas su //
T02TD1874E:17b-10: chos dbyings kyis ni 'di nyid dag / sems can dbyings ni rab sgrol mdzad //
T02TD1874E:17b-11: rgyal ba'i mchog ni mi bskyod mgon //
T02TD1874E:17b-12: bde bar gshegs pa kun gyi gnas //
T02TD1874E:17b-13: skyon kun las ni grol bar mos //
T02TD1874E:17b-14: bla mas g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyis //
T02TD1874E:17b-15: dbang ldan mtshams nas phyi rol nas //
T02TD1874E:17b-16: ri mo lnga ni bri ba'o //
T02TD1874E:17b-17: dkar po ser po dmar po dang //
T02TD1874E:17b-18: ljang khu nag po nang du'o //
T02TD1874E:17b-19: g-yas su bskor cing chad med pas //
T02TD1874E:17b-20: rdul tshon ri mo bri ba'o //
T02TD1874E:17b-21: sbom por bris na nad 'byung ste //
T02TD1874E:17b-23: chad na slob ma bla ma 'chi //
T02TD1874E:17b-24: de bas phyogs kun mnyam par 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:17b-25: g-yas skor tshul du mi 'debs na //
T02TD1874E:17b-26: tshon la phur bus gdab par bya //
T02TD1874E:17b-27: rdo rje rtse mo gnyis dkar mo //
T02TD1874E:17b-28: gzhan ni ser por shes par bya //
T02TD1874E:17b-30: / ma ra ga ta lta bu ste //
T02TD1874E:17b-31: dbus ma nag por shes byas nas //
T02TD1874E:17b-32: tshom gyi rim pa de ltar ro //
T02TD1874E:17b-33: shar gyi phyogs su dkar po che //
T02TD1874E:17b-34: lho ser nub dmar byang ljang khu //
T02TD1874E:17b-35: dbus ma'i cha phyogs ra bas bskor //
T02TD1874E:17b-36: aindra n'i la'i kha dog go //
T02TD1874E:17b-37: de dus rlung dang sbrul sogs sprul //
T02TD1874E:17b-38: bgegs dgra'i phyag rgya dran byas nas //
T02TD1874E:17b-39: sdang ba'i dgra yi sngags rgyal 'di //
T02TD1874E:17b-40: brjod pas de dag sel bar bya //
T02TD1874E:17b-41: na ma: sa manta k'a ya w'a ka tsitta badzra n'am /
T02TD1874E:17b-42: na mo badzra kro dh'a ya /
T02TD1874E:17b-43: ma h'a damshtota ka ta bhee ra ba ya aa si mu sa la pa ra shu p'a sha ha st'a ya /
T02TD1874E:17b-44: aom aa mri ta kunda li kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi /
T02TD1874E:17b-51: bi spo ta ya bi spho ta ya /
T02TD1874E:17b-52: sarba bighnan bi n'a ya ka /
T02TD1874E:17b-53: ma h'a ga na pa ti /
T02TD1874E:17b-54: dza'i banti anta ka ra ya h'um phat /
T02TD1874E:17b-55: de ltar rdul tshon btab gyur nas //
T02TD1874E:17b-56: padma'i gdan la nyi ma dang //
T02TD1874E:17b-57: zla ba rab tu bkod byas nas //
T02TD1874E:17b-58: mtshan ma'i phyag rgya dgod pa'o //
T02TD1874E:18a-1: su rdo rje rtse lnga pa //
T02TD1874E:18a-3: shar du lce brgyad 'khor lo ni //
T02TD1874E:18a-4: zla ba lta bu'i 'od zer dang //
T02TD1874E:18a-5: lho ru rin chen zur dgu pa //
T02TD1874E:18a-8: dmar po 'od zer dang ldan pa //
T02TD1874E:18a-9: byang du ral gri rin chen yu //
T02TD1874E:18a-10: sngon po 'od zer dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD1874E:18a-11: me mtshams spyan ni sngon po'o //
T02TD1874E:18a-12: bden bral mtshams su rdo rje bri //
