T02TD1874E:18a-13: rlung mtshams padma sdong bur bcas //
T02TD1874E:18a-14: dbang ldan autpala ljang ser can //
T02TD1874E:18a-15: phyi rol me mtshams la sogs dang //
T02TD1874E:18a-16: shar sgo g-yas g-yon gru gnyis la //
T02TD1874E:18a-17: me long pi wang dung dang snod //
T02TD1874E:18a-18: gos dang chos kyi 'byung gnas bri //
T02TD1874E:18a-19: tho ba 'bar ba shar sgor bri //
T02TD1874E:18a-20: rdo rje dbyug pa lho sgor bri //
T02TD1874E:18a-21: padma nub kyi sgo ru bri //
T02TD1874E:18a-22: rdo rje kha bye byang du bri //
T02TD1874E:18a-23: shes rab thabs su rab ldan pas //
T02TD1874E:18a-24: rtag tu mnyam par gzhag ste bya //
T02TD1874E:18a-25: rang rang gi ni ngo bo rnams //
T02TD1874E:18a-26: 'phro ba'i sngags kyis gdab par bya //
T02TD1874E:18a-27: de nas lha rnams gnas bya'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:18a-28: sme sha can gyi bdag nyid che //
T02TD1874E:18a-29: bu mo lo grangs bcu gnyis pa //
T02TD1874E:18a-30: m'a ma k'i ru byin gyis brlabs //
T02TD1874E:18a-31: gnyis sbyor rjes su chags bskyed nas //
T02TD1874E:18a-32: sangs rgyas rang gi nang du gzhug / cho ga gsum gyis bsgrub byas nas //
T02TD1874E:18a-33: bzhi pas gnyis su med par bya //
T02TD1874E:18a-34: rdo rje padma'i sgra yis ni //
T02TD1874E:18a-35: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor rnam par dgug / bskrad nas srung bya sngon bzhin du //
T02TD1874E:18a-36: mchod yon la sogs dbul bar bya //
T02TD1874E:18a-37: mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang byas nas //
T02TD1874E:18a-38: shes rab mthar byed kyis gzhug dang //
T02TD1874E:18a-39: bcings te dga' byas nyer sgrub dang //
T02TD1874E:18a-40: sgrub pa dbang bskur gyis mtshan pa'o //
T02TD1874E:18a-41: sngon bzhin mchod pa yang byas te //
T02TD1874E:18a-42: de bzhin bstod dang bdud rtsi myang //
T02TD1874E:18a-43: gsal bar bsgoms nas bzlas brjod dang //
T02TD1874E:18a-44: reg pa'i mchod pas mnyes bya'o //
T02TD1874E:18a-45: de bzhin phyi yi dri la sogs //
T02TD1874E:18a-46: sngags dang phyag rgya dang ldan pas //
T02TD1874E:18a-47: rang gi sa bon las sprul te //
T02TD1874E:18a-49: 'di ni yang dag bdug pa ste //
T02TD1874E:18a-50: rang bzhin dang ni sbyar ba'i dri //
T02TD1874E:18a-51: bdag gis dbul ba 'di bzhes la //
T02TD1874E:18a-52: bdag la bka' drin stsal du gsol //
T02TD1874E:18a-53: badzra dh'uppe p'u dza spha ra na /
T02TD1874E:18a-54: sna tshogs me tog yid 'ong pa //
T02TD1874E:18a-56: byang chub yan lag me tog 'di /
T02TD1874E:18b-0: @18b bdag la brtser dgongs bzhes su gsol //
T02TD1874E:18b-1: badzra pushpe p'u dza spha ra na /
T02TD1874E:18b-4: lha yi spyan ni thob byed pa //
T02TD1874E:18b-5: bdag la brtser dgongs bzhes su gsol //
T02TD1874E:18b-6: badzra aa lo ke p'u dza spha ra na /
T02TD1874E:18b-7: ga pur la sogs byug pa ni ;
T02TD1874E:18b-8: / dri zhim la sogs me tog rgyan //
T02TD1874E:18b-10: bdag la brtser dgongs bzhes su gsol //
T02TD1874E:18b-11: badzra gandhe p'u dza spha ra na /
T02TD1874E:18b-12: sna tshogs bza' ba yid 'ong ba //
T02TD1874E:18b-13: bza' dang bcas dang bldag dang gzhib //
T02TD1874E:18b-15: bdag la brtser dgongs bzhes su gsol //
T02TD1874E:18b-16: badzra nee bi tye p'u dza spha ra na /
T02TD1874E:18b-17: sna tshogs btung ba yid 'ong ba //
T02TD1874E:18b-18: 'bru yi chang dang bcos pa'i chang //
T02TD1874E:18b-19: myos byed bdud rtsi dpa' bo 'di //
T02TD1874E:18b-20: bdag la brtser dgongs bzhes su gsol //
T02TD1874E:18b-21: badzra su ra p'u dza spha ra na /
T02TD1874E:18b-22: rin chen ri'am rgya mtsho rin chen rnams //
T02TD1874E:18b-23: bzhad dang sgeg dga' rol dang bde ba dang //
T02TD1874E:18b-24: dpag bsam shing dang na bza' shing rnams kun //
T02TD1874E:18b-25: 'khor lo bla mar bcas la dbul bar bya //
T02TD1874E:18b-26: bo dhi ratna aa lam ka ra /
T02TD1874E:18b-27: sa ha la se ra ti kri ha soo khy'a aa nutta ra /
T02TD1874E:18b-28: aa nutta ra bo dhyam lam ka ra bstra p'u dza me gha sa mu tra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um zhes dbul lo //
T02TD1874E:18b-29: bsrungs nas phyi rol byung nas kyang //
T02TD1874E:18b-30: phyogs skyong rang rang rnal 'byor gnas //
T02TD1874E:18b-31: sdig med sha khrag chu zan gyi //
T02TD1874E:18b-32: gtor ma phul nas nang du 'gro //
T02TD1874E:18b-33: 'di ni gzhan du bshad pas der shes par bya'o //
T02TD1874E:18b-34: gos dang rgyan gyis rab brgyan te //
T02TD1874E:18b-35: rdo rje h'um mdzad bdag bsgyur la //
T02TD1874E:18b-36: dkyil 'khor bskor ba yang byas te //
T02TD1874E:18b-37: phyag 'tshal me tog sngon po dor //
T02TD1874E:18b-38: bdag pos bcing bsams mgo ru bcings //
T02TD1874E:18b-39: de yi gong 'og cho ga rnams //
T02TD1874E:18b-40: rnam par dag par 'gyur bas na //
T02TD1874E:18b-41: dag pa'i dag pa rnam dag pa'o //
T02TD1874E:18b-42: de nas lha rnams tshim bya'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:18b-43: thab la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i /
T02TD1874E:18b-44: sbyin sreg gnas su song nas kyang //
T02TD1874E:18b-45: sbyor ba ldan pas mnyes par bya //
T02TD1874E:18b-46: 'di'i cho ga yang gzhan du bshad pas der shes par bya'o //
T02TD1874E:18b-47: dkyil 'khor mchod pa yang byas te //
T02TD1874E:18b-48: shis pa'i phyir na bkra shis glu //
T02TD1874E:18b-49: 'khor lo bskor nas bdag nyid kyis //
T02TD1874E:19a-0: pheg rdob pa yi gar gyis @19a * //
T02TD1874E:19a-2: / h'um h'um 'khor ba 'don byed sku 'dzin pa //
T02TD1874E:19a-3: gnyis gnyis 'khyud pa'i sbyor ba'i mchog / mi bskyod rdo rje khyod 'ba' zhig / te na h'um te na h'um te na te te h'um /
T02TD1874E:19a-4: khyod kyi zhabs kyi padma la //
T02TD1874E:19a-5: lha dang mi yis 'dud pa'i mchog / sprul pa'i me tog sna tshogs dang //
T02TD1874E:19a-6: mi bskyod rdo rje khyod 'ba' zhig / te na h'um te na h'um te na te te h'um /
T02TD1874E:19a-7: dngos po rnam grol rnam par bsnyen //
T02TD1874E:19a-8: gsang ba'i gsang ba 'dzin pa khyod //
T02TD1874E:19a-9: bdud rtsi mtha' med gsol ba khyod //
T02TD1874E:19a-10: khyod kyi dgongs pa pad rgyas yin //
T02TD1874E:19a-11: te na h'um te na h'um te na te te h'um /
T02TD1874E:19a-12: rtsom spangs sems can don mdzad pa //
T02TD1874E:19a-13: rgyu med gzugs la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1874E:19a-14: te na h'um te na h'um te na te te h'um /
T02TD1874E:19a-15: dung dang ku mu ta yi gzugs //
T02TD1874E:19a-16: rgya mtsho dangs ma zla gzugs 'dra //
T02TD1874E:19a-17: te na h'um te na h'um te na te te h'um /
T02TD1874E:19a-18: rol pa gnyis med rnal 'byor mdzad //
T02TD1874E:19a-19: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya 'dzin //
T02TD1874E:19a-20: te na h'um te na h'um te na te te h'um /
T02TD1874E:19a-22: rkyen gyis ma byas gzugs can yin //
T02TD1874E:19a-23: te na h'um te na h'um te na te te h'um /
T02TD1874E:19a-25: bdag nyid zhugs byas lha yis kyang //
T02TD1874E:19a-26: chu nas bka' stsal bar gyi dbang //
T02TD1874E:19a-27: bskur bsams 'khor lo de la ni //
T02TD1874E:19a-28: slob ma rnams ni gzhug pa'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:19a-29: rdo rje 'chang ba las byung ba'i //
T02TD1874E:19a-30: dkyil 'khor rten dang bcas pa yi //
T02TD1874E:19a-31: de bzhin nyid ni lan gsum brjod //
T02TD1874E:19a-32: nam mkha' las byung mtshan ldan phyir //
T02TD1874E:19a-33: thog mtha' ma med pa'i sems //
T02TD1874E:19a-34: rdo rje sems dpa' che rang bzhin //
T02TD1874E:19a-35: mi bskyod rdo rje deng grub shog / mchog chen dngos grub thams cad dang //
T02TD1874E:19a-36: dbang phyug rdo rje 'dzin pa'i lha //
T02TD1874E:19a-37: thams cad rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gzugs //
T02TD1874E:19a-38: dam pa'i yi ge grub par shog / skyon med rtag pa la sogs pa //
T02TD1874E:19a-39: 'dod chags kun la rjes su chags //
T02TD1874E:19a-40: 'dod chags chen po dga' ba che //
T02TD1874E:19a-41: de nyid bcom ldan bdag la grub //
T02TD1874E:19a-42: gtan du dag pa kun gyi mchog / gdod ma nas grol de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD1874E:19a-43: kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid //
T02TD1874E:19a-44: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag grub bo //
T02TD1874E:19a-45: dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog / dbang phyug chen po'i phyag rgya yis //
T02TD1874E:19a-46: rdo rje snying gtso bdag la ni //
T02TD1874E:19a-47: rdo rje sngags chen grub par shog / sems can kun gyi yid khyab pa //
T02TD1874E:19b-0: @19b sems can kun gyi snying la gnas //
T02TD1874E:19b-1: sems can kun gyi de bzhin pha //
T02TD1874E:19b-2: dam tshig mchog gi 'dod ba'i mchog / bden pa gang gis ye shes kyi //
T02TD1874E:19b-3: shes rab thabs dag dkyil 'khor ni //
T02TD1874E:19b-4: mgon po khyod kyi bden pa des //
T02TD1874E:19b-5: bdag gis 'dod pa yongs su skongs //
T02TD1874E:19b-6: gzugs brnyan dang ni mnyam pa'i chos //
T02TD1874E:19b-7: dag cing dang ba rnyog med pa //
T02TD1874E:19b-8: gzung med brjod du med pa yang //
T02TD1874E:19b-9: rgyu dang rkyen la kun du byung //
T02TD1874E:19b-10: de nyid de nyid bskyed pa ni //
T02TD1874E:19b-11: de dag bden pas dkyil 'khor la //
T02TD1874E:19b-12: gzugs brnyan gsal bar slob pa ni //
T02TD1874E:19b-13: sdig med pas ni pa lta bar bgyi //
T02TD1874E:19b-14: thun mong sdom pa dang ldan pa //
T02TD1874E:19b-15: bsnyen sgrub gsum gyis bsgrubs nas su //
T02TD1874E:19b-16: yol bas bar du bcad pa la //
T02TD1874E:19b-17: 'khyil bzlas chu yis gtor bar bya //
T02TD1874E:19b-18: dmar po sham gyis gdong g-yogs nas //
T02TD1874E:19b-19: dga' ba khyod gang yin zhes dri //
T02TD1874E:19b-20: dga' ba skal ldan bdag yin zhes //
T02TD1874E:19b-21: 'jug pa po yis smra bar bya //
T02TD1874E:19b-22: de nas me tog snyim bkang nas //
T02TD1874E:19b-23: 'khor los bzhes zhes gtor nas ni //
T02TD1874E:19b-24: gtong sems bskyed nas bla ma la //
T02TD1874E:19b-25: yon ni rab tu dbul bar bya //
T02TD1874E:19b-26: yul mkhar khyim dang glang po rta //
T02TD1874E:19b-27: bran dang bran mo chung ma drug / bu mo shin tu yid 'ong dang //
T02TD1874E:19b-28: gang gis rang gi lus 'di yang //
T02TD1874E:19b-29: deng nas brtsams te dbul par bya //
T02TD1874E:19b-30: ci yi phyir ni dbul bya na //
T02TD1874E:19b-31: slob dpon du ni nyer gnas phyir //
T02TD1874E:19b-32: snying rje chen pos nyer gnas phyir //
T02TD1874E:19b-33: sems can thams cas skyob don du //
T02TD1874E:19b-34: bdag gi lus 'di dbul bar bgyi //
T02TD1874E:19b-35: h'um gis snying kar rdo rje bsgom //
T02TD1874E:19b-36: aom sarba yo ga tsitta autp'a da ya mi /
T02TD1874E:19b-37: su ra ta stvam siddhi badzra ya th'a su kham /
T02TD1874E:19b-38: brjod pas byang chub sems bskyed la //
T02TD1874E:19b-39: lus kyi 'khor lo bskul bar bya //
T02TD1874E:19b-40: de ring khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1874E:19b-41: khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog gi gsang chen 'di //
T02TD1874E:19b-42: dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pa rnams kyi mdun du smra bar mi bya'o //
T02TD1874E:19b-43: dad par mi byed pa yang mi rung ngo //
T02TD1874E:19b-45: gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'am //
T02TD1874E:19b-46: aa kham ba'i ra h'um brjod nas //
T02TD1874E:19b-47: drangs nas 'jug pa'i sgor gnas te //
T02TD1874E:19b-48: snga ma'i sngom pa brtan par bya //
T02TD1874E:20a-0: de ring khyod de bzhin gshegs pa @20a * //
T02TD1874E:20a-1: thams cad kyi rigs la rab tu chud do //
T02TD1874E:20a-2: de bas ngas khyod la rdo rje ye shes bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD1874E:20a-3: ye shes de khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyang thob na /
T02TD1874E:20a-4: dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos /
T02TD1874E:20a-5: de'i thabs 'di khyod kyis dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams kyi mdun du ma smra shig / khyod dam tshig las 'da' bar mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD1874E:20a-6: snying gar rdo rje bzhag nas ni //
T02TD1874E:20a-7: de ring rdo rje sems dpa' nyid //
T02TD1874E:20a-8: khyod kyi snying la yang dag gnas //
T02TD1874E:20a-13: yi ge gsum gyis 'bar byas la //
T02TD1874E:20a-14: rdo rje yis ni de yi khar //
T02TD1874E:20a-15: mi ldog phyir ni blud par bya //
T02TD1874E:20a-16: 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu //
T02TD1874E:20a-17: dam las 'da' na sreg par byed //
T02TD1874E:20a-18: dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub pa'i //
T02TD1874E:20a-19: bdud rtsi rdo rje chu 'thung shig / badzro da ka tha /
T02TD1874E:20a-20: de nas de yis mi 'gyur byas //
T02TD1874E:20a-21: sems g-yo dogs phyir bstan pa yi //
T02TD1874E:20a-22: dam bcas 'di ni bla ma yis //
T02TD1874E:20a-23: lan gsum du ni bsgrags par bya //
T02TD1874E:20a-24: de ring phyin chad khyod kyis phyag na rdo rje nga yin gyi /
T02TD1874E:20a-25: ngas ci smras pa'i bya ba thams cad khyod kyis bya dgos so //
T02TD1874E:20a-26: khyod kyis bdag la brnyas par mi rung ste //
T02TD1874E:20a-27: brnyas na yang ba ma spangs pas shi ba'i dus byas nas dmyal bar ltung bas ma 'gro shig / de nas slob ma de yis kyang //
T02TD1874E:20a-28: brtan nas rang nyid dag bya'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:20a-29: gsol ba gdab pa 'di yi mchog / smros shig ces ni bla mas smras //
T02TD1874E:20a-30: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlobs la rdo rje sems dpa' bdag cag la dbab du gsol lo //
T02TD1874E:20a-31: de yi snying ga ru ni h'um //
T02TD1874E:20a-32: lam byung dbang chen dbus su bsam //
T02TD1874E:20a-33: mgrin par aa ni bam byung pa'i //
T02TD1874E:20a-34: chu yi dkyil 'khor dbus su bsam //
T02TD1874E:20a-35: spyi bor ham ni dkar po che //
T02TD1874E:20a-36: yam byung rlung dbus bsams nas ni //
T02TD1874E:20a-37: skul byed dzheem ni rkang mthil gnyis //
T02TD1874E:20a-38: rlung gis bskyod pas 'bar byas dbab //
T02TD1874E:20a-39: aom a'a ni sha ya stam bha ya ra ra ra ra tsa la ya tsa la ya /
T02TD1874E:20a-41: rdo rje dril bu sgra dang bcas //
T02TD1874E:20a-42: 'jigs rung gar gyis smin ring bskyod //
T02TD1874E:20a-43: mig bgrang so gtsigs bzhad byed pas //
T02TD1874E:20a-44: slob ma dbab pa rab tu bya //
T02TD1874E:20a-45: lce la thig le'i yi ge a'a:/
T02TD1874E:20b-0: bsams nas @20b bzlas shing dge mi dge / bru hi badzra zhes brjod nas //
T02TD1874E:20b-1: dbab pa brtan par bya ba'o //
T02TD1874E:20b-2: pra ti badzra ho brjod la //
T02TD1874E:20b-3: me tog dkyil 'khor dor du gzhug / de yis bcings par rab bsams la //
T02TD1874E:20b-4: blangs nas mgo ru bcing bar bya //
T02TD1874E:20b-5: 'di ni stobs chen sems dpa' bas //
T02TD1874E:20b-7: phyag mtshan nye'am mi nye ba //
T02TD1874E:20b-8: re'u cha'i gnas las shes par bya'o //
T02TD1874E:20b-9: yang na rang gi skal pa yis //
T02TD1874E:20b-10: gdong phye me tog de la gtor //
T02TD1874E:20b-11: mig gnyis aom 'bar bsams nas ni //
T02TD1874E:20b-12: gdong phye las kyi kha dog bstan //
T02TD1874E:20b-13: de ring rdo rje sems dpa' nyid //
T02TD1874E:20b-14: nan tan byas te khyod mig phye //
T02TD1874E:20b-15: bla na med pa'i rdo rjes mig / thams cad la ni mig phye 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:20b-16: dkyil 'khor gtso bo nas brtsams nas //
T02TD1874E:20b-18: yang na bdud rtsi 'khyil pa las //
T02TD1874E:20b-19: gco bo'i bar du bstan bya'o //
T02TD1874E:20b-20: slob mas thal mo sbyar byas la //
T02TD1874E:20b-21: rdo rje dkyil 'khor chen po yi //
T02TD1874E:20b-22: dkyil 'khor nyid du bdag zhugs so //
T02TD1874E:20b-23: sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po yi //
T02TD1874E:20b-24: dkyil 'khor de ring bdag gis mthong //
T02TD1874E:20b-25: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen bo yi //
T02TD1874E:20b-26: dkyil 'khor du ni bdag dbang bskur //
T02TD1874E:20b-27: de skad lan gsum brjod par bya //
T02TD1874E:20b-28: bum pa rnams chu gcig tu byas //
T02TD1874E:20b-29: mi bskyod rdo rje rab skyed la //
T02TD1874E:20b-30: zhugs nas slob ma'i mgo bo ru //
T02TD1874E:20b-31: 'khor los sgyur bzhin dbang bskur bya //
T02TD1874E:20b-32: rin chen la sogs dbu rgyan la //
T02TD1874E:20b-33: rin chen 'byung ldan gyur bas te //
T02TD1874E:20b-34: dbus su rang gi lha bzhag pas //
T02TD1874E:20b-35: cod pan dang ldan dbang bskur bya //
T02TD1874E:20b-36: rdo rje rtse mo dgu lnga pa //
T02TD1874E:20b-37: 'od dpag med bsgoms yongs gyur te //
T02TD1874E:20b-38: byin nas snying gar de bzung ba //
T02TD1874E:20b-39: rdo rje'i dbang ni bskur bar bya //
T02TD1874E:20b-40: dril bu don yod grub ba ru //
T02TD1874E:20b-41: bsgoms nas yongs gyur byin nas ni //
T02TD1874E:20b-42: rdo rje dril bu la 'khyud tshul //
T02TD1874E:20b-43: bdag por dbang ni bskur bar bya //
T02TD1874E:20b-44: spyi gtsug ltag pa la bcug ste //
T02TD1874E:20b-45: spyi bor phyag reg ming gi dbang //
T02TD1874E:20b-46: che ge rdo rje zhes bos nas //
T02TD1874E:20b-47: khyad par gzhan yang mthong bar bya //
T02TD1874E:20b-48: gang gang snang ba kun bdag ste //
T02TD1874E:20b-49: de yi gtso bo mi bskyed mgon //
T02TD1874E:20b-50: chos rnams rang bzhin gyis dag bas //
T02TD1874E:20b-51: chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ge tshul /
T02TD1874E:21a-0: kun gyi gtso bo yin pa'i @21a * //
T02TD1874E:21a-2: / ming gong dpal gyi sgra gzhug bya //
T02TD1874E:21a-3: go ba nyid du bsgrags pa'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:21a-4: dang po kye sbyor mtha' yi bar //
T02TD1874E:21a-5: h'um bskyed rdo rje lag byin nas //
T02TD1874E:21a-6: 'chang bas rdo rje lan gsum gsor //
T02TD1874E:21a-7: brtul zhugs 'di ni dang po ru //
T02TD1874E:21a-8: rnal 'byor ba yis blang bar bya //
T02TD1874E:21a-9: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang //
T02TD1874E:21a-10: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag na gnas //
T02TD1874E:21a-11: rtag par khyod kyis kyang bzung ste //
T02TD1874E:21a-12: lag na rdo rje brtul zhugs brtan //
T02TD1874E:21a-13: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta siddhi badzra sa ma ya tishtha ae sha tvam dha ra ya mi /
T02TD1874E:21a-15: de yi de nyid bshad par bya //
T02TD1874E:21a-16: sngon mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02TD1874E:21a-17: rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che //
T02TD1874E:21a-18: kun du bzang po kun gyi bdag / rdo rje snying po'i gtso bo'i gtso //
T02TD1874E:21a-19: aa las byung ba'i dril bu ni //
T02TD1874E:21a-20: lag g-yon byin nas phyogs brgyad dkrol //
T02TD1874E:21a-21: brtul zhugs 'di yang dang po ru //
T02TD1874E:21a-22: de yi grogs su sbyin pa'o //
T02TD1874E:21a-23: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD1874E:21a-25: rtag par khyod kyis kyang bzung ste //
T02TD1874E:21a-26: rgyal ba byang chub mchog tu 'dod //
T02TD1874E:21a-27: de nyid bshad par bya ba ni //
T02TD1874E:21a-28: 'di ni khyod kyis dkrol bya ste //
T02TD1874E:21a-29: srid pa rang bzhin gyis dag phyir //
T02TD1874E:21a-30: rang bzhin gyis ni 'byung bar byed //
T02TD1874E:21a-31: rang bzhin dag pas sems can kun //
T02TD1874E:21a-32: dam pa'i srid pa byed pa po //
T02TD1874E:21a-33: slob ma rdo rje dbyings phyug dang //
T02TD1874E:21a-34: ldan par bsams nas bcom ldan 'das //
T02TD1874E:21a-36: phyag rgya'i dam tshig sbyin pa'o //
T02TD1874E:21a-37: phyag rgya chen po'i byin brlabs te //
T02TD1874E:21a-38: snying po bsnyen pa la sogs grags ;
T02TD1874E:21a-39: / dam tshig 'dod gzugs sogs rnams kyis //
T02TD1874E:21a-40: sngags ni dbugs su rtogs nas bzla //
T02TD1874E:21a-41: rang gi rang bzhin de rnams kyis //
T02TD1874E:21a-42: phyogs bcu dus gsum khyab pa yi //
T02TD1874E:21a-43: ma lus gtso bo mchod byas nas //
T02TD1874E:21a-44: bdag dang gzhan yang mnyes par bya //
T02TD1874E:21a-45: dka' thub dam bcas de dag gis ;
T02TD1874E:21a-46: / bstan par byas kyang 'grub pa med //
T02TD1874E:21a-47: mi snang mngon shes mkha' 'gro med //
T02TD1874E:21a-48: sku gsung thugs las grub skyes so //
T02TD1874E:21a-49: de bas sangs rgyas sems can rnams //
T02TD1874E:21a-50: sngags kyi spyod pa mchog bzung ste //
T02TD1874E:21a-51: 'dod pa kun la longs spyod pas //
T02TD1874E:21a-52: chos kyi yi ge mchog thob 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:21b-0: @21b bde sdug gnyis med bdag nyid kyis //
T02TD1874E:21b-1: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga bsten te //
T02TD1874E:21b-2: chags chen ye shes don sbyor na //
T02TD1874E:21b-3: de kho na nyid kun kyang 'grub //
T02TD1874E:21b-4: sku gsung thugs grub yang dag ste //
T02TD1874E:21b-5: gang gzhan dman pa yang skye 'dod //
T02TD1874E:21b-6: de yang sku gsung thugs bsgoms nas //
T02TD1874E:21b-8: thun mong ma yin sdom par ldan //
T02TD1874E:21b-9: sbyor ba ma nyams yon phul nas //
T02TD1874E:21b-10: rdo rje slob dpon dbang nod phyir //
T02TD1874E:21b-11: de yis lan gsum gsol ba gdab //
T02TD1874E:21b-12: byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la //
T02TD1874E:21b-13: mchod chen ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin //
T02TD1874E:21b-14: bdag kyang rab tu bsgral ba'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:21b-15: nam mkha' rdo rje bdag la stsol //
T02TD1874E:21b-16: 'jug pa'i sgo ru khru do bar //
T02TD1874E:21b-18: sa bon gyis mtshan dbang stegs bri //
T02TD1874E:21b-19: seng ge mtshan par 'dug tu gzhug / de nyid ting 'dzin gsum ldan par //
T02TD1874E:21b-20: byas nas bla ma'i lus dkyil 'khor //
T02TD1874E:21b-21: sangs rgyas sogs spro rnam dgug cing //
T02TD1874E:21b-22: nam mkha'i khams kun dga' bar bya //
T02TD1874E:21b-23: de yis rnga dril sil snyen dang //
T02TD1874E:21b-24: rgyal mtshan 'phen sogs pheg rdob cing //
T02TD1874E:21b-25: bum pa gtso sogs gzung byas nas //
T02TD1874E:21b-26: sngon bzhin chu sogs dbang bskur bsam //
T02TD1874E:21b-27: dbang bskur rdo rje chen po ni //
T02TD1874E:21b-28: khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas pa //
T02TD1874E:21b-29: gsang gsum gnas las byung ba yi //
T02TD1874E:21b-30: sangs rgyas kun gyis sbyin pa yin //
T02TD1874E:21b-31: de skad lan gsum brjod nas su //
T02TD1874E:21b-32: dge ba'i phyir dang shis pa'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:21b-33: bum pa spyi bor rab bzung ste //
T02TD1874E:21b-34: bkra shis dbyangs 'di brjod par bya //
T02TD1874E:21b-35: dpal ldan gser gyi ri bo ltar 'bar ba //
T02TD1874E:21b-36: 'jig rten gsum mgon dri ma gsum dang bral //
T02TD1874E:21b-37: bcom ldan pad rgyas lta bu'i spyan mnga' ba //
T02TD1874E:21b-38: bkra shis des ni deng khyod zhi byed shog / de yis bstan pa'i dri med mchog rab ni //
T02TD1874E:21b-39: 'jig rten gsum grags lha dang mis mchod pa //
T02TD1874E:21b-40: cho ga skye dgu rnams ni zhi bar byed //
T02TD1874E:21b-41: bkra shis gnyis pa deng 'dir khyed la shog / dam pa'i chos ldan thos gang bkra shis shing //
T02TD1874E:21b-42: dge 'dun lha dang lha mi'i mchod 'os pa //
T02TD1874E:21b-43: ngo mtshar dpal rab mchog rab tshogs rnams kyi //
T02TD1874E:21b-44: bkra shis gsum pa deng 'dir khyed la shog / de nas de dag thams cad kun //
T02TD1874E:22a-0: ye shes ngo bor zhugs bsams @22a * //
T02TD1874E:22a-2: / dbu rgyan ye shes sems dpa' bskyed //
T02TD1874E:22a-3: bskor byas slob dpon gnas par bya //
T02TD1874E:22a-4: sngon bzhin mchod dang bstod pa dang //
T02TD1874E:22a-5: bdud rtsi myang ba yang byas nas //
T02TD1874E:22a-6: dkyil 'khor de bzhin nyid bstan bya //
T02TD1874E:22a-7: sangs rgyas ma rgyas mnyam pa'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:22a-8: gru bzhi ru ni rab tu bstan //
T02TD1874E:22a-9: dran pa nyer bzhag shar gyi sgo //
T02TD1874E:22a-10: yang dag spong ba lho yi sgo //
T02TD1874E:22a-11: rdzu 'phrul rkang pa nub kyi sgo //
T02TD1874E:22a-12: dbang po stobs ni byang gi sgo //
T02TD1874E:22a-13: bsam gtan bzhi ni tva ra na //
T02TD1874E:22a-14: ting 'dzin rnams ni kha khyer brgyad //
T02TD1874E:22a-15: gzungs rnams der gnas lha mo'o //
T02TD1874E:22a-16: bsam pa bskang phyir lha tshogs rgyan //
T02TD1874E:22a-17: gsung rab yan lag 'phags sogs so //
T02TD1874E:22a-18: byang chub yan lag dra bsogs //
T02TD1874E:22a-19: rnam par thar brgyad ka ba brgyad //
T02TD1874E:22a-20: sngags tshul rdo rje phreng ba zlum //
T02TD1874E:22a-21: phyi logs rnam dag yon tan lnga //
T02TD1874E:22a-22: dri med stobs sogs mchod pa lnga //
T02TD1874E:22a-23: bum pa chus gang thugs rje dang //
T02TD1874E:22a-24: tshogs rdzogs ser po ye shes gter //
T02TD1874E:22a-25: 'gro ba rnams dang dbyer med kyang //
T02TD1874E:22a-26: de yi nyes pas mi gos phyir //
T02TD1874E:22a-27: sna tshogs padma bcu dgu ni //
T02TD1874E:22a-28: sdong bu dang ni bcas pa'o //
T02TD1874E:22a-29: mi dge 'dam rdzab skam mdzad phyir //
T02TD1874E:22a-30: dge ba'i myu gu gso mdzad pa //
T02TD1874E:22a-31: nyi ma'i gdan ni bdun rnams so //
T02TD1874E:22a-32: nyon mongs tsha ba bsil byed dang //
T02TD1874E:22a-33: ma rig mun nag sel ba'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:22a-34: zla ba bcu gnyis dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD1874E:22a-35: tshor ba gsob la sogs pa dang //
T02TD1874E:22a-36: 'ju ba la sogs dus bcu gnyis //
T02TD1874E:22a-37: zad dus sgron bdun rnam dag pas //
T02TD1874E:22a-38: grangs ni nges par bstan pa'o //
T02TD1874E:22a-39: nyon mongs thams cad las grol phyir ;
T02TD1874E:22a-40: / gzhal yas khang du btags pa yin //
T02TD1874E:22a-41: snying po la ni 'dus pa'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:22a-42: dkyil 'khor zhes su bshad pa yin //
T02TD1874E:22a-43: rnam par shes pa zhe sdang thugs //
T02TD1874E:22a-44: chos dbyings rnam dag mi bskyod pa //
T02TD1874E:22a-45: gzugs phung gti mug che dang sku //
T02TD1874E:22a-46: me long rnam dag rnam snang mdzad //
T02TD1874E:22a-47: tshor ba'i phung po mnyam pa nyid //
T02TD1874E:22a-48: nga rgyal rnam dag rin chen 'byung //
T02TD1874E:22a-50: so sor rtog pa snang mtha' yas //
T02TD1874E:22a-51: 'du byed phung po nan tan dang //
T02TD1874E:22a-52: phrag dog rnam dag don yod grub //
T02TD1874E:22a-53: sa dang stong nyid thabs dang ni //
T02TD1874E:22a-54: snying rje zhi byed spyan ma'o //
T02TD1874E:22b-0: byams dang me tshan med @22b smon lam dang //
T02TD1874E:22b-1: chu khams srung byed m'a ma k'i //
T02TD1874E:22b-2: dga' dang smon med stobs dang ni //
T02TD1874E:22b-3: me khams rgyas byed na bza' dkar //
T02TD1874E:22b-4: btang snyoms ye shes rang bzhin gsal //
T02TD1874E:22b-5: rlung khams sgrol byed sgrol ma'o //
T02TD1874E:22b-6: sbyin pa rnam dag gzugs rdo rje //
T02TD1874E:22b-7: tshul khrims rnam dag sgra rdo rje //
T02TD1874E:22b-8: bzod pa rnam dag dri rdo rje //
T02TD1874E:22b-9: brtson 'grus rnam dag ro rdo rje //
T02TD1874E:22b-10: bsam gtan rnam dag reg rdo rje //
T02TD1874E:22b-11: shes rab rnam dag chos rdo rje //
T02TD1874E:22b-12: phyi yi longs spyod kyis mchod phyir //
T02TD1874E:22b-14: mi la sogs pa rnam dag phyir //
T02TD1874E:22b-15: de nyid du ni bkod par gsungs //
T02TD1874E:22b-16: dbyung sngags ting 'dzin ma gsungs pas //
T02TD1874E:22b-17: sa snying la sogs phyir mi dgod //
T02TD1874E:22b-18: 'jigs sogs shes bya phung po'i bdud //
T02TD1874E:22b-19: dad dag gshin rje gshed 'gugs pa //
T02TD1874E:22b-20: nyon mongs de bdud mthar 'dzin lha //
T02TD1874E:22b-21: brtson dag 'jug byed shes mthar byed //
T02TD1874E:22b-22: skye sgrib 'chi bdag log par lta //
T02TD1874E:22b-23: dran dag 'ching byed rta mgrin no //
T02TD1874E:22b-24: las dang lha bdud mchog 'dzin lha //
T02TD1874E:22b-26: chos dang longs spyod sprul pa dang //
T02TD1874E:22b-27: ngo bo nyid de rnam bzhi ni //
T02TD1874E:22b-28: thugs sogs rdo rje ye shes sems //
T02TD1874E:22b-29: phyag rgya bzhi zhes bshad pa yin //
T02TD1874E:22b-30: rnam par rtog pa dang bral phyir ;
T02TD1874E:22b-31: / gting dpag dka' bas zab mo ste //
T02TD1874E:22b-32: phyag rgya chen por rab snang ba //
T02TD1874E:22b-33: rang bzhin smin byed gsal ba po //
T02TD1874E:22b-34: zab mo dang ni yang dag gsal //
T02TD1874E:22b-35: shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid de //
T02TD1874E:22b-36: mtha' gnyis skyo na ni rab bkag pas //
T02TD1874E:22b-37: dus thams cad du dbyer med do //
T02TD1874E:22b-38: de bzhin slob ma dbang bskur dang //
T02TD1874E:22b-39: dngos grub sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi //
T02TD1874E:22b-40: sgrub pa'i thabs ni rab bstan pas //
T02TD1874E:22b-41: gang zag gnyis su shes par byed //
T02TD1874E:22b-42: gzugs brnyan glegs bam la sogs pa //
T02TD1874E:22b-43: yod na khyod kyis rab gnas mdzod //
T02TD1874E:22b-44: de ni ji srid bar du ni //
T02TD1874E:22b-46: / de ltar lung bstan dbugs dbyung dang //
T02TD1874E:22b-47: bka' stsal ba yis dbang bskur nas //
T02TD1874E:22b-48: bskyed pa'i rim pa kun bstan te //
T02TD1874E:22b-49: bka' lung g-yar gyi blang pa'o //
T02TD1874E:22b-50: bum pa'i dbang gi cho ga'o //
T02TD1874E:22b-51: lo'am yang na zla ba ru //
T02TD1874E:22b-52: rig dang slob dpon dbang thob pas //
T02TD1874E:23a-2: spyod pa mchog gis bla ma bkur //
T02TD1874E:23a-3: rin chen sna bdun la sogs pa //
T02TD1874E:23a-4: rjes su mthun pa dbul bya ste //
T02TD1874E:23a-5: bla ma dgyes bar byed pa'i ched //
T02TD1874E:23a-6: bu mo gzhon nu gzugs bzang ba //
T02TD1874E:23a-7: rgyan ldan dam sdom dbang bcas pa //
T02TD1874E:23a-8: lus rgyas mdzes pa dbul byas nas //
T02TD1874E:23a-9: bla ma'i g-yon du bu mo bzhag / rgyal po mu stegs chom rkun gyis //
T02TD1874E:23a-10: gnod med dben pa'i sa phyogs su //
T02TD1874E:23a-11: mchog gi dris byugs pad sogs gdan //
T02TD1874E:23a-12: bla re rgyal mtshan sogs kyis bklubs //
T02TD1874E:23a-13: rol mo zil snyan sna tshogs sgras //
T02TD1874E:23a-14: gong gi 'khor ram yang na sku //
T02TD1874E:23a-15: tshogs kyi mchod pa chen po yis //
T02TD1874E:23a-16: dbyer med 'khor lo mchod byas nas //
T02TD1874E:23a-17: me tog snyim bkang gsol ba gdab //
T02TD1874E:23a-18: kun mkhyen ye shes phung po sogs //
T02TD1874E:23a-19: bus btsugs thal sbyar mgrin dma' bas //
T02TD1874E:23a-20: gsang ba mchog gi sdom pa che //
T02TD1874E:23a-21: yang dag blangs nas bsrung bar bya //
T02TD1874E:23a-22: ji ltar dbang bskur sogs tshul gyis //
T02TD1874E:23a-23: sangs rgyas la sogs thob pa bzhin //
T02TD1874E:23a-24: byang chub spyod pa gzhan gyis ni //
T02TD1874E:23a-25: 'dul ba'i dge ba de bzhin med //
T02TD1874E:23a-26: de bas dam tshig bus srungs shig / rtag tu sdom pa yang skyongs shig / sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga bza' ste //
T02TD1874E:23a-27: de las gzhan yang dam tshig srungs //
T02TD1874E:23a-28: dkon mchog bla ma brnyas byed gzhom //
T02TD1874E:23a-29: gzhan gyi bud med spyad pa dang //
T02TD1874E:23a-30: ma byin par yang blangs byas nas //
T02TD1874E:23a-31: brdzun gyi tshig kyang smra bar bya //
T02TD1874E:23a-32: rnal 'byor rgyud las gsungs pa bzhin //
T02TD1874E:23a-33: de ni chog bzhin du srungs //
T02TD1874E:23a-34: de ltar bya'o zhes gsol nas //
T02TD1874E:23a-35: yang na me tog phreng ba gtor //
T02TD1874E:23a-36: thal mo sbyar nas gsang ba yi //
T02TD1874E:23a-37: dbang nod phyir ni gsol ba gdab //
T02TD1874E:23a-38: rdo rje sems khyod la sogs pa //
T02TD1874E:23a-39: tshigs bcad lnga yis lan gsum du //
T02TD1874E:23a-40: zhugs nas slob ma dam pa ni //
T02TD1874E:23a-41: mdzes pa'i chas ldan gyis bya'o //
T02TD1874E:23a-42: de nas bla ma yon tan mtsho //
T02TD1874E:23a-43: mchog gi mchog gis de gsan nas //
T02TD1874E:23a-44: zhal ni mdangs dang ldan byas nas //
T02TD1874E:23a-45: snying rje de la bskyed par bya //
T02TD1874E:23a-46: gzugs sogs phun sum tshogs ldan pa'i lha mo de ni byin brlabs nas //
T02TD1874E:23a-47: thub pa'i dbang po zhugs byas nas //
T02TD1874E:23a-48: rdo rje nang du gnas par bya //
T02TD1874E:23b-0: mthe @23b bo srin lag gis bkab nas //
T02TD1874E:23b-1: slob ma dpal ldan snang mdzad khar //
T02TD1874E:23b-2: spro ba'i sngags kyis phab nas su //
T02TD1874E:23b-3: gnyi gas 'di ni brjod bar bya //
T02TD1874E:23b-4: aa ho aa ho su kha ho //
T02TD1874E:23b-5: gzhan yang blo yi bye brag gis //
T02TD1874E:23b-6: dbang bskur byas nas mgrin ba ru //
T02TD1874E:23b-7: de nyid myong bar byas nas su //
T02TD1874E:23b-9: de 'di rdo rje thams cad kyi //
T02TD1874E:23b-10: dbang bskur mchog tu bsngags pa ste //
T02TD1874E:23b-12: las mchog khyad par can yang 'grub //
T02TD1874E:23b-13: zla ba za ba rab byung ba //
T02TD1874E:23b-14: lung bstan dbugs dbyung bka' stsal pa //
T02TD1874E:23b-16: rdo rje bzlas pas phyi nang tshogs //
T02TD1874E:23b-17: sgyu ma smig rgyu la sogs pa'i //
T02TD1874E:23b-18: 'dod don phyag mtshan mdog dang dbyibs //
T02TD1874E:23b-19: bsam mi khyab pa'i rnam smin sku //
T02TD1874E:23b-20: bsgom pa la gnas de bsgom gzhug / gsang ba'i dbang gi cho ga'o //
T02TD1874E:23b-21: de bzhin gong ma'i rim pa yis //
T02TD1874E:23b-22: mtshan dang ldan pa'i rig pa che //
T02TD1874E:23b-23: btsal te bla ma dag la yon //
T02TD1874E:23b-24: rjes mthun dang bcas dbul bar bya //
T02TD1874E:23b-25: sngon bzhin gsol btab sdom pa blangs //
T02TD1874E:23b-26: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T02TD1874E:23b-27: nyan thos rang rgyal de bzhin te //
T02TD1874E:23b-28: sku gsung thugs su sbyor ba na //
T02TD1874E:23b-30: kun du rdo rje sems dpa' yi //
T02TD1874E:23b-31: lus ngag yid kyi dkyil 'khor la //
T02TD1874E:23b-32: bsam gtan rdo rje gsum sbyor bas //
T02TD1874E:23b-33: sngags zlos pas ni bsam gtan bya //
T02TD1874E:23b-34: mdor na sems can thams cad ni //
T02TD1874E:23b-35: bsam gtan rdo rje bskul bar bya //
T02TD1874E:23b-36: de 'di rdo rje thams cad kyi //
T02TD1874E:23b-37: dam chos rab tu bstan pa'o //
T02TD1874E:23b-38: dkyil 'khor dag kyang yang mi bri //
T02TD1874E:23b-39: glegs bam bklag par mi bya zhing //
T02TD1874E:23b-40: mchog rten dag gi las mi bya //
T02TD1874E:23b-41: rdo rje gsum mchog phyag mi bya //
T02TD1874E:23b-42: gal te byang chub mchog 'dod na //
T02TD1874E:23b-43: lag pa'i phyag rgya mi bcing ngo //
T02TD1874E:23b-44: de ltar bya zhes gsol bar bya //
T02TD1874E:23b-45: yang ni me tog gtor byas nas //
T02TD1874E:23b-46: mchod sbyin rdo rje la sogs pa'i //
T02TD1874E:23b-47: tshigs bcad lan gsum gsol btab nas //
T02TD1874E:23b-48: shes rab ye shes yang dag blang //
T02TD1874E:23b-49: de nas lha mo bdag nyid dang //
T02TD1874E:23b-50: dam tshig sdom pa'i mchog smras nas //
T02TD1874E:23b-51: bde chen za ma tog gi ni //
T02TD1874E:23b-52: lha mo'i bsngags pa rab tu brjod //
T02TD1874E:24a-1: mdun du gnas pa'i lag / g-yas g-yon 'og dang steng bzhag nas //
T02TD1874E:24a-2: byin gyis brlabs pa'i lha mo 'di //
T02TD1874E:24a-3: sngags 'di yis ni sbyin bar bya //
T02TD1874E:24a-5: sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod du gnang //
T02TD1874E:24a-7: dam pa'i bde ba khyod kyis myong //
T02TD1874E:24a-8: de nas rab mnyam bzhag pa yis //
T02TD1874E:24a-9: dal ba'i bya ba rnam gsum gyis //
T02TD1874E:24a-10: rdo rje skyil krung nang du sems //
T02TD1874E:24a-11: rin chen dkyil du rtogs pa bya //
T02TD1874E:24a-12: rang gi lha yi 'khor lor ldan //
T02TD1874E:24a-13: dbyings kyi dbang phyug dang 'brel pa //
T02TD1874E:24a-14: yol bas bcad de bde myong la //
T02TD1874E:24a-15: sngon bzhin dbang bskur byas nas thim //
T02TD1874E:24a-16: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nu r'a ga badzra sv'a bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD1874E:24a-17: gti mug rang bzhin gti mug sbyor //
T02TD1874E:24a-18: gti mug dga' dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1874E:24a-19: gti mug rgyun gyis dbang bskur na //
T02TD1874E:24a-20: gti mug rdo rje'i bdag nyid 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:24a-21: zhe sdang rang bzhin zhe sdang sbyor //
T02TD1874E:24a-22: zhe sdang dga' ma dang ldan par //
T02TD1874E:24a-23: zhe sdang rgyun gyis dbang bskur na /
T02TD1874E:24a-24: zhe sdang rdo rje'i bdag nyid 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:24a-25: dod chags rang bzhin 'dod chags sbyor //
T02TD1874E:24a-26: 'dod chags dga' dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1874E:24a-27: 'dod chags rgyun gyis dbang bskur na //
T02TD1874E:24a-29: shes rab ye shes bdag sbyar na //
T02TD1874E:24a-30: rdo rje dga' ma dang ldan par //
T02TD1874E:24a-31: ye shes rgyun gyis dbang bskur na //
T02TD1874E:24a-32: shes rab ye shes bdag nyid 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:24a-34: de nas bla mas g-yon pa yi //
T02TD1874E:24a-35: phyag ni slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag / de bzhin gshegs kun dpang byas la //
T02TD1874E:24a-36: rig pa'i brtul zhugs sbyin pa'o //
T02TD1874E:24a-37: thabs gzhan gyis ni sangs mi rgya //
T02TD1874E:24a-38: de bas rig ma 'di ni mchog / chos kun gnyis su med pa la //
T02TD1874E:24a-39: gnyis kyis rnam par mtshon pa yin //
T02TD1874E:24a-40: de bas rtag tu 'khor ba ru //
T02TD1874E:24a-41: khyed kyis 'bral bar ma byed cig /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD1874E:24a-42: rig pa'i brtul zhugs bla na med //
T02TD1874E:24a-43: blun chen gang zhig 'da' byed na //
T02TD1874E:24a-44: mchog gi dngos grub de la med //
T02TD1874E:24a-45: de ltar de bzhin gzhir yang grangs //
T02TD1874E:24a-46: sngon bzhin gnyis ni rgyas btab pas //
T02TD1874E:24a-47: gsal la zhing rab dga' mkha' 'dra ba'i //
T02TD1874E:24b-0: man ngag du ni de nyid brtag / bla ma de bzhin @24b gshegs gyur na //
T02TD1874E:24b-1: snying gar khu tshur chos gos g-yon //
T02TD1874E:24b-2: g-yas pas mchog sbyin phyag rgya bya //
T02TD1874E:24b-3: bdag nyid bzhengs nas lung ston bya //
T02TD1874E:24b-4: aom khyod la bdag gis lung 'di ston //
T02TD1874E:24b-5: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD1874E:24b-6: srid pa'i ngan 'gro thar byas nas //
T02TD1874E:24b-7: yang dag srid pa grub pa'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:24b-8: sa bla sa steng sa 'og tu //
T02TD1874E:24b-9: kye rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba //
T02TD1874E:24b-10: rang byung rang nyid grub gyur cig / sngags pa gang la lung 'di bstan //
T02TD1874E:24b-11: de ni 'gro ba kun gyi gtso //
T02TD1874E:24b-12: bla na med pa'i byang chub la //
T02TD1874E:24b-13: bde gshegs kun gyis lung bstan yin //
T02TD1874E:24b-15: ji ltar dbang bskur thob pa yis //
T02TD1874E:24b-16: slob mas yon tan brjod par mos //
T02TD1874E:24b-17: dam tshig gsum gyis dbugs phyung nas //
T02TD1874E:24b-19: dam tshig gsang chen dkyil 'khor la //
T02TD1874E:24b-20: rab tu zhugs nas mthong bas na //
T02TD1874E:24b-21: khyod ni sdig pa kun las grol //
T02TD1874E:24b-22: de ring shin tu kho nar gnas //
T02TD1874E:24b-23: bde chen theg pa 'di la ni //
T02TD1874E:24b-24: phyin chad shi ba yong med de //
T02TD1874E:24b-25: mi thub mi shigs gzhan gyis kyang //
T02TD1874E:24b-27: sdug bsngal srid las mya ngan 'das //
T02TD1874E:24b-28: srid pa gtan du dag pa'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:24b-29: yang dag 'byung ba ston pa'i mchog / srid pa gtan du dngos grub po //
T02TD1874E:24b-30: dngos grub dam tshig sdom pa 'di //
T02TD1874E:24b-31: rig ma rtag tu bsrung bar bya //
T02TD1874E:24b-32: dam pa'i shes rab bstan pa ni //
T02TD1874E:24b-33: sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par gsungs //
T02TD1874E:24b-34: byang chub sems ni spang mi bya //
T02TD1874E:24b-35: gang zhig rdo rje phyag rgya zhes //
T02TD1874E:24b-36: de ni bskyed pa tsam gyis kyang //
T02TD1874E:24b-37: sangs rgyas nyid du the tshom med //
T02TD1874E:24b-38: dam pa'i chos ni smad mi bya //
T02TD1874E:24b-39: ma rig pa dang gti mug gis //
T02TD1874E:24b-40: de ni bor bar mi bya'o //
T02TD1874E:24b-41: rang bdag yongs su spangs pa dang //
T02TD1874E:24b-42: dka' thub sdug bsngal gzir mi bya //
T02TD1874E:24b-43: ji ltar bde ba 'di bzung nas //
T02TD1874E:24b-45: rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya rnams //
T02TD1874E:24b-46: nam yang spang par byar mi rung //
T02TD1874E:24b-47: bla ma sangs rgyas dang mnyam phyir //
T02TD1874E:24b-48: rdo rje slob dpon smad mi bya //
T02TD1874E:24b-49: de ni sangs rgyas kun mnyam phyir //
T02TD1874E:24b-50: slob dpon la ni smod byed na //
T02TD1874E:24b-51: sangs rgyas thams cad smad pa yin /
T02TD1874E:24b-52: des ni rtag tu sdug bsngal thob //
T02TD1874E:24b-53: rims dang 'or dang dug dang nad //
T02TD1874E:25a-2: bgegs dang tshogs bdag drag po yis //
T02TD1874E:25a-4: de bas nan tan thams cad kyis //
T02TD1874E:25a-5: mchog gi dge ba mngon 'gyur ba'i //
T02TD1874E:25a-6: rdo rje slob dpon bla chen la //
T02TD1874E:25a-7: nam yang brnyas par byar mi rung //
T02TD1874E:25a-8: gus pas bla ma yon du ni //
T02TD1874E:25a-9: rjes su 'thad pas dbul bar bya //
T02TD1874E:25a-10: des ni rims nad la sogs pa //
T02TD1874E:25a-12: rtag tu rang gi dam tshig bsgrub //
T02TD1874E:25a-13: rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa mchod //
T02TD1874E:25a-14: rtag tu bla ma la yang dbul //
T02TD1874E:25a-15: sangs rgyas kun dang de mnyam phyir //
T02TD1874E:25a-16: de byin sangs rgyas thams cad la //
T02TD1874E:25a-17: rtag tu byin pa nyid du 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:25a-18: de byin bsod nams tshogs yin pas //
T02TD1874E:25a-19: tshogs la byang chub mchog tu 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:25a-20: ci phyir shin tu 'dir gnas pas //
T02TD1874E:25a-22: dam tshig lha dang mnyam pa ru //
T02TD1874E:25a-23: gnas par the tshom med pa'o //
T02TD1874E:25a-24: rdo rje dang bcas sangs rgyas kyis //
T02TD1874E:25a-25: de ring khyed rnams dbang bskur bas //
T02TD1874E:25a-26: rgyal po chen po khams gsum na //
T02TD1874E:25a-27: rgyal po gtso bo brtan par 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:25a-28: de ring bdud rnams rnam bcom nas //
T02TD1874E:25a-29: gzhal yas khang mchog du chud phyir //
T02TD1874E:25a-30: sangs rgyas nyid phyir de kho nar //
T02TD1874E:25a-31: khyab bdag gis ni the tshom med //
T02TD1874E:25a-32: rab tu dang ba'i yid kyis ni //
T02TD1874E:25a-33: rdo rje de dag kun mdzod cig / zad med rang gi dam tshig bde //
T02TD1874E:25a-34: bde bar sems bskyed la bsnyen cing //
T02TD1874E:25a-35: myur bar 'gro ba'i bde chu ru //
T02TD1874E:25a-36: rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra ba yi //
T02TD1874E:25a-37: mnyam pa de ru gyur nas su //
T02TD1874E:25a-38: khyod rnams de la 'gro bar shog /
T02TD1874E:25a-40: de nas slob mas phyag 'tshal te /
T02TD1874E:25a-41: bla ma'i zhabs kyi bka' drin gyis //
T02TD1874E:25a-42: sogs pa'i tshig gis thams cad kun //
T02TD1874E:25a-43: gnang ba'i dbang ni blang bar bya //
T02TD1874E:25a-45: sems can rang bzhin du 'gro bgyis //
T02TD1874E:25a-46: de lta de ltar sems can don //
T02TD1874E:25a-47: 'dod chags la sogs dag par bya //
T02TD1874E:25a-48: nyin re yi ni mtshams gsum la //
T02TD1874E:25a-49: ting 'dzin gsum gyis sbyor ldan ni //
T02TD1874E:25a-50: bsgrubs nas sgrub pa thun mong dang //
T02TD1874E:25a-51: cig shos dngos grub bsgrub par bya //
T02TD1874E:25a-52: mi snang stong ni chung ngu la //
T02TD1874E:25a-53: mngon shes nyi stong bar ma la //
T02TD1874E:25b-0: rig 'dzin dag ni stong gsum @25b la ;
T02TD1874E:25b-2: zhi ba rgyas pa sogs las gang //
T02TD1874E:25b-3: de las gzhan nam gang 'dod la //
T02TD1874E:25b-4: dkyil 'khor kun du chags sbyor na //
T02TD1874E:25b-6: rdo rje bdag po thams cad kyis //
T02TD1874E:25b-7: 'dod chags de nyid don bsams te //
T02TD1874E:25b-8: sems can thams cad phan byed pa'i //
T02TD1874E:25b-9: byang chub 'dod chags las skyes mdzad //
T02TD1874E:25b-10: de bas byang chub 'dod bsngags pas //
T02TD1874E:25b-11: sku gsung thugs ni bsgom byas te //
T02TD1874E:25b-12: cho ga bzhin du las byed na //
T02TD1874E:25b-13: de kun rtogs par 'gyur ba yin //
T02TD1874E:25b-14: de dag byang chub thob 'dod kun //
T02TD1874E:25b-15: dga' ba'i sems kyis thams cad dbul //
T02TD1874E:25b-16: gang zhig phongs pas yid mi bde //
T02TD1874E:25b-17: dad pa'i mchog ldan de yin no //
T02TD1874E:25b-19: dad pa mchog tu gus ldan pas //
T02TD1874E:25b-20: bla ma'i zhabs ni spyi bor blang //
T02TD1874E:25b-21: ji ltar rje btsun bka' stsal ltar //
T02TD1874E:25b-22: de ltar bya zhes sbyang sngar gsol //
T02TD1874E:25b-23: bkra shis smon lam dang ldan par //
T02TD1874E:25b-24: yang dag gnas par gyur cig brjod //
T02TD1874E:25b-25: snod rung byas pa'i slob ma la /
T02TD1874E:25b-26: bla ma shin tu dgyes pa na /
T02TD1874E:25b-27: de dag kun las gsang ba dang /
T02TD1874E:25b-28: rab gsang shin tu gsang ba yi //
T02TD1874E:25b-29: bsgrags min mna' yis btab byas nas //
T02TD1874E:25b-30: som nyi med par bshad par bya ;
T02TD1874E:25b-31: /'byor ldan slob ma kun tshogs nas //
T02TD1874E:25b-32: sbyin sreg gnas su gnas byas nas //
T02TD1874E:25b-33: bla ma slob ma sbyor bar ldan //
T02TD1874E:25b-34: mar la sogs pa rgya chen rnams //
T02TD1874E:25b-35: slob mas g-yon pa'i mthe bong ni //
T02TD1874E:25b-36: bla ma'i g-yas pa'i mthe bong dang //
T02TD1874E:25b-37: gung mo yis ni gzung byas nas //
T02TD1874E:25b-38: sdig pa rnams ni zhi bar bya //
T02TD1874E:25b-39: de bzhin de ru sa bdag dang //
T02TD1874E:25b-40: phyogs skyong rgyal po la sogs pa //
T02TD1874E:25b-41: zhi bar bya phyir bdun nam ni //
T02TD1874E:25b-42: yang na gsum mam gcig tu bya'o //
T02TD1874E:25b-43: bdag nyid bshad dang nyan pa dang //
T02TD1874E:25b-44: bsam dang bsgom dang dngos grub bsgrub //
T02TD1874E:25b-45: tha na 'jig rten las grub dang //
T02TD1874E:25b-46: khyod kyis grogs ni mdzod cig ces //
T02TD1874E:25b-47: gsol ba btab nas gshegs su gsol //
T02TD1874E:25b-48: sngon bzhin mchod pa thams cad dang //
T02TD1874E:25b-49: glu gar sil snyan la sogs dang //
T02TD1874E:25b-50: bza' dang btung ba'i mchog rnams kyis //
T02TD1874E:25b-51: bdag gzhan 'khor lo mnyes par bya //
T02TD1874E:25b-52: de nas pog snod lag thogs te //
T02TD1874E:26a-0: @26a * // dril bu gsil nas pus mo btsugs //
T02TD1874E:26a-1: ye shes 'khor lo thams cad kun //
T02TD1874E:26a-3: aom sems can kun don mdzad nas su //
T02TD1874E:26a-4: dngos grub stsal te rigs pa bzhin //
T02TD1874E:26a-5: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs su gsol //
T02TD1874E:26a-6: yang ni 'byon par mdzod cig mu: //
T02TD1874E:26a-7: de bzhin aom dang a'a: dang h'um //
T02TD1874E:26a-9: rdo rje gsum la bsdu byas nas //
T02TD1874E:26a-10: de yang nam mkha' lta bur mos //
T02TD1874E:26a-11: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am /
T02TD1874E:26a-12: a'adya nu tpa nna tv'ta aom a'a: h'um sv'a h'a zhes brjod pas /
T02TD1874E:26a-13: gzugs brnyan stong pa nyid dmigs la //
T02TD1874E:26a-14: snod gtsang ma ru bsdus nas su //
T02TD1874E:26a-15: 'dod pa la ni nyung shas sbyin //
T02TD1874E:26a-16: lhag ma chu yi skye bo sogs //
T02TD1874E:26a-17: phan phyir gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang //
T02TD1874E:26a-18: 'phan sogs sil snyan rab ldan pa //
T02TD1874E:26a-19: dge 'dun tshogs kyis bteg nas su //
T02TD1874E:26a-20: chu bo chen por blug par bya //
T02TD1874E:26a-21: rdo rje rtse mos ri mo dbyi //
T02TD1874E:26a-22: bum pa bla re la sogs pa //
T02TD1874E:26a-23: spyad rung bla mas blang bya ste //
T02TD1874E:26a-24: lhag ma gong bzhin dor bar bya //
T02TD1874E:26a-26: glegs bam la sogs rab gnas kyi //
T02TD1874E:26a-27: cho ga bya ba gzhan du bshad //
T02TD1874E:26a-28: mkhas pa rnams kyi der shes bya //
T02TD1874E:26a-30: dkyil 'khor cho ga dang por gsungs //
T02TD1874E:26a-31: gzhan du khyad par ma gtogs pa //
T02TD1874E:26a-32: cho ga rgyas par 'dir shes bya //
T02TD1874E:26a-33: cung zad ye shes dbang thob pas //
T02TD1874E:26a-35: khams gsum skye bos smon 'dzugs phyir //
T02TD1874E:26a-36: rnam pa gzhan du mi bya'o //
T02TD1874E:26a-37: ri rtse nyams ni dga' ba dang //
T02TD1874E:26a-38: nags tshal rab tu dben pa'am //
T02TD1874E:26a-39: mchod rten kun dga' ra ba sogs //
T02TD1874E:26a-40: dgon pa'i gnas su spyad bya'o //
T02TD1874E:26a-41: bu mo lo grangs bcu gnyis ma //
T02TD1874E:26a-42: de bzhin bcu gnyis lon pa'i khye'u //
T02TD1874E:26a-43: cho rigs btsun zhing drang por skyes //
T02TD1874E:26a-44: rma sogs spangs dang bzhin mdzes shing //
T02TD1874E:26a-45: so yi thags bzang rab gtsang ba //
T02TD1874E:26a-46: skra gnag mig dkyus ring ba dang //
T02TD1874E:26a-47: rang bzhin dul ba rig pa che //
T02TD1874E:26a-48: bzung nas dbab par rab tu brtag / de la gong du smos pa dang //
T02TD1874E:26a-49: snod rung sogs kyis zhus nas su //
T02TD1874E:26a-50: de rnams don du tshogs skyed phyir //
T02TD1874E:26b-0: rnam par @26b dag pa'i bzlas pa bya //
T02TD1874E:26b-1: de bzhin sa btsal la sogs nas //
T02TD1874E:26b-2: sbran pa'i cho ga'i bar byas nas //
T02TD1874E:26b-3: lha dang bum pa sems can rnams //
T02TD1874E:26b-4: sta gon du ni gnas par bya //
T02TD1874E:26b-5: thig skud rdul tshon byin brlabs na //
T02TD1874E:26b-6: gong gsungs snod ni khrus byas te //
T02TD1874E:26b-7: gos dang rgyan gyis rab bklubs te //
T02TD1874E:26b-8: ri ska la sogs kyis bdug bya //
T02TD1874E:26b-9: de yi gnas gsum snga ma bzhin //
T02TD1874E:26b-10: dbang chen chu dang rlung dkyil 'khor //
T02TD1874E:26b-11: yi ge gsum gyi byin brlabs la //
T02TD1874E:26b-12: rkang mthil gnyis su skul byed pa //
T02TD1874E:26b-13: rlung gis sbar bas sdig pa bsreg / ye shes yang dag dbab pa'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:26b-14: rigs gsum pa dag nyid rdo rje dril //
T02TD1874E:26b-15: 'jigs rung gar dang bcas pa yis //
T02TD1874E:26b-16: de yi snying ga phye byas nas //
T02TD1874E:26b-17: chu dang mar bzhin ro gcig gyur //
T02TD1874E:26b-18: gzi byin la sogs ldan gyur na //
T02TD1874E:26b-19: babs pa'i rtags kyis shes par bya //
T02TD1874E:26b-20: spyan dang rnam par snang mdzad zhugs //
T02TD1874E:26b-21: khru gang tsam ma ma khru do'am //
T02TD1874E:26b-22: khru lnga tsam ma ma brgyad tsam du //
T02TD1874E:26b-24: snang ba mtha' yas gos dkar zhugs //
T02TD1874E:26b-25: phreng ba'i sngags dang dbyung pa'i sngags //
T02TD1874E:26b-26: de bzhin snying po rig pa sogs //
T02TD1874E:26b-27: ma bslabs par yang brjod par 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:26b-28: mi bskyod m'a ma k'i babs pas //
T02TD1874E:26b-30: ji ltar byung 'byung dngos po rnams //
T02TD1874E:26b-31: skad cig gis ni yang dag ston //
T02TD1874E:26b-32: de nas sngags kyis bstan par bya //
T02TD1874E:26b-33: de gnyis bla ma slob ma'i tshul //
T02TD1874E:26b-35: phyag rgya'am sku sogs 'god par byad //
T02TD1874E:26b-36: de nas mdun du 'dug byas nas ;
T02TD1874E:26b-37: / ji ltar bgyi zhes bka' nod byed //
T02TD1874E:26b-38: mchod pa sna tshogs rab byas la //
T02TD1874E:26b-39: ye shes lha ni gshegs su gsol //
T02TD1874E:26b-40: snod gnyis zas dang skom rnams dang //
T02TD1874E:26b-41: yon gyis mnyes par byas nas su //
T02TD1874E:26b-42: grangs lhag rung bar bya ba ste //
T02TD1874E:26b-43: rang gi gnas su gtang bya'o //
T02TD1874E:26b-44: de nas 'khor lo gnas bsam dang //
T02TD1874E:26b-45: mchod dang zhugs dang dbang bskur ba //
T02TD1874E:26b-46: bsdu ba dang po rnal 'byor bzhin //
T02TD1874E:26b-47: cho ga rgyas par bya ba'o //
T02TD1874E:26b-49: gzhan don rab tu bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:26b-50: bri ba'i gsung gi cho ga ni //
T02TD1874E:26b-51: gzhan du bshad pas der shes bya //
T02TD1874E:27a-2: / bri ba'i cho ga gsungs pa'o //
T02TD1874E:27a-3: sgrub pa la yang ri mo ni //
T02TD1874E:27a-4: tshul 'di dang ni mtshungs zhes bya //
T02TD1874E:27a-5: ye shes dbang sgyur rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD1874E:27a-6: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis //
T02TD1874E:27a-7: dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog las rgyal mchog / rdzogs pa'i bsam gtan gyis bsgrub bya //
T02TD1874E:27a-8: bla ma'i man ngag rab thob cing //
T02TD1874E:27a-9: sbyor shes de dag lhur len pa //
T02TD1874E:27a-10: rtags shes dang po pha rol phyin //
T02TD1874E:27a-11: yul la zhen pa dang bral ba'i //
T02TD1874E:27a-12: bdag nyid chen po nyag gcig des //
T02TD1874E:27a-13: de 'dra'i sa bcu mgon po che //
T02TD1874E:27a-14: rang gi nus pa dang phrad pa //
T02TD1874E:27a-15: mnyes bya de yis yang dag blang ;
T02TD1874E:27a-16: / me tog la sogs mchod pa'i tshogs //
T02TD1874E:27a-17: phyi rol nang du bcas sngon song //
T02TD1874E:27a-18: thal sbyar pus mo btsugs nas ni //
T02TD1874E:27a-19: bla chen de la gsol ba btab //
T02TD1874E:27a-20: 'jig rten sgron mchog rnal 'byor kun la 'phags //
T02TD1874E:27a-21: khyod ni skyon rnams dag pa'i pha rol phyin //
T02TD1874E:27a-22: srid pa'i mtsho las sems can kun sgrol ba //
T02TD1874E:27a-23: ded dpon chen po khyed la skyabs su mchi //
T02TD1874E:27a-24: bdag cag thabs bral 'khor bar 'khyams gyur te //
T02TD1874E:27a-25: ma rig mun pas bsgribs pas dmus long gyur //
T02TD1874E:27a-26: sdug bsngal gyis gzir yang dag don ma rnyed //
T02TD1874E:27a-27: bdag nyid chen po khyod kyis bskyab tu gsol //
T02TD1874E:27a-28: de skad gsol nas de yi tshe //
T02TD1874E:27a-29: bla ma bdag nyid chen po des //
T02TD1874E:27a-30: snying rje chen po rab bskyed nas //
T02TD1874E:27a-32: bu tshur shog cig bsam gtan gyi //
T02TD1874E:27a-33: 'khor lo chen po nga yis bstan //
T02TD1874E:27a-34: khyod kyis kyang ni mnyam zhog la //
T02TD1874E:27a-35: nga yi bkod pa lta bar gyis //
T02TD1874E:27a-36: de skad gsol nas bsam gtan gyi //
T02TD1874E:27a-38: lhun gyis grub pa'i sbyor ba ni //
T02TD1874E:27a-39: skad cig ye shes kyis rdzogs pa'o //
T02TD1874E:27a-40: sangs rgyas 'khor lo sbyar ba yis //
T02TD1874E:27a-41: bsam gtan 'khor lo rab rdzogs bya //
T02TD1874E:27a-42: ye shes 'khor lo bsam gtan gyis //
T02TD1874E:27a-43: 'khor lo can kun mngon sum zhugs //
T02TD1874E:27a-44: gong gsungs mchod pa'i cho ga ni //
T02TD1874E:27a-45: bsam gtan ldan pas mnyes par bya //
T02TD1874E:27a-46: de nyid brjod pas 'khor lo bskul //
T02TD1874E:27a-47: zhugs sogs gong bzhin rab byas te //
T02TD1874E:27a-48: ye shes dbab pa sngon 'gro ba'i //
T02TD1874E:27a-49: mthong ba'i yul bzhin rnam par gnas //
T02TD1874E:27b-0: @27b ye shes kyi ni 'khor lo la //
T02TD1874E:27b-1: gnyis med 'khor lo gzhug par bya //
T02TD1874E:27b-2: de nas byin gyis brlabs brjod la //
T02TD1874E:27b-3: sa bcu'i mgon po'i dkyil 'khor la //
T02TD1874E:27b-4: dngos grub rtags ni shes bya'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:27b-5: me tog 'dod par bya ba ste //
T02TD1874E:27b-6: sku'am dbus su nub gyur na //
T02TD1874E:27b-7: phyag rgya chen po bsgrub par bya ;
T02TD1874E:27b-8: / zhal gyi dkyil 'khor la babs na //
T02TD1874E:27b-9: sngags kyi dngos grub thob par bshad //
T02TD1874E:27b-10: lte ba'i dbus su rab babs na //
T02TD1874E:27b-11: thun mong dngos grub brgyad 'grub bo //
T02TD1874E:27b-12: sku smad cha ni gar 'bab kyang //
T02TD1874E:27b-14: ring zhing thal bas dngos grub kyang //
T02TD1874E:27b-16: phyag rgya chen po ji lta bzhin //
T02TD1874E:27b-17: bsgrub pas ji bzhin dus thob bo //
T02TD1874E:27b-18: ye shes babs pa'i mthu nyid kyis //
T02TD1874E:27b-19: dman mchog gsum dang rang gi las //
T02TD1874E:27b-20: ji skad bshad bzhin gyis rab thob //
T02TD1874E:27b-21: de las gzhan pa ji snyed pa //
T02TD1874E:27b-22: bla ma'i ye shes stobs kyis ni //
T02TD1874E:27b-23: sbyar ba yis ni rnyed pa'o //
T02TD1874E:27b-24: de nas mkha' dbyings thams cad kun //
T02TD1874E:27b-25: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T02TD1874E:27b-26: rig pa'i lha mo khro bo tshogs //
T02TD1874E:27b-27: chu sogs rkyen bzung gang bar bsams //
T02TD1874E:27b-28: de dag kun gyis bum pa dang //
T02TD1874E:27b-29: gsang dang shes rab ye shes dang //
T02TD1874E:27b-30: brtul zhugs lung bstan dbugs dbyung dang //
T02TD1874E:27b-31: bka' stsal pa rnams rim bzhin dbang //
T02TD1874E:27b-32: de yis de yi byang chub ni //
T02TD1874E:27b-33: sku gsungs thugs kyi byang chub che //
T02TD1874E:27b-34: sems can thams cad phan 'dod pas //
T02TD1874E:27b-35: ngo mtshar chen po rab tu grub //
T02TD1874E:27b-36: bsam gtan dkyil 'khor bsam gtan gyis //
T02TD1874E:27b-37: mchod dang dbang bskur de bzhin du //
T02TD1874E:27b-38: byas nas gzhan la 'ga' yi don //
T02TD1874E:27b-40: nga yis khyed ni dkyil 'khor du //
T02TD1874E:27b-41: bcug zin dbang bskur yang zin gyis //
T02TD1874E:27b-42: khyod kyis slob dpon sgrub po las //
T02TD1874E:27b-43: 'dod bzhin du ni gyis shig ces //
T02TD1874E:27b-44: gnang nas bsnyen la sogs pa la //
T02TD1874E:27b-46: de yis kyang ni khyod shes bya //
T02TD1874E:27b-47: bsam gtan 'khor los sbyang phyir ro //
T02TD1874E:27b-48: gnyis pa de ru 'jug mi nus //
T02TD1874E:27b-49: mthong ba'i yul la mngon zhen zhing //
T02TD1874E:27b-50: blo gros ngan zhing sbyor ba spangs //
T02TD1874E:27b-51: dad ldan snod rung de mthong nas //
T02TD1874E:28a-2: snying rje chen po rab bskyed nas //
T02TD1874E:28a-3: dag sogs cho ga sngon 'gro ba'i //
T02TD1874E:28a-4: phyi yi bya ba bsten bya ste //
T02TD1874E:28a-5: ye shes cung zad dbang gyur ltar //
T02TD1874E:28a-6: ri mo'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni //
T02TD1874E:28a-7: dbang bskur yang dag brtsam bya ste //
T02TD1874E:28a-8: gnyis med man ngag gis sbyang bya //
T02TD1874E:28a-9: de bzhin sku sogs 'khor lo la //
T02TD1874E:28a-10: cho ga sngon bzhin rgyas bya ste /
T02TD1874E:28a-11: kun khyab chos kyi dbyings ye shes //
T02TD1874E:28a-12: thams cad de ru rnam dag pas //
T02TD1874E:28a-13: bde gshegs gnas su mi bskyod dgod //
T02TD1874E:28a-14: gzhan gyi gnas su gzhan bkod de //
T02TD1874E:28a-15: gnyis shes rdo rje mtshon la sogs //
T02TD1874E:28a-16: khyad par gzhan yang rtogs par bya //
T02TD1874E:28a-17: rdo rje slob dpon slob ma sogs //
T02TD1874E:28a-18: gong dang 'og gi cho ga rnams //
T02TD1874E:28a-19: sems kyi 'ba' zhig gtso bor gsungs //
T02TD1874E:28a-20: dman pa las ni mchog mi 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:28a-21: sems nyid glang po yan lta bu //
T02TD1874E:28a-22: gzugs la sogs la 'phyan byed pas //
T02TD1874E:28a-24: de nyid rab tu rtogs byas la //
T02TD1874E:28a-25: dran pa'i thag pa dam po yis //
T02TD1874E:28a-26: dmigs pa'i ka ba la btags te //
T02TD1874E:28a-27: 'dod bzhin ba yi yul spyod pas //
T02TD1874E:28a-28: ji lta bzhin du 'dus pang bya //
T02TD1874E:28a-30: sems can kun gyi sems gang ni //
T02TD1874E:28a-31: brtan pa'i phyir na sems dpar brjod ;
T02TD1874E:28a-32: / mnyam par gzhag na ting 'dzin te //
T02TD1874E:28a-33: de bstan pa las rdo rjer 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:28a-34: sems dpa'i byin rlabs sbyor ba las //
T02TD1874E:28a-35: slar yang rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:28a-37: bsod nams tshogs kyi yan lag phyir //
T02TD1874E:28a-38: bcom ldan 'das kyis lus ngag gi //
T02TD1874E:28a-39: bya ba bstan te drang srong ltar //
T02TD1874E:28a-41: khang skas yan lag dang po bzhin //
T02TD1874E:28a-42: steng phyin ma yin dgos med min //
T02TD1874E:28a-43: de yi rten gyis de bzung ste //
T02TD1874E:28a-44: de nyid 'ba' zhig rtogs par bya //
T02TD1874E:28a-45: de bas sems la khyad par 'byung //
T02TD1874E:28a-46: longs spyod rdzogs dang sprul pa'i sku //
T02TD1874E:28a-47: de yi zhing khams yongs dag pa //
T02TD1874E:28a-49: mtshams kyi rnam shes ji lta dang //
T02TD1874E:28a-50: klu khros pa yi sems bzhin du //
T02TD1874E:28a-51: mi mthun ltar yang snang ba ste //
T02TD1874E:28a-52: de bas sems nyid rtogs par bya //
T02TD1874E:28a-53: rnal 'byor pa rnam pa gsum gyis slob ma rnams dbang bskur ba'i cho ga rgyas par bshad zin to /
T02TD1874E:28b-0: // / da ni dngos @28b grub sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga bshad par bya'o //
T02TD1874E:28b-1: de la sgrub pa po'i gang zag ni //
T02TD1874E:28b-2: brtul zhugs sdom pa sngags ldan pa //
T02TD1874E:28b-3: mi brtan lha yi nga rgyal bral //
T02TD1874E:28b-4: cung zad ye shes dbang gyur pa //
T02TD1874E:28b-5: thun mong sgrub pa shes par bya //
T02TD1874E:28b-6: rgyu dang mi rgyur bcas pa rnams //
T02TD1874E:28b-7: sgyur 'drar sems can dbyer med rtogs //
T02TD1874E:28b-8: thun mong cig shos dngos grub kyi //
T02TD1874E:28b-9: sgrub par ye shes dbang gyur pa'o //
T02TD1874E:28b-10: de yi yid dang mthun ba'i gnas //
T02TD1874E:28b-11: shin tu dben pa'i ri dgon dang //
T02TD1874E:28b-12: rnam pa sna tshogs ri bo dang //
T02TD1874E:28b-13: klung dang 'bab chu rnams dang ni //
T02TD1874E:28b-14: dur gyi khrod la sogs bar yang //
T02TD1874E:28b-15: bsam gtan bsdus pa 'di bsgom mo //
T02TD1874E:28b-16: dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs ni //
T02TD1874E:28b-17: me tog 'bras bu sogs kyis brgyan //
T02TD1874E:28b-18: ri bo dben pa dag tu ni //
T02TD1874E:28b-19: dngos grub thams cad bsdus pas 'grub //
T02TD1874E:28b-20: lam gyi bzhi mdo shing gcig drung //
T02TD1874E:28b-21: mtshan ma gcig dang zhi gnas su //
T02TD1874E:28b-22: rdo rje dgug pa'i khyad par gyis ;
T02TD1874E:28b-23: / sgrub pa pos ni rtag tu bsgrug / dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs sam //
T02TD1874E:28b-24: rab tu rnam par dben pa'am //
T02TD1874E:28b-25: ri bo nags 'dab chu ngogs su //
T02TD1874E:28b-27: rdo rje 'gug gnas mig sman dang //
T02TD1874E:28b-28: ka p'a la ru bsgom par bya //
T02TD1874E:28b-29: yid du 'od dang shis pa'i gnas //
T02TD1874E:28b-30: sgrub pa po yas rab nges bya //
T02TD1874E:28b-31: rjes su mthun pa'i shes pa'i zas //
T02TD1874E:28b-32: nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang //
T02TD1874E:28b-33: chu dang shel dang sman dang dri //
T02TD1874E:28b-34: phyag rgya chen po rig 'dzin gyis //
T02TD1874E:28b-35: lam la mkhas pa rnams kyis sngags //
T02TD1874E:28b-36: glang chen sha yis mngon shes bsgrub //
T02TD1874E:28b-37: rta yi sha yis mi snang bsgrub //
T02TD1874E:28b-38: 'gugs pa ba lang sha yis bsgrub //
T02TD1874E:28b-39: khyi sha yis ni thams cad bsgrub //
T02TD1874E:28b-40: nus pa yis ni dgug par bya //
T02TD1874E:28b-41: med na bsam pas rnam par brtag //
T02TD1874E:28b-42: ngo bo nyid dang mthun dag dang //
T02TD1874E:28b-43: rang bzhin gyis ni de 'grub pa'o //
T02TD1874E:28b-44: de ltar byas nas sangs rgyas dang //
T02TD1874E:28b-45: byang chub sems dpa' grangs chen mnyes /
T02TD1874E:28b-48: gtso bo gzi chen stobs dang ldan //
T02TD1874E:28b-49: mdangs bzang mthong na yid du 'ong //
T02TD1874E:28b-50: mthong bas bskul ba ma byas kyang //
T02TD1874E:28b-52: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD1874E:28b-53: gsang ba dam pa byang chub ste //
T02TD1874E:29a-0: @29a * // yang dag sngags kyi gsang ba 'di //
T02TD1874E:29a-2: mi snang stobs dang brtson 'grus dang //
T02TD1874E:29a-3: dam tshig chen po bsgrub pa dang //
T02TD1874E:29a-4: rdo rje 'gugs pa mchog dag kyang //
T02TD1874E:29a-5: dam tshig 'di yis rnam par grub //
T02TD1874E:29a-6: grub pa yi ni mtshan ma ni //
T02TD1874E:29a-7: shin tu 'bebs pa thob pa yis //
T02TD1874E:29a-9: bsod nams tshogs kyi yan lag rdzogs //
T02TD1874E:29a-10: spyi yi mtshan mar shes par bya //
T02TD1874E:29a-11: bzlas dang bsgom dang rang lha yi //
T02TD1874E:29a-12: khyad par gang yin rtogs par mdzad //
T02TD1874E:29a-13: rmi lam bye brag rab byed pas //
T02TD1874E:29a-14: so so'i mtshan ma shes par bya //
T02TD1874E:29a-15: bsam gtan ngag gi bzlas pa yis //
T02TD1874E:29a-16: dus sam byin rlabs rab sdud du //
T02TD1874E:29a-17: 'dod pas rnyed pa'i mtshan ma ni //
T02TD1874E:29a-18: rmi lam du ni shes par bya //
T02TD1874E:29a-19: rmi lam na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs tha dad par mthong ba dang /
T02TD1874E:29a-20: rmi lam na bdag nyid ye shes mchog thob nas sangs rgyas thams cad dang mthu mnyam par mthong ba dang /
T02TD1874E:29a-21: rmi lam na mtshan dang dpe byad du ldan pa'i longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku rgyud dag pa la snang bar bdag nyid mthong ba dang /
T02TD1874E:29a-22: rmi lam na brgya byin dang tshangs ba dang drag pa sogs pas bdag nyid la me tog la sogs pas mchod par mthong ba dang /
T02TD1874E:29a-23: rmi lam na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyi nang gi 'dod pa'i yon tan ldas bdag la mchod par mthong ba dang /
T02TD1874E:29a-24: rmi lam na bdag nyid rdo rje 'chang ba'am /
T02TD1874E:29a-25: rtag pa la sogs pa'i gzugs su mthong ba dang /
T02TD1874E:29a-26: rmi lam na rdo rje gsum mam spyan ma la sogs pa'am ;
T02TD1874E:29a-27: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bdag la btung cing phyag 'tshal bar mthong ba dang /
T02TD1874E:29a-28: rmi lam na mngon dga' la sogs pa'i zhing du mi bskyod pa la sogs pa mthong ba dang /
T02TD1874E:29a-29: de dag kyang thugs rab tu dgyes nas chos kyi mdzod chen po gtad par mthong pa dang /
T02TD1874E:29a-30: rmi lam na bdag nyid sh'akya thub pa la sogs pa'i gzugs lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin la sogs pas bskor zhing chos bshad par mthong ba dang /
T02TD1874E:29a-31: rmi lam na bdag nyid la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis nam mkha' la gdugs dkar po bteg cing /
T02TD1874E:29b-0: seng ge'i khri la @29b bzhag nas chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur bar mthong ba dang /
T02TD1874E:29b-1: rmi lam na gdol ba'i bu mo'am /
T02TD1874E:29b-3: rta rgod ma la sogs pa'am /
T02TD1874E:29b-4: snyoms par 'jug pa de dag phyag rgya chen po grub pa'i mtshan ma'o //
T02TD1874E:29b-5: gzhan yang rmi lam na kha dog sna tshogs pa'i kun dga' rab dang skyed mos tshal yid du 'ong ba mthong ba dang /
T02TD1874E:29b-6: rmi lam na lha'i bu mo gdu bu dang /
T02TD1874E:29b-11: zur phud la sogs pas brgyan pa dang /
T02TD1874E:29b-12: mi'i khye'u dang bu mo yid du 'ong ba bcu drug pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa mthong ba ni thun mong gi 'grub ba'i mtshan ma'o //
T02TD1874E:29b-13: rigs 'dzin la sogs yongs smin las //
T02TD1874E:29b-15: de bas de dag thams cad kun //
T02TD1874E:29b-16: cig shos mtshan mar shes par bya //
T02TD1874E:29b-17: sngon du bya ba'i las kyi rgyal po mchog ni /
T02TD1874E:29b-18: sngags pa rnam par dag pa yis //
T02TD1874E:29b-19: de dag rab tu rtogs byas nas //
T02TD1874E:29b-20: sngon gyi phyir na gnyis kyis kyang //
T02TD1874E:29b-21: ci rigs gsang sngags bzlas brjod bya //
T02TD1874E:29b-22: dben par gtsang gtor byas nas su //
T02TD1874E:29b-23: bgegs bskrad sa la gsol ba btab //
T02TD1874E:29b-24: cig shos la yang gsol byas nas //
T02TD1874E:29b-25: bka' stsal sa ni brko bar bya //
T02TD1874E:29b-26: sngon gyi rim pa shes byas la ;
T02TD1874E:29b-27: / sa stengs rgyan dang ldan pa dang //
T02TD1874E:29b-28: dag bya'i phyir na gong bzhin du //
T02TD1874E:29b-29: dbang bskur blang bas yid sbyang bya //
T02TD1874E:29b-30: rdo rjes khyad par byas pa yis //
T02TD1874E:29b-31: sa 'dzin lta bur byin brlabs la //
T02TD1874E:29b-32: bdag nyid ting 'dzin gsum gnas pas //
T02TD1874E:29b-33: de dbus nga rgyal gsum ldan bya //
T02TD1874E:29b-34: sngon bzhin rtag sogs gsol btab nas //
T02TD1874E:29b-35: byin brlabs stangs thabs brtsam pa'o //
T02TD1874E:29b-36: phur bus btab nas sa srung ste //
T02TD1874E:29b-37: nub gcig sta gon gnas par bya //
T02TD1874E:29b-38: lha rnams gnas par byas nas su //
T02TD1874E:29b-39: brod bskyed mchod pa sna tshogs brtsam //
T02TD1874E:29b-40: dgongs par bya phyir gong ma bzhin //
T02TD1874E:29b-41: 'khor lo gsol ba gdab par bya //
T02TD1874E:29b-42: lha mo bzhi dang mi bskyod pa //
T02TD1874E:29b-43: bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i bum pa ni //
T02TD1874E:29b-44: rdzas dang ldan par sta gon bya //
T02TD1874E:29b-45: yod na bcu dgu nges pa'o //
T02TD1874E:29b-46: skud pa tshon rtsi 'dus byas la //
T02TD1874E:29b-47: sngon bzhin 'bebs ba'i cho ga bya //
T02TD1874E:29b-48: de yis thig dang tshon btab nas //
T02TD1874E:30a-2: gzhan la ma thos sems can rnams //
T02TD1874E:30a-3: gzung bar bya phyir sngon bzhin bshad //
T02TD1874E:30a-4: gnas rnams stong ba mi mdzes pas //
T02TD1874E:30a-5: dang chud sring pas de ma bsngags //
T02TD1874E:30a-6: mi rnams kyis ni phye ma yis //
T02TD1874E:30a-7: zhal la sogs pa rdzogs mi 'gyu //
T02TD1874E:30a-8: yan lag ma rdzogs byin mi rlob //
T02TD1874E:30a-9: de bas lha yi mdzes pa bsngags //
T02TD1874E:30a-10: rang gi phyag rgya'am sems kyis su //
T02TD1874E:30a-11: lha rnams rab tu gnas byas nas //
T02TD1874E:30a-12: byin rlabs sngon du mchod pa sogs //
T02TD1874E:30a-13: brtsams te 'byung gtor khyad par du //
T02TD1874E:30a-14: rnam rgyal spyor bas skyon bsal nas //
T02TD1874E:30a-15: tshim par bya phyir lha rnams la //
T02TD1874E:30a-16: ji sring rdzas kyi thab rnams su //
T02TD1874E:30a-17: sbyin sreg gis ni mnyes bya'o //
T02TD1874E:30a-18: slob ma gzhug ba'i rim pa bzhin //
T02TD1874E:30a-19: bdag nyid 'khor lor zhugs par bya //
T02TD1874E:30a-20: sdig bshags me tog 'dor ba'i bar //
T02TD1874E:30a-21: byas nas lha rnams kyis gnang ba'i //
T02TD1874E:30a-22: sngon bzhin bum pa gsang ba dang ;
T02TD1874E:30a-23: / shes rab ye shes brtul zhugs dang //
T02TD1874E:30a-24: lung bstan dbugs dbyung bka' stsal thob //
T02TD1874E:30a-25: de yis bsgrub pa brtsam pa'o //
T02TD1874E:30a-26: sgrub pa'i thabs gang zhe na /
T02TD1874E:30a-27: dang po de bzhin gshegs pa yi //
T02TD1874E:30a-28: rig 'dzin sgrub thabs bshad par bya'o //
T02TD1874E:30a-29: ji bzhin byas pa'i sngags pa yis //
T02TD1874E:30a-30: thun mong cig shos bgegs bsal nas //
T02TD1874E:30a-31: spyi gzugs gyur nas rtag pa las //
T02TD1874E:30a-32: byung ba'i gzhal yas khang pa bsgom //
T02TD1874E:30a-33: lnga dang bzhi las mchog dang po //
T02TD1874E:30a-34: rab bskyed skye rim bzhi spangs nas //
T02TD1874E:30a-35: dri za rab tu zhugs byas pas //
T02TD1874E:30a-36: de ni cho ga bzhin du zhu //
T02TD1874E:30a-37: rang gi tshangs pa'i spyod pa bzhi //
T02TD1874E:30a-38: m'a ma k'i la sogs gyur nas //
T02TD1874E:30a-39: bskul te thim gyur sa bon gyur //
T02TD1874E:30a-40: phyag mtshan des mtshan bshes gnyen zhugs //
T02TD1874E:30a-41: de las rtag pa sngon bzhin bskyed //
T02TD1874E:30a-42: de yi thugs kar zla ba la //
T02TD1874E:30a-43: aom las 'khor lo aom gyis mtshan //
T02TD1874E:30a-44: bsams nas sngags kyis byin gyis brlab //
T02TD1874E:30a-45: aom dharma dh'a tu sv'a bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD1874E:30a-46: gnyis sogs ma gtogs de phyag rgyas //
T02TD1874E:30a-47: gnas nas sngags 'di bsgom par bya //
T02TD1874E:30a-48: aom a'a: aom dzin dzik h'um //
T02TD1874E:30a-49: brjod pas aom las 'od zer tshogs //
T02TD1874E:30a-50: dkar ba'i rgyun gyis nang gsal te //
T02TD1874E:30a-51: ba spu'i bu ga nas spros pa'i //
T02TD1874E:30b-0: 'od rtse rtag pa'i tshogs rnams @30b kyis ;
T02TD1874E:30b-1: / nam mkha'i khams kun bkang byas nas //
T02TD1874E:30b-2: sangs rgyas rtag pa spyan drangs nas //
T02TD1874E:30b-3: rang gi pa spu'i bu gar gzud //
T02TD1874E:30b-4: brtan pa'i ngo bos phyag byas nas //
T02TD1874E:30b-5: yang nas yang du dus bzhir bsgom //
T02TD1874E:30b-6: de nas zhag bdun la sogs nas //
T02TD1874E:30b-7: nye ba'i mtshan ma mthong nas ni //
T02TD1874E:30b-8: 'byung po rnams la gtor byin nas //
T02TD1874E:30b-9: yang ni sbyin pa der zhen bya //
T02TD1874E:30b-10: 'di lta bu yi sbyor ldan pas //
T02TD1874E:30b-11: rdo rje'i sku ni rgya mtsho dag / zla ba phyed na nges pa ru //
T02TD1874E:30b-13: ye shes lnga ldan bsten nas ni //
T02TD1874E:30b-14: rnam par snang mdzad dang 'dra ba'i //
T02TD1874E:30b-16: rdo rje bskal pa gsum du gnas //
T02TD1874E:30b-17: thams cad sngon bzhin rab byas te //
T02TD1874E:30b-18: 'od dpag med bsgoms mgrin pa ru //
T02TD1874E:30b-19: a'a: las padma a'a: yis mtshan //
T02TD1874E:30b-20: bsams nas bzlas brjod yang bya'o //
T02TD1874E:30b-21: aom a'a: a'a ro lik h'um //
T02TD1874E:30b-22: de yis sngon bzhin 'od dpag med //
T02TD1874E:30b-23: spros te bkug nas rang la btsud //
T02TD1874E:30b-24: brtan byas sngon bzhin rab bsgrubs nas //
T02TD1874E:30b-25: zla ba phyed na 'grub par nges //
T02TD1874E:30b-26: ye shes lnga dang ldan pa yis //
T02TD1874E:30b-27: rdo rje chos ni bsten byas nas //
T02TD1874E:30b-29: rdo rje bskal pa gsum du gnas //
T02TD1874E:30b-30: sngon bzhin mi bskyod rab bskyed de //
T02TD1874E:30b-31: thugs kar h'um las rdo rje la //
T02TD1874E:30b-32: h'um gis mtshan pa rab bsams la //
T02TD1874E:30b-33: sngags kyi bzlas brjod bya ba'o //
T02TD1874E:30b-34: aom a'a: h'um badzra dhrik h'um /
T02TD1874E:30b-35: sangs rgyas mi bskyod tshogs rnams kyang //
T02TD1874E:30b-36: btsud nas chags par byas nas su //
T02TD1874E:30b-37: sngon bzhin nye mtshan mthong bsgrubs nas //
T02TD1874E:30b-38: zla phyed 'grub par the tshom med //
T02TD1874E:30b-39: ye shes lnga ldan bsten na ni //
T02TD1874E:30b-40: ston pa rdo rje thugs 'dra ba //
T02TD1874E:30b-41: ye shes yon tan rgya mtshor 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:30b-42: rdo rje bskal pa gsum du gnas //
T02TD1874E:30b-43: thams cad sngon bzhin rab gnas te //
T02TD1874E:30b-44: mi bskyod cho ga bzhin bskyed nas //
T02TD1874E:30b-45: thugs kar rdo rje bum pa ru //
T02TD1874E:30b-46: aom bsams bzlas brjod bya ba'o //
T02TD1874E:30b-47: aom dharma dh'a tu dzny'a na rastu h'um /
T02TD1874E:30b-48: mi bskyod tshogs bkug sngon bzhin du //
T02TD1874E:30b-49: zhugs nas chags byas nye bar mthong //
T02TD1874E:30b-50: gtor ma btang nas rab bsgrubs nas //
T02TD1874E:30b-51: zla phyed mi bskyod 'dra ba thob /
T02TD1874E:30b-52: mi bskyod pa yi sku dag dang //
T02TD1874E:31a-2: mi bskyod rdo rje mchod par 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:31a-3: rin chen 'byung ldan sngon bzhin bskyed //
T02TD1874E:31a-4: thugs kar mtshan ma la gnas pa'i //
T02TD1874E:31a-6: de dang 'dra bar bsgrub par bya //
T02TD1874E:31a-7: aom a'a: aom samanta dzny'a na rastu h'um /
T02TD1874E:31a-8: de yis rin chen 'byung ldan tshogs //
T02TD1874E:31a-9: spros pa bkug nas rab tu btsud //
T02TD1874E:31a-10: brtan byas gong bzhin rab bsgrubs nas //
T02TD1874E:31a-11: zla ba phyed na rab tu 'grub //
T02TD1874E:31a-12: lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi //
T02TD1874E:31a-14: de ni byang chub bdag med dang //
T02TD1874E:31a-15: yi shes gsang ba'i gnas su 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:31a-16: 'od dpag med pa bsgom byas la //
T02TD1874E:31a-17: de yi thugs kar padma la //
T02TD1874E:31a-18: gnas pa'i aom ni bzlas byas pas //
T02TD1874E:31a-19: dpag med 'dra ba bsgrub par bya //
T02TD1874E:31a-20: aom a'a: aom pra t+ya beksha na dzny'a na rastu h'um /
T02TD1874E:31a-21: 'od dpag med pa'i tshogs spros pas //
T02TD1874E:31a-22: bkug nas brtan byas chags byas nas //
T02TD1874E:31a-23: gong ma bzhin du rab bsgrubs nas //
T02TD1874E:31a-24: zla ba phyed na 'grub par nges //
T02TD1874E:31a-25: sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje yi //
T02TD1874E:31a-27: 'di ni sems can thams cad kyi //
T02TD1874E:31a-28: theg chen lam gyi mchog tu 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:31a-29: sngon bzhin don yod grub bsgoms la //
T02TD1874E:31a-30: thugs kar ral gri'i yu ba la //
T02TD1874E:31a-31: zla ba'i dbus su aom bsams la //
T02TD1874E:31a-32: sngags kyi bzlas brjod brtsam pa'o //
T02TD1874E:31a-33: aom a'a: aom kri ta aa nushtha na dzny'a na rastu h'um /
T02TD1874E:31a-34: de yis don yod grub pa'i tshogs //
T02TD1874E:31a-35: spros te bkug byas zhugs byas la //
T02TD1874E:31a-36: gnas brtan ngo bor chags byas na //
T02TD1874E:31a-37: zla ba phyed na de dag 'grub //
T02TD1874E:31a-38: sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje yi //
T02TD1874E:31a-40: de ni dpal ldan ye shes mtsho //
T02TD1874E:31a-42: de bzhin snang mdzad bsgom byas te //
T02TD1874E:31a-43: sngags kyi bzlas brjod bya ba'o //
T02TD1874E:31a-44: aom a'a: aom a'a darsha dzny'a na badzra rastu h'um /
T02TD1874E:31a-45: sngon bzhin zhugs sogs rab byas nas //
T02TD1874E:31a-47: thams cad snga ma bzhin byas te //
T02TD1874E:31a-48: snang mdzad mgo mgrin thugs ka ru //
T02TD1874E:31a-50: zla ba'i dbus nas aom gsum gnas //
T02TD1874E:31a-51: aom a'a: aom aom aom tri ga ka ra ya rastu h'um /
T02TD1874E:31a-52: de yis rdo rje gsum gyi tshogs //
T02TD1874E:31a-53: bkug nas gnas gsum du brtan par //
T02TD1874E:31a-54: byas nas nye ba'i mtshan ma mthong //
T02TD1874E:31b-0: gong bzhin @31b byas na zla phyed 'grub //
T02TD1874E:31b-1: sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje yi //
T02TD1874E:31b-2: sangs rgyas snang mdzad 'dra ba'i mdog / de ni byang chub ye shes dang //
T02TD1874E:31b-4: de yi rim pas mi bskyod sogs //
T02TD1874E:31b-5: rang rang ngo bos rab bsgrubs na //
T02TD1874E:31b-6: dpal ldan zla ba phyed grub nas //
T02TD1874E:31b-7: rdo rje bskal pa gsum du gnas //
T02TD1874E:31b-8: de bzhin de ltar de gnyis sam //
T02TD1874E:31b-9: gcig la'ang gsum du goms byas nas //
T02TD1874E:31b-10: rgyal ba'i sras po mos pa yis //
T02TD1874E:31b-11: nyung ngam lhag par gnas par 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:31b-12: sngon bzhin thams cad rab byas la //
T02TD1874E:31b-13: rnam par snang mdzad cho ga bzhin //
T02TD1874E:31b-14: bskyed nas chos dbyings byin brlabs nas //
T02TD1874E:31b-15: lag pa g-yas pa 'khor lo bskyed //
T02TD1874E:31b-16: 'khor lo gser sogs dngos byas la //
T02TD1874E:31b-17: aom bskyed lte bar rtag pa yi //
T02TD1874E:31b-18: 'khor lo chen po rab bsgoms te //
T02TD1874E:31b-19: sngags kyi bzlas brjod brtsam pa'o //
T02TD1874E:31b-20: aom a'a: dzin dzik tsa kra aartha siddhi h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1874E:31b-22: bsdus te bcug nas brtan byas pas //
T02TD1874E:31b-25: de yi steng du su bsams nas //
T02TD1874E:31b-26: lag tu babs nas spyan mas bzla //
T02TD1874E:31b-27: 'byung po rnams la gtor sbyin la //
T02TD1874E:31b-28: chags byas zla ba phyed nas 'grub //
T02TD1874E:31b-29: ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi //
T02TD1874E:31b-30: rab tu phra ba'i rdul snyed kyi //
T02TD1874E:31b-33: sngon bzhin mi bskyod rab bsgoms la //
T02TD1874E:31b-34: rdo rje dngos byas h'um bskyed de //
T02TD1874E:31b-35: rdo rje rigs kyi 'khor lo bsgom //
T02TD1874E:31b-36: sngags kyi bzlas brjod bya ba'o ;
T02TD1874E:31b-37: / aom a'a: badzra dhrik badzra aartha siddhi h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1874E:31b-38: rdo rje rigs kyi spro dang bsdu //
T02TD1874E:31b-39: brtan par byas la chags byas nas //
T02TD1874E:31b-40: sngon bzhin rab tu bsgrub gyur na //
T02TD1874E:31b-41: zla ba phyed na 'grub par nges //
T02TD1874E:31b-42: ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi //
T02TD1874E:31b-43: rdul phran ji snyed yod pa yi //
T02TD1874E:31b-44: de snyed kyi ni bud med rnams //
T02TD1874E:31b-45: yon tan can gyi bdag gir 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:31b-46: drag po dag gis phyag byas pas //
T02TD1874E:31b-47: khams gsum rdo rje chen por 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:31b-48: sngon bzhin rgyas par rin chen 'byung //
T02TD1874E:31b-49: bsgoms nas sva bskyed rin chen dngos //
T02TD1874E:31b-50: rin chen rigs kyi lha bsgoms la //
T02TD1874E:31b-51: sngags kyi bzlas brjod bya ba'o //
T02TD1874E:32a-1: a'a: ratna dhrik ratna aartha siddhi sv'a h'a /
T02TD1874E:32a-2: rin chen rigs kyi lha rnams kun //
T02TD1874E:32a-3: spro zhing bsdu bas brtan byas nas //
T02TD1874E:32a-4: nye ba'i mtshan mthong sngon bzhin bsgoms //
T02TD1874E:32a-5: zla ba phyed 'grub the tshom med //
T02TD1874E:32a-6: ye shes lnga ldan bsten na ni //
T02TD1874E:32a-7: bskal ba gsum gyi yun gnas shing /
T02TD1874E:32a-8: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis //
T02TD1874E:32a-9: gsang ba gsum la bsnyen bkur byed //
T02TD1874E:32a-10: de bzhin dpag med tshe bsgoms la //
T02TD1874E:32a-11: gser sogs padma a'a: las skyes //
T02TD1874E:32a-12: lte bar gsung rigs lha bsgoms la //
T02TD1874E:32a-13: bzlas brjod rab tu bya ba'o //
T02TD1874E:32a-14: ao a'a: a'a ro likka ma la aartha siddhi sv'a h'a ;
T02TD1874E:32a-15: de spros gsung gi rigs bkug nas //
T02TD1874E:32a-16: bcug nas brtan bya yang yang bsgom //
T02TD1874E:32a-17: mtshan ma thob nas gtor ma btang //
T02TD1874E:32a-19: ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi //
T02TD1874E:32a-20: rab tu phra ba'i rdul snyed la //
T02TD1874E:32a-21: sangs rgyas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la //
T02TD1874E:32a-22: dag pa'i bdag nyid 'jog par byed //
T02TD1874E:32a-23: don yod grub pa sngon bzhin bsgom //
T02TD1874E:32a-24: ral gri dngos byas ha las bskyed //
T02TD1874E:32a-25: las kyi lha rnams yu bar bsgom //
T02TD1874E:32a-26: sngags kyi bzlas pa brtsam pa'o //
T02TD1874E:32a-27: aom a'a: pradzny'a dhrik khadga aartha siddhi sv'a h'a /
T02TD1874E:32a-28: las kyi rigs kyi lha rnams spro //
T02TD1874E:32a-29: bsdu zhing bcug nas chags byas na //
T02TD1874E:32a-30: de mtshan mthong nas sngon bzhin bsgrub //
T02TD1874E:32a-31: zla phyed kyis ni nges par 'grub //
T02TD1874E:32a-32: khams gsum kun gyis rab mchod cing //
T02TD1874E:32a-33: tshangs la sogs pas phyag kyang byas //
T02TD1874E:32a-34: stong gsum na ni mchog tu dpa' //
T02TD1874E:32a-36: gang rnams 'dod dang bsam pa dag / sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje 'dzin //
T02TD1874E:32a-37: rdo rje thugs las rab byung ba //
T02TD1874E:32a-38: de lta bu yi dngos grub ster //
T02TD1874E:32a-39: 'khor lo la sogs grub pa'i mchog / sangs rgyas sku dang 'dra bar 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:32a-40: gang g'a'i bye snyed thams cad du //
T02TD1874E:32a-41: grub pa kun du rnam par spyod //
T02TD1874E:32a-42: dam tshig dam pa thams cad kyi //
T02TD1874E:32a-44: rdo rje sku ni rab bsgoms pas //
T02TD1874E:32a-45: de ni dam tshig mchog tu 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:32a-46: thams cad snga ma bzhin byas te //
T02TD1874E:32a-47: 'jam dpal bskyed pa'i cho ga rdzogs //
T02TD1874E:32a-48: thugs kar ral gri'i yu ba la //
T02TD1874E:32a-49: ham gi 'od ldan bzlas brjod bya /
T02TD1874E:32b-0: @32b aom a'a: ham mnydzu shr'i h'um phat /
T02TD1874E:32b-1: de yi 'od kyis nang gsal nas //
T02TD1874E:32b-2: ba spu las byung 'od zer lngas //
T02TD1874E:32b-3: thams cad 'jam dpal skur byas te //
T02TD1874E:32b-4: bkug cing bu gar thim par bya //
T02TD1874E:32b-5: yang nas yang du brtan byas pas //
T02TD1874E:32b-6: baspu dbang po gzhu mthong nas //
T02TD1874E:32b-7: 'byung po gtor byin chags byas na ;
T02TD1874E:32b-8: / zla ba phyed kyis nges par 'grub //
T02TD1874E:32b-9: 'jam dpal dam tshig longs spyod la //
T02TD1874E:32b-10: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can //
T02TD1874E:32b-11: sa bcu dag la gnas pa yi //
T02TD1874E:32b-12: byang chub sems dpa' de 'gyur ro //
T02TD1874E:32b-13: yang ni 'jam dpal de bzhin bsgom //
T02TD1874E:32b-14: ral gri yu bar bcug 'phan gnas //
T02TD1874E:32b-15: bzlas brjod byas la gong bzhin dpag / de dang 'dra bar bsgrub par bya //
T02TD1874E:32b-16: aom a'a:thlim manydzu h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1874E:32b-17: de ni zla ba phyed na yang //
T02TD1874E:32b-19: rdul phran rdo rje lus ngag gi //
T02TD1874E:32b-21: snga ma bzhin du kun shes bya //
T02TD1874E:32b-22: gshin rje gshed la sogs pa bcu /
T02TD1874E:32b-23: longs spyod dang po rdzogs pa la //
T02TD1874E:32b-25: tho ba dbyug pa padma dang //
T02TD1874E:32b-26: rdo rje lcags kyu dbyug gsal zhing //
T02TD1874E:32b-27: ral gri 'khor lo rdo rje rnams //
T02TD1874E:32b-28: dngos byas 'khor lo gcig bsgom brjod //
T02TD1874E:32b-29: aom a'a: ya m'anta kri ta mud ra siddhi h'um /
T02TD1874E:32b-30: aom a'a:prdzny'nta krita badzha dha na da siddhi h'um /
T02TD1874E:32b-31: aom a'a: padmanta kri ta padma siddhi h'um /
T02TD1874E:32b-32: aom a'a: bighrn'a krita badzra siddhi h'um /
T02TD1874E:32b-33: aom a'a: takki r'a dza aam ku sha siddhi h'um /
T02TD1874E:32b-34: aom a'a: n'i la danda'i danda siddhi h'um /
T02TD1874E:32b-35: aom a'a: mbh'a ba la tri sh'u la siddhi h'um /
T02TD1874E:32b-36: aom a'a:aa tsa la khadga siddhi h'um /
T02TD1874E:32b-37: aom a'a: tsakra warti tsa kra siddhi h'um /
T02TD1874E:32b-38: aom a'a: su bha badzro siddhi h'um /
T02TD1874E:32b-39: de yis khro bo'i tshogs bkug ste //
T02TD1874E:32b-40: bcug nas brtan par byas nas su //
T02TD1874E:32b-41: sngon bzhin gtor sogs kyis bsgrub na /
T02TD1874E:32b-43: yang na rtag pa 'od dpag med //
T02TD1874E:32b-44: mi bskyod pa yi mtshan ma rnams //
T02TD1874E:32b-45: bsgrubs te rang gi lha bcug pas //
T02TD1874E:32b-47: mi snang ba bsgrub pa'i cho ga bshad par bya'o //
T02TD1874E:32b-48: sngon du spyi yi cho ga sogs //
T02TD1874E:32b-49: rgyas par rab tu bshad 'gyur yang //
T02TD1874E:32b-50: bde blag tu ni rtogs bya'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:32b-51: yang ni thugs rjes bsdus te bstan //
T02TD1874E:32b-52: mtshan ma thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD1874E:32b-53: 'dzab bzlas cho ga la sogs nas //
T02TD1874E:33a-2: bde ba'i stan la 'jug par bya //
