T02TD1874E:33a-3: bgegs bzlog chog nas brtsams te //
T02TD1874E:33a-4: brgyad kyis nam mkha' snying po bskyed //
T02TD1874E:33a-5: chos dbyings byin rlabs lus kun la //
T02TD1874E:33a-6: gnas bzhi ma gtogs kham gis mtshan //
T02TD1874E:33a-7: aom a'a: kham na kha garbha h'um /
T02TD1874E:33a-8: de yi 'od kyis sangs rgyas rnams //
T02TD1874E:33a-9: nam mkha'i snying po'i skur byas la //
T02TD1874E:33a-10: bkug ste kham kun la bstims la //
T02TD1874E:33a-11: na ma mkha' bzhin du stong par bsam //
T02TD1874E:33a-12: bdag gi yan lag mi mthong sogs //
T02TD1874E:33a-13: 'byung po gtor ma yang byin te //
T02TD1874E:33a-14: chags byas yad du bsgrub 'gyur na //
T02TD1874E:33a-15: zla ba phyed na mi snang 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:33a-16: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis //
T02TD1874E:33a-17: yang dang yang du mchod pa dang //
T02TD1874E:33a-18: bskal pa gcig tu gnas pa dang //
T02TD1874E:33a-19: sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi gzigs 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:33a-20: gzhi yi 'bras bu gzhan yin phyir //
T02TD1874E:33a-21: de bshad gsang ba'i thig le las //
T02TD1874E:33a-23: 'jig rten dbang po bsgrub pa bshad //
T02TD1874E:33a-24: thams cad sngon bzhin rab byas la //
T02TD1874E:33a-25: spyan ras gzigs dbang bsgom par bya //
T02TD1874E:33a-26: de lce hr'i: las padma ni //
T02TD1874E:33a-27: 'dab brgyad mdun du rdo rje ni //
T02TD1874E:33a-28: aom a'a: hr'i: lo ke shva ra bha dha na aartha siddhi h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1874E:33a-29: bzlas pa thos pas sangs rgyas rnams //
T02TD1874E:33a-30: 'jig rten dbang ni bskur bya ste //
T02TD1874E:33a-31: bkug ste lce la bcug nas ni //
T02TD1874E:33a-32: gnas brtan ngo bor chags par bya //
T02TD1874E:33a-33: lce de rdo rje mthong gyur nas //
T02TD1874E:33a-34: gtor ma byin te yang yang bsgom //
T02TD1874E:33a-35: zla pa phyed na nges pa ru //
T02TD1874E:33a-36: tshig gi dngos grub thams cad 'grub //
T02TD1874E:33a-37: bden pa ru ni smra ba dang ;
T02TD1874E:33a-38: / shags dang rgol ba sun 'byin dang //
T02TD1874E:33a-39: kun thos rnams ni yid 'ong bar //
T02TD1874E:33a-41: de las yang ni sgrub pa'i mchog / mtshon cha rnams ni 'jig 'gyur ba //
T02TD1874E:33a-42: phyi mas gsungs pa 'byung ba'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:33a-43: de yi sgrub pa'i cho ga bshad //
T02TD1874E:33a-44: sngon gsungs rgyas par bshad pa yi //
T02TD1874E:33a-45: cho ga rnams ni rdzogs byas la //
T02TD1874E:33a-46: klu shing me tog mtshan pa yi //
T02TD1874E:33a-47: snang mdzad 'dra ba'i byams pa bskyed //
T02TD1874E:33a-48: thugs kar mtshan ma la gnas pa'i //
T02TD1874E:33a-49: me ni cho ga bzhin bsgoms la //
T02TD1874E:33a-50: bzlas brjod byas pas byams pa yi //
T02TD1874E:33b-0: tshogs kyis @33b khams gsum dgad pa'o //
T02TD1874E:33b-1: aom a'a: me ma h'a me dha ra sa ra na h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1874E:33b-2: de yis sems can thams cad la //
T02TD1874E:33b-3: byams bas dmigs byas snying rje sogs //
T02TD1874E:33b-4: khro dang bral bar rab bsams la //
T02TD1874E:33b-5: sems can de dag rab tu bsdu //
T02TD1874E:33b-6: brtan par rab tu chags byas la //
T02TD1874E:33b-7: ral gri so sogs ma gtogs te //
T02TD1874E:33b-8: 'byung po gtor sbyin yang bsgoms na //
T02TD1874E:33b-9: zla phyed mtshon chas mi tshugs so //
T02TD1874E:33b-13: gang mthong byams sems dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD1874E:33b-14: sngon bzhin bya ba thams cad bya //
T02TD1874E:33b-15: 'jam dpal cho ga bzhin bsgoms la //
T02TD1874E:33b-16: thugs kar ral gri'i yu bar mam //
T02TD1874E:33b-17: bsams nas bzlas brjod par bya'o //
T02TD1874E:33b-18: aom a'a: mam manydzu shr'i aartha siddhi h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1874E:33b-19: 'od zer stug pos nang gsal te //
T02TD1874E:33b-20: ba spu'i bu ga las byung bas //
T02TD1874E:33b-21: sangs rgyas thams cad 'jam dpal skur //
T02TD1874E:33b-22: byas te bkug nas ba spu yi //
T02TD1874E:33b-23: bu gar bcug nas stod pa nyid //
T02TD1874E:33b-24: bsams pas sngon bzhin rtogs 'gyur na //
T02TD1874E:33b-25: bar chad zhi bar byas nas su //
T02TD1874E:33b-26: bsgrubs na zla ba phyen na 'grub //
T02TD1874E:33b-27: dpag chad brgya yi khyon tsam du //
T02TD1874E:33b-29: rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa yi //
T02TD1874E:33b-30: grub pa'i mtshan ma snang bar 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:33b-31: tshangs pa drag po la sogs lhas //
T02TD1874E:33b-32: nam yang mthong bar mi nu so //
T02TD1874E:33b-33: yang ni sngon bzhin thams cad bya //
T02TD1874E:33b-34: phyag rgya chen po gang yad rung //
T02TD1874E:33b-35: cho ga bzhin du dang pos bsgrub //
T02TD1874E:33b-36: de yis bsgrub pa'i ri lu gsungs //
T02TD1874E:33b-37: bdud rtsi lnga lnga'am rta shar sbyar //
T02TD1874E:33b-38: khyi sha'am sha chen dag dang sbyar //
T02TD1874E:33b-39: ba lang sha'am shang srin bu //
T02TD1874E:33b-40: ga bur tsandan dang sbyar ba'am //
T02TD1874E:33b-41: gi wam aa ka rur sbyar ba'am //
T02TD1874E:33b-42: ga pur gur kum sbyar ba yi //
T02TD1874E:33b-43: ril bu skrod byed lnga sbyor tsam //
T02TD1874E:33b-44: nyi ma zla ba sred byed kyi //
T02TD1874E:33b-45: nyi ma man cha bzhi dang ni //
T02TD1874E:33b-46: sreg byed gcig ste zla ba gnyis //
T02TD1874E:33b-47: bkri ba tsa na'i 'bru tsam du //
T02TD1874E:33b-49: khar bcug nas ni de dbus su //
T02TD1874E:33b-50: rang gi 'khor lo rab bsgoms la //
T02TD1874E:33b-51: de yis de yi sangs rgyas tshogs //
T02TD1874E:33b-52: bkug ste bcug nas bzlas brjod bya //
T02TD1874E:33b-53: aom a'a: ku la aartha siddhi h'um //
T02TD1874E:34a-2: 'byung po gtor ma yang byin nas //
T02TD1874E:34a-3: bsgoms na zla phyed mi snang 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:34a-4: rdo rje sku dang rab 'dra zhing //
T02TD1874E:34a-7: byang chub ye shes thob par 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:34a-8: 'di ni dpal dang ldan pa yi //
T02TD1874E:34a-10: dpag tshad bye ba gang g'a yi //
T02TD1874E:34a-12: 'dod thams gnas pa'i bu mo ni //
T02TD1874E:34a-13: lha yi longs spyod brtul zhugs ma //
T02TD1874E:34a-14: yang na gzugs khams gnas pa la //
T02TD1874E:34a-15: stobs chen gyis ni 'dod pa spyod //
T02TD1874E:34a-16: thams cad sngon bzhin rab byas te //
T02TD1874E:34a-17: rang gi lha ni dang po dmigs //
T02TD1874E:34a-19: thod pa yis ni brgyan par bya //
T02TD1874E:34a-20: bdud rtsi lnga ni go rims bzhin //
T02TD1874E:34a-21: gong gi cho gas dag byas nas //
T02TD1874E:34a-22: aom a'a: h'um yig gsum po ni ;
T02TD1874E:34a-23: / brgya dang brgyad du bzlas par bya //
T02TD1874E:34a-24: de yis dro ba la sogs pa //
T02TD1874E:34a-25: mthong nas bar chad zhi bya ste //
T02TD1874E:34a-26: yang ni sbyor bas brtan byas na //
T02TD1874E:34a-27: zla phyed sangs rgyas kyis mi mthong //
T02TD1874E:34a-28: de bzhin bshad pa 'ba' zhig gam //
T02TD1874E:34a-29: khyi sha rta sha 'bras chan sha //
T02TD1874E:34a-30: gong gi cho gas rab zos nas //
T02TD1874E:34a-31: sangs rgyas nyi mas mi mthong ngo //
T02TD1874E:34a-32: mi snang gyur pa kun las mchog / stong khams dag ni snang bar byed //
T02TD1874E:34a-33: sangs rgyas kun la 'phrog pa dang //
T02TD1874E:34a-34: lha yi bu mo mchog la spyod //
T02TD1874E:34a-35: mig sman sgrub pa bshad par bya'o //
T02TD1874E:34a-36: mtshan ma thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD1874E:34a-37: thams cad sngon bzhin rab byas la //
T02TD1874E:34a-38: rang gi lha yi sbyor ba ni //
T02TD1874E:34a-39: longs spyod dang pos rdzogs par bya //
T02TD1874E:34a-40: nya yi dus su brtsams nas ni //
T02TD1874E:34a-41: dro sogs rgyu las rab byung ba //
T02TD1874E:34a-42: brgyad kyi dus su shes byas la //
T02TD1874E:34a-43: bcu bzhi'i dus su bsgrub par bya //
T02TD1874E:34a-44: gong gi gnas su song nas kyang //
T02TD1874E:34a-45: thod pa gnyis kyi steng 'dug nas //
T02TD1874E:34a-46: mdun du thod pa'i man 'ji la //
T02TD1874E:34a-47: skyes pa'i thod pa bzang po bzhag / de yin nang du tshil chen la //
T02TD1874E:34a-48: khrag dang bdud rtsi lnga yis dgang //
T02TD1874E:34a-49: padma'i khong srog dur ras dkris //
T02TD1874E:34a-50: de la me mar 'bar bar bya //
T02TD1874E:34a-51: spyad mkhan thod bas steng bkab nas //
T02TD1874E:34b-0: de yi dud pa blangs @34b nas su ;
T02TD1874E:34b-2: // 'ug pa'i mgo ni bsreg byas nas //
T02TD1874E:34b-4: srod kyi dus su btags nas su //
T02TD1874E:34b-5: bya rgod rje ngar nang bkang la //
T02TD1874E:34b-6: padma'i zil pas brlan par bya //
T02TD1874E:34b-7: 'od med thur mas mig la bsku //
T02TD1874E:34b-8: de yi tho rangs dus nas ni //
T02TD1874E:34b-9: gnod sbyin gter rnams mthong ba dang ;
T02TD1874E:34b-11: gzi can kun gyis mi mthong 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:34b-13: bskal par gso bar gnas pa'i rgyu //
T02TD1874E:34b-14: bdud rtsi sman gyi cho ga mchog / ji bzhin du ni bshad par bya //
T02TD1874E:34b-15: thabs dang shes rab dbye ba yis //
T02TD1874E:34b-16: dkon mchog dpal dang 'od dpag med //
T02TD1874E:34b-17: dbu rgyan la ni bsam byas la //
T02TD1874E:34b-18: gnyis su med pa'i ros zhu 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:34b-19: tshim pa'i cho ga bzhin drangs nas //
T02TD1874E:34b-20: rtsa rgyus thams cad khyab par byas //
T02TD1874E:34b-21: rlung dang bad kan mkhris pa ni //
T02TD1874E:34b-22: khros par gyur kyang mi thub bo //
T02TD1874E:34b-23: skal dbang rnam pa gsum po yis ;
T02TD1874E:34b-24: / mos pa'i sems can gzung ba'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:34b-25: mthun pa'i cho ga la gnas nas //
T02TD1874E:34b-26: rang rang dam tshig gis gnas bya //
T02TD1874E:34b-27: thugs rjes non pa'i sngags pa yis //
T02TD1874E:34b-28: nyan thos gzugs kyis gnyis med spang //
T02TD1874E:34b-29: dge ba bcu la btsud nas ni //
T02TD1874E:34b-31: de bzhin rang sangs rgyas gzugs kyis //
T02TD1874E:34b-32: lus kyi rdzu 'phrul dpag med mdzad //
T02TD1874E:34b-33: btsud nas de don 'di la bkod //
T02TD1874E:34b-34: slar yang rang gi ngo bor 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:34b-35: de bzhin skad cig aom las bskyed //
T02TD1874E:34b-36: tshangs pa chen po zhal bzhi ba //
T02TD1874E:34b-37: mtshan dang rgyan rnams kyis brgyan pa //
T02TD1874E:34b-38: tshangs skud se ral cod pan la //
T02TD1874E:34b-39: rdo rje sems dpas mtshan pa yi //
T02TD1874E:34b-40: dang po dbyug pa rtse gsum gyis //
T02TD1874E:34b-41: mtshan pas zhi ba'i ku tsa btsir //
T02TD1874E:34b-43: dang steng padma zla bar gnas //
T02TD1874E:34b-44: gti mug lam gyis dman pa rnams //
T02TD1874E:34b-45: 'jigs pa bskyed cing mos ma thag / rang gi lha yi skur 'gyur ro //
T02TD1874E:34b-46: aa las bskyed pa'i drag po ni //
T02TD1874E:34b-47: thal mdog zhal gcig spyan gsum pa //
T02TD1874E:34b-48: zla phyed dang ldan cod pan la //
T02TD1874E:34b-49: rdo rje sems dpas mtshan pa'o //
T02TD1874E:34b-50: kha tv'am mgul pa dril mtshan pa'i //
T02TD1874E:34b-51: phyag g-yas kyi ni phrag pa brten //
T02TD1874E:35a-3: au ma sku mdog ser po ste //
T02TD1874E:35a-4: me tog sna tshogs sku la dkris //
T02TD1874E:35a-5: rgyan rnams kun gyis rab brgyan pa //
T02TD1874E:35a-6: rdo rje rtse mo nang pa ltas bsnams //
T02TD1874E:35a-7: gnyis kyis de yi ku tsa 'dzin //
T02TD1874E:35a-8: stag lpags sham thabs glang steng na //
T02TD1874E:35a-9: padma zla pa la gnas nas //
T02TD1874E:35a-10: zla ba'i 'od kyis rgyan du mtshan //
T02TD1874E:35a-11: de yi gzugs kyis 'dod chags can //
T02TD1874E:35a-12: bud med dngos po gsum spyad na //
T02TD1874E:35a-13: btsud nas mos ma thag tu ni //
T02TD1874E:35a-15: h'um las bskyed pa'i khyab 'jug gzugs ;
T02TD1874E:35a-16: / nag po rin chen dbu rgyan can //
T02TD1874E:35a-17: rdo rje sems dpa' ral pa mtshan //
T02TD1874E:35a-18: phyag bzhi 'khor lo rtse gsum dang //
T02TD1874E:35a-20: lha mo gser sku'i bdag nyid 'dra //
T02TD1874E:35a-21: thod du me tog sna tshogs dkris //
T02TD1874E:35a-22: mtshan ma bdag 'dra rgyan rnams brgyan //
T02TD1874E:35a-23: dang po gnyis kyis legs par 'khyud //
T02TD1874E:35a-24: khyung steng padma nyi ma bdug pa 'bru mar gyis //
T02TD1874E:35a-25: srin po rnams ni dga' bar bya //
T02TD1874E:35a-27: sdang ba rnams ni bsad nas su //
T02TD1874E:35a-28: yal bar mi 'gyur brtson byas nas //
T02TD1874E:35a-29: slar yang rang gi bdag nyid 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:35a-30: de ltar de bzhin sha bza' zhing //
T02TD1874E:35a-31: gzhan gyi bud med spyod pa yis //
T02TD1874E:35a-32: gnod spyin pho mo bsgrubs na ni //
T02TD1874E:35a-33: don byas yang ni grol bar 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:35a-34: 'o ma dang ni phra ma dang //
T02TD1874E:35a-35: 'dod yon lnga dang dri rnams kyis //
T02TD1874E:35a-36: klu yi bu mo bsten byas na //
T02TD1874E:35a-37: yang ni grol nas ngo bor gnas //
T02TD1874E:35a-38: khro zhing nga rgyal gnod sems ldan //
T02TD1874E:35a-39: sbos dang me tog spyad pa yis //
T02TD1874E:35a-40: lha min bu mo mnyes byas la //
T02TD1874E:35a-41: grol nas rang gi skur 'gyur ro //
T02TD1874E:35a-42: thos rung bdug pa 'bru mar gyis //
T02TD1874E:35a-43: srin po rnams ni dga' bar bya //
T02TD1874E:35a-44: de bzhin 'byung po rnams kyang ngo //
T02TD1874E:35a-45: des kyang gtsang ba'i don chen byed //
T02TD1874E:35a-46: bdud rtsi lnga'am khrag dag gam //
T02TD1874E:35a-47: chang la sogs pa 'thung pa yis //
T02TD1874E:35a-48: goo ra'i la sogs mnyes byas la //
T02TD1874E:35a-49: sdang ba ma lus gsad bar bya //
T02TD1874E:35a-50: de bzhin brgya byin la sogs pa'i //
T02TD1874E:35a-51: ngo bo dam tshig la gnas nas //
T02TD1874E:35a-52: de 'dra'i sems can gdul bya'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:35a-53: gzugs kyis de tsam gnas pa'o //
T02TD1874E:35b-0: @35b ngo bo nyid kyis kun 'byung ba //
T02TD1874E:35b-1: khams rnams dag na rnam par spyod //
T02TD1874E:35b-2: sems can kun la phan 'dod pas //
T02TD1874E:35b-3: dam tshig ma lus spyad par bya //
T02TD1874E:35b-4: gang dang gang gis bsam pa yis //
T02TD1874E:35b-6: thugs rjes non pa de dang der //
T02TD1874E:35b-7: snying rje'i bdag nyid rnams kyis bstan //
T02TD1874E:35b-8: da ni mngon par shes pa lnga //
T02TD1874E:35b-9: bsgrub pa'i cho ga bshad par bya'o //
T02TD1874E:35b-10: mtshan ma thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD1874E:35b-11: sngon bzhin bzlas pa'i cho ga nas //
T02TD1874E:35b-12: ri mo'i dkyil 'khor rjo gas byas nas //
T02TD1874E:35b-13: lha yis dbang bskur bar zhugs te //
T02TD1874E:35b-14: bgegs dgra sbyor ba nas brtsams te //
T02TD1874E:35b-15: chos kyi dbyings su byin gyis brlabs //
T02TD1874E:35b-16: gnyis kyi bsgrub pa rnam par bshad //
T02TD1874E:35b-17: gcig la 'bras bu gnyis su shes //
T02TD1874E:35b-18: mig gnyis dang ni rna pa gnyis //
T02TD1874E:35b-19: dpral ba snying ga lte ba ru //
T02TD1874E:35b-20: sngon bzhin kshim sogs mtha' gnyis las //
T02TD1874E:35b-21: 'khor lo la sogs de yis mtshan //
T02TD1874E:35b-22: de las bzhi po gcig gnyis skyed //
T02TD1874E:35b-23: de rnams thugs kyi 'od zer gyis //
T02TD1874E:35b-24: sangs rgyas rnams bkug zhugs byas pas //
T02TD1874E:35b-25: rdo rje ldar gyur bcud 'phan mtshan //
T02TD1874E:35b-26: aom a'a: badzra dhrik pnytsa bhi bhyid aartha siddhi h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1874E:35b-28: / sangs rgyas sa snying sogs byas pas //
T02TD1874E:35b-29: bkug ste gnas bcug brtan byas nas //
T02TD1874E:35b-30: bar du chod pa'ang mthong la sogs //
T02TD1874E:35b-31: dngos grub bar chod nyer zhi'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:35b-32: 'byung po sogs la gtor byin nas //
T02TD1874E:35b-33: gong gi sbyor bas chags byas na //
T02TD1874E:35b-35: de bzhin rtag pa rin chen 'byung //
T02TD1874E:35b-36: 'od dpag med dang don yod grub //
T02TD1874E:35b-38: ral gri gyur pa bcud 'phen mtshan //
T02TD1874E:35b-39: aom a'a: dzin dzik panytsa aa bhi bhyid aartha siddhi h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1874E:35b-40: aom ratna dhrik panytsa aa bhi bhyid aartha siddhi h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1874E:35b-41: aom a'a ro lik pnytsa aa bhi bhyid aartha siddhi h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1874E:35b-42: aom prdzny'a dhrik panytsa aa bhi bhyid aartha siddhi h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1874E:35b-43: brjod cing spros pas gong ma ltar //
T02TD1874E:35b-44: sa snying la sogs bcug byas te //
T02TD1874E:35b-45: mtshan mthong bar chad zhi byas nas //
T02TD1874E:35b-46: zla ba phyed na nges par 'grub //
T02TD1874E:35b-47: gang g'a'i bye snyeng sangs rgyas rnams //
T02TD1874E:36a-2: shing tog lag tu bzhag pa bzhin //
T02TD1874E:36a-3: rdo rje mig gis mthong bar 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:36a-4: gang g'a'i bye snyed zhing dag na //
T02TD1874E:36a-5: rna ba'i drung na 'khod pa bzhin //
T02TD1874E:36a-6: sgra grag pa yi ji snyed pa //
T02TD1874E:36a-7: mngon shes rna bas thos pa'o //
T02TD1874E:36a-8: gang g'a'i bye snyed zhing dag gi ;
T02TD1874E:36a-9: / sems can kun gyi sems rnams ni //
T02TD1874E:36a-10: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyis mtshan //
T02TD1874E:36a-11: gar mkhan la sogs rig par 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:36a-12: bskal pa gang g'a'i bye snyed du //
T02TD1874E:36a-13: 'khor ba dag na gnas pa yi //
T02TD1874E:36a-14: sngon gyi gnas kyi gtan tshigs brtag //
T02TD1874E:36a-15: zhag gsum 'das pa bzhin du dran //
T02TD1874E:36a-16: gang ga'a'i bye snyed zhing dag tu //
T02TD1874E:36a-17: sangs rgyas sprin gyis brgyan pa'i sku //
T02TD1874E:36a-18: bskal pa gang g'a'i bye snyed du //
T02TD1874E:36a-20: sangs rgyas mngon shes rgyu yi phyir //
T02TD1874E:36a-21: phul du 'byung bar bshad pa ste //
T02TD1874E:36a-22: grangs dang tshad du rab ldan pa'i ;
T02TD1874E:36a-23: / mngon par shes pa rtogs par bya //
T02TD1874E:36a-24: gang g'a'i bye snyeng grangs med pa'i //
T02TD1874E:36a-25: 'khor gyis yongs su bskor nas su //
T02TD1874E:36a-26: rdo rje sku dang gsung thugs kyis //
T02TD1874E:36a-28: da ni dgug pa'i cho ga'i las 'ga' zhig bshad par bya'o //
T02TD1874E:36a-29: mtshan ma thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD1874E:36a-30: gang gsungs gnas su ji lta bzhin //
T02TD1874E:36a-31: ri mo'i dkyil 'khor bri byas nas //
T02TD1874E:36a-32: lha yi dbang bskur byas nas zhugs //
T02TD1874E:36a-33: bka' yi 'khor lo sogs sbyor bas //
T02TD1874E:36a-34: rdo rje sems dpa'i sngon 'gro ba'i //
T02TD1874E:36a-35: 'dod pa'i lha ru dmigs byas la //
T02TD1874E:36a-36: mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs //
T02TD1874E:36a-37: lcags kyu gnas ni bsgrub pa'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:36a-38: rdo rje gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs //
T02TD1874E:36a-39: yi ge gsum par rang rang sngags //
T02TD1874E:36a-40: rig pa dang bcas bzlas par bya //
T02TD1874E:36a-41: rdo rje gsum las 'phros pa yi //
T02TD1874E:36a-42: lcags kyus mtshan pa'i lha rnams sbro ;
T02TD1874E:36a-43: / skyes pa bud med la sogs pa //
T02TD1874E:36a-44: sems can ma yin pa yang rung //
T02TD1874E:36a-45: rlung gi dkyil 'khor thog gnas pa //
T02TD1874E:36a-46: lcags kyus snying gar sbyar bar bya //
T02TD1874E:36a-47: rim bzhin 'ongs te lam byung gis //
T02TD1874E:36a-48: phab ste mdun du zla gnas la //
T02TD1874E:36b-0: spyan ma zhi @36b dang bsrung bar bya //
T02TD1874E:36b-1: de ltar byas pas ji tsam du //
T02TD1874E:36b-2: 'dod pa'i las ni byed nus pas //
T02TD1874E:36b-3: cho ga'i mchog ni 'di nyid ni //
T02TD1874E:36b-4: dgug pa kun la spyi ru sbyar //
T02TD1874E:36b-5: de bzhin bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yang //
T02TD1874E:36b-6: rdo rje gsum gyis mtshan pa bsgom //
T02TD1874E:36b-7: sngon bzhin rlung dkyil la gnas pa'i //
T02TD1874E:36b-8: mi yi bu mo mchog rnams dgug / aom a'a: bigh'anta krita bu mo che ge mo a'a karsha ya dza h'um dza /
T02TD1874E:36b-9: brgya rtsa lnga bcur brjod par bya //
T02TD1874E:36b-10: sngon bzhin 'dod pa'i rgyal bo yang //
T02TD1874E:36b-11: rdo rje gsum gyis byin brlabs la //
T02TD1874E:36b-12: rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i //
T02TD1874E:36b-13: nam mkha'i bu mo dgug par bya //
T02TD1874E:36b-14: aom a'a:takki r'a dza nam mkha'i bu mo a'a karsha ya dza h'um dza /
T02TD1874E:36b-15: spyor ba de ltar gnod mdzes kyang //
T02TD1874E:36b-16: rdo rje gsum gyis mtshan bsgoms la //
T02TD1874E:36b-17: lha ma yin gyi bu mo mchog / rlung dkyil tri sh'u lcags kyus dgug / aom a'a:sumbha r'a dza lha ma yin gyi bu mo a'a karsha ya dza h'um dza /
T02TD1874E:36b-18: sngon bzhin 'jam dpal rdo rje bskyed //
T02TD1874E:36b-19: rdo rje gsum gyis byin brlabs la //
T02TD1874E:36b-20: rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i //
T02TD1874E:36b-21: gnod sbyin bu mo'i cod pan la //
T02TD1874E:36b-22: mnan phyir khro bo gshin rje gshed //
T02TD1874E:36b-23: bskal pa'i bsregs pa ltar bsams la //
T02TD1874E:36b-24: lcags kyu zhags pas snying gar sbyar //
T02TD1874E:36b-25: mngag gzhug don du dgug par bya //
T02TD1874E:36b-26: rang rang sngags kyi khyad par dang //
T02TD1874E:36b-27: phyag rgya'i khyad par thams cad kyis //
T02TD1874E:36b-28: dgug par rang rang thabs su gsungs //
T02TD1874E:36b-30: rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che //
T02TD1874E:36b-31: yang dang yang du bskul bar bya //
T02TD1874E:36b-32: de nyid lha rnams thams cad dang //
T02TD1874E:36b-33: rgyal po rab tu brtan pa'o //
T02TD1874E:36b-34: rdo rje rgya mtsho rkang pas gnon pa'i cho ga bshad par bya'o //
T02TD1874E:36b-35: mtshan ma thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD1874E:36b-36: ri mo'i cho ga sngon bstan bzhin //
T02TD1874E:36b-37: chu yi drung sogs bris nas kyang //
T02TD1874E:36b-38: lha yi dbang bskur bar gyis zhugs //
T02TD1874E:36b-39: bka' yi 'khor lo la sogs pa //
T02TD1874E:36b-40: rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed nas kyang //
T02TD1874E:36b-41: dri za 'jug pa la sogs pas //
T02TD1874E:36b-42: byang chub sems su zhu bar 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:36b-43: de las phyogs bzhi dbus lnga'i chu //
T02TD1874E:36b-44: bhr'um 'am dzr'i kham h'um du gyur //
T02TD1874E:36b-45: de la mtshan ma de yis mtshan //
T02TD1874E:37a-2: mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs //
T02TD1874E:37a-3: rdo rje gsum ni gnas gsum bkod //
T02TD1874E:37a-4: de rnams kyi ni ye shes kyis //
T02TD1874E:37a-5: bskul sogs sngon 'gro dbang bskur bya //
T02TD1874E:37a-6: de yi dbu la bdag nyid ni //
T02TD1874E:37a-7: rdo rje 'chang ba rig mar bcas //
T02TD1874E:37a-8: mi bskyod dbu gnas zhabs bzhi yi //
T02TD1874E:37a-9: sangs rgyas bzhi yi spyi bor bsgom //
T02TD1874E:37a-10: aom a'a: sarbba buddha ma ku a'atma ham h'um /
T02TD1874E:37a-11: nga rgyal de yis brtan par gnas //
T02TD1874E:37a-12: chu la sogs ba reg rung ste //
T02TD1874E:37a-13: 'byung po mnyes par byas nas su //
T02TD1874E:37a-14: chags byas zla ba phyed na 'grub //
T02TD1874E:37a-15: de nas rtag pa la sogs pa'i ;
T02TD1874E:37a-16: / rnal 'byor ldan pas chu yi rdul //
T02TD1874E:37a-17: spyan la sogs pa bsgom byas nas //
T02TD1874E:37a-19: 'jam dpal rdo rje la sogs pas //
T02TD1874E:37a-20: chu rnams rang gi gnas su bsgom //
T02TD1874E:37a-21: gong bzhin brtan par rab byas nas //
T02TD1874E:37a-23: grub nas rgya mtsho bzhi la sogs //
T02TD1874E:37a-25: thang la bya ba ji bzhin du //
T02TD1874E:37a-26: rnal 'byor pa ni spyod par byed //
T02TD1874E:37a-27: thams cad sngon bzhin rab byas te //
T02TD1874E:37a-28: rdo rje sems dpa' sngon 'gro ba'i //
T02TD1874E:37a-29: bam dang rdo rje ser po las //
T02TD1874E:37a-30: dpa' po rdo rje bsgrub par bya //
T02TD1874E:37a-31: cung zad ser la g-yas g-yon zhal //
T02TD1874E:37a-32: gnag dang dkar po bsgom par bya //
T02TD1874E:37a-33: dang pos 'khyud cir lhag ma na //
T02TD1874E:37a-34: rdo rje ral gri nor bu pad //
T02TD1874E:37a-35: rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs pa //
T02TD1874E:37a-36: mig dang lus rdzogs byin brlabs nas //
T02TD1874E:37a-37: bskul ba la sogs sngon 'gro ba'i //
T02TD1874E:37a-38: mi bskyod pa yis dbu brgyan bsam //
T02TD1874E:37a-39: aom a'a:bi bi ra badzra h'um phat sv'a h'a //
T02TD1874E:37a-40: bzlas pa sngon bzhin rab byas pas //
T02TD1874E:37a-41: sangs rgyas thams cad de ru byas //
T02TD1874E:37a-42: bkug ste bcu gnas brtan byas pas //
T02TD1874E:37a-43: zla ba phyed na bka' nyan te //
T02TD1874E:37a-44: dgug dang dbang du bya ba sogs //
T02TD1874E:37a-45: sman dang sngags kyi dngos grub rnams //
T02TD1874E:37a-46: sgrub pa po ni ci 'dod pa'o //
T02TD1874E:37a-47: de dag thams cad sbyin par byed //
T02TD1874E:37a-48: yang ni sngon bzhin thams cad bya //
T02TD1874E:37a-49: rdo rje sems dpa' las byung ba'i //
T02TD1874E:37a-50: tsum dang padma dkar po las //
T02TD1874E:37a-51: tsum gyis mtshan pa bsam par bya //
T02TD1874E:37b-0: phyogs bcu la @37b gnas sangs rgyas sogs //
T02TD1874E:37b-1: skul byed pa yi gzugs byas nas //
T02TD1874E:37b-2: bkug ste de ru gzhug par bya //
T02TD1874E:37b-3: de la sangs rgyas rdo rje ma //
T02TD1874E:37b-4: dkar mo g-yas g-yon gnag dang dmar //
T02TD1874E:37b-5: dang pos thabs la 'khyud pa dang //
T02TD1874E:37b-6: pad snod ral gri nor bu 'bar //
T02TD1874E:37b-7: rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa yi //
T02TD1874E:37b-8: mig dang lus sogs byin brlabs la //
T02TD1874E:37b-9: bskul pa sngon du 'gro ba yi //
T02TD1874E:37b-10: mi bskyod pa yis dbu brgyan bya //
T02TD1874E:37b-11: de yi ye shes sems ma yi //
T02TD1874E:37b-12: thugs kar zla ba tsum bkod de //
T02TD1874E:37b-13: spro bsdu gzhug pa snga ma bzhin //
T02TD1874E:37b-14: sngags kyi bzlas pa bya ba'o //
T02TD1874E:37b-15: aom aa ca le tsu le tsunda le sv'a h'a h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1874E:37b-16: de yis zla ba phyed na ni //
T02TD1874E:37b-17: zhi ba la sogs gang yang rung //
T02TD1874E:37b-18: sgrub po'i yid la 'dod pa yi //
T02TD1874E:37b-19: dngos grub rnams ni ster bar 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:37b-20: khyad par du ni bum bzang dang //
T02TD1874E:37b-21: yid bzhin nor dang dpag bsam shing //
T02TD1874E:37b-23: sgrub pa po la spyon par byed //
T02TD1874E:37b-24: snga ma bzhin du thams cad bya //
T02TD1874E:37b-25: rdo rje sems las byung ba yi //
T02TD1874E:37b-26: dzam dang ral gri 'bras bu ni //
T02TD1874E:37b-27: dzam gis mtshan pa bsam par bya //
T02TD1874E:37b-28: de yi 'od kyis sangs rgyas rnams //
T02TD1874E:37b-29: gnod gnas kyi ni skur byas nas //
T02TD1874E:37b-30: bkug nas de la thim par bya //
T02TD1874E:37b-31: de la gnod sbyin dbang po che //
T02TD1874E:37b-32: gsus che rkang pa thung ba ste //
T02TD1874E:37b-33: gser 'dra g-yas g-yon gnag dang dkar //
T02TD1874E:37b-35: lhag mas pi dza p'u ra dang //
T02TD1874E:37b-36: sre mo rin chen skyug byed dang //
T02TD1874E:37b-38: zhabs g-yas rdo rje mtshan pa yi //
T02TD1874E:37b-39: bum pa bzang la rab bzhag ste //
T02TD1874E:37b-40: g-yon pa btsan dkyil du gnas pa //
T02TD1874E:37b-41: zla stang de yi 'od kyis mtshan //
T02TD1874E:37b-42: nor rgyun de 'dra dang po na //
T02TD1874E:37b-43: mchog sbyin 'bras kyi ste ldan pa //
T02TD1874E:37b-44: sku 'jam dbu la me tog gi //
T02TD1874E:37b-45: sna tshogs thod bcings zhi ba'o //
T02TD1874E:37b-46: gzhan gyi spyan zlum yid dga' ba'o //
T02TD1874E:37b-47: spyi bo snying ga lte ba dang //
T02TD1874E:37b-48: gsang ba dang ni rkang mthil du //
T02TD1874E:37b-49: zla ba nyi mar go rims bzhin //
T02TD1874E:37b-50: rtag pa mi 'khrugs rin chen che //
T02TD1874E:37b-51: 'od dpag med dang don grub bsgom //
T02TD1874E:37b-52: sku sogs byin gyis brlab byas nas //
T02TD1874E:37b-53: bskul ba sngon du 'gro ba yi //
T02TD1874E:37b-54: mi bskyod ba yis dbu brgyan bya //
T02TD1874E:38a-2: thugs kar zla bar dzam bkod de //
T02TD1874E:38a-3: sngon bzhin nor gyi char 'bebs pa //
T02TD1874E:38a-4: rtsom pa bcug ste bzlas brjod bya //
T02TD1874E:38a-5: aom a'a:dzambha la dza lendr'a ya h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1874E:38a-6: de yis zla ba phyed na ni //
T02TD1874E:38a-7: nyin re gser srang stong stong gi //
T02TD1874E:38a-8: sgrub pa po la rab sbyin par //
T02TD1874E:38a-10: yang ni rang 'dod sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1874E:38a-11: yan lag brgyad ni rdzogs byas te //
T02TD1874E:38a-12: rdo rje padma sbyar brtsams nas //
T02TD1874E:38a-13: bde gshegs rang gi zhal du gzhag / zhu nas rdor phyung pad nang du //
T02TD1874E:38a-14: byang chub sems la dzam bcu dgu //
T02TD1874E:38a-15: de las gtso bo gnod gnas kyis //
T02TD1874E:38a-17: de yi mig la sogs pa dang //
T02TD1874E:38a-18: sku gsung thugs ni byin gyis brlabs //
T02TD1874E:38a-19: yang na rang gi sa bon gyi //
T02TD1874E:38a-20: 'od kyis bde gshegs dgug par bya //
T02TD1874E:38a-21: zhal zhugs zhu gyur rdo rjer phyung //
T02TD1874E:38a-22: de yi lce la dzam bkod nas //
T02TD1874E:38a-24: zhal du dbab par byas nas dbul //
T02TD1874E:38a-25: aom a'a:dzam dan de hi de hi h'um /
T02TD1874E:38a-26: de yis tshim nas dbu rgyan la //
T02TD1874E:38a-27: rdo rje sems dpa' mchog bsgom zhing //
T02TD1874E:38a-28: zla ba phyed du dus bzhi ru //
T02TD1874E:38a-30: ji tsam 'dod pa'i nor ldan zhing //
T02TD1874E:38a-32: sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin rdzogs pa'i //
T02TD1874E:38a-34: thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la //
T02TD1874E:38a-37: gnod sbyin mo ni bsgrub par bya //
T02TD1874E:38a-38: ci gsungs gzhal yas khang bsgoms la //
T02TD1874E:38a-39: de yi sbyor bas dbus su gnas //
T02TD1874E:38a-40: mdun du gser mdog zla ba la //
T02TD1874E:38a-41: zla gam thig le rtse ldan pa //
T02TD1874E:38a-42: kshim bsgoms de las 'od zer spro //
T02TD1874E:38a-43: kha dog sna tshogs 'phros pa yis //
T02TD1874E:38a-44: spyan sogs lha mo bkod pa la //
T02TD1874E:38a-45: phog pas gnod sbyin mo ru 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:38a-46: bkug ste de la thim gyur nas //
T02TD1874E:38a-47: de gzugs gnas gyur gnod sbyin mo //
T02TD1874E:38a-48: rgyud gzhan las ni gsungs pa bzhin //
T02TD1874E:38a-49: sgrub po'i mdun du rnam par bsam //
T02TD1874E:38a-50: gser mdog mdzes pa'i cha lugs can //
T02TD1874E:38a-51: bud med gzhon nu'i skra tshul ldan //
T02TD1874E:38a-52: dar gyi na bzas stod smad dkris //
T02TD1874E:38b-0: rgyan rnams @38b kun gyis rnam par brgyan //
T02TD1874E:38b-1: g-yas pas gtugs ni dkar po thogs //
T02TD1874E:38b-2: g-yon pas dpag bsam shing la brten //
T02TD1874E:38b-3: cung zad 'dzum zhing zhal mdzes shing //
T02TD1874E:38b-4: kha dog lnga pa'i me tog las //
T02TD1874E:38b-5: me tog phring [*phreng] ba sogs kyis mdzes //
T02TD1874E:38b-6: byas pa'i phyed krung thor tshugs can //
T02TD1874E:38b-7: rin po che yi ri pug na //
T02TD1874E:38b-8: gnas par rab tu bsam pa'o //
T02TD1874E:38b-9: de yi gzugs la sogs pa lnga //
T02TD1874E:38b-10: shr'i buddha ham bha lnga yis //
T02TD1874E:38b-11: lha mor bskyed nas gnas gsum du //
T02TD1874E:38b-12: yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs //
T02TD1874E:38b-13: bskul pa sngon du 'gro ba yi //
T02TD1874E:38b-14: dbang bskur byas pas dbu rgyan la //
T02TD1874E:38b-15: gshin rje gshed po rnam bsgoms te //
T02TD1874E:38b-16: de yang ngar 'dzin mnan par bya //
T02TD1874E:38b-17: de nas rang gis bon gyi //
T02TD1874E:38b-18: 'od kyis ye shes sems dpa' bkug / thugs kar bcug ste snyan tshig gis //
T02TD1874E:38b-19: bzhams te bsgo bas bsgrub par bya //
T02TD1874E:38b-20: de nas de yi ye shes sems //
T02TD1874E:38b-21: rang gi sems dpar rab bcug pas ;
T02TD1874E:38b-22: / rang bzhin gcig tu gyur byas nas //
T02TD1874E:38b-24: de nas sha dang khrag dang ni //
T02TD1874E:38b-25: ti la phye sgur gdong la sogs pa'i //
T02TD1874E:38b-26: gtor mas mnyes par byas nas su //
T02TD1874E:38b-27: zhi ba'i sbyor bas bsgrub par bya //
T02TD1874E:38b-28: yang ni de yis ma grub na //
T02TD1874E:38b-29: drag shul gyis ni bsgrub par bya //
T02TD1874E:38b-30: ye shes sems dpa' der bcug la //
T02TD1874E:38b-31: rdo rje sbyor ba brtsam par bya //
T02TD1874E:38b-32: gnod sbyin mo la 'khyud byas nas //
T02TD1874E:38b-34: padmar stsal nas sngags bzlas pas //
T02TD1874E:38b-35: nang du 'od zer spro bar bya //
T02TD1874E:38b-36: aom a'a:ya m'anta krita yakshim yakshim dzva la dzva la h'um phat //
T02TD1874E:38b-38: ye shes sems dpa' gdung byas pas //
T02TD1874E:38b-39: tsha ste skrag nas sgrub po la //
T02TD1874E:38b-40: zla phyed 'phral du dngos grub ster //
T02TD1874E:38b-41: sgrub po'i mdun du thal sbyar nas //
T02TD1874E:38b-42: rje gcig bdag la bka' stsol zhes //
T02TD1874E:38b-43: 'dzum pa'i bzhin bltas bka' len te ;
T02TD1874E:38b-44: / sgrub pos de la bka' stsal pa //
T02TD1874E:38b-45: ma dang sring mo chung ma dang //
T02TD1874E:38b-46: g-yog mo'i bya ba gyis zhes bya //
T02TD1874E:38b-47: de nas de yis rje gcig gi //
T02TD1874E:38b-48: bka' ni spyi bos nod ces len //
T02TD1874E:38b-49: gal te ma yi bya ba byed //
T02TD1874E:38b-50: tho rangs srod la 'ongs byas nas //
T02TD1874E:38b-51: gser srang bcu dang mu tig gi //
T02TD1874E:39a-2: srid mo yi ni bya ba byed //
T02TD1874E:39a-3: nyi ma'i gung la drung 'ongs te //
T02TD1874E:39a-4: gser srong bdun dang ha ra bdun //
T02TD1874E:39a-5: phul te ming po sang 'od zer //
T02TD1874E:39a-6: gal te chung ma'i bya byed na //
T02TD1874E:39a-7: yid kyi 'dod pa'i dus su ni //
T02TD1874E:39a-9: cang mi smra bar 'dod pa spyad //
T02TD1874E:39a-10: gser srang lnga dang ha ra gcig / bzhag ste rang gi gnas su 'gro //
T02TD1874E:39a-11: gal te gtam smras gyur na ni //
T02TD1874E:39a-12: phyin chad ci yang mi ster ro //
T02TD1874E:39a-13: g-yog mo'i bya ba byed pa yis //
T02TD1874E:39a-14: zas dang gos dang gser la sogs //
T02TD1874E:39a-15: bzhon pa la sogs ci 'dod pa //
T02TD1874E:39a-16: bka' tsam gyis ni sbyor bar byed //
T02TD1874E:39a-17: gzhan ni na chung yid du 'ong //
T02TD1874E:39a-18: bkug nas byin te rang gnas skyel //
T02TD1874E:39a-19: de sogs gnod sbyin mo rnams kyi //
T02TD1874E:39a-20: yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab thob //
T02TD1874E:39a-21: sngags kyi khyad par rnams kyi sgrub par khyad par bshad zin to /
T02TD1874E:39a-23: // / da ni zhi ba'i las kyi rim pa bshad par bya'o //
T02TD1874E:39a-24: spyan gyi tshul gyi rnal 'byor gyis //
T02TD1874E:39a-25: bsam gtan 'di ni brtag par bya //
T02TD1874E:39a-26: yang na mos pa'i rnam pa yis //
T02TD1874E:39a-28: grong ngam yang na grong khyer ram //
T02TD1874E:39a-29: ljang rnams gang ba'i nad la sogs //
T02TD1874E:39a-30: zhi bar bya phyir bsam gtan mchog /'di ni rtag tu sbyar bar bya //
T02TD1874E:39a-31: thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la //
T02TD1874E:39a-32: zhi ba'i sems kyis shar bltas te //
T02TD1874E:39a-33: rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa mchog / ta la bdun cam nam mkha' la //
T02TD1874E:39a-34: phyogs de 'greng bur rnam par bsam //
T02TD1874E:39a-35: de yi bum pa gzhal yas khang //
T02TD1874E:39a-36: gang na dang bcas pa rnam bsams te //
T02TD1874E:39a-37: de nang rtag pa'i 'khor lo ni //
T02TD1874E:39a-38: dkar po sngon bzhin nyi shu bsgom //
T02TD1874E:39a-39: mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang byas la //
T02TD1874E:39a-40: sngags kyi bzlas pa las byung ba'i //
T02TD1874E:39a-41: 'od zer rnam par spro bar bya //
T02TD1874E:39a-42: aom a'a: brum dzin dzik che ge mo'i nang dzva la dza h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1874E:39a-43: de brjod lha dang rdo rje yi //
T02TD1874E:39a-46: nad rnams rab tu bsreg 'gyur ro //
T02TD1874E:39a-47: shel ltar rab tu gnas pa la //
T02TD1874E:39a-48: mi ldog bya phyir rgyas bya'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:39a-49: gsang sngags 'di ni brjod ba yis //
T02TD1874E:39a-50: spyan la sogs pa spra bar bya //
T02TD1874E:39b-0: aom ru ru sdu ru dzva la tishtha siddha lo tsa ni sarba aartha s'a dha ni nad @39b sh'ntim ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1874E:39b-1: mkha' dbyings yongs su bkang byas nas //
T02TD1874E:39b-2: bdud rtsi lngas gang bum pa yis //
T02TD1874E:39b-3: de rnams spyi bor bkra shis sgra //
T02TD1874E:39b-4: ldan par blangs nas dbang bskur stsol //
T02TD1874E:39b-5: aom k'a ya badzra nad sh'intam ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1874E:39b-6: aom w'a ka badzra nad sh'intam ku ru sv'a h'a //
T02TD1874E:39b-7: aom tsitta badzra nad sh'ntim ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1874E:39b-8: de rnams brjod pas rdo rje gsum //
T02TD1874E:39b-9: ba spu'i bu ga las spros pas //
T02TD1874E:39b-10: sngon bzhin dbang bskur rab byin na //
T02TD1874E:39b-11: nges pa'i nad kyang zhag bdun 'jig / rdo rje bsam gtan 'di yis ni //
T02TD1874E:39b-13: de ni sbyin pa rab grub cing //
T02TD1874E:39b-15: / bskal pa gsum gyi yun gnas shing //
T02TD1874E:39b-16: sangs rgyas thams cad byin gyis rlob //
T02TD1874E:39b-17: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD1874E:39b-18: gsang ba'i sku ste skyon med pa'o //
T02TD1874E:39b-19: yang na 'ga' zhig don gyi phyir //
T02TD1874E:39b-20: thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la //
T02TD1874E:39b-21: chu zla'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
T02TD1874E:39b-22: rtag pa'i 'khor lo nyi shus bskyed //
T02TD1874E:39b-23: mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang byas la //
T02TD1874E:39b-24: de yi ye shes sems dpa' yi //
T02TD1874E:39b-25: thugs kar zla ba'i steng du ni //
T02TD1874E:39b-26: zhi bar 'dod pa gzhag par bya //
T02TD1874E:39b-27: de nas gong du gsungs pa yi //
T02TD1874E:39b-28: spyan ma'i sngags ni rig mar bcas //
T02TD1874E:39b-29: bzlas brjod byas bas ba spu yi //
T02TD1874E:39b-30: bu ga las ni spyan tshogs spro //
T02TD1874E:39b-32: 'od zer tshul gyis nad pa la //
T02TD1874E:39b-33: zhi bar bya phyir rgyas bya'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:39b-34: de la gzi brjid dbab par bya'o //
T02TD1874E:39b-35: yad na mi ldog bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:39b-36: gong gi dbyung ba'am sa bon nam //
T02TD1874E:39b-37: yi ge gsum par rig par bcas //
T02TD1874E:39b-38: bzlas par rtag pa'i tshogs spro bya //
T02TD1874E:39b-39: de rnams spyan dang bcas pa yis //
T02TD1874E:39b-40: bdud rtsis gang ba'i bum pa bzung //
T02TD1874E:39b-41: dbyangs dang bcas pas dbang bskur bya //
T02TD1874E:39b-42: nad ni zhag bdun gyis zhi byed //
T02TD1874E:39b-43: rdo rje bsam gtan 'di yis ni //
T02TD1874E:39b-45: de ni de ma thag tu yang ;
T02TD1874E:39b-47: thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la //
T02TD1874E:39b-48: spyan ma'i dkyil 'khor 'khor lo mchog / cho ga nyi shus rdzogs byas la //
T02TD1874E:39b-49: mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang ba bya //
T02TD1874E:39b-50: de yi ye shes sems ma yis //
T02TD1874E:39b-51: shi ba'i ro ni gzhag byas na //
T02TD1874E:40a-2: aom ru ru sphu ru dzva la tishtha siddhi lo tsa ni sarba aartha s'a dha ni shi ba sos par gyur cig sv'a h'a /
T02TD1874E:40a-3: de yis de nas lam 'phros pa'i //
T02TD1874E:40a-4: lcags kyu'i gzugs su phyung byas te //
T02TD1874E:40a-5: de yis shi ba'i rnam par shes //
T02TD1874E:40a-6: bar ma do na gnas pa'am //
T02TD1874E:40a-7: yang na skye gnas chud kyang rung //
T02TD1874E:40a-8: dri med mar me'i tshul gnas pa'i //
T02TD1874E:40a-9: bkug ste ro yi snying ga ru //
T02TD1874E:40a-10: bcug nas dbyung sngags de la dgod //
T02TD1874E:40a-11: de yi zer gyis ro bsregs te //
T02TD1874E:40a-12: rang mi na tha mas spyan ma yi //
T02TD1874E:40a-13: gzugs su bskyed nas phung po dang //
T02TD1874E:40a-14: khams dang skye mched kyis dag bya //
T02TD1874E:40a-15: de lus gang ba'i phreng sngags kyis //
T02TD1874E:40a-16: phyi nang bar mtshams med par gtams //
T02TD1874E:40a-17: sngags las sngon bzhin spyan ma spro //
T02TD1874E:40a-18: bsdus nas 'od zer spro bar bya //
T02TD1874E:40a-19: bskal pa'i bar du gnas bya'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:40a-20: sangs rgyas rtag pa'i tshogs spros pa'i //
T02TD1874E:40a-21: dbang bskur byas pa las skyes pa'i //
T02TD1874E:40a-22: shi ba zhag ni bdun nas 'tsho //
T02TD1874E:40a-23: 'tsho na'ang lnga brgya'am stong gi bar //
T02TD1874E:40a-25: spyan gyi ye shes kyis btab phyir //
T02TD1874E:40a-26: rim gyis sangs rgyas thob pa'o //
T02TD1874E:40a-27: thams cad snga ma bzhin byas te //
T02TD1874E:40a-28: rnam par snang mdzad rnam 'byor pas //
T02TD1874E:40a-29: lta ba rdo rje dug la sogs //
T02TD1874E:40a-30: mi bzad dug ni dbrog par bya //
T02TD1874E:40a-31: bdag nyid g-yas pa'i bar ma ru //
T02TD1874E:40a-32: 'khor lo dkar po rtsibs brgyad pa //
T02TD1874E:40a-33: lte bar aom dkar po yis mtshan //
T02TD1874E:40a-34: 'od zer dkar po spros nas brtsam //
T02TD1874E:40a-35: nad pa mdun du gzhag byas la //
T02TD1874E:40a-36: sgrub pos spyi bo la bzhag ste //
T02TD1874E:40a-37: dug rnams dbrog pa'i ched du ni //
T02TD1874E:40a-39: aom a'a:dzin dzik che ge mo'i dug zhi bar mdzod cig h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1874E:40a-40: brjod pas 'od zer dkar po ni //
T02TD1874E:40a-41: spyi bor zhugs pas nag po dbyung //
T02TD1874E:40a-42: 'od zer de yis nam mkha'i khams //
T02TD1874E:40a-43: phyogs bcu kun du gtor bar bya //
T02TD1874E:40a-44: de yi shul du 'od zer ni //
T02TD1874E:40a-45: dkar zhing bsil ba phab byas pas //
T02TD1874E:40a-46: zhag bdun na ni nam mkha' kun //
T02TD1874E:40a-47: gang pa'i dug kyang med par byed //
T02TD1874E:40a-48: yang ni sngon bzhin thams cad bya //
T02TD1874E:40a-49: mi bskyod 'khor lo dang ldan pas //
T02TD1874E:40a-50: ha la ha la la sogs pa //
T02TD1874E:40a-51: sbyor ba 'di yis gso bar bya //
T02TD1874E:40b-0: @40b bsgrub bya mdun du rab bzhag la //
T02TD1874E:40b-1: de yi thugs kar h'um byung ba'i //
T02TD1874E:40b-2: rdo rje dkar po rtse lnga pa //
T02TD1874E:40b-4: de yang zla 'od ltar bsil zhing //
T02TD1874E:40b-5: bsil bas lus kun khyab pa'i dug / snying ga lkog ma dpral ba dang //
T02TD1874E:40b-6: mgo bo'i gnas su yang dag bsdu ;
T02TD1874E:40b-7: / de ltar lan gsum bar bsams la //
T02TD1874E:40b-8: thams cad snying ga'i dbus su bsdu //
T02TD1874E:40b-9: de nas 'di ni brjod pa yis //
T02TD1874E:40b-10: nag po skyug pa'i tshul du bsam //
T02TD1874E:40b-11: aom a'a:badzra dhrik che ge mo'i dug sos par gyur cig sv'a h'a /
T02TD1874E:40b-12: de ltar byas pas zhag bdun na //
T02TD1874E:40b-13: nam mkha'i khams kun gang ba yi //
T02TD1874E:40b-14: dug rnams kyang ni zad byed na //
T02TD1874E:40b-15: bsgrub bya'i lus ni smos ci dgos //
T02TD1874E:40b-16: sngon bzhin thams cad rab byas la //
T02TD1874E:40b-18: 'bras dang pho la mig 'brum phran sogs //
T02TD1874E:40b-19: nye ba'i dug rnams dbyung bar bya //
T02TD1874E:40b-20: g-yas kyi bar mas aas bskyed pa'i ;
T02TD1874E:40b-23: aa bsams nas ni bya par bya //
T02TD1874E:40b-24: bsgrub bya mdun du rab bzhag la //
T02TD1874E:40b-25: aa yi 'od zer gyis bsdus nas //
T02TD1874E:40b-26: nag po'i mdog ni rnam pa ru //
T02TD1874E:40b-27: bsgrub bya'i lus las byung bar bsam //
T02TD1874E:40b-28: de yis kun du rab spros pas //
T02TD1874E:40b-29: dug spangs kha dog dkar po bsam //
T02TD1874E:40b-30: de ltar dus bzhir gsang sngags 'di //
T02TD1874E:40b-31: bzlas pas zhag bdun dug rnams 'byang //
T02TD1874E:40b-32: aom a'a ro lik che ge mo'i nye ba'i dug zhi bar gyur cig h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1874E:40b-33: de yis las skyes snying 'bar ba'i //
T02TD1874E:40b-34: dug rnams thams cad zad byed na //
T02TD1874E:40b-35: bsgrub bya'i lus gcig la gnas pa'i //
T02TD1874E:40b-36: nye ba'i dug rnams smos ci dgos //
T02TD1874E:40b-37: thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la //
T02TD1874E:40b-38: khro bo'i rgyal po rta mgrin ni //
T02TD1874E:40b-39: kha dog dkar po rab bsgoms te //
T02TD1874E:40b-40: dug rnams thams cad bsal bar bya //
T02TD1874E:40b-41: bsgrub bya mdun du gzhag byas la //
T02TD1874E:40b-42: de yi snying gar zla ba la //
T02TD1874E:40b-44: 'od zer de yis lus kun gyi //
T02TD1874E:40b-45: dug rnams rab tu sbar byas la //
T02TD1874E:40b-46: g-yas pa'i sbar mar h'um dkar po //
T02TD1874E:40b-48: dkar po'i lte bar h'um bsam mo //
T02TD1874E:40b-49: rang ming yi ge dang po yis //
T02TD1874E:41a-1: bya rnam par bsams nas ni //
T02TD1874E:41a-2: gsang sngags 'di yis de yi ni //
T02TD1874E:41a-3: dug rnams kun du bsal bar bya //
T02TD1874E:41a-4: na ma:samanta k'a ya w'ak tsitta badzr'a n'am //
T02TD1874E:41a-5: aom h'um h'um h'um tu rul bi ru la /
T02TD1874E:41a-6: sarba pi sha ga ta ya /
T02TD1874E:41a-9: ha sa ke sa ris ta to pa ;
T02TD1874E:41a-10: badzra khu ra ni ra ga ta /
T02TD1874E:41a-11: tsa li ta ba su tat la ni shtsa sa ma ru tod kshi bi da da ra ni da ra /
T02TD1874E:41a-12: bi sha na ta ha sa /
T02TD1874E:41a-13: aa sha na ta ha sa /
T02TD1874E:41a-16: a'a r+ya be ga ste bhu ta ga na /
T02TD1874E:41a-18: ha ya gra'i ba kha da kha da /
T02TD1874E:41a-19: pa ra mantra na tshindhi tshandha siddhi me de ma me da da bi sha /
T02TD1874E:41a-20: a'a be sha ya ra ksha dza /
T02TD1874E:41a-23: pra ti ta to ta bha ba badzra dam shta ki tsa m'a ra ya si /
T02TD1874E:41a-30: buddha ra ma sang+ga nu dzny'a na ta ka ra nam /
T02TD1874E:41a-31: ku ru sri ban ha ya gr'i ba ya phat /
T02TD1874E:41a-37: badzra khu ra ni ra ga ta ya phat /
T02TD1874E:41a-38: pa ra manta bi n'a sha na ya phat /
T02TD1874E:41a-39: tree lo kya ta pa yi kar ya phat /
T02TD1874E:41a-40: sarba karma shtha pra ti ha ta ya phat /
T02TD1874E:41a-41: badzra ku la ta pa na phat /
T02TD1874E:41a-45: h'um las 'od zer dkar po yi //
T02TD1874E:41a-46: bdud rtsi babs pas bsgrub bya yi //
T02TD1874E:41a-47: lus las nag po'i dug blangs te //
T02TD1874E:41a-48: sa la sogs par spro bar bya //
T02TD1874E:41a-49: shul du bdud rtsi dkar po yi //
T02TD1874E:41a-50: 'od zer bab par byas nas su //
T02TD1874E:41a-51: de bzhin thun bzhir bya bas gyur na //
T02TD1874E:41a-52: zhag bdun na ni na ma mkha'i dbyings //
T02TD1874E:41a-53: dug gis yongs su gang ba yi //
T02TD1874E:41a-54: rdo rje mi bzad pa yi dug / sbyar ba tsam gyis sel bar byed //
T02TD1874E:41a-55: sngon bzhin thams cad rab byas la //
T02TD1874E:41a-56: yang ni dug rnams zad bya'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:41a-57: sbyor ba rnams la brgyad ldan par //
T02TD1874E:41a-58: gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba bsgom //
T02TD1874E:41a-59: gser 'dra g-yas gnag g-yon dkar te //
T02TD1874E:41a-62: lhag mas ral gri rin chen pad //
T02TD1874E:41a-63: 'di la rnam snang lta bur sbyar //
T02TD1874E:41a-64: brum las 'khor lo rtsi bas brgyad ni //
T02TD1874E:41a-65: dkar po brum gyis mtshan pa bsam //
T02TD1874E:41a-66: bsgrub bya ming gi dang por bskyed //
T02TD1874E:41b-0: sgrub po'i mdun du @41b rab bzhag la //
T02TD1874E:41b-1: sbyor pa gsum gyis spang bya'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:41b-2: gsang sngags 'di ni brjod pas su //
T02TD1874E:41b-3: brum las 'od zer dkar po spro //
T02TD1874E:41b-4: na ma:sa manta k'a ya w'ak tsitta badzr'a n'am /
T02TD1874E:41b-5: aom a'a: sarba la bu ti /
T02TD1874E:41b-8: tsa'u rna pra yo gi ti /
T02TD1874E:41b-9: ma ma kri ti ye na ke na tsi ta kri ti /
T02TD1874E:41b-16: kam pa ya kam pa ya /
T02TD1874E:41b-20: aom aushn'i sha badzra tsa kra warti /
T02TD1874E:41b-24: de nas 'od zer tshogs spros pas //
T02TD1874E:41b-25: spyi bo nas ni phul byas te //
T02TD1874E:41b-26: rkang pa'i mthil du phyung byas la //
T02TD1874E:41b-27: sa yi gting du mnan par bya //
T02TD1874E:41b-28: yang ni 'od zer de yis kyang //
T02TD1874E:41b-29: mdun du bsdun pas dug rnams ku na //
T02TD1874E:41b-30: rgyab tu phyung bas sa la sogs //
T02TD1874E:41b-31: 'byung ba rnams su spro bar bya //
T02TD1874E:41b-32: de bzhin 'od zer gyis bsdus nas //
T02TD1874E:41b-33: phyung ste gtor nas de shul du //
T02TD1874E:41b-34: bdud rtsi dkar po rab 'bab pas //
T02TD1874E:41b-35: dug ni rnam par spang bar bya //
T02TD1874E:41b-36: dkar po dang ni ser po dang //
T02TD1874E:41b-37: nag po bsam gtan 'di yis ni //
T02TD1874E:41b-38: rdo rje gsum gyi sprul pa yis //
T02TD1874E:41b-39: dug rnams kyang ni zhag bdun 'byin //
T02TD1874E:41b-40: yang ni sngon bzhin thams cad bya //
T02TD1874E:41b-41: rnam par snang mdzad 'khor lo che //
T02TD1874E:41b-42: kha dog dkar po bsam byas te //
T02TD1874E:41b-43: 'don pa'i sngags kyis nang rnams bsal //
T02TD1874E:41b-44: nad pa mdun du gzhag byas te //
T02TD1874E:41b-45: bdag nyid khros nas gsang sngags 'di //
T02TD1874E:41b-46: brjod pas 'od zer tshogs spros pas //
T02TD1874E:41b-47: bsgrub pa bya'i lus la gzhug par bya //
T02TD1874E:41b-48: aom a'a: dzin dzik che ge mo'i nad aa pa na ya h'um /
T02TD1874E:41b-49: de yis nad rnams bskul bar bya //
T02TD1874E:41b-50: rlung mkhris bad kan las byung ba'i //
T02TD1874E:41b-52: de bzhi na khyi ni rkang pa gsum //
T02TD1874E:41b-53: yi dgas gcer bu'i gzugs dag tu //
T02TD1874E:41b-54: bsgrub bya'i lus las phyung nas su //
T02TD1874E:41b-55: phyogs bcu dag tu rab rgyug cing //
T02TD1874E:41b-56: 'bros par gyur par rnam par bsam /
T02TD1874E:41b-58: // / aom a'a dzin dzik che ge mo'i nad m'a ra ya h'um phat /
T02TD1874E:41b-59: brjod pas thugs las 'phros pa yi //
T02TD1874E:41b-60: khro bo'i 'khor los mtshan pa yi //
T02TD1874E:41b-61: spre'u la sogs pa'i nad rnams kun //
T02TD1874E:42a-2: bkug ste 'ongs pa rang gnas kyi //
T02TD1874E:42a-3: mtshan mas phye mar brlag 'gyur te //
T02TD1874E:42a-4: bsgrub bya na da dang rnam bral pas //
T02TD1874E:42a-5: shel 'dra'i kha dog lta bur bsam //
T02TD1874E:42a-6: de nas bdag nyid 'khor lo che //
T02TD1874E:42a-7: kha dog dkar po rnam bsams la //
T02TD1874E:42a-8: sngon bzhin spyan ma'i sngags brjod pas //
T02TD1874E:42a-10: aom a'a: zin dzik nad pa che ge ma'o la aa bhi shi nytsa h'um sv'a h'a //
T02TD1874E:42a-11: zhes brjod sngon bzhin rtag pa'i tshogs //
T02TD1874E:42a-12: spyan dang bcas pas bum pa 'dzin //
T02TD1874E:42a-13: dbang bskur byas te brgya rtsa brgyad //
T02TD1874E:42a-14: zhag bdun bar du dus bzhir bya //
T02TD1874E:42a-15: de ltar byas na phyi nang gi //
T02TD1874E:42a-16: myong bar nges pa'i nad kun yang //
T02TD1874E:42a-17: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bka' bzhin du //
T02TD1874E:42a-19: de bzhin mi bskyod rin chen dpal //
T02TD1874E:42a-20: 'od dpag med dang don yod grub //
T02TD1874E:42a-21: yi ge'i tshig ni gang mos pa //
T02TD1874E:42a-22: dad pa bskyed de nad rnams bsal //
T02TD1874E:42a-23: aom a'a: badzra dhrik che ge mo'i nad aa pa na aa h'um /
T02TD1874E:42a-24: aom a'a: ratna dhrik che ge mo'i nad aa pa na ya h'um /
T02TD1874E:42a-25: aom a'a:a'a ro lik che ge mo'i nad aa pa na ya h'um //
T02TD1874E:42a-26: aom p'a:pradzny'a dhrik che ge mo'i nad aa pa na ya h'um /
T02TD1874E:42a-27: aom a'a: badzra dhrik che ge mo'i nad m'ar ya phat h'um /
T02TD1874E:42a-28: aom a'a: ratna dhrik che gi mo'i nad m'a ra ya phat h'um /
T02TD1874E:42a-29: aom a'a: a'a ro lik che ge mo'i nad m'a ra ya phat h'um /
T02TD1874E:42a-30: aom a'a: pradzny'a dhrik nad pa che ge mo'i nad m'a ra ya phat h'um /
T02TD1874E:42a-31: aom a'a:badzra dhrik nad pa che ge mo la aa bhi shinytsa h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1874E:42a-32: aom a'a:ratna dhrik nad pa che ge mo la aa bhi shinytsa h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1874E:42a-33: aom a'a:a'a ro lik nad pa che ge mo la aa bhi shinytsa h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1874E:42a-34: aom a'a:pradzny'a dhrik nad pa che ge mo la aa bhyi shinytsa h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1874E:42a-35: de yis nad rnams phyung byas te //
T02TD1874E:42a-36: rang rang mtshan mas sngon bzhin bsad //
T02TD1874E:42a-37: stobs dang dbang bskur sogs pa yi //
T02TD1874E:42a-38: snga ma bzhin du rab tu bya //
T02TD1874E:42a-39: sbyor bas zlos pas zhag bdun du //
T02TD1874E:42a-40: myong bar nges pa'i nad rnams kun //
T02TD1874E:42a-41: rdo rje bsam gtan cho ga des //
T02TD1874E:42a-42: phyi dang nang du bcas pa sel //
T02TD1874E:42a-43: da ni rgyas pa'i las kyi lam gyi rim pa rgyas par bshad par bya'o //
T02TD1874E:42a-44: sngon bzhin bzlas pa'i cho ga nas //
T02TD1874E:42a-45: dbang bkur yan chad rdzogs byas te //
T02TD1874E:42b-0: rdo rje padmo can @42b gyi ni ;
T02TD1874E:42b-1: / sbyor bas rgyas pa'i las brtsam mo //
T02TD1874E:42b-2: stobs la sogs pa'i chos rnams dang //
T02TD1874E:42b-4: mdzod po che ni rgyas byas phyir //
T02TD1874E:42b-5: rgyas pa'i sems kyis bya ba'o //
T02TD1874E:42b-6: bka' yi 'khor lo sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1874E:42b-7: sngon bzhin khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbus ;
T02TD1874E:42b-8: / rdo rje sems dpa' las byung ba //
T02TD1874E:42b-9: dbang chen dkyil 'khor ser po'i dbus //
T02TD1874E:42b-10: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsams nas ni //
T02TD1874E:42b-11: gser zhun lta bu'i 'od dpag med //
T02TD1874E:42b-12: 'khor lor bcas pa bsam byas la //
T02TD1874E:42b-13: mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang ba bya //
T02TD1874E:42b-14: de yi ye shes sems dpa' yi //
T02TD1874E:42b-15: thugs kar zla ba'i steng du ni //
T02TD1874E:42b-16: 'dod pa rnams gsum bzhag nas ni //
T02TD1874E:42b-17: thams cad gsang sngags 'di ni zlos //
T02TD1874E:42b-18: aom ka te ni ka te te ka tam ka te ka ro ba re che ge mo pushtim ku ru h'um /
T02TD1874E:42b-19: na bza' dkar mo la sogs tshogs //
T02TD1874E:42b-21: nam mkha'i khams kun rab bkang nas //
T02TD1874E:42b-22: rjes su 'od zer bsdu bar bya //
T02TD1874E:42b-23: de ni 'od zer rnam pa lnga //
T02TD1874E:42b-24: 'dod pa'i spyi bo mgrin pa dang //
T02TD1874E:42b-25: thugs ka'i gnas ni gsum po ru //
T02TD1874E:42b-26: 'dod pa gsum gyi tshul du bzhag / de rnams mi bzad bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:42b-27: thams cad kyi ni gsang sngags 'di ;
T02TD1874E:42b-28: / brjod nas 'od dpag med pa'i tshogs //
T02TD1874E:42b-29: bum pa gang ba gzung bar bya //
T02TD1874E:42b-30: aom a'a:dzi a'a ro lik che ge mo pushthim ku ru h'um /
T02TD1874E:42b-31: bkra shis glu dbyangs tshigs bcad kyi //
T02TD1874E:42b-32: dbang bskur ba ni stsol bar bsam //
T02TD1874E:42b-33: de ltar dus bzhir zhag bdun du //
T02TD1874E:42b-34: sbyor bas thams cad rgyas par 'gyur ;
T02TD1874E:42b-35: / rdo rje bsam gtan 'di yis ni //
T02TD1874E:42b-36: dgang dka' ba yang rab tu 'gengs //
T02TD1874E:42b-37: de ni sbyin pa rab bsgrub cing //
T02TD1874E:42b-39: yang na 'di ltar gos dkar ba'i //
T02TD1874E:42b-40: 'khor lo ldan pa'i sbyor ba bsgom //
T02TD1874E:42b-41: ye shes sems ma'i thugs ka ru //
T02TD1874E:42b-42: 'dod pa dag ni gzhug par bya //
T02TD1874E:42b-43: aom ka te bi ka te ni ka te ka tam ka te ka ro ba re che ge mo pushthim ku ru h'um /
T02TD1874E:42b-44: brjod pas de mtha' dbus yig la //
T02TD1874E:42b-45: nam mkha'i khams ni dkar mos gang //
T02TD1874E:42b-46: de nyid gzi brjid tshul gyis su //
T02TD1874E:42b-47: rjes su 'od zer sngon bzhin dbab //
T02TD1874E:43a-2: spros nas dbang bskur stsal bar bsam //
T02TD1874E:43a-3: de ltar dus bzhir zhag bdun du //
T02TD1874E:43a-4: byas pas bsgrub pa bya rgyas par 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:43a-5: bsam gtan sngags kyi sbyor ba 'dis //
T02TD1874E:43a-6: rtag par chos kyis rgyas par mdzad //
T02TD1874E:43a-7: rtag tu mdzod po che dang ldan ;
T02TD1874E:43a-8: / nad rnams med cing tshe rgyas 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:43a-9: da ni dbang gi las kyi rim pa bshad par bya'o //
T02TD1874E:43a-10: thams cad sngon bzhin rab byas la //
T02TD1874E:43a-11: ri mo'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya //
T02TD1874E:43a-12: don yong grub pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD1874E:43a-13: dbang du bya ba brtsam pa'o //
T02TD1874E:43a-14: sangs rgyas rdo rje chen dang //
T02TD1874E:43a-15: sems can khams rnams ma lus pa //
T02TD1874E:43a-16: dbang du byed dam byed 'dod phyir //
T02TD1874E:43a-17: chags pa'i yid kyis bya ba'o //
T02TD1874E:43a-18: bka' yi 'khor lo rab bskor bas //
T02TD1874E:43a-19: khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbus su ni //
T02TD1874E:43a-20: rdo rje sems dpa' las byung ba'i //
T02TD1874E:43a-21: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor zla ga ma la //
T02TD1874E:43a-22: ji bzhin sbyor bas bandu ka ;
T02TD1874E:43a-23: / don yod grub pa'i 'khor lo che //
T02TD1874E:43a-24: bsgoms nas mchod pa bstod pa dang //
T02TD1874E:43a-25: bdud rtsi myang bas mnyes par bya //
T02TD1874E:43a-26: de yi ye shes sems dpa' yi //
T02TD1874E:43a-27: thugs kar zla ba'i steng du ni //
T02TD1874E:43a-28: gong gi gnyis po bzhag nas ni //
T02TD1874E:43a-29: thams cad kyi ni gsang sngags brjod //
T02TD1874E:43a-30: aom a'a: kham pra dzny'a dhrik che ge mo ba sham ram r'a ga ya ho //
T02TD1874E:43a-31: de brjod thams cad pa spu yi //
T02TD1874E:43a-32: sgo las sangs rgyas thams cad dang //
T02TD1874E:43a-33: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis //
T02TD1874E:43a-34: mkha' dbyings yongs su dang bar bsam //
T02TD1874E:43a-35: de rnams 'od zer rnam lnga yi //
T02TD1874E:43a-36: tshul gyis thams cad 'dus byas la //
T02TD1874E:43a-37: thugs kar 'dod pa de lus la //
T02TD1874E:43a-38: rjes su stobs ni dbab par bya //
T02TD1874E:43a-39: gong gi sngags brjod sngon bzhin du //
T02TD1874E:43a-40: dbang bskur de la rtsol bar bsam //
T02TD1874E:43a-41: de ltar spyod pas dus bzhi ru //
T02TD1874E:43a-43: de ni de ma thag tu yang //
T02TD1874E:43a-44: sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs su byon ;
T02TD1874E:43a-45: /'jam dpal dang ni gzhi brjid mnyam //
T02TD1874E:43a-46: las thabs byed par de 'gyur ro //
T02TD1874E:43a-47: dga' bas myong ba'i dbang po dang //
T02TD1874E:43a-48: dgyes nas ci 'dod rab tu stsol //
T02TD1874E:43a-49: bskur pa chen po ma byas kyang //
T02TD1874E:43a-51: yang ni de ltar sgrol ma yi //
T02TD1874E:43b-0: 'khor lo ldan @43b pa rab bsgoms la /
T02TD1874E:43b-1: de yi ye shes sems dpa' yi //
T02TD1874E:43b-2: thugs kar zla ba'i steng du ni //
T02TD1874E:43b-3: dbang du bya ba bzhag nas ni //
T02TD1874E:43b-4: dbus su yi ge t'am dmar po //
T02TD1874E:43b-5: mtha' ma phreng sngags dmar po ni //
T02TD1874E:43b-6: gyen du 'greng bas bskor bar bsam //
T02TD1874E:43b-7: dmar ba'i mtshan ma rnams dang ni //
T02TD1874E:43b-8: t'am las 'od zer dmar po'i tshogs //
T02TD1874E:43b-9: gsang sngags 'di ni brjod nas su //
T02TD1874E:43b-10: bsgrub bya bskur phyir dbyung bar bya //
T02TD1874E:43b-11: aom t'a re tu tt'a re tu re che ge mo pa sham ku ru ho //
T02TD1874E:43b-12: skyes pa'i snying dang mgrin par bskul //
T02TD1874E:43b-13: bud med gsang ba nas bskul bya //
T02TD1874E:43b-14: phreng ba'i sngags las 'od zer dmar //
T02TD1874E:43b-15: rang gi skye gnas nas phyung bya //
T02TD1874E:43b-16: gong gi sgo ru rab zhugs pas //
T02TD1874E:43b-17: bsgrub bya'i sems ni bkag 'dra ba //
T02TD1874E:43b-18: zla ba'i dbyibs 'dra bkug nas ni //
T02TD1874E:43b-19: rim pa gnyis su chud par bya //
T02TD1874E:43b-20: gal te lha mo mda' can ma //
T02TD1874E:43b-22: bskul ba la sogs de bzhin bya //
T02TD1874E:43b-23: des kyang dbang du byed pa'o //
T02TD1874E:43b-24: gzhan yang snga ma bzhin du 'dod //
T02TD1874E:43b-25: de ni thugs kar rab bzhag la //
T02TD1874E:43b-26: dpa' bo btang sogs cho ga yis //
T02TD1874E:43b-27: gzhan la stobs ni dbab par bya //
T02TD1874E:43b-28: de ltar sbyor bas dus bzhi ru //
T02TD1874E:43b-29: zhag bdun par du rab byas na //
T02TD1874E:43b-30: sangs rgyas rdo rje sde can dang //
T02TD1874E:43b-31: sems can khams rnams ma lus pa //
T02TD1874E:43b-32: de ma thag tu bran bzhin du //
T02TD1874E:43b-33: thams cad yod med dbang du byed //
T02TD1874E:43b-34: thams cad snga ma bzhin bsgoms la //
T02TD1874E:43b-35: rdo rje sems dpa' las byung ba'i //
T02TD1874E:43b-37: dbang du bya ba brtsams pa'o //
T02TD1874E:43b-38: sngags byed dang ni dal byed dang //
T02TD1874E:43b-39: 'dod byed dang ni rmongs byed dang //
T02TD1874E:43b-40: dbang gi rang bzhin mda' lnga ni //
T02TD1874E:43b-41: cho ga 'di yis byin brlab bya //
T02TD1874E:43b-42: smyug ma aa yis byin brlabs te //
T02TD1874E:43b-43: mde'u ni h'um gis byin brlabs la //
T02TD1874E:43b-44: g-yon gyis lam bskyed gzhu bzung nas //
T02TD1874E:43b-45: dbu rgyan rtse mor sbyar byas la //
T02TD1874E:43b-46: drangs te rna drung du bkang nas //
T02TD1874E:43b-47: sngags kyis rab tu gdab pa'o //
T02TD1874E:43b-48: aom a'a:mam manydzu shr'i che ge mo pa sham ku ru ho //
T02TD1874E:43b-49: de yis spros pas bsgrub bya yi //
T02TD1874E:43b-50: mgo dang snying ga lte ba dang //
T02TD1874E:43b-51: gsang ba dang ni rkang mthil du //
T02TD1874E:43b-52: khro bo'i tshig gis rab tu gdab //
T02TD1874E:44a-2: / rdo rje gnyis las phyung nas kyang //
T02TD1874E:44a-3: zla ba spyad ldan lta bu'i sems //
T02TD1874E:44a-4: 'od zer gyis ni dgug par bya //
T02TD1874E:44a-5: bdag ni skye gnas bcug ste //
T02TD1874E:44a-6: ye shes sems dpa' de bzhin no //
T02TD1874E:44a-7: dang shing brgyal bar rab bsgoms te //
T02TD1874E:44a-9: sbyor ba de yis dus bzhi ru //
T02TD1874E:44a-10: zla pa phyed du rab bsgoms na //
T02TD1874E:44a-11: byis pa'i blo ni grags chen pos //
T02TD1874E:44a-12: gsang ba'i bskul ba bsgom byas pas //
T02TD1874E:44a-13: rdo rje kun gyis rab gsang ba'i //
T02TD1874E:44a-14: rdo rje don ni chud par gsungs //
T02TD1874E:44a-15: de nas mngon spyod lam gyi rim pa bshad par bya'o //
T02TD1874E:44a-16: sngon bzhin bzlas pa la sogs pa'i //
T02TD1874E:44a-17: dbang bskur yan chad rdzogs byas te //
T02TD1874E:44a-18: rdo rje khro bo rnal 'byor gyis //
T02TD1874E:44a-20: dkon mchog gnod byed ma chags pa //
T02TD1874E:44a-21: gdug pa'i sems can rnal 'byor gcod //
T02TD1874E:44a-22: bla ma smod brtson ma rungs pa //
T02TD1874E:44a-23: gtum pa'i yid kyis bsgrub pa'o //
T02TD1874E:44a-25: sta gri gtun shing lag na 'dzin //
T02TD1874E:44a-26: gnod par byed pa rab brtson la //
T02TD1874E:44a-27: bsams nas bsam gtan rab tu bya //
T02TD1874E:44a-28: mkha' dbyings sems can sangs rgyas kyis //
T02TD1874E:44a-29: yongs su gang bar rab tu bsam //
T02TD1874E:44a-30: gdug pa'i sta gri gtun shing gis //
T02TD1874E:44a-31: gsang par rab tu bsam pa'o //
T02TD1874E:44a-32: de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' yis //
T02TD1874E:44a-33: mkha' dbyings yongs su gang bar bsam //
T02TD1874E:44a-34: sta gri gtun shing gis gsang par //
T02TD1874E:44a-35: bsams nas dgra rnams myur du 'chi //
T02TD1874E:44a-36: de yis dran rnyed mtshon cha bor //
T02TD1874E:44a-37: skyabs med skrag cing 'jigs pas dkrugs //
T02TD1874E:44a-38: sdug bsngal dang ldan gzigs byas la //
T02TD1874E:44a-39: snying rje chen po'i khro ba bskyed //
T02TD1874E:44a-40: rang lha goms pa'i phyag rgya yis //
T02TD1874E:44a-41: rnal 'byor byas nas gsum pa ru //
T02TD1874E:44a-42: ye shes sems dpa'i 'od zer gyis //
T02TD1874E:44a-43: sangs rgyas tshogs spro bka' lung blang //
T02TD1874E:44a-44: khams bzhugs mgon po rnams kyis ni //
T02TD1874E:44a-45: bdag rtsom las 'di gzigs mdzad phyir //
T02TD1874E:44a-46: gro ba tsandan dkar po sogs //
T02TD1874E:44a-47: las brtsam bris pa snyam du gsol //
T02TD1874E:44a-48: phan mdzad khyed cag rnams la ni //
T02TD1874E:44a-50: 'di ni mnar med skyi g-ya' ba'i //
T02TD1874E:44b-0: @44b bud shing du ni 'gyur bar nges //
T02TD1874E:44b-1: snying rjer ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa //
T02TD1874E:44b-2: khyod kyi bka' lung bdag cag byed //
T02TD1874E:44b-3: de bas las ni bgyid pa la //
T02TD1874E:44b-4: rdo rje can rnams bdag bka' stsol //
T02TD1874E:44b-5: bdag cag khyad par ma mthong bar //
T02TD1874E:44b-6: dad pa kho na dang ldan pas //
T02TD1874E:44b-7: snying rje 'di la phan pa'i phyir ;
T02TD1874E:44b-8: / khyed kyi bka' stsol byed pa'o //
T02TD1874E:44b-9: geng bzhin khro bo'i tshogs spros pas //
T02TD1874E:44b-10: do dag snyan du rig pa dang //
T02TD1874E:44b-11: sngon bzhin du dang gal bcu yis //
T02TD1874E:44b-12: snyan gsan dbab par bsam pa'o //
T02TD1874E:44b-13: las mdzad 'di la khyod kyis ni //
T02TD1874E:44b-14: grogs po mdzad pa rigs pa yin //
T02TD1874E:44b-15: de ltar min na khyed cag 'dir //
T02TD1874E:44b-17: de nas de dag thams cad kyang //
T02TD1874E:44b-18: zhal gyis bzhes par bsam byas nas //
T02TD1874E:44b-19: 'khor lo dang bcas nag por bsgyur //
T02TD1874E:44b-20: khros nas bka' yi 'khor lo spro //
T02TD1874E:44b-21: bgegs kyi tshogs kun nyan par byos //
T02TD1874E:44b-22: sku gsung thugs la gnas pa yi ;
T02TD1874E:44b-23: / dpal ldan bdag ni che ge mo //
T02TD1874E:44b-25: gal te nga yi bka' 'gom na //
T02TD1874E:44b-29: de nas sa bon 'od zer gyis //
T02TD1874E:44b-30: mkha' khyab sangs rgyas zhal bcug ste //
T02TD1874E:44b-31: zhu gyur rdo rje padma ru //
T02TD1874E:44b-32: cho ga bzhin gyis bskyed byas la //
T02TD1874E:44b-33: mi bskyod lta bu dang pos 'khyud //
T02TD1874E:44b-34: rdo rje lcags kyu ral gri zhags //
T02TD1874E:44b-36: de yi srung ma dgug don bskyed //
T02TD1874E:44b-37: snying rje ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD1874E:44b-38: dbyangs yig 'og la h'um yig steng //
T02TD1874E:44b-39: rdo rje rgya gram kha sbyor phyir //
T02TD1874E:44b-41: aom a'a:he sumbha ni che ge mo'i srung ngam khug cig dza:h'um /
T02TD1874E:44b-42: de yis dgug la g-yon du bzhag / gnod mdzes de la bcug byas te //
T02TD1874E:44b-43: de yi lus gnas 'khor lo la //
T02TD1874E:44b-44: de yi nyes pa bsgo ba'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:44b-45: dpal ldan gnod mdzes mdun du gnas //
T02TD1874E:44b-46: rig pa'i tshogs kyis gsol gdab bya //
T02TD1874E:44b-47: las kun rnam pa gang gis ni //
T02TD1874E:44b-48: da lta mthu ni yod 'gyur ba //
T02TD1874E:44b-50: khyod kyis 'di nyid spang bar bya //
T02TD1874E:44b-51: sangs rgyas gsod byed ma chags pa //
T02TD1874E:45a-0: @45a * // bla ma smod par byed pa'o //
T02TD1874E:45a-1: 'di yi srung dang byin rlabs kyis //
T02TD1874E:45a-2: da lta ru ni spang bar gsol //
T02TD1874E:45a-3: de ltar min na khyed cag kun //
T02TD1874E:45a-4: rang gi bstan pa 'di la ni //
T02TD1874E:45a-5: brdzun gyis sgrub po bslus 'gyur bas //
T02TD1874E:45a-7: de dag thams cad mgrin gcig tu //
T02TD1874E:45a-8: bdag gis spangs kyi 'dod bzhin gyis //
T02TD1874E:45a-9: dgyes te bsad dbyung rang lha yi //
T02TD1874E:45a-10: 'khor lo ru ni gzhug par bya //
T02TD1874E:45a-11: bsrung ba la sogs rnams dang yang //
T02TD1874E:45a-12: de yi lha rnams mnan bya'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:45a-13: sangs rgyas rnams kun bgegs dgra'i gzugs //
T02TD1874E:45a-14: sngon bzhin phur bus bskyed byas nas //
T02TD1874E:45a-15: g-yas pas tho ba gzung byas nas //
T02TD1874E:45a-16: g-yon pas mgul pa brten byas te //
T02TD1874E:45a-17: stong pa dran par bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:45a-19: aom gha gha gh'a ta ya gh'a ta ya sarba du shtr'a na phat /
T02TD1874E:45a-20: ka'i la ya ka'i la ya sarba dushtr'a na ye shes srung ma phat /
T02TD1874E:45a-21: h'um h'um h'um badzra k'a'i la ya /
T02TD1874E:45a-22: badzra dha ro a'a dznya pa ya ti /
T02TD1874E:45a-23: sarba du shtr'a na ye shes sems dpa'i k'a ya w'aka tsi tta badzra k'i la ya h'um phat /
T02TD1874E:45a-24: de yis rang gi ye shes sems //
T02TD1874E:45a-25: gnyis su med par 'gyur bar bsam //
T02TD1874E:45a-26: skra bshig gcer bu 'bru mar byugs //
T02TD1874E:45a-27: 'jigs bcas dran nyams srog med pa //
T02TD1874E:45a-28: me la gnas shing gzi brjid bral //
T02TD1874E:45a-29: skyabs byed srung mas rnam spangs pas //
T02TD1874E:45a-30: khang stong lta bur bsams nas ni //
T02TD1874E:45a-31: las kyi dngos gzhi la 'jug bya //
T02TD1874E:45a-32: sngon bzhin thams cad rab byas la //
T02TD1874E:45a-33: dang po mgon po las byung ba //
T02TD1874E:45a-34: sa bon las skyes kha bzhi pa'i //
T02TD1874E:45a-35: rtse lnga mgon pos byin gyis brlabs //
T02TD1874E:45a-36: 'od zer bde gshegs thams cad la //
T02TD1874E:45a-37: bsgrub bya'i skyon brjod de dag kun //
T02TD1874E:45a-38: mi bskyod ngo bor khor gyur nas //
T02TD1874E:45a-39: zhugs bzhin de la thim par 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:45a-40: de gnyis zhu par gyur pa las //
T02TD1874E:45a-41: g-yas bskum g-yon pa rkang mi bskyod pa //
T02TD1874E:45a-42: drag po sbrul gyi ske rags can //
T02TD1874E:45a-43: mgon po rten sogs kyis mtshan pa //
T02TD1874E:45a-44: dang po sbyor bas rnam bsgoms te //
T02TD1874E:45a-45: de kho na bzhin rtag pa sogs //
T02TD1874E:45a-46: sbyor ba gnyis pas bsgom byas te //
T02TD1874E:45a-47: mchod pa sogs kyis mnyes par bya //
T02TD1874E:45a-48: de nas badzra dhrik sogs ni //
T02TD1874E:45a-49: yid kyis brjod pas rab bskul la //
T02TD1874E:45b-0: @45b sangs rgyas zhi ba'i tshul spros pas //
T02TD1874E:45b-1: skrag pa spang phyir dang po dgra //
T02TD1874E:45b-2: 'od kyi gong bu'i tshul du ni //
T02TD1874E:45b-3: sha glan phyir na gnas gsum du //
T02TD1874E:45b-4: btsud de rang sngags brjod pa yis //
T02TD1874E:45b-5: ji ltar gzugs bzhin spro bar bya //
T02TD1874E:45b-6: aom a'a: badzra dhrik che ge mo m'a ra ya phat h'um /
T02TD1874E:45b-7: sems lus khros pa'i khro bo che //
T02TD1874E:45b-8: mi sdug 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs //
T02TD1874E:45b-9: gsod pa'i don rnams sems pa'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:45b-10: sta gri tho ba sogs 'dzin spro //
T02TD1874E:45b-11: gzhan yang gri dang ka p'a la 'dzin //
T02TD1874E:45b-12: skra 'greng srin po'i tshogs rnams dang //
T02TD1874E:45b-13: ring du sgra 'byin pa yi tshogs //
T02TD1874E:45b-14: khva dang bya rog sna tshogs spro //
T02TD1874E:45b-15: bya rgod lcags kyi mchu can dang //
T02TD1874E:45b-16: lcags kyi mche ba can gyi khyis //
T02TD1874E:45b-17: nam mkha'i khams kun gang bar bsgom //
T02TD1874E:45b-18: bskal pa'i me bzhin 'bar ba yis //
T02TD1874E:45b-19: gru gsum la gnas sngon bzhin du //
T02TD1874E:45b-20: gnas pa'i bsgrub bya de dag gis //
T02TD1874E:45b-21: khros nas rtog cing 'thab pa'i tshul //
T02TD1874E:45b-22: drag po'i tshig gis bskul bar bya //
T02TD1874E:45b-23: sha rnams gcod cing rgyus rkang drangs //
T02TD1874E:45b-25: dus bzhir rab tu brtan byas te //
T02TD1874E:45b-26: nyi ma bdun du bsgrub par bya //
T02TD1874E:45b-27: de ltar bsgoms na dgra rnams 'chi //
T02TD1874E:45b-28: snying rje'i dbang gis 'og bzhin brtsam //
T02TD1874E:45b-31: sngon bzhin thams cad rab byas la //
T02TD1874E:45b-32: gzhin rje gshed kyi 'khor lo che //
T02TD1874E:45b-33: rang gi rdo rje rab brtan la //
T02TD1874E:45b-35: aom a'a:ya m'anta krita h'um phat //
T02TD1874E:45b-36: de yis ba spu bu ga las //
T02TD1874E:45b-37: zhi ba'i tshul spros sangs rgyas kyis //
T02TD1874E:45b-38: sems can bsdu par byas nas su //
T02TD1874E:45b-39: rang gi sku gsung 'khor lo gzhug / aom hr'ai:shtr'i: wa'i kri t'a na na che ge mo na sha ya stvam bha ya m'a ra ya h'um phat /
T02TD1874E:45b-40: brjod pas de dag spro bar bya //
T02TD1874E:45b-41: gshin rje gshed gzugs 'ba' zhig tu //
T02TD1874E:45b-42: spros pas gdug sems dgra po rnams //
T02TD1874E:45b-43: sngon bzhin gcod par byed par bsam //
T02TD1874E:45b-44: thun mtshams bzhi ru zhag bdun du //
T02TD1874E:45b-45: brtan pas rab tu chags byas nas //
T02TD1874E:45b-46: ma mo'i bdag gshed yang 'chi na //
T02TD1874E:45b-47: gdug sems ldan pa smos ci dgos //
T02TD1874E:45b-48: rtse gcig ma gyur pa yis kyang //
T02TD1874E:45b-49: bsrung ba'i dam tshig bsgrub pa'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:46a-2: bdud rtsi 'khyil pas gdug pa gzhom //
T02TD1874E:46a-3: thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la //
T02TD1874E:46a-4: rdo rje sems dpa' las byung ba'i //
T02TD1874E:46a-5: gdug pa'i dgra bo 'ba' zhig gam //
T02TD1874E:46a-6: 'khor lor bcas pa bsam byas nas //
T02TD1874E:46a-7: mchod pa sogs kyis mnyes par bya //
T02TD1874E:46a-8: aom a'a: bighn'anta krita che ge mo m'a ra ya h'um phat /
T02TD1874E:46a-9: brjod pas ba spu'i bu ga las //
T02TD1874E:46a-10: gong ma lta bu'i srin po dang //
T02TD1874E:46a-11: gtum zhing mi bzad khro bo spros //
T02TD1874E:46a-12: me steng gnas pa'i bsgrub bya ni //
T02TD1874E:46a-13: bcings shing brdegs pa la sogs pas //
T02TD1874E:46a-14: de ni skrag par byas par bsam //
T02TD1874E:46a-15: de bzhin 'ug pa khva ta dang //
T02TD1874E:46a-16: ring du sgra 'byin pa spros pas //
T02TD1874E:46a-17: mig dang rna ba la sogs par //
T02TD1874E:46a-18: rtse zhing deng par rab bsams te //
T02TD1874E:46a-19: skrag cing 'jigs par bsams gyur nas //
T02TD1874E:46a-20: dgra bo da yi mod la 'chi //
T02TD1874E:46a-21: de bzhin sbrul nag mgo brgya pa //
T02TD1874E:46a-22: re re lce gnyis mche phreng can //
T02TD1874E:46a-23: rgyud dang gnas dug bdag nyid spro //
T02TD1874E:46a-24: dpral bar dug bsams gdug pa 'chi //
T02TD1874E:46a-25: yang na bdag gi lag pa ru //
T02TD1874E:46a-26: tho ba rab tu drag po bsam //
T02TD1874E:46a-27: bsgrub bya gong mas mdun bkug la //
T02TD1874E:46a-28: 'og ma'i sngags kyis snying gar brdeg / de bzhin lag na gnas pa yi //
T02TD1874E:46a-29: rdo rje ste gri gtun shin sogs ;
T02TD1874E:46a-30: / bsgrub bya ba shig cing gtub bsams na //
T02TD1874E:46a-32: sngags kyi cha lugs dran byas nas //
T02TD1874E:46a-33: phyag 'tshal la sogs sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1874E:46a-34: spros ba rnams kyis bsgrub pa'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:46a-36: na ma:sa manta k'a ya w'aka tsitta badzr'a n'am //
T02TD1874E:46a-43: bi spho ta ya bi spho ta ya /
T02TD1874E:46a-44: che ge mo'i srog dz'i bi t'a na ka ra ya phat /
T02TD1874E:46a-45: sngags rgyud sbyin sreg las rnams la //
T02TD1874E:46a-46: 'di yi las la de mchog yin //
T02TD1874E:46a-47: phyogs bcu sems can thams cad la //
T02TD1874E:46a-49: dgra rnams 'jig par byed pa la //
T02TD1874E:46a-50: bskul ba dam pa 'di mchog yin //
T02TD1874E:46a-51: snga ma bzhin du thams cad la //
T02TD1874E:46a-52: sku gsung thugs kyi snying po mchog / rdo rje sems dpa' las byung ba'i //
T02TD1874E:46a-53: dang po las byung hri bskyed do //
T02TD1874E:46b-0: de la tri sh'ul hri @46b yis mtshan //
T02TD1874E:46b-1: de yis sangs rgyas thams cad kun //
T02TD1874E:46b-2: mkha' 'gro'i gzugs byas hri la zhugs //
T02TD1874E:46b-3: de gnyis rdo rje mkha' 'gror bskyed //
T02TD1874E:46b-4: drag po mi sdug khros pa ni //
T02TD1874E:46b-5: autpala sngon po lta bu la //
T02TD1874E:46b-6: g-yas dkar g-yon dmar phyag drug pa //
T02TD1874E:46b-8: / g-yas pa tri sh'ul rdo rje bsnams //
T02TD1874E:46b-9: g-yon pa thod pa rin chen 'dzin //
T02TD1874E:46b-10: nyi ma'i gdan la brkyang bskum du //
T02TD1874E:46b-11: khro bo'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa bskyed //
T02TD1874E:46b-12: dkon mchog gzhom pa la sogs pa'i //
T02TD1874E:46b-13: bsgrub bya nam mkha'i dbus su ni //
T02TD1874E:46b-14: kham bskyed dmar gyis rgyal ba ltar ;
T02TD1874E:46b-15: / brgyangs pa'i ye shes drang byas nas //
T02TD1874E:46b-16: mi bskyod pa ru bskyed byas te //
T02TD1874E:46b-17: lus de khang stong lta bur bsams //
T02TD1874E:46b-18: bdag gi lce la hr'i: bsams te //
T02TD1874E:46b-19: de ni 'od zer mthing ga dang //
T02TD1874E:46b-20: dkar ser dmar po ljang khu'i tshogs //
T02TD1874E:46b-21: lus dang yan lag bzhi ru bsam //
T02TD1874E:46b-22: rang gi mtshan ma tri sh'ul dang //
T02TD1874E:46b-23: rdo rje rin chen phur bu yis //
T02TD1874E:46b-24: gongs ma rab tu phug byas te //
T02TD1874E:46b-25: bsam gtan sngags kyi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1874E:46b-26: 'od zer lnga yis thod pa ru //
T02TD1874E:46b-27: khrag drang pa ni bsam par bya //
T02TD1874E:46b-28: h'um hri kham badzra dhrik ni aa nu ka sa ma ya rakta a'a krsha ya tsu sha ya h'um /
T02TD1874E:46b-29: brtan par zhag bdun thun bzhi ru //
T02TD1874E:46b-30: byas pas sangs rgyas chos sku yang //
T02TD1874E:46b-31: skams par 'gyur na gdug pa kun //
T02TD1874E:46b-32: smos ci dgos te de lta yin //
T02TD1874E:46b-33: thams cad snga ma bzhin byas te //
T02TD1874E:46b-34: brgyud kyis dbyug sngon 'og bzhin bskyed //
T02TD1874E:46b-35: mchod pa bzlas pa mnyes byas la //
T02TD1874E:46b-36: sngags rgyud ldan pa'i las brtsam mo //
T02TD1874E:46b-37: sha chen dur khrod sol ba dang //
T02TD1874E:46b-38: bal mi khams khre tsi phug / bsgrub bya'i rkang rjes rnams dang ni //
T02TD1874E:46b-39: bong bu'i gcin gyis gzugs brnyan bya //
T02TD1874E:46b-40: de yi snying gar dur ras la //
T02TD1874E:46b-41: sna tshogs rdo rje rgya gram la //
T02TD1874E:46b-42: gnas pa'i me yi dkyil 'khor te //
T02TD1874E:46b-43: bsgrub bya'i ming dang phreng sngags spel //
T02TD1874E:46b-44: zhi ba'i sa bon bton nas su //
T02TD1874E:46b-45: h'um phat ldan par mi dgug par //
T02TD1874E:46b-46: dug khrag rnams kyis bri byas la //
T02TD1874E:46b-47: de yi snying gar gzhug par bya //
T02TD1874E:46b-48: bsgrub bya bkug ste bcug byas na //
T02TD1874E:46b-49: rabs chad thod pa kha sbyar gzhag / shin tu khros pa'i g-yon pa yis //
T02TD1874E:46b-50: mnan te brgya dang brgyad du ni //
T02TD1874E:47a-2: bzlas te rdo dang rus pa dang //
T02TD1874E:47a-3: nim pa'i lo ma rnams kyis ni //
T02TD1874E:47a-4: gzugs brnyan de ni mnan par bya //
T02TD1874E:47a-5: na ma :sa manta k'a ya w'aka tsitta badzr'a n'am /
T02TD1874E:47a-6: aom ae hye hi bha ga b'an n'i la badzra danda /
T02TD1874E:47a-11: ku la p'a ya ku la p'a ya /
T02TD1874E:47a-22: ma ta p'a ya ma ta p'a ya /
T02TD1874E:47a-26: me te mam sarba ru dhi ra /
T02TD1874E:47a-27: ma ma sa med mdzdza ru ti pri ya /
T02TD1874E:47a-28: ae hye hi bha ga b'an sarba bighn'am /
T02TD1874E:47a-30: sarba m'u la gra ha na /
T02TD1874E:47a-34: ai di me gnya s+ya da ya /
T02TD1874E:47a-35: h'um n'i la ya n'i la ya badzra /
T02TD1874E:47a-38: bighn'am bi n'a ya ka n'a sha ya /
T02TD1874E:47a-41: sarba mantra na sha tru n'an /
T02TD1874E:47a-46: tishtha aa nu sm'a ra ya sa ma ya badzra da ra pa tsa n'an /
T02TD1874E:47a-47: da ra ma ni ni krinta h'um /
T02TD1874E:47a-54: dee ba ri shi bir+ya ka pa ya /
T02TD1874E:47a-55: badzra dan te na che ge mo m'a ra ya h'um phat /
T02TD1874E:47a-56: g-yel med pa yis zhag bdun du //
T02TD1874E:47a-57: mtshan ma mnan nas bzlas byas pas //
T02TD1874E:47a-58: de yi nyi ma kho na la //
T02TD1874E:47a-59: gdug pa rnams ni gsod par byed //
T02TD1874E:47a-60: de ru gal te ma grub na //
T02TD1874E:47a-61: nam phyed dus su dur khrod du //
T02TD1874E:47a-62: gang gi gzugs brnyan khyer nas ni //
T02TD1874E:47a-63: mi ro bsregs pa'i thal ba la //
T02TD1874E:47a-64: mngon spyod hom khung gzhung bzhin byas //
T02TD1874E:47a-65: nim pa'i me ni sbar byas nas //
T02TD1874E:47a-66: zhal dang spyan rnams 'gyur ba yi //
T02TD1874E:47a-67: dbyig sngon kha gdangs dbus bsams la //
T02TD1874E:47a-68: gzugs brnyan mtshon cha rnon po yis //
T02TD1874E:47a-69: g-yon pa'i rkang nas bcad gtubs nas //
T02TD1874E:47a-70: gong gi sngags bzlas sbyin sreg bya //
T02TD1874E:47a-71: de yi mtshan mo 'chi bar nges //
T02TD1874E:47a-72: yang ni khro bo gang rung gi ;
T02TD1874E:47a-73: / bzlas pas sngags pa dag byas la //
T02TD1874E:47a-74: rab tu dben pa'i gnas dag tu //
T02TD1874E:47a-75: 'bum phrag tu ni rang sngags bzlas //
T02TD1874E:47a-76: ma mo'i gnas sam dur khrod dam //
T02TD1874E:47a-77: khang stong dang ni bzhi mdo dang //
T02TD1874E:47a-78: ling ga gcig pa shing gcig drug //
T02TD1874E:47a-79: mngon spyod las ni brtsam pa'o //
T02TD1874E:47b-0: dbyug sngon can bsrung rdzas @47b la ni ;
T02TD1874E:47b-1: / gzugs brnyan ming dang bcas byas nas //
T02TD1874E:47b-2: gan rkyal du ni gzhag byas te //
T02TD1874E:47b-3: dgug pa sngon 'gro kha sbyar dbye //
T02TD1874E:47b-4: de nas khro bo gang rung gi //
T02TD1874E:47b-5: rnal 'byor khros byas khrag chu yis //
T02TD1874E:47b-6: gsher ba'i gos ni gyon pa'am //
T02TD1874E:47b-7: bshad gcis sa gsher ba'i gos gyon bya //
T02TD1874E:47b-8: gzugs brnyan rkang pas mnan nas ni //
T02TD1874E:47b-9: mngon sum bzhin du bsams byas nas //
T02TD1874E:47b-10: rang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad du bzla //
T02TD1874E:47b-11: de bzhin chu dron 'ba' zhig gam //
T02TD1874E:47b-12: bshad gcis gsher bar byas pa'i gos //
T02TD1874E:47b-13: ngan pa rul pa dri mnam pa //
T02TD1874E:47b-14: bgos te sngon bzhin bzlas pa bya //
T02TD1874E:47b-15: de bzhin thal pa'i skyo ma yis //
T02TD1874E:47b-16: gsher ba'i gos gyon lus ngan 'khrugs //
T02TD1874E:47b-17: sngon bzhin brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na //
T02TD1874E:47b-19: yang na gcer bur rab phyung ste //
T02TD1874E:47b-20: skra bshig thur du 'phyang byas te //
T02TD1874E:47b-21: mche gtsigs mig ni bsgyur byas la //
T02TD1874E:47b-22: rkang bas gzugs brnyan mnan nas ni //
T02TD1874E:47b-23: sngon bzhin brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te //
T02TD1874E:47b-24: lus ngag yid gsum khro byas nas //
T02TD1874E:47b-25: thun bzhir zhag bdun sogs sbyar bas //
T02TD1874E:47b-26: nam mkha'i dbyings kyang 'jig par nus //
T02TD1874E:47b-27: yang na gong ma'i gnas de ru //
T02TD1874E:47b-28: rnal 'byor der gnas phur bus gdab //
T02TD1874E:47b-29: ro bsregs sol dang thal ba dang //
T02TD1874E:47b-30: chu ngogs pa dang phub ma dang //
T02TD1874E:47b-31: rkang rjes dang ni bshang gcis brdzis //
T02TD1874E:47b-32: bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan snying ga ru //
T02TD1874E:47b-33: ske che dug dang lan tshva dang //
T02TD1874E:47b-34: nyungs mar snag tshas dur ras la //
T02TD1874E:47b-35: khro bo rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i //
T02TD1874E:47b-36: lte bar sngags dang ming spel ba'i //
T02TD1874E:47b-37: rang rang sngags ldan mi dgug par //
T02TD1874E:47b-38: bris nas snying gar gzhug pa'o //
T02TD1874E:47b-39: kha sbyor dbye ba sngon 'gro ba'i //
T02TD1874E:47b-40: dgug pas gzugs la phab nas su //
T02TD1874E:47b-41: mi yi rus pa las byas pa'i //
T02TD1874E:47b-42: sor brgyad pa yi phur bu la //
T02TD1874E:47b-43: rang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas //
T02TD1874E:47b-44: gzugs brnyan snying gar btab nas ni ;
T02TD1874E:47b-45: / dgra yi khyim mam sgo'am ni //
T02TD1874E:47b-46: grong la sogs par sba bar bya //
T02TD1874E:47b-47: sangs rgyas sku gsum mchog sbyin pa //
T02TD1874E:47b-48: shes dang mi shes rnam spangs pa //
T02TD1874E:47b-49: zla ba phyed ni tshun chad kyis //
T02TD1874E:47b-51: rdo rje gsum gyi rnal 'byor gyis //
T02TD1874E:48a-2: dkyil 'khor gsum dang rigs lnga'i las //
T02TD1874E:48a-3: ting 'dzin dag pas byed phyir ro //
T02TD1874E:48a-4: de yi rnal 'byor sngon bzhin bya //
T02TD1874E:48a-5: gzugs brnyan gong ma bzhin byas la //
T02TD1874E:48a-6: dgug pa sngon du 'gro ba yis //
T02TD1874E:48a-7: rtag pa'i sbyor bas las 'di bya ;
T02TD1874E:48a-8: / mi yi rus pa'i phur bu la //
T02TD1874E:48a-9: sor brgyad rtse mor 'khor lo bsam //
T02TD1874E:48a-10: me tog sngon pos mchod cing ni //
T02TD1874E:48a-11: 'khyil ba'i sngags ni rig bcas bzla //
T02TD1874E:48a-12: de yis spyi bor btab gyur na //
T02TD1874E:48a-13: rtag pa yang ni klad gzer can //
T02TD1874E:48a-14: 'gyur na bdag sems ldan pa yi //
T02TD1874E:48a-15: dgra bo dag ni smos ci dgos ;
T02TD1874E:48a-16: / de bzhin seng ldeng rtse mo las //
T02TD1874E:48a-17: byas pa'i phur bus padma can //
T02TD1874E:48a-18: byin gyis brlabs bzlas sngon bzhin mchod //
T02TD1874E:48a-19: snying gar btab nas ling ga de //
T02TD1874E:48a-20: thod pa kha sbyar nang bcug ste //
T02TD1874E:48a-21: dur khrod me la gdung byas na //
T02TD1874E:48a-22: tsha ba'i nad kyis 'debs byed pas //
T02TD1874E:48a-24: de bzhin mi bskyod rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD1874E:48a-25: gsod byed lcags byas phur bu la //
T02TD1874E:48a-26: rdo rje rtse mor byin brlabs la //
T02TD1874E:48a-27: mchod cing sngags bzlas snying gar gdab //
T02TD1874E:48a-28: me 'bar nang du de bcas bskur //
T02TD1874E:48a-29: de yi mod la gang sbyar ba'i //
T02TD1874E:48a-30: sku gsum 'jig par byed pa ste //
T02TD1874E:48a-31: bdag sems ldan pa smos ci dgos //
T02TD1874E:48a-33: sngon bzhin gzugs brnyan rab byas la //
T02TD1874E:48a-34: de mnan khro bo bka' nod bsgo //
T02TD1874E:48a-35: de nas btang nas bkug ste gzhug / sngon ma'am yams nad 'tshe ba'am //
T02TD1874E:48a-36: yul du sna tshogs 'byung byed pa //
T02TD1874E:48a-37: gzugs brnyan de la phab nas ni //
T02TD1874E:48a-38: snying ga nas ni rkang pa'i bar //
T02TD1874E:48a-39: de bzhin du ni spyi bo'i bar //
T02TD1874E:48a-40: rdo rje gsum gyi sngags brjod cing //
T02TD1874E:48a-41: gdug dang sdig pa bsal byas nas //
T02TD1874E:48a-42: che ge lus ngag yid gsum la //
