T02TD1874E:48a-43: rdo rje phur bus thob ces pa'i //
T02TD1874E:48a-44: sngags ni gong ma bzhin du brjod //
T02TD1874E:48a-45: thun bzhir g-yel med zhag bdun du //
T02TD1874E:48a-47: bsam gtan rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1874E:48a-48: sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'bebs //
T02TD1874E:48a-49: rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che //
T02TD1874E:48a-50: phur bu btab na'ang myur du 'chi //
T02TD1874E:48a-51: de bzhin bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yi //
T02TD1874E:48b-0: rnal 'byor sngon @48b bzhin rab byas te //
T02TD1874E:48b-1: kha sbyor dbye ba sngon 'gro ba'i //
T02TD1874E:48b-2: sbyor ba bdun gyis bsgrub par bya //
T02TD1874E:48b-3: dur khrod thal ba la sogs la //
T02TD1874E:48b-4: sngon bzhin gzugs dang ming bcas pa //
T02TD1874E:48b-5: dgug pa sngon 'gro dur khrod du //
T02TD1874E:48b-6: skra bshig gcer bur phyung byas te //
T02TD1874E:48b-7: mtshan ma mnan nas sngon ma yi ;
T02TD1874E:48b-8: / sngags ni brgya dang rtsa brgyad bzla //
T02TD1874E:48b-9: zhag ni bdun du thun bzhi ru //
T02TD1874E:48b-10: sbyor ba de yis khams gsum 'jig / ro bsregs thal ba 'ba' zhig la //
T02TD1874E:48b-11: gzugs brnyan la sogs sngon bzhin byas //
T02TD1874E:48b-12: gong ltar stong rtsa brgyad bzlas na //
T02TD1874E:48b-13: sbyor ba yis de mod la 'chi //
T02TD1874E:48b-14: chu 'gram gnyis kyis ba sogs la //
T02TD1874E:48b-15: bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan rab byas te //
T02TD1874E:48b-16: ske tshe lan tshva 'bru mang dang //
T02TD1874E:48b-17: dug dang da dur snag tshar sbyar //
T02TD1874E:48b-18: dur khrod ras la de yi ming //
T02TD1874E:48b-19: sngags spel byis nas ming bcug ste //
T02TD1874E:48b-20: gan rkyal mgo ni byang du bstan //
T02TD1874E:48b-21: srang ko tsa dang 'byi tse ka /
T02TD1874E:48b-22: gzhan ma btsos pas de'i lus la //
T02TD1874E:48b-23: til 'bru tsam du btsags byas la //
T02TD1874E:48b-24: bskul ba'i tshig dang sngags bcas pa //
T02TD1874E:48b-25: dgang zhing thun bzhir zhag bdun byas //
T02TD1874E:48b-26: sbyor ba de yis sangs rgyas kyang //
T02TD1874E:48b-28: smos ci dgos te de lta yin //
T02TD1874E:48b-29: rus phye dug dang khrag rnams la //
T02TD1874E:48b-30: gzugs brnyan ming dang bcas byas la //
T02TD1874E:48b-31: sol khur spangs ba'i gos gon la //
T02TD1874E:48b-32: khros nas rkang pas mnan te bzlas //
T02TD1874E:48b-33: che ge mo raksha seng kra ha ya /
T02TD1874E:48b-34: bskul ba'i tshigs bcad thun bzhi ru //
T02TD1874E:48b-35: zhag bdun bzlas pas dgra bo de //
T02TD1874E:48b-36: srin pos khyer bar gdon mi za //
T02TD1874E:48b-37: ske tshe mar dang bshang gcir sbyar //
T02TD1874E:48b-38: gzugs brnyan yog par blugs byas la //
T02TD1874E:48b-39: bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i rkang pa mchog / me yi 'khor lor byin gyis brlab //
T02TD1874E:48b-40: pra sha dza la che ge mo m'a ra ya h'um phat /
T02TD1874E:48b-41: gong gi sngags spel thun bzhi ru //
T02TD1874E:48b-42: zhag bdun g-yel med sems kyis bsgrub //
T02TD1874E:48b-43: tsha ba'i nad kyis 'debs par byed //
T02TD1874E:48b-44: gang yang rung pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD1874E:48b-45: thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la //
T02TD1874E:48b-46: phran tshegs rdo rje gsang ba yi //
T02TD1874E:48b-48: rdo rgyus sam dur khrod sol ba la //
T02TD1874E:49a-0: de nyid gsum gyi bar bcug @49a * //
T02TD1874E:49a-2: / kham ni brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na //
T02TD1874E:49a-3: dur khrod sa la sbrul gzugs bri //
T02TD1874E:49a-4: nag po mi sdug 'jigs byed pa //
T02TD1874E:49a-6: lce gnyis myug pa mig bgrad pa //
T02TD1874E:49a-7: mjug ma rdeb pa'i tshul can no //
T02TD1874E:49a-8: de yi kha ru mi bzad dug / sreg byed lta bu dmar nag tu //
T02TD1874E:49a-9: gnas pa'i yi ge kham bsams te //
T02TD1874E:49a-10: de yis sbrul de gnas las bskyod //
T02TD1874E:49a-11: de yi lce yi rtse mo la //
T02TD1874E:49a-12: hr'i ljang khu yi lcags kyu yis //
T02TD1874E:49a-13: rgyu ba dang ni gnas pa'i dug / ha la ha la sogs kun //
T02TD1874E:49a-14: bkug ste bsdus nas khyer 'ongs nas //
T02TD1874E:49a-15: lce yi rtse la gzhug par bya //
T02TD1874E:49a-16: de yis khams gsum dug blangs nas //
T02TD1874E:49a-17: de nyid dug gis gang bar bsam //
T02TD1874E:49a-18: aom krishna sarba che ge mo'i dpral grihna na kham hri phat /
T02TD1874E:49a-19: brjod pas de sod dpral bar bzung //
T02TD1874E:49a-20: mche bas phug ste lces rig pas //
T02TD1874E:49a-21: rdo rje 'chang ba chen po yang //
T02TD1874E:49a-22: dug gis 'chi nges dogs pa med //
T02TD1874E:49a-23: de kho na bzhin sdig pa dang //
T02TD1874E:49a-24: sre mong lta ba ae na pa //
T02TD1874E:49a-25: chu sbrul rlung sbrul la sogs pa //
T02TD1874E:49a-26: sa yi zas can sbal pa las //
T02TD1874E:49a-27: bsgrub bya 'dzin du gzhug pa'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:49a-28: bri ba'i rdzas dang gzugs dang bskul //
T02TD1874E:49a-29: bdug pa kun nas rbad btang bas //
T02TD1874E:49a-30: de yis mi 'chi dogs pa med //
T02TD1874E:49a-31: gshin rje gshed kyi sbyor ldan pas //
T02TD1874E:49a-32: thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la //
T02TD1874E:49a-33: dkon mchog gnod byed gzhom pa'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:49a-34: sbyor ba bzhi yis bsgrub par bya //
T02TD1874E:49a-35: aom hr'i: shtr'i: wi kri t'a na na che ge mo pa ta ya h'um phat /
T02TD1874E:49a-36: de yis dur khrod sol ba la //
T02TD1874E:49a-37: stong rtsa brgyad ni btab nas kyang //
T02TD1874E:49a-38: ro bsregs shul gyi sa la yang //
T02TD1874E:49a-39: bsgrub bya'i gzugs bris bkug ste gzhug / bkas ba'i bsam pas sol ba de //
T02TD1874E:49a-40: gong gi sngags bzlas sbu gri ltar //
T02TD1874E:49a-41: bsams te mgul pa'am spyi bo nas //
T02TD1874E:49a-42: de ltar thun bzhin zhag bdun sbyar //
T02TD1874E:49a-46: de nyid lag pa g-yas par 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:49a-47: mdun du bsgrub bya'i lus bsams la //
T02TD1874E:49a-48: sngags 'di nyid kyis bsnun zhing brgyab //
T02TD1874E:49a-49: aom hr'i :shtr'i:wi kri t'a na na che ge mo mu kha ra aa ta ya h'um phat /
T02TD1874E:49b-0: de yis @49b thun bzhir zhag bdun du //
T02TD1874E:49b-1: bsnun zhing brdungs pas bsgrub bya de //
T02TD1874E:49b-2: g-yang du ltung nas 'chi bar nges //
T02TD1874E:49b-3: yang na de yi rnal 'byor gyis //
T02TD1874E:49b-4: g-yas par h'um las byung ba yi //
T02TD1874E:49b-5: rdo rje rtse lngas bsgrub bya yi //
T02TD1874E:49b-6: lus la bsnun zhing 'di brjod do //
T02TD1874E:49b-7: aom hr'i:shtr'i:wi kri t'a na na che ge mo badzra aa ko ta ya h'um phat /
T02TD1874E:49b-8: de yis thun bzhir zhag bdun du //
T02TD1874E:49b-9: kha phye bsnun pas bsgrub bya de //
T02TD1874E:49b-10: srin po la sogs 'jigs par byed //
T02TD1874E:49b-11: de ltar de yi rnal 'byor gyis //
T02TD1874E:49b-12: sngon bzhin sngags btab rdo rgyus sam //
T02TD1874E:49b-13: sol bas dur khrod sa gzhi la //
T02TD1874E:49b-14: bsgrub bya pho mo'i gzugs bris la //
T02TD1874E:49b-15: h'um bskyed sta gri lag par bsam //
T02TD1874E:49b-16: khros te mgul par sngags bzlas nas //
T02TD1874E:49b-17: mid pa bcad par bsam pa ni //
T02TD1874E:49b-18: sbyor ba thun bzhir zhag bdun du //
T02TD1874E:49b-19: aom hr'i:shtr'i:wi kri t'a na na che ge mo w'aka ti pa ta h'um phat /
T02TD1874E:49b-20: brjod cing g-yel ba med pa yis //
T02TD1874E:49b-21: bzlas pas bsgrub bya mgul 'gags nas //
T02TD1874E:49b-22: kha zas mi thar nad kyis 'dzin //
T02TD1874E:49b-23: de bzhin bgegs dgra'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1874E:49b-24: ro bsregs thal ba rus la sogs //
T02TD1874E:49b-25: khro bo nyi shu'am de phyed kyis //
T02TD1874E:49b-26: me thab dkyil 'khor gru gsum bya //
T02TD1874E:49b-27: mar chen dud pas kha dog bsgyur //
T02TD1874E:49b-28: kha phye rdo rje rtse gsum pas //
T02TD1874E:49b-29: dbus su kha khyer gsum byas te //
T02TD1874E:49b-30: tsher ma'i me ni khros nas sbar //
T02TD1874E:49b-31: bshad pa'i cho gas me lha bskyed //
T02TD1874E:49b-32: gong gsungs rdzas byas gzugs brnyan gtub //
T02TD1874E:49b-33: de yi zhal du lan gsum du //
T02TD1874E:49b-34: gang ba'i sbyin sreg dbul bar bya //
T02TD1874E:49b-35: de yi ye shes sems dpa' ru //
T02TD1874E:49b-36: bdud rtsi 'khyil pa zhal gdangs pa //
T02TD1874E:49b-37: h'um ljags mche ba rnon po can //
T02TD1874E:49b-38: khro dang ldan pa sngon bzhin bsam //
T02TD1874E:49b-39: srog song steng ngam sra ba'am //
T02TD1874E:49b-40: yang na ci yang med pa ru //
T02TD1874E:49b-41: rkang pas rkang pa mnan nas su //
T02TD1874E:49b-42: sos ni so yang 'cha' bar byed //
T02TD1874E:49b-43: ba lang sha dang khyi yi sha //
T02TD1874E:49b-44: zangs phud can sogs sha rnams ni //
T02TD1874E:49b-45: bsgrub bya'i yan lag tu bsams la ;
T02TD1874E:49b-46: / gong ma'i sngags kyis sbyin sreg bya //
T02TD1874E:49b-47: sha chen 'ba' zhig kho na la //
T02TD1874E:49b-48: dgra yi gzugs brnya na byas nas ni //
T02TD1874E:49b-49: de yi zhal du sbyin sreg byas //
T02TD1874E:49b-50: rdo rje las byung 'jig par bshad //
T02TD1874E:49b-51: sngon bzhin dgra yi gzugs brnyan la //
T02TD1874E:49b-52: bshang gci 'bru mar bcas byugs nas //
T02TD1874E:50a-1: gsungs sngags dang bskul bar bya //
T02TD1874E:50a-2: tsher ma'i me la khros te bsreg / thun bzhir zhag bdun brgya rtsa brgyad //
T02TD1874E:50a-3: bzlas pas sangs rgyas kyis sbyar ba'i //
T02TD1874E:50a-4: las kyang 'jig na dgra bo yi //
T02TD1874E:50a-5: sbyar ba'i las ni smos ci dgos //
T02TD1874E:50a-6: bsad pas de dag thams cad kun ;
T02TD1874E:50a-7: / thugs rjes bzung phyir rnal 'byor ches //
T02TD1874E:50a-8: gnyis bral 'das pa'i de ma thag /'jug pa'i las 'di brtsam pa'o //
T02TD1874E:50a-9: de dag rnams kyis dngos po rnams //
T02TD1874E:50a-10: ma skyes par ni gzhig nas kyang //
T02TD1874E:50a-11: 'bras bu myong bar nges pa'i tshul //
T02TD1874E:50a-12: ye shes rang rig chen po mchog /
T02TD1874E:50a-13: sa bon 'od zer gyis bkug nas //
T02TD1874E:50a-14: zhal du zhugs nas zhu gyur te //
T02TD1874E:50a-15: rdo rje lam byung padmar gnas //
T02TD1874E:50a-16: ye shes bdud rtsi'i gzugs gyur la //
T02TD1874E:50a-17: spyan sogs lha mos bskul pa la //
T02TD1874E:50a-18: h'um las rdo rje h'um gis mtshan //
T02TD1874E:50a-19: spro bsdus mi bskyod rdo rjer bskyed //
T02TD1874E:50a-20: chos kyi dbyings su byin gyis brlab ;
T02TD1874E:50a-21: / rang las dgu gnyis drug phyung nas //
T02TD1874E:50a-22: gnyis dang gsum du rdzogs byas la //
T02TD1874E:50a-23: dang po rtog pa yongs dag phyir //
T02TD1874E:50a-24: sngags kyis phur bu dbyung bar bya //
T02TD1874E:50a-25: aom a'a: badzra k'i li ki l'a ya h'um /
T02TD1874E:50a-26: phyung nas de yi gnas su yang //
T02TD1874E:50a-27: rang gi ye shes 'khor lo can //
T02TD1874E:50a-28: gnas bcas bsams nas 'od zer gyis //
T02TD1874E:50a-29: sngon bzhin rang sgra sangs rgyas su //
T02TD1874E:50a-30: bskyed dang des bskyed lha mo'i tshogs //
T02TD1874E:50a-31: bdud rtsi lngas gang bum pa yis //
T02TD1874E:50a-32: dbang bskur de dang bla mar bcas //
T02TD1874E:50a-33: zhugs pas rdo rje sems dpar bskyed //
T02TD1874E:50a-34: aom badzra dhrik sngags kyis phyung ste //
T02TD1874E:50a-35: mdun du rlung gi dkyil 'khor steng //
T02TD1874E:50a-36: 'khor lo bcas pa mos byas la //
T02TD1874E:50a-37: mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang ba bya //
T02TD1874E:50a-38: aa ho yam gi sngags brjod pas //
T02TD1874E:50a-39: rlung gis bteg nas mngon dga' ru //
T02TD1874E:50a-40: gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags 'phangs pas //
T02TD1874E:50a-41: de dag sras su skye bar nges //
T02TD1874E:50a-42: rang rang lha yi sbyor ba'am //
T02TD1874E:50a-43: de yi gnas pa gang rung du //
T02TD1874E:50a-44: blo gros ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD1874E:50a-45: sbyor ba de khon yis bya //
T02TD1874E:50a-46: gnyis po rang zhugs de ma thag / de yi ye shes rang lha'am //
T02TD1874E:50a-47: zhe sdang dag pa'i sbyor kho nas //
T02TD1874E:50a-48: gong ma bzhin du rab tu brtsam //
T02TD1874E:50a-49: bdag med sems med bems po ni //
T02TD1874E:50b-0: @50b lan gsum gyis ni gzhig byas pas //
T02TD1874E:50b-1: gong gi sbyor bas 'bras bu che //
T02TD1874E:50b-2: mjug tu brtsam mi dgos par 'byung //
T02TD1874E:50b-3: de ltar thabs dang sngags ldan pas //
T02TD1874E:50b-5: bsad pas rang dang gzhan dag pas //
T02TD1874E:50b-7: sred pa zhe sdang gis bslang ba'i //
T02TD1874E:50b-8: sems kyis gsod pa'i gti mug can //
T02TD1874E:50b-9: thabs med ye shes dang bral bas //
T02TD1874E:50b-10: thur du bltas te dmyal bar 'gro //
T02TD1874E:50b-11: da ni gnas nas spro ba'i cho ga bshad par bya'o //
T02TD1874E:50b-12: rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1874E:50b-13: thams cad sna ma bzhin byas la //
T02TD1874E:50b-14: gnyis kyi rab tu bsgrub byas pa //
T02TD1874E:50b-16: thod ba srubs ni gang ba dag / pho dang mo yi bskrad pa la //
T02TD1874E:50b-17: de yi rigs pas btsal byas la //
T02TD1874E:50b-18: gnod byed yul gzhan dbyung bar bya //
T02TD1874E:50b-19: aa ri lo ma'i khu ba dang //
T02TD1874E:50b-20: rkang pa g-yon pa'i srin lag khrag / snag tshar byas te bya rgod kyi //
T02TD1874E:50b-21: skrog rtsa'i smyu gus bri bar bya //
T02TD1874E:50b-22: mgar ba'i dur khrod ras ma la //
T02TD1874E:50b-24: ral gri yis ni mtshan pa bri //
T02TD1874E:50b-25: de steng sgrub bya'i gzugs gzhag la //
T02TD1874E:50b-26: gong gi ras la de yi ming //
T02TD1874E:50b-27: sngags kyi bar bcug che ge mo //
T02TD1874E:50b-28: autstsha ta ya phat bris la //
T02TD1874E:50b-29: de yi snying gar gzhug par bya //
T02TD1874E:50b-30: bkug ste bcug nas de dkris la //
T02TD1874E:50b-31: thod pa ru ni bcug byas te //
T02TD1874E:50b-32: khro bo'i tshig gi rang rang sngags //
T02TD1874E:50b-33: rig dang bcas par brgya rtsa brgyad //
T02TD1874E:50b-34: thun bzhir zhag bdun bzlas byas nas //
T02TD1874E:50b-35: khyim mam grong gnam sgo dag tu //
T02TD1874E:50b-36: sbas te bzhag na dus de ru //
T02TD1874E:50b-37: sangs rgyas dpung yang skrod par 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:50b-38: de bzhin t'a la'i lo ma la //
T02TD1874E:50b-39: gro ga'am shog shog ras la sogs //
T02TD1874E:50b-40: snod med cho gas gong ma ltar //
T02TD1874E:50b-41: stod rtsa brgyad ni rig bcas bzlas //
T02TD1874E:50b-42: dgra yi khyim mam sgo dag tu //
T02TD1874E:50b-43: sbas te bzhag na myur ba ru //
T02TD1874E:50b-44: dkon mchog 'joms pa'i dgra bo che //
T02TD1874E:50b-46: las de bdud rtse 'khyil pa yi //
T02TD1874E:50b-47: sbyor ba yis kyang rab tu bsgrub //
T02TD1874E:50b-48: thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la //
T02TD1874E:50b-49: cho ga 'di ni rab tu brtsam //
T02TD1874E:50b-50: rgyal mtshan ras ni chag gang la //
T02TD1874E:50b-51: gru bzhi lham par kha ti dang //
T02TD1874E:51a-2: ro bsregs smyo byed sol ba dang //
T02TD1874E:51a-3: mu zi'i dug dang rkang g-yon gyi //
T02TD1874E:51a-4: ming med khrag la snag tshar byas //
T02TD1874E:51a-5: khva yi gshog pa'i smyu gu yis //
T02TD1874E:51a-7: phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad rtse bstan pa'i //
T02TD1874E:51a-8: ral gri brgyad pa'i 'khor lo la //
T02TD1874E:51a-9: de dbus bsgrub bya'i gzugs bris la //
T02TD1874E:51a-10: de yi snying gar phreng sngags ni //
T02TD1874E:51a-11: gong gi rig pa dang bcas pa //
T02TD1874E:51a-12: dgug med bris nas snying gar glan //
T02TD1874E:51a-13: bkug ste bcug nas rkang g-yon gyis //
T02TD1874E:51a-14: mnan te brgya dang rtsa brgyad bzlas /
T02TD1874E:51a-15: na ma:sa manta ksha ya w'ak tsitta badzr'a n'am /
T02TD1874E:51a-16: na mo badzra kro dh'a ya /
T02TD1874E:51a-18: ka ta bhee ra ba ya //
T02TD1874E:51a-19: aa si mu sa la pa ra shu //
T02TD1874E:51a-21: aom aa mri ta kunda likha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi //
T02TD1874E:51a-27: bi spho ta ya bi spho ta ya //
T02TD1874E:51a-30: che ge mo autstsha ta ya phat ;
T02TD1874E:51a-31: de yang phyag 'tshal mjug tu yang //
T02TD1874E:51a-32: bskul ba 'di ni bya ba dang //
T02TD1874E:51a-33: phyag 'tshal bskul dang bod pa dang //
T02TD1874E:51a-34: las brgyad de dag tu shes bya //
T02TD1874E:51a-35: de ltar bsngags nas ras ma de //
T02TD1874E:51a-36: ma mo la sogs gnas su sba //
T02TD1874E:51a-37: sangs rgyas dpung yang skrod byed na //
T02TD1874E:51a-38: bgegs kyi gnod pa smos ci dgos //
T02TD1874E:51a-39: da ni bsgrub bya srin po la sogs pas 'dzin du gzhug pa'i chog bshad par bya'o //
T02TD1874E:51a-40: thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la //
T02TD1874E:51a-41: gzhan gyis mi thub rnal 'byor gyis //
T02TD1874E:51a-42: gsum pa'i dus su rdzas ldan par //
T02TD1874E:51a-44: rgyal mtshan dang ni mtshon bsnun dang //
T02TD1874E:51a-45: shi ba'i thod pa gnyis btsal la //
T02TD1874E:51a-46: dur khrod kyi ni sol ba la //
T02TD1874E:51a-47: khro bo'i sngags ni rig bcas bzlas //
T02TD1874E:51a-48: de yi thong par srin po'i gzugs //
T02TD1874E:51a-49: 'jigs rung gyen brdzes mche gtsigs pa //
T02TD1874E:51a-50: sha rlon za zhing khrag 'jag pa //
T02TD1874E:51a-51: g-yas g-yon ro langs gri dang ni //
T02TD1874E:51a-52: sdigs 'dzub byad pa h'um bskyed bri //
T02TD1874E:51a-53: de yi snying gar rus phye dang //
T02TD1874E:51a-54: dug dang ma the'u chung khrag gis ni //
T02TD1874E:51a-55: che ge mo ni zung shig bri //
T02TD1874E:51a-56: yang ni thod pa gnyis pa la //
T02TD1874E:51a-57: bsgrub bya'i rkang rjes sa dang ni //
T02TD1874E:51a-58: ro bsregs dang thal ba dang //
T02TD1874E:51a-59: sol ba gcin gyis sbrus byas la //
T02TD1874E:51b-0: de yi gzugs brnyan byas @51b nas su //
T02TD1874E:51b-1: dug dang rus phye mdzub mo'i khrag / ming dang sngags bcas ta ler bris //
T02TD1874E:51b-2: de yis snying gar gzhug par bya //
T02TD1874E:51b-3: gnyi ga bkug ste bcug byas nas //
T02TD1874E:51b-4: de ni 'og bzhag gong ma steng //
T02TD1874E:51b-5: srin po de yis bsgrub bya rnams //
T02TD1874E:51b-6: bzung bar bsams nas khros byas te //
T02TD1874E:51b-7: nag po gnyis la dur khrod du //
T02TD1874E:51b-8: nam phyed song nas bsgreng byas te //
T02TD1874E:51b-11: k'a ya w'ak tsitta badzr'a n'am /
T02TD1874E:51b-12: aom h'um dzin ri ta che ge mo raksha ghi ha nam h'um phat /
T02TD1874E:51b-13: de bzhin sbrul dang seng+ger dang //
T02TD1874E:51b-14: 'byung po sdig la sogs pa rnams //
T02TD1874E:51b-15: cho ga gong bzhin gnyis par bri //
T02TD1874E:51b-16: gong gi sngags de rigs bcas bzla //
T02TD1874E:51b-17: g-yeng med gnyis kyi mtshan dus su //
T02TD1874E:51b-18: khros nas bsgreng zhing bzlas byas pas //
T02TD1874E:51b-19: gal te mi bskyod yin na yang //
T02TD1874E:51b-21: de dag thor bar byed 'dod pas //
T02TD1874E:51b-22: 'dzin byed de dag thams cad kun //
T02TD1874E:51b-23: bsgrub bya'i lus la bsdus byas la //
T02TD1874E:51b-24: rkang pa gnyis kyis mnye bar bya //
T02TD1874E:51b-25: lag gnyis 'bar ba'i rdo rjer bskyed //
T02TD1874E:51b-26: de yis dbyug pas brdung bar bya //
T02TD1874E:51b-27: rdo rje 'bar bas brdung ba dang //
T02TD1874E:51b-28: sngon gyi sngags bzlas lcug mas gdab //
T02TD1874E:51b-29: che ge mo raksha sa 'di phyi mo tsa yi //
T02TD1874E:51b-30: srin mo ma rungs gtum mo dang //
T02TD1874E:51b-32: sbyor ba de yis rab sbyar na //
T02TD1874E:51b-33: cho ga bzhin du grol bar byed //
T02TD1874E:51b-34: da ni dgug pa'i cho ga rgyas par bshad par bya'o //
T02TD1874E:51b-35: ri mo'i dkyil 'khor bris nas su //
T02TD1874E:51b-36: lha yis dbang bskur yan chad ni //
T02TD1874E:51b-37: thams cad gong ma bzhin byas la //
T02TD1874E:51b-38: bsam gtan 'khor los dgug par bsgrub //
T02TD1874E:51b-39: rnam par snang mdzad sbyor ba yi //
T02TD1874E:51b-40: 'khor lo chen po rnam par bsams //
T02TD1874E:51b-41: mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang byas la //
T02TD1874E:51b-42: lcags kyu gnas ni bsgom par bya //
T02TD1874E:51b-43: aom a'a:dzin ka che ge mo sems can nam sems can ma yin pa a'a karsha ya dza:/
T02TD1874E:51b-44: brjod pas de las rab 'phros pas //
T02TD1874E:51b-45: lcags kyu zhags pas mtshan pa yi //
T02TD1874E:51b-46: lha yi sku ni mangs po dag / bsgrub bya 'gugs phyir spro bar bya //
T02TD1874E:51b-47: dgug bya ming gi yi ges bskyed //
T02TD1874E:51b-48: yam byung rlung dkyil la bzhag ste //
T02TD1874E:52a-2: rlung gis bteg nas 'od bar bsam //
T02TD1874E:52a-4: mtshan ma'i lha rnams spros byas nas //
T02TD1874E:52a-5: de yis btab pas de bzhin du //
T02TD1874E:52a-6: dgug par the tshom med pa'o //
T02TD1874E:52a-7: lam gis phab ste mdun bzhag nas //
T02TD1874E:52a-8: sngon bzhin lha mo gnyis kyis ni //
T02TD1874E:52a-9: 'tshe ba bzlog nas bka' nod bsam //
T02TD1874E:52a-10: de ltar sbyor bas zhag bdun du //
T02TD1874E:52a-11: thun bzhir rab tu sbyar byas nas //
T02TD1874E:52a-12: dgug las mi 'da' kun gyis kyang //
T02TD1874E:52a-13: sgrub po las thabs byed par 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:52a-14: de bzhin mi bskyod rdo rje dang //
T02TD1874E:52a-15: rnam par snang mdzad 'od dpag med //
T02TD1874E:52a-16: 'khor lo chen po'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1874E:52a-17: lcags kyus gnas bsam rang sngags brjod //
T02TD1874E:52a-18: aom a'a:badzra dhrik che ge mo a'a karsha ya dza:/
T02TD1874E:52a-19: aom a'a:aa ro lik che ge mo a'a karsha ya dza:/
T02TD1874E:52a-20: gzhan kun sngon bzhin dpag byas la //
T02TD1874E:52a-21: mthun bzhir zhag bdun sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1874E:52a-22: rdo rje gsum gyi nus pa yang //
T02TD1874E:52a-24: sems kyi spyod pa gzhan bral bas //
T02TD1874E:52a-25: rdzogs chen rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor bas //
T02TD1874E:52a-26: de yi bsam gtan 'ba' zhig gis //
T02TD1874E:52a-27: dgug pa dag ni thabs su gsungs //
T02TD1874E:52a-28: dga' dang dga' ba rab dga' yi //
T02TD1874E:52a-29: skyed pa gong du mngon byas la //
T02TD1874E:52a-30: bsgrub bya ye shes ngo bo ru //
T02TD1874E:52a-31: byas te gnyis par chud byas te //
T02TD1874E:52a-32: ma 'phros rtsi gcig pa yis gzung //
T02TD1874E:52a-33: ye shes gsum gyis sku gsum mchog / de yi rgyud la 'gugs 'gyur na //
T02TD1874E:52a-34: sngags rgyud la sogs bsgrub bya ni //
T02TD1874E:52a-35: smos ci dgos te de mchog yin //
T02TD1874E:52a-36: de bas rnam pa thams cad du //
T02TD1874E:52a-37: las rnams kun 'di bstan pa yin //
T02TD1874E:52a-38: lus sogs med pa'ang dgug sogs 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:52a-39: gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD1874E:52a-40: thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la //
T02TD1874E:52a-41: rang gi sngags kyi rig pa mchog / grangs med bzlas pa rab tu bya //
T02TD1874E:52a-42: de nas lus rtsal thob pa yis //
T02TD1874E:52a-43: 'bum phrag gcig ni bzlas pa bya //
T02TD1874E:52a-44: ri mo'i dkyil 'khor bris byas la //
T02TD1874E:52a-45: lha yis dbang bskur bar gyis zhugs //
T02TD1874E:52a-46: bud med gzhon nu'i thod pa ni //
T02TD1874E:52a-47: ma chag cing ni ma gas pa //
T02TD1874E:52a-49: dum bu gcig pa blangs byas nas //
T02TD1874E:52b-0: gi wang la ni sngags bzlas @52b nas ;
T02TD1874E:52b-1: / rlung gi dkyil 'khor steng du ni //
T02TD1874E:52b-3: lte bar dgug par bya ba ni //
T02TD1874E:52b-4: gur gum go ro tsa nas bri //
T02TD1874E:52b-5: gro ga shog shog la sogs la //
T02TD1874E:52b-6: phreng sngags 'di ni mi dgug par //
T02TD1874E:52b-7: sv'a h'a bton te dza bcug nas //
T02TD1874E:52b-8: bskul ba dang bcas bris nas ni //
T02TD1874E:52b-9: de yi snying gar glan par bya //
T02TD1874E:52b-10: thod pa de yang kha sbubs nas //
T02TD1874E:52b-11: gshin rje gshed kyi zhabs g-yas brkyang //
T02TD1874E:52b-12: g-yon par bskum pas mnan byas la //
T02TD1874E:52b-13: khro dang bcas pas gsang sngags 'di //
T02TD1874E:52b-14: rdo rje gsum dang bcas bsams pas //
T02TD1874E:52b-15: lan gsum drag tu brjod par bya //
T02TD1874E:52b-17: k'a ya w'aka tsitta badzr'a n'am /
T02TD1874E:52b-18: aom kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi //
T02TD1874E:52b-19: sarba dushtr'a nas tva da ma ka /
T02TD1874E:52b-20: aa si mu sa la pa ra shu p'a sha ha st'a ya /
T02TD1874E:52b-21: tsa turbhu dza tsa turmu kha /
T02TD1874E:52b-22: sho da sha tsa r'a ya /
T02TD1874E:52b-24: sarba dushtr'a na pr'a n'am aa ha ri ni /
T02TD1874E:52b-25: ma h'a bigh'a bi n'a ya ka /
T02TD1874E:52b-26: bi krii t'a ana na sarba bh'u ta bha yam ra ya /
T02TD1874E:52b-27: a'a gatta ha sa da di ni ;
T02TD1874E:52b-28: by'a ghra tsarma ni ba sa na /
T02TD1874E:52b-33: bu mo che ge a'a karsha ya a'a karsha ya /
T02TD1874E:52b-35: nir ma tha ya nir ma tha ya /
T02TD1874E:52b-37: pra be sha ya pra be sha ya //
T02TD1874E:52b-38: mandala ma bi bi be ba sv'a h'a dz'i bi t'an ta ka pri ya /
T02TD1874E:52b-43: ma bi lamba ma bi lamb /
T02TD1874E:52b-44: sa ma ya ma nu sma ra h'um h'um phat phat /
T02TD1874E:52b-45: spho ta ya spho ta ya /
T02TD1874E:52b-46: sarba n'a sha ya ni sum ka ra ka ra //
T02TD1874E:52b-48: kanytsi ra ya si ma ma aartha s'a dha yadzdza /
T02TD1874E:52b-49: de las 'phros pa'i gshin rje gshed //
T02TD1874E:52b-50: lcags kyu thogs pa mang po yis //
T02TD1874E:52b-51: sngon bzhin rlung dkyil la gnas pa'i //
T02TD1874E:52b-52: bsgrub bya bud med dgug par byed //
T02TD1874E:52b-53: skrag pas 'tshe ba bzlog pa'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:52b-54: spyan ma'i sngags kyis sngon bzhin du /
T02TD1874E:52b-55: ring dug gnas par bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:52b-56: m'a ma k'i ni sbyor bas srung //
T02TD1874E:52b-57: de bzhin skyes pa'i thod pa la //
T02TD1874E:52b-58: g-yon brkyang g-yas bskum pas mnan te //
T02TD1874E:52b-59: cho ga sngon bzhin rab byas te //
T02TD1874E:52b-60: skyes ba rnams kyang dgug par byed //
T02TD1874E:52b-61: bsam gtan sngags rgyud sbyor ba yi //
T02TD1874E:52b-62: zhag bdun thun bzhir rab brtsams nas //
T02TD1874E:52b-63: gshin rje gshed kyi yon tan yang //
T02TD1874E:53a-2: 'dod pa'i rgyal po khro bo che //
T02TD1874E:53a-4: bu mo rnams ni dgug pa'i mchod / gshin rje gshed kyi rgyud gsungs pa'i //
T02TD1874E:53a-5: cho gas bsgrub bya bkug bcug nas //
T02TD1874E:53a-6: g-yon brkyang g-yas bskum gyis mnan na ;
T02TD1874E:53a-7: / sngags 'dis rig bcas bzlas brjod bya //
T02TD1874E:53a-9: k'a ya w'ak tsitta badzra n'am /
T02TD1874E:53a-10: ta ki bu mo che ge mo h'um a'a karsha ya dza:/
T02TD1874E:53a-11: brjod pas sngags byung khro bo yis //
T02TD1874E:53a-12: lcags kyus sngon bzhin bskug byas nas //
T02TD1874E:53a-13: zhi bsrung ba'i cho ga yis //
T02TD1874E:53a-14: lha rnams la sogs 'gugs par byed //
T02TD1874E:53a-15: sngon bzhin thams cad rab byas la //
T02TD1874E:53a-16: rdo rje las byung mi g-yo ni //
T02TD1874E:53a-18: lha chen chung mar bcas pa dgug / skyes pa'i thod pa ma gas pa //
T02TD1874E:53a-19: mdzes shing srub med ma gas pa //
T02TD1874E:53a-20: 'thab tshe g-yul du shi ba yi //
T02TD1874E:53a-21: skyon med pa de btsal bar bya //
T02TD1874E:53a-22: rkang pa g-yas pa'i sor mo'i khrag / lan tshva yungs kar ske che la //
T02TD1874E:53a-23: snag tsha byas la bya rgod rkang //
T02TD1874E:53a-24: lha chen chung mar bcas pa kun //
T02TD1874E:53a-25: thod pa de la bri bar bya //
T02TD1874E:53a-26: de yi snying gar gong ma ltar //
T02TD1874E:53a-27: rig bcas sngags ni dgug par bya //
T02TD1874E:53a-28: bris nas snying gar glan par bya //
T02TD1874E:53a-29: bkug ste bcug nas kha spubs la //
T02TD1874E:53a-30: g-yon bskum g-yas brkyang pas mnan na //
T02TD1874E:53a-31: sngags 'di thun bzhir zhag bdun du //
T02TD1874E:53a-32: rig pa dang bcas bzlas dgug bya //
T02TD1874E:53a-34: k'a ya w'ak tsitta badzr'a n'am //
T02TD1874E:53a-35: aa tsa la ga na tsa ta //
T02TD1874E:53a-44: aa bi sha aa bi sha //
T02TD1874E:53a-45: ma h'a matta pa la ka //
T02TD1874E:53a-49: bighn'am ma ra ma ra dushta n'an /
T02TD1874E:53a-54: spo ta ya spo ta ya /
T02TD1874E:53a-56: tri ba li bam ga na rta ya //
T02TD1874E:53a-57: aam ham aam ham aa tsa la tse te //
T02TD1874E:53a-58: spo ta ya spo ta ya //
T02TD1874E:53a-61: tra ta ma h'a ba la /
T02TD1874E:53a-63: tam ma shu ta bu lo ka du shya du //
T02TD1874E:53a-64: badzra ni masta pri ti ha ta ba la bya //
T02TD1874E:53a-65: dzal ya tra aa ha sa na nam //
T02TD1874E:53a-66: lha chen po bud med dad bcas pa a'a karsha yadzdza //
T02TD1874E:53a-67: sngags las byung ba'i khro bo che //
T02TD1874E:53b-0: lcags kyu thogs pas 'gugs @53b bsams nas //
T02TD1874E:53b-1: sngon bzhin rab mchod bsrung ba yis //
T02TD1874E:53b-2: g-yog dang chud ma'i bya ba byed //
T02TD1874E:53b-3: de bzhin lha min la sogs kyang //
T02TD1874E:53b-4: sbyor ba de yis rab sgrubs na //
T02TD1874E:53b-5: skrag cing 'jigs pa gong mas bsrung //
T02TD1874E:53b-6: kha sbyar lus su bcas pa 'grub //
T02TD1874E:53b-7: thams cad snga ma bzhin bya //
T02TD1874E:53b-9: /'og nas 'byung ba'i cho ga yis / gnod mdzes rgyal po bsgoms byas te /
T02TD1874E:53b-10: bu mo rnams dgug par bya //
T02TD1874E:53b-11: mtshan rnams kun gyis rnam brgyan pa //
T02TD1874E:53b-12: rgyal mtshan gyur pa'i thod pa la //
T02TD1874E:53b-13: rkang pa g-yon pa'i ming med khrag / snag tsha byas nas ne tso'i sgros //
T02TD1874E:53b-14: bsgrub bya'i bu mo'i gzugs bris la //
T02TD1874E:53b-15: de yi snying gar gong ma ltar //
T02TD1874E:53b-16: rig bcas sngags bri glan byas la //
T02TD1874E:53b-17: de yi bha gar gnod mdzes kyi //
T02TD1874E:53b-18: rkang po g-yon pa'i mthe bos mnan //
T02TD1874E:53b-19: thun bzhir zhag bdun gsang sngags 'di //
T02TD1874E:53b-20: bskul dang bcas pas khros byas nas /
T02TD1874E:53b-21: brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas pa'o //
T02TD1874E:53b-22: aom sumbha ni sumbha bu mo che ge mo h'um /
T02TD1874E:53b-23: grihn'a bu mo che ge mo h'um /
T02TD1874E:53b-24: grihn'a pa ya grihn'a pa ya //
T02TD1874E:53b-25: bu mo che ge mo h'um /
T02TD1874E:53b-26: a'a na ya ho:bha ga b'an bidya r'a dza bu mo che ge mo h'um phat dzdza /
T02TD1874E:53b-27: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa kun //
T02TD1874E:53b-28: gnod mdzes gyur pa lcags kyu zhags //
T02TD1874E:53b-29: thogs pa 'phros pas rlung dkyil la //
T02TD1874E:53b-30: gnas pa'i bu mo snying dag phug / zhags pas ske nas bcings nas ni //
T02TD1874E:53b-31: 'ongs pa'i tshe na bzlog pa'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:53b-32: zhing dag bsrung bas brtan byas pas //
T02TD1874E:53b-33: ji ltar 'dod pa'i las rnams byed //
T02TD1874E:53b-34: gang yang rung ba'i rnal 'byor bas / snga ma bzhin du thams cad bya //
T02TD1874E:53b-35: kha ti la sogs bsgrub byas la //
T02TD1874E:53b-36: skyes pa bud med dgug pa sgrub //
T02TD1874E:53b-37: zla ba sbyang ki zin pa'i tshe //
T02TD1874E:53b-38: btsag gam rdo rgyus la sogs pa //
T02TD1874E:53b-39: rang gi kha ru bcu gnas kyang //
T02TD1874E:53b-40: de nyid gsum bskyed lha ru bsam //
T02TD1874E:53b-41: de par rang sngags bcu gnas ni //
T02TD1874E:53b-42: spar na yis spro byas pas //
T02TD1874E:53b-43: de las byung ba'i lha rnams ni //
T02TD1874E:53b-44: lcags kyus mtshan pas rnam mkha' dgang //
T02TD1874E:53b-45: bsdu ba'i sbyor bas kun bsdus nas //
T02TD1874E:53b-46: rdzas kyis lha la bstim par bya //
T02TD1874E:53b-47: brtan pa'i ngo bo bos yang dag dang yang //
T02TD1874E:53b-48: zla ba grol gyi bar du gzung //
T02TD1874E:53b-49: de nas brtsams te thun bzhi ru //
T02TD1874E:54a-2: tshangs pa drag po la sogs lha /
T02TD1874E:54a-3: gang gi ming rnams bris 'gyur na //
T02TD1874E:54a-4: rdo rje thugs kyi bka' bzhin du //
T02TD1874E:54a-6: tha ma la skyes pa bung med sogs //
T02TD1874E:54a-8: sngon bzhin bzlas pa la sogs nas //
T02TD1874E:54a-9: dbang bskur yan chad zhugs byas te //
T02TD1874E:54a-10: rdo rje 'dzin pa las byung ba'i //
T02TD1874E:54a-11: thor tshugs gcig ma bsgom par bya //
T02TD1874E:54a-12: g-yas dkar g-yon mar dbu ma sngo //
T02TD1874E:54a-13: dang pos rang gi thabs la 'khyud //
T02TD1874E:54a-14: g-yas gnyis gri dang ral gri dang //
T02TD1874E:54a-15: g-yon gnyis thod pa nor bu bsnams //
T02TD1874E:54a-16: rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam brgyan pa //
T02TD1874E:54a-17: rnam par smin sogs mos pa yis //
T02TD1874E:54a-18: rang sgra dang ni ldan byas nas //
T02TD1874E:54a-19: cung zad mtshe gtsigs dmigs par bya //
T02TD1874E:54a-20: mtshams thung mi smrar gyur pa yi //
T02TD1874E:54a-21: thod pa klu shing me tog dang //
T02TD1874E:54a-22: rkang pa g-yon pa'i ming med khrag /
T02TD1874E:54a-23: bsres te 'o mar sbyar byas la //
T02TD1874E:54a-24: de yi skra yi bir gyis ni //
T02TD1874E:54a-25: rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa //
T02TD1874E:54a-26: nor rgyas la sogs bu mo bri //
T02TD1874E:54a-27: de yi snying gar rig snag ni //
T02TD1874E:54a-28: bskul ba dang bcas bris te glan //
T02TD1874E:54a-29: bkug ste bcu gnas g-yas brkyang ste //
T02TD1874E:54a-30: g-yon bskum pa yis gnas byas la //
T02TD1874E:54a-31: sngags 'di brgya dang rtsa brgyad bzlas //
T02TD1874E:54a-32: aom a'a:badzra shu li ni klu'i bu che ge mo a'a karsha yadzdza /
T02TD1874E:54a-33: brjod pas gsum las byung ba yi //
T02TD1874E:54a-34: bdung can ma ni lcags kyus mtshan //
T02TD1874E:54a-35: rlung dkyil la gnas bsgrub bya ni /
T02TD1874E:54a-36: bcug ste ngon bzhin 'tshe ba ba bzlog //
T02TD1874E:54a-37: de ltar zhag bdun thun bzhi ru //
T02TD1874E:54a-38: sngags rgyud de yis rab sbyar te //
T02TD1874E:54a-39: klu yi bu mo mig bzang dang //
T02TD1874E:54a-40: bkug nas nye bar spyad par bya //
T02TD1874E:54a-41: thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la// rdo rje 'dzin pa las byung ba'i //
T02TD1874E:54a-42: khro gnyer ma yi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1874E:54a-43: nam mkha'i rig 'dzin bu mo dgug / dmar skya g-yas sdo g-yon dkar ba //
T02TD1874E:54a-44: dang po rang gi thabs la 'khyud //
T02TD1874E:54a-47: gsum po mos pas dpag med mtshan //
T02TD1874E:54a-48: se ral thod pa'i phreng ba brgyan //
T02TD1874E:54a-49: rgyan kun brgyan pa'i na bza' bklubs //
T02TD1874E:54a-50: mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa bsgom //
T02TD1874E:54b-0: rgyal @54b po 'dra ba'i bu mo yi //
T02TD1874E:54b-1: thod par rig 'dzin bu mo'i gzugs //
T02TD1874E:54b-2: rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa //
T02TD1874E:54b-3: gong gi rdzas kyis bri bar bya //
T02TD1874E:54b-4: snying gar sngon bzhin ming gas bris nas //
T02TD1874E:54b-5: bkug ste bcu gnas g-yas brkyang dang //
T02TD1874E:54b-6: g-yon bskum pa yis mnan byas la //
T02TD1874E:54b-7: 'di ni brgyad dang rtsa gcig bzla //
T02TD1874E:54b-8: aom aa pa ya na sha ni tra sa pra bhe ni tr'a ya tr'a sa ya //
T02TD1874E:54b-10: shthe pa ti shthe be ta /
T02TD1874E:54b-11: dza ti ni rig pa 'dzin pa bu mo che ge mo a'a karsha yadzdza //
T02TD1874E:54b-12: brjod pas sngags las byung ba yi //
T02TD1874E:54b-13: khro gnyer lcags kyus mtshan pa yis //
T02TD1874E:54b-14: rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i //
T02TD1874E:54b-15: rig pa 'dzin pa'i bu mo mchog / gser gyi rna rgyan 'phyang ba rnams //
T02TD1874E:54b-16: bkug ste 'ong ba rgyas btab bo //
T02TD1874E:54b-17: lhun gyis grub pa gnyis mi dgos //
T02TD1874E:54b-18: thun bzhir zhag bdun sbyar na 'grub //
T02TD1874E:54b-19: gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD1874E:54b-20: sngon bzhin thams cad rab byas la //
T02TD1874E:54b-21: mar ngo bcu bzhi tshes brgyad la //
T02TD1874E:54b-22: ro bsregs sol ba blangs nas ni //
T02TD1874E:54b-23: sngags 'di brgyad rtsa brgyad du ni //
T02TD1874E:54b-24: bzlas nas srin po la sogs pa //
T02TD1874E:54b-25: ming sa bcas gro ga la sogs pa //
T02TD1874E:54b-26: bris nas de yis dgug par byed //
T02TD1874E:54b-27: aom h'i:shitr'i:w'ai kri t'a na na srin po la sogs pa che ge mo skyes pa'am bud med 'di bdag la byin zhig stambha ya h'um phat dzdza //
T02TD1874E:54b-28: brjod cing de mnan thun bzhi ru //
T02TD1874E:54b-29: bdun sbyar srin pa la sogs pas //
T02TD1874E:54b-30: rang gis bka' stsal gang yang rung //
T02TD1874E:54b-31: khrid nas nges par 'bul bar byed //
T02TD1874E:54b-32: 'das ma thag pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1874E:54b-33: thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la //
T02TD1874E:54b-34: ji skad bshad pa'i phyag rgya mchog / bsgrub phyir sbyin sregs cho ga bya //
T02TD1874E:54b-35: dur khrod thal ba sol ba la //
T02TD1874E:54b-36: hom khung grub gsum khru do pa //
T02TD1874E:54b-37: zabs su khru gang kha khyer ni //
T02TD1874E:54b-38: sor mo brgyad pa'i tshad du bya //
T02TD1874E:54b-39: rdo rje rtse gsum sor bcu gnyis //
T02TD1874E:54b-40: rtse dbus lcags kyu ltar byas nas //
T02TD1874E:54b-41: dbus dang kha khyer la bkod de //
T02TD1874E:54b-42: dmar nag kha khyer rams kyis byug / ji skad rdo rje lce ldan pa'i //
T02TD1874E:54b-43: zhal du nges par 'gyur byas la //
T02TD1874E:54b-44: po son cha sogs me sbar ro //
T02TD1874E:54b-45: dug gi khrag rab ru sbyar //
T02TD1874E:54b-46: lan tshva ske tshe de bzhin sbyar //
T02TD1874E:54b-47: dha du aa yi 'bras bu yis //
T02TD1874E:55a-1: cing lus dang ngag / khro zhing bsgrub bya'i mings bcas pa'i //
T02TD1874E:55a-2: sngags 'di stong dang rtsa brgyad du //
T02TD1874E:55a-3: blo dang ldan pas g-yel med pas //
T02TD1874E:55a-4: bzla zhing sbyin sregs brtsam pa'o //
T02TD1874E:55a-5: aom hr'i:shtr'i:wi kri t'a na na bu mo che ge mo stambha ya na sh'a ya h'um h'um phat dzdza /
T02TD1874E:55a-6: de las 'phros pa'i gshin rje gshed ;
T02TD1874E:55a-7: / lcags kyu thogs pa 'phros byas pas //
T02TD1874E:55a-8: rlung dkyil la gnas bu mo yi //
T02TD1874E:55a-9: snying gar sbyar te dgug par bsam //
T02TD1874E:55a-10: nyi ma'i gung dang nam phyed na //
T02TD1874E:55a-11: 'di ni shis pa'i dus yin pas //
T02TD1874E:55a-12: blo dang ldan pas sbyor ba des //
T02TD1874E:55a-13: nyi ma gsum dang drug tu bya //
T02TD1874E:55a-15: sngon bzhin zhi dang bsrung ba bya //
T02TD1874E:55a-16: bskal pa grangs med gsum du'ang //
T02TD1874E:55a-18: sangs rgyas sam ni chos 'dzin nam //
T02TD1874E:55a-19: rdo rje sems dpa' gang yang rung //
T02TD1874E:55a-20: gal te rmongs pas 'das na ni //
T02TD1874E:55a-21: de yi tshe ni dre zad 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:55a-22: da ni klu skams pas char gcad par bya ba'i cho ga bshad par bya'o //
T02TD1874E:55a-23: sngon bzhin byas pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD1874E:55a-24: rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po nyid //
T02TD1874E:55a-25: kha dog ser po bsgoms byas la //
T02TD1874E:55a-26: char mi bcad pa 'gog par bya //
T02TD1874E:55a-27: yul yul kun nas phyogs gcig ste //
T02TD1874E:55a-28: h'um bskyed sna tshogs rdo rje ni //
T02TD1874E:55a-30: 'dod pa'i phyogs ni g-yogs par bsam //
T02TD1874E:55a-31: de yi lte bar h'um bskyed pa'i //
T02TD1874E:55a-32: rdo rje rtse lnga 'grengs bu ni //
T02TD1874E:55a-33: t'a la'i tshad tsam me 'bar ba'i //
T02TD1874E:55a-34: bim par rten gyi dkyil 'khor bsam //
T02TD1874E:55a-35: de ru gong gi sbyor ba ni //
T02TD1874E:55a-36: 'khor lo dang bcas de bzhin bsgom //
T02TD1874E:55a-38: brjod par bsams te sngags 'di bzlas //
T02TD1874E:55a-39: aom a'a:h'um ma h'a ba rasha ha na ha na h'um phat /
T02TD1874E:55a-40: de rnams ba spu'i bu ga las //
T02TD1874E:55a-42: 'dod pa'i phyogs ni khyab bsam sbas //
T02TD1874E:55a-43: sna tshogs rdo rje me yis ni //
T02TD1874E:55a-44: sa gzhi thams cad bsregs nas ni ;
T02TD1874E:55a-45: / klu skabs gyur zhing 'bros bsams na //
T02TD1874E:55a-46: rang 'dod gnas las phyi rol du //
T02TD1874E:55a-48: yang na sbyor ba nges gnas la //
T02TD1874E:55a-49: ske tshe lan tshva 'bru mar dang //
T02TD1874E:55a-50: dug dang dha du ra dag gis //
T02TD1874E:55b-1: / klu brgyud rnams kyi sa bon nam //
T02TD1874E:55b-2: rang rang snying po bri ba'o //
T02TD1874E:55b-3: phu pham phe pho pha phi pham //
T02TD1874E:55b-4: snying po phat gnyis bar du ni //
T02TD1874E:55b-5: chu yi snying po b'a bris la /
T02TD1874E:55b-6: de rnams bkug ste sa bon la //
T02TD1874E:55b-7: bcug stegs la bar bsgom par bya //
T02TD1874E:55b-8: yang ni ras ma gnyis pa la //
T02TD1874E:55b-9: las kyi rdo rje ser po ni //
T02TD1874E:55b-11: lte bar rdo rje rtse lnga pa //
T02TD1874E:55b-12: h'um gis mtshan pa bri bar bya //
T02TD1874E:55b-13: gong gi sbyor bas byin brlabs la //
T02TD1874E:55b-14: dang po ras ma bkan te bzhag / ras ma gnyis pa kha sbubs nas //
T02TD1874E:55b-15: rdo la spos mnan pas byas pa //
T02TD1874E:55b-16: gong ma'i sngags ni bzlas brjod bya //
T02TD1874E:55b-17: klu rgyal 'bum ni khros gyur yang //
T02TD1874E:55b-18: char ba 'gog pa'i mchog yin no //
T02TD1874E:55b-19: da ni pha rol ngag dang dpung gnon pa'i cho ga bshad par bya'o / snga ma bzhin du thams cad bya //
T02TD1874E:55b-21: thun bzhir gzugs brnyan gcig sbyar bya //
T02TD1874E:55b-23: / gang yang rung ba'i sbyor ldan pas //
T02TD1874E:55b-24: gcer bu la sogs phyir rgol rnams //
T02TD1874E:55b-25: ming gi yi ge dang pos bskyed //
T02TD1874E:55b-26: spobs pa mnan phyir de yi mgor //
T02TD1874E:55b-27: lam la dbang chen ser po la //
T02TD1874E:55b-28: grva bzhir rdo rje mtshan par bsam //
T02TD1874E:55b-29: de ste ham byung las rdo rje //
T02TD1874E:55b-30: de steng pam bskyed padma la ;
T02TD1874E:55b-31: / gzhal yas khang pa ji bzhin bsam //
T02TD1874E:55b-32: de dbus khro bo'i 'khor lo che //
T02TD1874E:55b-33: kha dog ser po bsgoms byas nas //
T02TD1874E:55b-34: de ni gnon pa rnam par bsam //
T02TD1874E:55b-35: rkan gyi dbus su ham bskyed pa'i / sna tshogs rdo kha bzhi yis /
T02TD1874E:55b-36: gsum pos spyi bo rna ba gnyis //
T02TD1874E:55b-37: lkog mar phug bsam sngags bzla'o //
T02TD1874E:55b-38: de nyis gsum par rang rang sngags //
T02TD1874E:55b-39: che ge pa sha pa ya h'um //
T02TD1874E:55b-40: brjod cing bltas pas bsgrub bya de //
T02TD1874E:55b-41: mig mi lta zhing smra mi nus //
T02TD1874E:55b-42: gang yang rung ba'i rnal 'byor bas //
T02TD1874E:55b-43: 'di yang sngon bzhin rab sbyar nas //
T02TD1874E:55b-44: gang tshe dpung tshogs mthong ba yi //
T02TD1874E:55b-45: de tshe las la yang dag sbyar //
T02TD1874E:55b-46: dpung rnams kun gyi spyi bo ru //
T02TD1874E:55b-47: sa sogs rten ni sngon bzhin bskyed //
T02TD1874E:55b-48: 'khor lo thams cad khro bo che //
T02TD1874E:55b-50: ri yi rgyal po tsam bsams te //
T02TD1874E:55b-51: de nyis gsum par rang rang sngags //
T02TD1874E:55b-52: ba hu pa ya h'um zhes brjod /
T02TD1874E:56a-2: khro bo rnams ni phar bltas bsam //
T02TD1874E:56a-3: ba hu bi ra h'um zhes brjod //
T02TD1874E:56a-4: de dag phyir ni mi ldog par //
T02TD1874E:56a-6: gal te khro bo rang mdun bltas //
T02TD1874E:56a-7: ba hu grihn'a h'um zhes brjod //
T02TD1874E:56a-9: mdung bzhin du ni rengs par 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:56a-10: tshu rol pham par byed 'dod pas //
T02TD1874E:56a-11: gnyi ga mdun gyi phyogs byas pas //
T02TD1874E:56a-12: ba hu ae hi h'um brjod pas //
T02TD1874E:56a-14: de ltar sbyor ba'i rnam pa yis //
T02TD1874E:56a-15: g-yel ba med par sbyar 'gyur na //
T02TD1874E:56a-16: sangs rgyas dpung yang gnon byed na //
T02TD1874E:56a-17: mi dbang la ni dogs pa med //
T02TD1874E:56a-18: yang ni sngon bzhin rab byas la //
T02TD1874E:56a-19: gang tshe dpung tshogs mthong 'gyur nas //
T02TD1874E:56a-20: de rmongs bya phyir phur bu yi //
T02TD1874E:56a-21: bsam gtan 'di ni sbyar bar bya //
T02TD1874E:56a-22: h'um las bskyed pa'i phur bu ni //
T02TD1874E:56a-23: steng ni rtse lnga 'og rtse gcig / sor brgyad tshad tsam rab bsams la //
T02TD1874E:56a-24: ded dpon dang pos dpung rnams bskyed //
T02TD1874E:56a-25: thams cad snying ni phyogs bsams nas //
T02TD1874E:56a-26: de ni rdo rje tho ba yis //
T02TD1874E:56a-27: khros shing thams cad phog bsams la //
T02TD1874E:56a-29: aom gha gha gh'a ta ya gh'a ta ya /
T02TD1874E:56a-31: k'i la ya k'i la ya /
T02TD1874E:56a-33: h'um h'um h'um badzra k'i la ya /
T02TD1874E:56a-34: badzra dha ro a'adzny'a pa ya ti /
T02TD1874E:56a-35: dpung thams cad k'a ya w'ak tsitta badzra k'i la ya h'um phat /
T02TD1874E:56a-36: khros pas bzla zhing btab 'gyur na //
T02TD1874E:56a-37: sangs rgyas dag gi dpung dag kyang //
T02TD1874E:56a-39: mi yi dbang po smos ci dgos //
T02TD1874E:56a-40: da ni char dbab pa'i cho ga rgyas par bshad par bya'o //
T02TD1874E:56a-42: stobs po che yi rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD1874E:56a-43: grangs med bzlas pas bka' lung thob //
T02TD1874E:56a-44: 'bum phrag gcig ni bzlas pa bya //
T02TD1874E:56a-45: thams cad dmar por rab bsams la //
T02TD1874E:56a-46: rdza phor so ni ma btang la //
T02TD1874E:56a-47: ral gri rtse brgyad 'khor lo la //
T02TD1874E:56a-49: de la rams kyi khu ba yis //
T02TD1874E:56a-50: rdo rje thor tshugs gcig ma yi //
T02TD1874E:56a-52: aom shu li ni nan sv'a h'a bri //
T02TD1874E:56a-53: de dad 'dra ba'i kham phor gzhag / kha sbyar skud pa sngon dmar dkri //
T02TD1874E:56a-54: de dad de 'dul rab bkug ste //
T02TD1874E:56b-1: de ni ji bzhin gzhan thal sbyar //
T02TD1874E:56b-2: mchod pa'i tshogs kyis mchod byas nas //
T02TD1874E:56b-3: klu gnas mtsho dang rdzing bu sogs //
T02TD1874E:56b-4: gzhan la gsang nas gzhug pa'o //
T02TD1874E:56b-5: bdag nyid gnas dgon dben pa ru //
T02TD1874E:56b-6: sa sogs cho ga sngon 'gro bas //
T02TD1874E:56b-7: me yi dkyil 'khor gru gsum steng //
T02TD1874E:56b-8: rlung gi dkyil 'khor zla gam bri //
T02TD1874E:56b-9: chu yi dkyil 'khor zlum po ste //
T02TD1874E:56b-11: phyogs dang mtshams ni ma 'khrul bar //
T02TD1874E:56b-12: sprul brgyad phyi rol bsnol mar bri //
T02TD1874E:56b-13: dbus su chu bdag dkar po che //
T02TD1874E:56b-14: spral mgo bdun pa zhabs klu gcig / skyes bu'i gdong can sbrul zhags bsnams //
T02TD1874E:56b-16: shar gyi 'dab mar mtha' yas ljang //
T02TD1874E:56b-17: autpala thogs pa bri bar bya //
T02TD1874E:56b-18: lho yi 'dab mar nor rgyas dkar //
T02TD1874E:56b-19: rin chen bum thogs bri bar bya //
T02TD1874E:56b-21: dgra sta thogs pa bri bar bya ;
T02TD1874E:56b-22: / byad du karko ta nag po //
T02TD1874E:56b-23: sbrul shog thogs pa bri bar bya //
T02TD1874E:56b-25: padma thogs pa bri bar bya //
T02TD1874E:56b-26: bden bral 'dab mar pad chen dkar //
T02TD1874E:56b-27: pad dkar thogs pa bri bar bya //
T02TD1874E:56b-28: rlung mtshams 'dab mar dung skyong ser //
T02TD1874E:56b-29: dung phor thogs pa bri bar bya ;
T02TD1874E:56b-30: / dbang ldan rigs ldan sna tshogs pa //
T02TD1874E:56b-31: rgyal bu 'dzin pa bri bar bya //
T02TD1874E:56b-32: de dag kun kyang sbrul mgo gdengs //
T02TD1874E:56b-33: zhabs kyang sbrul 'khyil sprin gyi ni //
T02TD1874E:56b-34: gdan la bzhugs pa bri bar bya //
T02TD1874E:56b-35: g-yo ba drag po la sogs pa //
T02TD1874E:56b-36: rang rang phyogs su brgyad po ni //
T02TD1874E:56b-37: zur dang sgo ru gnyis 'khyil nas ;
T02TD1874E:56b-38: / sgo zur gnyis su mgo mjug bsnol //
T02TD1874E:56b-39: de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas ni //
T02TD1874E:56b-40: bum pa 'o ma gang ba dgu //
T02TD1874E:56b-41: phyogs mtshams rnams su bzhag nas ni //
T02TD1874E:56b-42: rgyan rnams kyis kyang mdzes par bya //
T02TD1874E:56b-43: de yi rtog pa las bshad pa'i //
T02TD1874E:56b-44: cho gas klu rnams nam gis bskyed //
T02TD1874E:56b-45: srog dang bcas pa bzhin du ni //
T02TD1874E:56b-46: gong ma lta bu bsgom bar bya //
T02TD1874E:56b-47: de rnams dza nam dza zhes brjod //
T02TD1874E:56b-48: de nas bkug la bsang gtor sogs //
T02TD1874E:56b-49: byas nas de la zhugs par bsam //
T02TD1874E:56b-50: de nas gtor ma 'o mar bcas //
T02TD1874E:56b-51: bu ram la sogs lta bshos che //
T02TD1874E:56b-52: phul nas rang rang sngags 'di ni //
T02TD1874E:57a-2: aom bam ba ru na ya g'a ti pa ta ye na ga nam parsha ya h'um nam h'um nam sv'a h'a //
T02TD1874E:57a-3: aom aam aa nanta ya h'um nam h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1874E:57a-4: aom bam ba su ke h'um nam h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1874E:57a-5: aom tam taksha ka h'um nam h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1874E:57a-6: aom kam karko ta h'um nam h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1874E:57a-7: aom pam padma h'um nam h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1874E:57a-8: aom mam ma h'a padma h'um nam h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1874E:57a-9: aom sam sham kha ba la h'um nam h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1874E:57a-10: aom aa na pa ta ha h'um nam h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1874E:57a-11: de nas pog snod bzung byas te //
T02TD1874E:57a-12: gtor ma sogs kyis mnyes byas la //
T02TD1874E:57a-13: stobs chen sbyor ba de nyid kyis //
T02TD1874E:57a-14: bzhag ste tshig gis gsol ba gdab //
T02TD1874E:57a-15: klu chen po ni khyed rnams kyis //
T02TD1874E:57a-16: bdag la yang dag dga' ba dang /
T02TD1874E:57a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' yis ni //
T02TD1874E:57a-18: char gyi rgyun ni dbab tu gsol //
T02TD1874E:57a-19: lan gsum brjod pas klu rnams kyis //
T02TD1874E:57a-20: dga' bas char pa 'bebs bsams nas //
T02TD1874E:57a-21: rang gi sbyor ba mnyam par //
T02TD1874E:57a-22: ji bzhin rang gi sngags bzla'o //
T02TD1874E:57a-23: na ma:sa manta k'a ya w'ak tsitta badzr'a n'am /
T02TD1874E:57a-24: aom h'um h'um h'um phat phat /
T02TD1874E:57a-25: aom au gra la shu la ba ni h'um h'um h'um phat phat phat /
T02TD1874E:57a-26: aom dzo ti da ni da h'um h'um h'um phat phat phat /
T02TD1874E:57a-28: ma h'a pa l'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1874E:57a-29: de yi dbang du rab byas nas //
T02TD1874E:57a-30: sa gzhi thams cad char gyi ni //
T02TD1874E:57a-31: rgyun gyis ngoms par byas nas ni //
T02TD1874E:57a-32: thams cad bde la gnas par byed //
T02TD1874E:57a-33: de yis phebs par ma gyur na //
T02TD1874E:57a-34: stobs po che yi rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD1874E:57a-35: thams cad dkar pos bsams byas te //
T02TD1874E:57a-36: zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gis ni bsgrub //
T02TD1874E:57a-37: hom khung zlum po khru gang par //
T02TD1874E:57a-38: khru phyed zabs su kha khyer la //
T02TD1874E:57a-39: sor bzhi tshad tsam de tsam 'phags //
T02TD1874E:57a-42: rdo rgyus sogs kyis byugs byas te //
T02TD1874E:57a-43: ji bzhin pa yi cho ga yis //
T02TD1874E:57a-44: me lha la sogs mchod par bya //
T02TD1874E:57a-45: de yi dbus su stobs po che //
T02TD1874E:57a-47: phyogs dang mtshams su klu brgyad kyang //
T02TD1874E:57a-48: de yi zhal bltas thal sbyar bsam //
T02TD1874E:57a-49: gong gi sngags kyis spyan drangs nas /
T02TD1874E:57a-50: bsang gtor zhabs bsil la sogs pa //
T02TD1874E:57a-51: byas nas la thim par bsam de rnams lce yi dbus su ni //
T02TD1874E:57a-52: yi ge nam ni bsam byas te //
T02TD1874E:57a-53: blugs gzar dgang gzar cho ga bzhin //
T02TD1874E:57b-0: byas nas bsang gtor la @57b sogs pa //
T02TD1874E:57b-1: yang ni byas nas sbyin sreg dbul //
T02TD1874E:57b-3: bur ram sbrang rtsi li khar //
T02TD1874E:57b-4: dbang po la sogs sman rnams ni //
T02TD1874E:57b-5: dang por gsum gsum dbul bar bya //
T02TD1874E:57b-6: gong gi sngags la zhi ba yi //
T02TD1874E:57b-7: rig pa dang bcas bzlas na ni //
T02TD1874E:57b-8: klu rnams kun la ci 'dod pa'i //
T02TD1874E:57b-9: gong gi rdzas ni sbyin sreg bya //
T02TD1874E:57b-10: tshim par byas nas rang gi sngags //
T02TD1874E:57b-11: gong ma bzhin du rab brjod pas //
T02TD1874E:57b-12: ji ltar 'dod pa'i phyogs rnams su //
T02TD1874E:57b-13: char gyi rgyun ni 'bebs par byed //
T02TD1874E:57b-14: de yis phebs par ma gyur na //
T02TD1874E:57b-15: stobs chen khro bo'i rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD1874E:57b-16: thams cad nag por bsams byas te //
T02TD1874E:57b-18: chu bo'i ngos gnyis sa dang ni //
T02TD1874E:57b-19: grog mkhar sa dang bshad gcig bsres //
T02TD1874E:57b-20: klu yi gzugs brnyan mtho gsum pa'i //
T02TD1874E:57b-21: snying gar 'khor lo 'di ni gzhug / dur khrod ci ni ras ma la //
T02TD1874E:57b-22: ske tshe lan tshva yungs mar dang //
T02TD1874E:57b-23: khrag dug rams kyi snag tsha yis //
T02TD1874E:57b-24: ral gri rtse brgyad 'khor lo pri //
T02TD1874E:57b-26: phu sogs brgyad ni bri ba dang //
T02TD1874E:57b-27: snying por yi ge b'a bris la //
T02TD1874E:57b-28: sngon bzhin bsams te dgug gzhug bya //
T02TD1874E:57b-29: gzugs brnyan yan lag thams cad kun ;
T02TD1874E:57b-30: / tsha ba gsum dang ske tshe dang //
T02TD1874E:57b-31: dha du ra dang yungs mar dang //
T02TD1874E:57b-32: byugs nas me la gdung bya zhing //
T02TD1874E:57b-33: gong gi sngags ni brjod bya zhing //
T02TD1874E:57b-34: klu rnams gzugs ni rab tsha bas //
T02TD1874E:57b-35: bye ma me yi 'jigs pa yis //
T02TD1874E:57b-38: de yis char ni mi 'bebs na //
T02TD1874E:57b-39: sngon bzhin klu yi dkyil 'khor bri //
T02TD1874E:57b-40: stod g-yogs ser po smad g-yogs dmar //
T02TD1874E:57b-41: ze'u kha sngon po bcings nas ni //
T02TD1874E:57b-42: gos ni dmar po bgo ba'am //
T02TD1874E:57b-43: yang na gcer bur byung byas la //
T02TD1874E:57b-44: skra bshig so ni gtsigs byas nas ;
T02TD1874E:57b-45: / rkang par nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la //
T02TD1874E:57b-47: klu ni gan rkyal gnas par bsam //
T02TD1874E:57b-48: g-yon pas de yi dkyil 'khor mnan //
T02TD1874E:57b-49: skrag ste gdengs ka g-yo bar bsam //
T02TD1874E:57b-50: gyen bltas kha las phus 'debs shing //
T02TD1874E:58a-2: rgya mtsho lta bur gyur bsams nas //
T02TD1874E:58a-3: sngags 'di g-yeng ba med par bzla //
T02TD1874E:58a-5: k'a ya w'aka tsitta badzr'a n'am //
T02TD1874E:58a-6: aom nam h'um nam h'um nam h'um //
T02TD1874E:58a-8: aom au gra la shul pa ni nam //
T02TD1874E:58a-11: aom dzo ti ni rna ta /
T02TD1874E:58a-14: aom ma h'a ba la nam phat /
T02TD1874E:58a-15: de yis klu rnams stobs chen la //
T02TD1874E:58a-16: skrag nas sa gzhi rgyas pa ru //
T02TD1874E:58a-17: dam tshig dbang gis de dag gis //
T02TD1874E:58a-18: char gyi rgyun ni 'bebs par byed //
T02TD1874E:58a-19: des kyang char ni mi 'bab na //
T02TD1874E:58a-20: sngon bzhin mngon spyod ho ma khung du //
T02TD1874E:58a-21: bo son cha yi tsher mas dgang //
T02TD1874E:58a-22: sme sha can gyi me sbar bya //
T02TD1874E:58a-23: me lha sngon bzhin mchod byas nas //
T02TD1874E:58a-24: de dbus stobs po che bsams nas //
T02TD1874E:58a-25: zhal gdangs rdo rje rtse ldan pa //
T02TD1874E:58a-26: mche ba gtsigs pa bsam par bya //
T02TD1874E:58a-27: sngon gzugs klu yi gzugs brnyan ni //
T02TD1874E:58a-28: dug dang lan tshva dha du ra //
T02TD1874E:58a-29: ske tshe sogs pa rab byas la //
T02TD1874E:58a-30: phu:sa bskyed dgug cing gzhug par bya //
T02TD1874E:58a-31: de ni bshang ba gci bas byugs //
T02TD1874E:58a-32: gdug pa'i dgra yi g-yon pa yis //
T02TD1874E:58a-33: de yi mjug ma'i rtse mo nas //
T02TD1874E:58a-34: gtub cing gong ma'i sngags zlo zhing //
T02TD1874E:58a-35: klu rnams m'a ra ya phat ces //
T02TD1874E:58a-36: brjod cing sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad //
T02TD1874E:58a-37: byin pas klu rnams thams cad kyang //
T02TD1874E:58a-38: tsha ste skrag nas char 'bebs byed /
T02TD1874E:58a-39: gal te de ltar byed pa la //
T02TD1874E:58a-40: char ni 'bebs par mi byed na //
T02TD1874E:58a-41: stobs po che yi 'gal ba'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:58a-42: de gnon pa yi cho ga bya //
T02TD1874E:58a-43: chu ngogs sa la sogs pa yi //
T02TD1874E:58a-44: sngon gsungs rdzas la khro bo che /
T02TD1874E:58a-45: gzugs brnyan zhal gsum phyag drug pa //
T02TD1874E:58a-46: byas te gan rkyal gzhag par bya //
T02TD1874E:58a-47: bdag nyid dpal ldan gsum pa yi //
T02TD1874E:58a-49: de ni bkug nas gzugs brnyan bcug /
T02TD1874E:58a-50: g-yon pas ma nan te sngags bzla'o //
T02TD1874E:58a-51: aom su mbha ni su mbha /
T02TD1874E:58a-52: ma h'a ba la barsha sh'i ghram h'um phat /
T02TD1874E:58a-53: gri han grihn'a ma h'a ba la barsha sh'i ghram h'um phat /
T02TD1874E:58a-54: grihn'a pa ya grihn'a ba yam h'a ba la barsha sh'i ghram h'um phat /
T02TD1874E:58a-55: a'a na ya ho: bha ga b'an bidy'a r'a dza ma h'a ba la barsha sh'i ghram h'um phat /
T02TD1874E:58a-56: de yang ji bzhin khri phrag gnyis //
T02TD1874E:58a-57: bzlas brjod byas nas gong ma yi //
T02TD1874E:58b-0: hom khung dbus su gnod @58b mdzes che //
T02TD1874E:58b-1: zhal gdangs h'um gi lce can bsam //
T02TD1874E:58b-2: bskul ba'i tshig dang bcas pa yis //
T02TD1874E:58b-3: gzugs brnyan gtub cing khri phrag gcig / de yi zhal du sbyin sreg bya //
T02TD1874E:58b-4: stobs po che yis char phab nas //
T02TD1874E:58b-6: char gyis ngoms par byas pa yis //
T02TD1874E:58b-9: de nas zhi ba'i hom khung ni //
T02TD1874E:58b-10: sngon bzhin du ni rab byas nas //
T02TD1874E:58b-11: spyan ma dkar mo bsams nas ni //
T02TD1874E:58b-12: de yi sngags dang de'i cho gas //
T02TD1874E:58b-14: de yi zhal du dbab byas nas //
T02TD1874E:58b-15: sreg blugs khri phrag gcig dbul bas //
T02TD1874E:58b-16: klu dang khro bo stobs po che //
T02TD1874E:58b-17: tshar bcad de yis zhi bar byed //
T02TD1874E:58b-18: des na de yis dga' 'gyur te //
T02TD1874E:58b-19: gzhan du sbyar ba tsam gyis ni //
T02TD1874E:58b-20: mdo la char gyi rgyun 'bebs byed //
T02TD1874E:58b-21: las kyi tshogs ni de dag gam //
T02TD1874E:58b-22: gzhan la sgrub po bsrung ba'am //
T02TD1874E:58b-23: yang na bdag gis gzhan bsrung phyir //
T02TD1874E:58b-25: rdo rje 'dzin pa las byung ba'i //
T02TD1874E:58b-26: m'a ma k'i ni sngon bsam //
T02TD1874E:58b-27: ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka ru //
T02TD1874E:58b-28: bsgrub bya bzhag nas sngags 'di bzla //
T02TD1874E:58b-29: aom a'a: shad ka re shantim ka re ghutta ghutti ni ghutti ni gha ta ya sv'a che ge mo raksha raksha h'um //
T02TD1874E:58b-30: brjod pas sngon bzhin stobs dbab dang /
T02TD1874E:58b-31: dbang bskur byas nas bsgrub bya de //
T02TD1874E:58b-32: rdo rje sems dpa'i sprul pa yang //
T02TD1874E:58b-33: srung na gzhan sbyar smos ci dgos //
T02TD1874E:58b-34: gal te kyis gtses la sogs la //
T02TD1874E:58b-35: mtshon cha nor ni gzhan lta bsgrub ;
T02TD1874E:58b-38: rang gi lha yi sbyor ba ya //
T02TD1874E:58b-39: spyi bor h'um las rdo rje bskyed //
T02TD1874E:58b-40: de yi lte bar zla ba la //
T02TD1874E:58b-41: m'a ma k'i ni sngon bzhin bsam //
T02TD1874E:58b-42: de yi shes lha mo ni //
T02TD1874E:58b-43: thugs kar mam la bzlas pa'i sngags //
T02TD1874E:58b-44: yang 'greng rig bcas bskor bar bsam //
T02TD1874E:58b-46: de yis spyi bo nas brtsams te /
T02TD1874E:58b-47: rkang mthil bar gyi rdo rje yi //
T02TD1874E:58b-48: go chas bar mtshams med gtams te //
T02TD1874E:58b-49: 'byi lo ka ni chur blugs bzhin //
T02TD1874E:58b-50: sbyor ba yang dang yang bsams te //
T02TD1874E:58b-51: bdag dang gzhan ni srung bar byed //
T02TD1874E:59a-0: @59a * // 'jigs pa stong gsum gang ba yang //
T02TD1874E:59a-1: srung byed stobs su 'gyur bar bshad //
T02TD1874E:59a-2: mngon rtogs nye ba'i rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD1874E:59a-3: las ni bzhi ste gcig la gsum //
T02TD1874E:59a-4: bsgrub phyir nye dang mi nye bas //
T02TD1874E:59a-5: bsam gtan ri mo bsrung ba'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:59a-6: rang bzhin dag pa'i chos rnams kyi //
T02TD1874E:59a-7: don dang 'bras bur bcas pa rnams //
T02TD1874E:59a-8: dag pa'i khro bo rnams kyi ni //
T02TD1874E:59a-9: bsgom pa'i cho ga bshad par bya //
T02TD1874E:59a-10: sngon bzhin brten gyi dkyil 'khor dang /
T02TD1874E:59a-11: dang po mgon po bskyed nas /
T02TD1874E:59a-12: sems can skye rim bzhi spangs nas //
T02TD1874E:59a-13: bar ma'i sems kyis dang por 'gyur ;
T02TD1874E:59a-14: / bskul pas h'um lnga bh'um du byung //
T02TD1874E:59a-15: h'um lnga lcags kyu dbyug to dang //
T02TD1874E:59a-16: rtse gsum ral gri rdo rjer 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:59a-18: de yang de dag rnams kyis mtshan //
T02TD1874E:59a-19: 'od kyi khams bzhugs sangs rgyas rnams //
T02TD1874E:59a-20: rang dang 'dra bas bskul byas te //
T02TD1874E:59a-21: bcug ste sa bo na nang du thim //
T02TD1874E:59a-22: t'a kki rgyal po khro bo che //
T02TD1874E:59a-23: sku dang dbu zhal mthing ga la //
T02TD1874E:59a-24: g-yas dkar g-yon dmar phyag drug pa //
T02TD1874E:59a-25: g-yas gnyis lcags kyu ral gri 'dzin //
T02TD1874E:59a-27: dbyug sngon can ni khro bo che //
T02TD1874E:59a-28: sku mdog de 'dra phyag drug pa ;
T02TD1874E:59a-29: / g-yas gnyis dbyug to ral gri 'dzin //
T02TD1874E:59a-31: stobs po che ni khro bo che //
T02TD1874E:59a-32: zhal gsum de 'dra phyag drug pa //
T02TD1874E:59a-33: g-yas gnyis rtse gsum ral gri 'dzin //
T02TD1874E:59a-35: mi g-yo mgon po khro bo che //
T02TD1874E:59a-36: zhal gsum de 'dra zur gyis lta //
T02TD1874E:59a-39: gnod mdzes rgyal po khro bo che //
T02TD1874E:59a-40: sku dang dbu zhal de 'dra ste //
T02TD1874E:59a-41: g-yas gnyis rdo rje ral gri dang /
T02TD1874E:59a-43: gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur rgyal che //
T02TD1874E:59a-44: sku dang dbu zhal gser btso 'dra //
T02TD1874E:59a-45: g-yas ga nag g-yon dkar phyag drug pa //
T02TD1874E:59a-48: de dag dang pos rig ma 'khyud //
T02TD1874E:59a-49: stag lpags sham thabs dang ldan pa //
T02TD1874E:59a-50: 'gying bag tu ni rab khro ba //
T02TD1874E:59b-0: mche ba cung zad @59b gtsigs pa ste //
T02TD1874E:59b-1: rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan //
T02TD1874E:59b-3: sbom po g-yas bskum g-yon brkyang ba'o //
T02TD1874E:59b-6: mi bskyod cod pan mtshan ma bsgom //
T02TD1874E:59b-7: de dag dran pa gcig pa ste ;
T02TD1874E:59b-8: / las kyi khyad par sgrub byed pas //
T02TD1874E:59b-10: zhar la de yi sgrub pa gsungs //
T02TD1874E:59b-11: dgug dang dbang gi dang po dang //
T02TD1874E:59b-12: chos tshe rgyas mdzad mang po zhi //
T02TD1874E:59b-13: ma yin las kyi khyad par rnams //
T02TD1874E:59b-14: dang po gnyis pas yang bya ste //
T02TD1874E:59b-15: dus kyi bye brag nges med pas //
T02TD1874E:59b-16: 'grub ste dang po thun mong lung //
T02TD1874E:59b-17: khyad par gzhung 'dis zlos byas te //
T02TD1874E:59b-18: dad pas de rnams nan tan bya //
T02TD1874E:59b-19: gti mug nyes pa'i 'dod chags dang //
T02TD1874E:59b-20: sgrib pa las ni rnam dag pa'i //
T02TD1874E:59b-21: rang bzhin gzung dang dga' ba dang //
T02TD1874E:59b-22: tshul dang mi g-yo rgyu nyid dang //
T02TD1874E:59b-23: 'bras bur dag ste de rnams kyi //
T02TD1874E:59b-24: spyi yi mtshan nyid rnam dag pa //
T02TD1874E:59b-25: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba yi //
T02TD1874E:59b-26: bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya //
T02TD1874E:59b-27: gang phyir ri mo'i brtul zhugs kyis //
T02TD1874E:59b-28: gzhung du nges par gsungs pas na //
T02TD1874E:59b-29: las kyi rim pa bskang pa'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:59b-30: gsang ba'i thig le rgyud las gsungs //
T02TD1874E:59b-31: de phyir sgrub thabs rim pa ni //
T02TD1874E:59b-32: rdzogs par bya phyir bla mas kyang //
T02TD1874E:59b-33: sgrub po rnams la phan gdags phyir //
T02TD1874E:59b-34: 'dus pa'i cho gar gsungs pa yi //
T02TD1874E:59b-35: sngon bzhin thams cad rab byas la //
T02TD1874E:59b-36: rdo rje h'um mdzad rnal 'byor gnas //
T02TD1874E:59b-37: dbus zhal sku ni mthing ka la ;
T02TD1874E:59b-38: / g-yas dkar g-yon dmar phyag drug pa //
T02TD1874E:59b-39: dang pos rang gi rig ma 'khyud //
T02TD1874E:59b-40: g-yas gnyis rdo rje lcags kyu bsnams //
T02TD1874E:59b-41: g-yon gnyis padma zhags pa bsnams //
T02TD1874E:59b-42: mche bcur zad gtsigs pa ste //
T02TD1874E:59b-43: rin chen sna tshogs rgyan dang ldan //
T02TD1874E:59b-44: dbu skra ser po gyen du brdzes ;
T02TD1874E:59b-45: / gtum po'i h'um gi nga ro sgrogs //
T02TD1874E:59b-46: stag lpags smad g-yogs dang ldan pa //
T02TD1874E:59b-47: drag po g-yas bskum g-yon brkyang gis //
T02TD1874E:59b-48: lha chen chung mar bcas pa yi //
T02TD1874E:59b-49: gad na g-yon sra ba'i nu mar mnan //
T02TD1874E:59b-50: cod pan mi bskyod mtshan pa bsgom //
T02TD1874E:60a-0: de ltar bsgoms nas de yi @60a * //
T02TD1874E:60a-2: / h'um bzhi'am der gsungs bcu bdun po //
T02TD1874E:60a-3: rtse gcig las rnams kun la ni //
T02TD1874E:60a-4: sngar bcas cho ga bzhin du bzlas //
T02TD1874E:60a-5: aom a'a: kro dhe h'um ka ra na ha na ma tha bhanydza h'um phat //
T02TD1874E:60a-9: aom ka p'a la h'um phat /
T02TD1874E:60a-11: aom a'a: h'um ka ra ke ka be ra h'um phat /
T02TD1874E:60a-13: aom dzva la dzva la li ta ba'i tra ha h'um phat /
T02TD1874E:60a-15: sbyor ba de yis ba dan dang /
T02TD1874E:60a-16: thal ba snag tsha btsag sor gtub /
T02TD1874E:60a-17: skrod byed dag gi las rnams dag / ji bzhin du ni bsgrub par bya //
T02TD1874E:60a-18: dur khrod ras la ba dan ni //
T02TD1874E:60a-19: kha dog mthing ga sor bcu drug / smyug ma'i yu ba khru gang la //
T02TD1874E:60a-20: btags te dur khrod gnas su bsgrub //
T02TD1874E:60a-21: de ni lag tu gzung byas nas //
T02TD1874E:60a-22: zhag bdun sngags bzlas nam langs na //
T02TD1874E:60a-23: de thogs dgra dpung la g-yabs pas //
T02TD1874E:60a-24: the tshom med par gnon par 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:60a-25: mtshon thogs bdag la gnod byed gzhan //
T02TD1874E:60a-26: sgrub pa po ni mthong tsam gyis //
T02TD1874E:60a-27: de dag mdung bzhin rengs par 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:60a-28: de bzhin glang rgyal myos pa dang /
T02TD1874E:60a-29: shing rta rta dang srog chags rngam //
T02TD1874E:60a-30: rkang thang 'khrugs pa mang bcas pa //
T02TD1874E:60a-31: mthong pa tsam gyis rengs par 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:60a-32: mtshan mo mi ro bsregs ba yi //
T02TD1874E:60a-33: gnas song skra bshig gcer bur phyung //
T02TD1874E:60a-34: bzlas pa bskor zhing rab byas nas //
T02TD1874E:60a-35: nam langs thal ba spar gang blang //
T02TD1874E:60a-36: lag pa g-yon pas blangs nas ni //
T02TD1874E:60a-37: rang gi khyim du 'gro bar bya ;
T02TD1874E:60a-38: / yang na lha khang stong bar 'gro //
T02TD1874E:60a-39: phyir ni blta bar mi bya'o //
T02TD1874E:60a-40: de nas der yang thal ba de //
T02TD1874E:60a-41: zhag bdun sngags bzlas bsrung bar bya //
T02TD1874E:60a-42: snod sar nang du rab bzhag ste //
T02TD1874E:60a-43: sa la gzhag par mi bya'o //
T02TD1874E:60a-44: de yis gang gi dpung shi tshogs //
T02TD1874E:60a-45: mthong na lan cig gtor tsam gyis //
T02TD1874E:60a-47: rlung phyogs dag tu sbyar ba na //
T02TD1874E:60a-49: mdun du skem ste gtor byas nas //
T02TD1874E:60a-50: myos par 'gyur te mtshon cha rngam //
T02TD1874E:60a-52: tshil chen snum la mar me ni //
T02TD1874E:60b-0: @60b thod pa bzang por sbar bar bya //
T02TD1874E:60b-1: steng gi thod par du ba bsgo //
T02TD1874E:60b-2: snag tshar byas te de blangs la //
T02TD1874E:60b-3: zhag bdun sngags bzlas nam langs na //
T02TD1874E:60b-4: du ba'i snag tsha mig la bsku //
T02TD1874E:60b-5: de yis gang mthong thams cad kun //
T02TD1874E:60b-6: ci bgyi zhes ni bka' nyan 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:60b-7: yug snam btsag ni dge ba dag / bsreg pa'i gnas 'gro khar bcug la //
T02TD1874E:60b-8: de phyed tshig pa'i dus su ni //
T02TD1874E:60b-9: grogs med par ni mtshan mo blang //
T02TD1874E:60b-10: lha yi khang stong du khyer nas //
T02TD1874E:60b-11: gong gi sngags ni zhag bdun bzla //
T02TD1874E:60b-12: de tshe bgegs kyang sna tshogs dang //
T02TD1874E:60b-13: mi 'jigs 'a dug cing de la bzla //
T02TD1874E:60b-14: de nas nam langs gyur na //
T02TD1874E:60b-15: ras ni dmar pos dkri byas la //
T02TD1874E:60b-16: mchod cing bsrungs nas gzhag par bya //
T02TD1874E:60b-17: de yis sems dang ldan pa'am //
T02TD1874E:60b-18: mi ldan gang gi ming bris pas //
T02TD1874E:60b-19: bskul nas dogs pa med pa yang //
T02TD1874E:60b-20: rdo rje 'chang ba'i bka' bzhin du //
T02TD1874E:60b-21: 'ongs nas las rnams thams cad byed //
T02TD1874E:60b-22: srog song dur khrod khyer ba na //
T02TD1874E:60b-23: gser gyi sor gdub de yi khar //
T02TD1874E:60b-24: bcug nas bdag nyid gcig pu ni //
T02TD1874E:60b-25: khro bo'i sngags ni zlos shing 'dug / ro de me yis tshig 'gyur na /
T02TD1874E:60b-26: kha yi sor gdub sgrub pa po'i //
T02TD1874E:60b-27: lag pa g-yon pas blang byas la //
T02TD1874E:60b-28: zhag bdun par du bzla bar bya //
T02TD1874E:60b-29: de nas sor gdub bzang po de //
T02TD1874E:60b-30: lag pa g-yon pa'i mdzub mo la //
T02TD1874E:60b-31: bcug ste lag pa de yis ni //
T02TD1874E:60b-32: gang dang gang du reg 'gyur ba //
T02TD1874E:60b-33: de dang de yis las kun byed //
T02TD1874E:60b-35: rten 'brel bsam gyis mi khyab pa //
T02TD1874E:60b-36: 'di la dpyad par yong mi bya //
T02TD1874E:60b-37: sing ta'i shing la gab tshe yang //
T02TD1874E:60b-38: bzang po sor ni brgyad pa bya //
T02TD1874E:60b-39: de yin nang du skrod byed kyang //
T02TD1874E:60b-40: dngos grub sbyin par byed par blugs //
T02TD1874E:60b-41: zla ba gzas ni zin pa'i tshe //
T02TD1874E:60b-42: ma grol bar du de la bzla //
T02TD1874E:60b-43: de nas sngon bzhin 'khor lo bri //
T02TD1874E:60b-44: 'byung po gtor ma sbyin byas la //
T02TD1874E:60b-45: gab tshe nang gi skrod byed kyang //
T02TD1874E:60b-46: sgra 'byung yang na gas kyi bar //
T02TD1874E:60b-47: de srid zhag bdun de la ni //
T02TD1874E:60b-48: khro bo'i sngags kyi bzlas par bya //
T02TD1874E:60b-49: de tshe skrod byed grub ma thag / blangs nas gang yang rung ba ru //
T02TD1874E:60b-50: cho ga bzhin du sbyar na ni //
T02TD1874E:61a-2: sa yang 'gas byed chu yang skems //
T02TD1874E:61a-3: rin chen phye ma bzhin du rlog //
T02TD1874E:61a-4: ri rtser sbyar na bsnyil bar byed //
T02TD1874E:61a-5: khrag dang sol ba'i sel 'bebs byed //
T02TD1874E:61a-6: gnam lcags dag ni 'thor ba dang //
T02TD1874E:61a-7: sa g-yos sprin ni gtor ba dag //
T02TD1874E:61a-8: rnal 'byor pa yis rab sbyar na //
T02TD1874E:61a-9: glo bur du ni thogs med 'grub //
T02TD1874E:61a-10: mtsho gyo klu rnams skrag pa dang //
T02TD1874E:61a-12: gzhan yang sgrub po ci bsam pa'i //
T02TD1874E:61a-13: las rnams thams cad de yis byed //
T02TD1874E:61a-14: 'di ni rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi //
T02TD1874E:61a-15: sngags rgyud ldan ba'i las rnams de gzhan yang de las gsungs pa yi //
T02TD1874E:61a-16: las rnams mkhas pas shes par bya //
T02TD1874E:61a-17: da ni thun mong gi dngos grub kyi mjug tu mngag gzhug bsgrub pa'i tshogs bshad par bya'o //
T02TD1874E:61a-18: rdo rje bzlas gnas rnal 'byor bas //
T02TD1874E:61a-19: rang gi dgos ba rdzogs pa'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:61a-20: bdag gi rigs kyi khro bo mchog //
T02TD1874E:61a-21: mngag gzhug pa ru bsgrub par bya //
T02TD1874E:61a-23: thams cad snga ma bzhin byas la //
T02TD1874E:61a-25: nam mkha'i dbus su bsam par bya //
T02TD1874E:61a-26: mkha' dbyings bde gshegs byang chub sems //
T02TD1874E:61a-27: rig pa'i lha dang khro bo'i tshogs //
T02TD1874E:61a-28: gang bar bsams nas sngags 'di yis //
T02TD1874E:61a-29: sku gsung thugs la gnas la gdab //
T02TD1874E:61a-30: aom a'a:hri aa mo gha siddhi nan bhaksha ya h'um /
T02TD1874E:61a-31: phab pas gnas de rigs kyi rim //
T02TD1874E:61a-32: mi bskyod pa yi aa gyur te //
T02TD1874E:61a-33: tshe dpag med pa'i kham du gyur //
T02TD1874E:61a-34: rnam par snang mdzad ding gyur to //
T02TD1874E:61a-35: cho ga de la skad cig gis //
T02TD1874E:61a-36: cho ga gnyis pa bsgrub par bya //
T02TD1874E:61a-37: aa de bdud rtsi 'khyil par gyur //
T02TD1874E:61a-38: thal sbyar gzhan la sngon bzhin bsam //
T02TD1874E:61a-39: kham de padma mthar byed gyur //
T02TD1874E:61a-40: de ni gshin rje gshed gyur te //
T02TD1874E:61a-41: de dag sngon bzhin nyi ma la //
T02TD1874E:61a-42: gnas te dang po thal sbyar bsam //
T02TD1874E:61a-43: lha mo spangs pa'i phyag mtshan yang //
T02TD1874E:61a-44: g-yas kyi tha mar dpa' bo dang //
T02TD1874E:61a-45: lcags kyus bkang ba'i snod bzung nas //
T02TD1874E:61a-46: sgrub ba po la stobs byed bsgom //
T02TD1874E:61a-47: de dag gnas gsum gong ma yin //
T02TD1874E:61a-48: aa kham de ni bkod byas nas //
T02TD1874E:61a-49: de nas bskul ba la sogs pas //
T02TD1874E:61b-0: @61b don yod grub pas dbu brgyan te //
T02TD1874E:61b-1: bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i thugs ka ru //
T02TD1874E:61b-2: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i //
T02TD1874E:61b-3: mi bskyod pa ni bsgom par bya //
T02TD1874E:61b-4: padma mthar byed thugs ka ru //
T02TD1874E:61b-5: de gnas ched dpag med par bsgom //
T02TD1874E:61b-6: gshin rje gshed kyi thugs ka ru //
T02TD1874E:61b-7: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i //
T02TD1874E:61b-8: rnam par snang mdzad rab tu bsgom //
T02TD1874E:61b-9: de nas rigs gsum phyag gnas pa'i //
T02TD1874E:61b-10: mdung rtse gsum dang kyo ba dang //
T02TD1874E:61b-11: rdo rje dang ni gtun shing gis //
T02TD1874E:61b-12: gsang ba'i gnas la brdab cing bskul //
T02TD1874E:61b-13: aom mi bskyod pa ni rdo rje mchog //
T02TD1874E:61b-14: khyod kyi rigs kyi khro bo che //
T02TD1874E:61b-15: nga yi re rdzogs bya'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:61b-16: khyod kyi mngag bzhugs pa ru bskul //
T02TD1874E:61b-17: tsho dpag med dang snang mdzad kyang //
T02TD1874E:61b-18: de bzhin du ni bskul byas te //
T02TD1874E:61b-19: nyams dga' ba yi ri dag dang //
T02TD1874E:61b-20: chu gling rnam pa sna tshogs su //
T02TD1874E:61b-21: bsam gtan 'di ni zla phyed bsgom //
T02TD1874E:61b-22: ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi / rab tu phra ba'i rdul snyed dang //
T02TD1874E:61b-24: des khrid sangs rgyas zhing du 'gro //
T02TD1874E:61b-25: zab cing rgya che'i chos thob 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:61b-26: de ni gnyid sogs dang bral yang //
T02TD1874E:61b-27: bde gshegs kun gyis byin brlabs nas //
T02TD1874E:61b-28: gnyid 'od de ru gong sungs pa'i ;
T02TD1874E:61b-29: / mtshan ma rnams ni yang dang yang //
T02TD1874E:61b-31: lha yi bka' yis brtan par byed //
T02TD1874E:61b-32: nam mkha' chos rnams spangs pa yang //
T02TD1874E:61b-33: rta dang glang chen la sogs pa //
T02TD1874E:61b-34: sgrub pa po yis bskul ba yis //
T02TD1874E:61b-35: mngag gzhug de yis byed par 'gyur /
T02TD1874E:61b-37: sgrub pa'i thabs ni ji snyed pa //
T02TD1874E:61b-38: nus dang ldan pas de rnams las //
T02TD1874E:61b-39: lha sogs rnams kyis khyad shes gyur //
T02TD1874E:61b-40: 'dron [?] po'i dang po'i gnas bzhin du //
T02TD1874E:61b-41: thams bcad brjod pas lung rdo thogs //
T02TD1874E:61b-42: de bas dang po sngon 'gro bas //
T02TD1874E:61b-43: gzhung gi don la brtan par bya //
T02TD1874E:61b-44: da ni phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rgyas par bshad par bya'o //
T02TD1874E:61b-45: sngon gsungs yang dag rim gnas la //
T02TD1874E:61b-46: dgos dang don byed ma gtogs pa //
T02TD1874E:61b-47: bya ba thams cad mchil thal bzhin //
T02TD1874E:61b-48: spangs nas rdo rje 'chang ba yi //
T02TD1874E:62a-2: sangs rgyas mchod dang 'gro don la //
T02TD1874E:62a-3: dad pas brtson 'grus kyis sbyor byed //
T02TD1874E:62a-4: thabs shes sbyor bas skyon kun bsal //
T02TD1874E:62a-5: thob pa'i zas ni za bar byed //
T02TD1874E:62a-6: chags pa sdang ba rnams dang bral //
T02TD1874E:62a-7: 'jig rten chos brgyad ma gtogs pa'i //
T02TD1874E:62a-8: 'dod pa'i longs spyod thob bzhin spyod //
T02TD1874E:62a-9: bka' yi gzhung lugs 'jigs spangs nas //
T02TD1874E:62a-10: lus gnas pa yi cho ga shes te //
T02TD1874E:62a-11: bya ba gsum gyi mtha' la spyod //
T02TD1874E:62a-12: dgos pa 'grub pa des bsgrub bya //
T02TD1874E:62a-13: ci gsung mtshan ma mthong 'gyur nas //
T02TD1874E:62a-14: rang gi rigs kyi phyag rgya mchog /
T02TD1874E:62a-16: // gong du bstan pa'i cho ga yis //
T02TD1874E:62a-17: bkug ste bdag gi ra bya ba'o //
T02TD1874E:62a-18: de dang lhan cig yid 'ong dgon //
T02TD1874E:62a-19: rang nyid ma gtogs gzhan gyis ni //
T02TD1874E:62a-20: mi phyed gnas su zla drug tu //
T02TD1874E:62a-21: gsang ba'i brtul zhugs spyod pa bya //
T02TD1874E:62a-22: brgyud pa'i man ngag las gsungs pa'i //
T02TD1874E:62a-23: lus ngag yid kyi spyod pa'i mchog / phyag rgya dag phyir nyin mtshan du //
T02TD1874E:62a-24: rnal 'byor dbang phyug brtson par bya //
T02TD1874E:62a-25: de yis zla ba gcig gis ni //
T02TD1874E:62a-26: skal ldan gyur bar the tshom med //
T02TD1874E:62a-27: de dang lnga yi bar du ni //
T02TD1874E:62a-28: rdzes mthun shes pa'i zas longs spyod //
T02TD1874E:62a-29: rang gi khams na rang gnas pa'i //
T02TD1874E:62a-30: bde gshegs rnams kyis thugs gdungs nas //
T02TD1874E:62a-31: de ru byon nas sgrub po la //
T02TD1874E:62a-32: 'phral du bka' stsal ster bar gyur //
T02TD1874E:62a-33: de nas bka' stsal thob ma thag / rang gi mthu stobs rtogs bya'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:62a-34: gong dang lhan cig zla drug tu //
T02TD1874E:62a-35: phyi yi rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad //
T02TD1874E:62a-36: yid 'ong dben par cho ga bzhin //
T02TD1874E:62a-38: mchod pa sogs kyis mnyes byas te //
T02TD1874E:62a-39: bsod nams tshogs ni rdzogs par bya //
T02TD1874E:62a-40: de nas bdag nyid de dang ni //
T02TD1874E:62a-41: bcos ma'i gdong la sogs pas mtshan //
T02TD1874E:62a-42: yang na phyogs gos 'ba' zhig gis //
T02TD1874E:62a-43: mtshan te kun du rgyu bar bya //
T02TD1874E:62a-44: ri yi gcong rong nags tshal gnas //
T02TD1874E:62a-45: glang chen seng+ge sbrul dang stag / gdug pa'i sems can 'jigs pa'i sar //
T02TD1874E:62a-46: bdag rgyu de dag rtse bar byed //
T02TD1874E:62a-47: rdo leb rgya mtshor bdag nyid 'dug //
T02TD1874E:62a-48: ri dags lte ba'i dri bro ste //
T02TD1874E:62b-0: snum dang mig stong @62b gdan bzhin no //
T02TD1874E:62b-1: tsher mang chu mig grog ral mang //
T02TD1874E:62b-2: mi sdug gnas su bdag rgyu bas //
T02TD1874E:62b-3: me tog 'bras bu bzang po dang //
T02TD1874E:62b-4: dri ba zhim chu ni mdongs dang ldan //
T02TD1874E:62b-5: gzhan gsungs phyag rgya rnams kyi mtshan //
T02TD1874E:62b-6: gar byed glu blang brkam tshig sbra //
T02TD1874E:62b-9: 'dul zhing lus kyi rgyu mthun pas //
T02TD1874E:62b-10: gso bar byed cing stobs ma thob pas //
T02TD1874E:62b-11: nags tshal dag tu bsod snyoms bslang //
T02TD1874E:62b-12: bsgrub dbang de yi gzi brjid kyis //
T02TD1874E:62b-13: nags tshal lha rnams skrag nas ni //
T02TD1874E:62b-14: kha zas bzang po ster bdag / sgrub pa po la rab tu sbyor //
T02TD1874E:62b-15: phun sum tshogs pa ma sbyar na ;
T02TD1874E:62b-16: / dam tshig stobs kyis de rnams 'chi //
T02TD1874E:62b-17: de ltar spyi dang dngos gzhi yi //
T02TD1874E:62b-18: mtshan thob ba yi rnal 'byor bas //
T02TD1874E:62b-19: rang gi khams ni dag bya'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:62b-20: 'og nas bshad pa'i rim pa bzhin //
T02TD1874E:62b-21: dus mtshan bzhi ru zhag bdun du //
T02TD1874E:62b-22: bsgom pa'i dbang bskur rnam dag pas //
T02TD1874E:62b-23: nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid can //
T02TD1874E:62b-24: 'khor lo'i bdag nyid dri med bya //
T02TD1874E:62b-25: rang gi sa bon 'od lcags kyu //
T02TD1874E:62b-26: rtag dang sbyor ba'i spyan ma'i tshogs //
T02TD1874E:62b-27: 'og min nas ni bkug byas nas //
T02TD1874E:62b-28: nam mkha'i khams kun gang bzhugs bsgom //
T02TD1874E:62b-29: de nyid bde chen po zhu bas //
T02TD1874E:62b-30: 'o ma'i rgyun ltar de dag gis //
T02TD1874E:62b-31: spyi bo nas ni mdun rgyab dang //
T02TD1874E:62b-32: lnga stong dag ni zhugs par bya //
T02TD1874E:62b-33: de bzhin bde ba can zhing nas //
T02TD1874E:62b-34: dpag med dang sbyor gos dkar dgug //
T02TD1874E:62b-35: sngon bzhin bsams nas de yi dus //
T02TD1874E:62b-36: de dag rnams ni lce la gzhug //
T02TD1874E:62b-37: mngon dga' las byung mi bskyod dang //
T02TD1874E:62b-38: m'a ma ka'i ni gnyis med du //
T02TD1874E:62b-39: de dag rnams kyi thugs ka ru //
T02TD1874E:62b-40: lnga stong bdun brgya'i bar du zhugs //
T02TD1874E:62b-41: 'od des kha ti ka nas kyang //
T02TD1874E:62b-42: don yod grub dang sgrol ma yang //
T02TD1874E:62b-43: bde chen gzhan gyi dbang gyur nas //
T02TD1874E:62b-44: lte bar de dus zhugs byas nas //
T02TD1874E:62b-45: nam mkha' lta bur de bzhin nyid //
T02TD1874E:62b-46: yang dang yang du brtson bar bya //
T02TD1874E:62b-47: gang phyir de nyid yang bsgoms pas //
T02TD1874E:62b-48: dngos po dag par byed pa'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:62b-49: rgyal ba rnams kyis de nyid bsngags //
T02TD1874E:62b-50: de dang de yi rnal 'byor gyis //
T02TD1874E:62b-51: rdo rje gsum gyis mtshan pa ni //
T02TD1874E:62b-52: khyu mchog de ni mnyes par 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:63a-0: de ltar sbyor ba gsum ldan @63a * //
T02TD1874E:63a-2: / dngos gzhi'i las la 'jug don du //
T02TD1874E:63a-3: gong gsungs las kyi phyag rgya che //
T02TD1874E:63a-4: rigs gsum bye brag gis gzung bya //
T02TD1874E:63a-5: mi bskyod rdo rje rnal 'byor bas //
T02TD1874E:63a-6: sme can gyi mthu chen gyi //
T02TD1874E:63a-7: bu mo lo grangs bcu drug pa //
T02TD1874E:63a-9: / de bzhin rtag pa'i sbyor ba yi //
T02TD1874E:63a-10: btso bzlag mkhan gyi bu mo dkar //
T02TD1874E:63a-11: lo grang snyi shu ldan lon pa //
T02TD1874E:63a-12: spyan ma'i ngo bor bsgrub par bya //
T02TD1874E:63a-13: tshe dpag med kyi rnal 'byor bas //
T02TD1874E:63a-14: gar mkhan bu mo rab mdzes shing //
T02TD1874E:63a-15: dmar bo bzhin sdug mig dkyus ring //
T02TD1874E:63a-16: nyi shu lon pa gos dkar bsgrub //
T02TD1874E:63a-17: yang na bram zi rgyal rigs dang //
T02TD1874E:63a-18: rje'u rigs dmangs rigs gzhan bud med //
T02TD1874E:63a-19: gang gi rnal 'byor gyis gnas sgrub //
T02TD1874E:63a-20: de yis gsang ba'i sku gsum thob //
T02TD1874E:63a-22: gcig pu rab tu che ba'i lha //
T02TD1874E:63a-23: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog / lha pa'i bya ba bya zhes bsgrub //
T02TD1874E:63a-24: chags min chags dang bral ba'ang min //
T02TD1874E:63a-25: dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs so //
T02TD1874E:63a-26: 'di ni gnyis med theg pa'i mchog //
T02TD1874E:63a-27: bud med sgyu ma'i rgyu 'di yis //
T02TD1874E:63a-28: sgyu ma dag ni thams cad pas //
T02TD1874E:63a-29: bud med sgyur ma khyad par che //
T02TD1874E:63a-30: ngo bo nyid kyi mthu dag gis //
T02TD1874E:63a-31: rang bzhin gyis ni de 'grub pa'o //
T02TD1874E:63a-33: gus pa byed pa dag tu 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:63a-34: rnyed dang bde ba dga' kun gyis //
T02TD1874E:63a-36: rang gi ngo bo yongs bsgyur nas //
T02TD1874E:63a-37: bud med kun gyi sgyur ma 'grub //
T02TD1874E:63a-38: ngo mtshar sgyu ma'i phyag rgya 'di //
T02TD1874E:63a-39: mkha' 'gro ma yi brdar bstan to //
T02TD1874E:63a-40: de bas de dang lhan cig tu //
T02TD1874E:63a-41: yid 'ong gnas su sngon bzhin du //
T02TD1874E:63a-42: ri mo'i dkyil 'khor bris nas kyang //
T02TD1874E:63a-43: byin brlabs la sogs sngon bzhin bya //
T02TD1874E:63a-44: de ru stegs bu gru bzhi ni //
T02TD1874E:63a-45: bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pas byug / bde ba'i stan la de dang ni ;
T02TD1874E:63a-47: bsrung ba la sogs rten bsgrubs la //
T02TD1874E:63a-48: dang po'i mgon pos bdag nyid bsgrub //
T02TD1874E:63a-49: gong ma rig ma'i 'du byed pas //
T02TD1874E:63a-50: rab tu bsgrubs te padmar bzhag //
T02TD1874E:63a-51: phrin las la gnas bde chen po //
T02TD1874E:63a-52: de yis sku gsum goms bya'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:63b-0: yang @63b dang yang du nyin mtshan du //
T02TD1874E:63b-1: zla ba drug tu bsgrub par bya //
T02TD1874E:63b-2: de yis sgrub po bdag nyid kyis //
T02TD1874E:63b-3: phyin dus su sangs rgyas kyi //
T02TD1874E:63b-4: mtshan gyis brgyan par ma gyur na //
T02TD1874E:63b-5: yang nga ni cho ga de kho nas //
T02TD1874E:63b-6: de yi 'dod pa longs spyod cing //
T02TD1874E:63b-7: gsang ba'i mchod pa dang bcas pas //
T02TD1874E:63b-8: sa bcu de la gnas bcas te //
T02TD1874E:63b-9: zla ba drug tu yang bsgrub bya /
T02TD1874E:63b-10: gal te de ru sgrub pa pos //
T02TD1874E:63b-11: gong gsungs ma thob bar ma gyur na //
T02TD1874E:63b-12: ji skad bshad pa'i cho ga yis //
T02TD1874E:63b-13: yang ni zla drug rab tu brtsams //
T02TD1874E:63b-14: drug gsum bco brgyad cho ga bzhin //
T02TD1874E:63b-15: bsgrub bas rdo rje gsum gyis ni //
T02TD1874E:63b-16: dngos grub ster te phyis 'byung ba'i //
T02TD1874E:63b-17: phyag rgya chen po rab tu 'thob //
T02TD1874E:63b-18: de ltar byas ba'i sgrub pa pos //
