T02TD1874E:63b-19: bsgoms pas dngos grub mchog ma mthong //
T02TD1874E:63b-20: snyan tshig zhi ba'i bskul ba yis //
T02TD1874E:63b-21: dngos sgrub bslang bar bya ba'o //
T02TD1874E:63b-23: gzhan yang gang yang rung ba ru ;
T02TD1874E:63b-24: / bgegs bskrad phur bus btab nas su //
T02TD1874E:63b-25: sngon bzhin gtsang gtor sa gsol btab //
T02TD1874E:63b-26: sangs rgyas la sogs snga ma bzhin //
T02TD1874E:63b-27: gsol btab stegs bu 'dus byas te //
T02TD1874E:63b-28: byin brlabs ting 'dzin gsum gnas la //
T02TD1874E:63b-29: skye gcig thogs bsam gsol ba gdab /
T02TD1874E:63b-30: drug cu rtsa bzhis bgegs bskrad nas //
T02TD1874E:63b-31: sa bsrungs sa yi lha mo yang //
T02TD1874E:63b-32: mchod pa sogs kyis mnyes byas la //
T02TD1874E:63b-33: dbang por zhal gyir bzhes par bya //
T02TD1874E:63b-34: de nas me tog sna tshogs dang //
T02TD1874E:63b-35: dri zhim la sogs ldan pa yi //
T02TD1874E:63b-37: de na gnas pa dmigs par bya //
T02TD1874E:63b-38: rang gi sa bon 'od zer las //
T02TD1874E:63b-39: lcags kyu rdo rje gsal shing sogs //
T02TD1874E:63b-40: mtshan pa'i khro bo spro byas la //
T02TD1874E:63b-41: de dag mchod sogs kyis mnyes bya //
T02TD1874E:63b-43: tshigs bcad sngags kyi khyed rnams kyis /
T02TD1874E:63b-44: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams //
T02TD1874E:63b-45: bskul cig ces ni smra bar bya //
T02TD1874E:63b-46: de nas zhal gyis bzhes nas ni //
T02TD1874E:63b-47: song ste 'jig rten khams gnas pa'i //
T02TD1874E:63b-48: sangs rgyas sogs la phra mo dang //
T02TD1874E:63b-49: snyan tshig 'jebs pa'i dbyangs kyis bskul //
T02TD1874E:63b-50: che ge zhes bya rdo rje che //
T02TD1874E:64a-2: rig ma'i brtul zhugs spyod pa yis //
T02TD1874E:64a-4: bsgom pa bzlas brjod yongs rdzogs nas //
T02TD1874E:64a-5: phyag rgya chen po bsgrub pa'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:64a-6: brtul zhugs spyod pa yang gnas nas //
T02TD1874E:64a-7: khyod kyis bsgrub ba'i dkyil 'khor bri //
T02TD1874E:64a-8: khyed cag de ru byon nas su //
T02TD1874E:64a-9: de yi 'khor lo byin brlabs la //
T02TD1874E:64a-10: mchod pa la sogs bzhes nas kyang //
T02TD1874E:64a-11: phyag rgya chen po gnang bar mdzod //
T02TD1874E:64a-12: de ltar brjod pas de dag kyang //
T02TD1874E:64a-13: rab tu dgyes nas khro bo la //
T02TD1874E:64a-14: de ltar bya zhes bsams nas kyang //
T02TD1874E:64a-15: lhan cig byon bsams gnas su dgod //
T02TD1874E:64a-16: khro bos sgrub pa bo la smras //
T02TD1874E:64a-17: bdag cag rnams kyis gsol ba btab //
T02TD1874E:64a-18: de dag kyang ni 'di skad gsungs //
T02TD1874E:64a-19: rdo rje che ge zhes bya la //
T02TD1874E:64a-20: bdag cag phyag rgya chen po bzhin //
T02TD1874E:64a-21: gsungs nas 'di ru byon pa lags //
T02TD1874E:64a-22: khyed kyis mchod pa'i tshogs rnams kyis //
T02TD1874E:64a-23: mnyes par byas te dam tshig bskul //
T02TD1874E:64a-24: de nas sgrub pos sangs rgyas dang //
T02TD1874E:64a-25: khro rgyal lha mo mnyes bya'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:64a-26: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bkug nas //
T02TD1874E:64a-27: rang gi ba spu'i bu gar bcug //
T02TD1874E:64a-28: de nyid lha mo sgeg pas brgyan //
T02TD1874E:64a-29: spros nas sangs rgyas byang chub sems ;
T02TD1874E:64a-30: / khro bo dang bcas 'khor lo la //
T02TD1874E:64a-31: bde ba chen po'i ros mchod pa //
T02TD1874E:64a-32: byas nas bstod la bdud rtsi myang //
T02TD1874E:64a-33: sna tshogs kyis ni mnyes byas nas //
T02TD1874E:64a-34: srog dang bcas pa bsams nas kyang //
T02TD1874E:64a-35: bdag nyid kyis ni snyan gson gsol //
T02TD1874E:64a-36: sangs rgyas kun bdag dngos grub kyi //
T02TD1874E:64a-38: sang ni de ru byon nas kyang //
T02TD1874E:64a-39: bdag gi mchod pa la sogs bzhes //
T02TD1874E:64a-40: bzhes nas bdag la dngos grub stsol //
T02TD1874E:64a-41: gal te ma stsal khyed rnams kun //
T02TD1874E:64a-42: rang nyid kyi ni bstan pa la //
T02TD1874E:64a-43: brdzun du smra bar gyur ba'o //
T02TD1874E:64a-44: de ltar snyan gsan lan gsum du //
T02TD1874E:64a-45: gsol nas de dag zhal bzhes nas //
T02TD1874E:64a-46: mchod pa sogs kyis mnyes par bya //
T02TD1874E:64a-47: steng gi gnas su gshegs su gsol //
T02TD1874E:64a-48: yang ni mchod pa'i bum pa rnams //
T02TD1874E:64a-49: sngon bzhin sta gon gnas byas nas //
T02TD1874E:64a-50: me tog sbos la sogs pa yis /
T02TD1874E:64b-0: @64b mchod nas ji bzhin gnas su dgod //
T02TD1874E:64b-1: de nas phi de nyid par yang //
T02TD1874E:64b-2: skud pa tshon rtsi sngon bzhin bsgrub //
T02TD1874E:64b-3: gos dang rin chen rgyan ldan pa'i //
T02TD1874E:64b-4: khye'u dang bu mo dbab byas nas //
T02TD1874E:64b-5: de yis dngos grub dkyil 'khor mchog / yang dag sbyin byed bras nas kyang //
T02TD1874E:64b-6: dbye ba byas nas de nyid kyang /
T02TD1874E:64b-7: mchod nas rang gi gnas su btang //
T02TD1874E:64b-8: de nas phyag gya dang lhan cig //
T02TD1874E:64b-9: 'khor lo bsgrub pa'i cho ga bzhin //
T02TD1874E:64b-10: gnyis 'dres byas nas steng nas dbab //
T02TD1874E:64b-11: sngon bzhin dkyil 'khor dbyer med bya //
T02TD1874E:64b-12: bdag po lnga lnga bzhi ba'i dus //
T02TD1874E:64b-13: bdag po gnyis pas yang mtshan bya //
T02TD1874E:64b-14: yang na de dag klad rgyas dang //
T02TD1874E:64b-15: lkog ma snying ga lte ba dang //
T02TD1874E:64b-16: gsang bar rgyu yi skyes bu dgod //
T02TD1874E:64b-17: rdo rje mi phyed gsum las skyes //
T02TD1874E:64b-18: sgrub pa bo ni blo ldan la //
T02TD1874E:64b-19: 'jigs shing skra gnas byin gyis rlob //
T02TD1874E:64b-20: de dag gsang ba'i mchog sogs pa //
T02TD1874E:64b-21: sngon gsungs mchod pa nyi shus kyang //
T02TD1874E:64b-22: mchod nas 'od zer rtse mo las //
T02TD1874E:64b-23: yid dga'i rin chen sna bdun spro gser mdog lta bu'i rgyan rnams kyis //
T02TD1874E:64b-24: brgyan pa'i bde ba'i longs spyod 'dzin //
T02TD1874E:64b-25: padma'i steng na gnas pa yi //
T02TD1874E:64b-26: bud med rin chen dbul bar bya //
T02TD1874E:64b-27: gnod sbyin lta bu'i gzugs 'dzin pa //
T02TD1874E:64b-28: gos sngon bsgos pa rin chen gter //
T02TD1874E:64b-29: gzung ba'i khyim bdag rin po che //
T02TD1874E:64b-30: sgyur ma lta bus sbrul ba bya //
T02TD1874E:64b-31: mche ba drug ldan glang po dkar //
T02TD1874E:64b-32: gser gyis brgyan pa spro bar bya //
T02TD1874E:64b-33: au tab la mthing ga'i 'dab 'dra'i rta //
T02TD1874E:64b-34: rin chen chas brgyan spros to /
T02TD1874E:64b-36: / chang zungs rin chen sna bdun gyis //
T02TD1874E:64b-37: sbras ba'i ral gri rin po che //
T02TD1874E:64b-39: gnas pa spros te dbul bar bya //
T02TD1874E:64b-40: lha yi gos kyis rab brgyan pa //
T02TD1874E:64b-41: 'od zer sna tshogs spro ba yi //
T02TD1874E:64b-42: gser gyi 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa //
T02TD1874E:64b-43: sbyor ba shes pas sgro bar bya //
T02TD1874E:64b-44: mkha' kun gsal bar byed pa yi /
T02TD1874E:64b-45: 'od zer mtha' yas rab spro ba //
T02TD1874E:64b-46: blon po rin chen spros nas kyang //
T02TD1874E:64b-47: de dag phyir rgol brgyan par bsgom //
T02TD1874E:64b-48: de ltar lha sogs bu mo dang //
T02TD1874E:64b-49: rig 'dzin rnams kyis bsgyur ba yi //
T02TD1874E:64b-50: glu dang gar dang gling bu dang //
T02TD1874E:65a-2: nam mkha'i khams kun g-yos bar bsgom //
T02TD1874E:65a-3: shin tu zhi ba'i sgra sgrogs pa'i //
T02TD1874E:65a-4: khu byug bung ba dang ba sogs //
T02TD1874E:65a-5: ma dangs dga' rnams kyis gang bar bsam //
T02TD1874E:65a-6: me tog shing gis mtha' brgyan ba'i //
T02TD1874E:65a-7: mdzes pa'i rdzing bu sna tshogs dang //
T02TD1874E:65a-8: dpag bsam shing gi nags tshal ni //
T02TD1874E:65a-10: de bzhin bza' bca' kha zas dkar //
T02TD1874E:65a-11: tshal dang theg pa gdan rnams dang //
T02TD1874E:65a-12: myos byed btung ba'i tshogs rnams kyang //
T02TD1874E:65a-13: 'khor lo mnyes phyir spro bar bya ;
T02TD1874E:65a-14: / rang bzhin dag pa'i chos nyid la //
T02TD1874E:65a-15: chos kyi dbyings ni gnas med de //
T02TD1874E:65a-16: rdo rje las byung rtog pa ni //
T02TD1874E:65a-17: gsungs pa nyed kyang ma grub bo //
T02TD1874E:65a-18: de ltar sna tshogs mchod pa yis //
T02TD1874E:65a-19: mnyes byas sngon bzhin rang nyid zhugs //
T02TD1874E:65a-20: bdag po nga rgyal dang ldan par //
T02TD1874E:65a-21: 'khor lo bdag la zhugs byas te //
T02TD1874E:65a-22: dga' ba'i ye shes rab gnas nas //
T02TD1874E:65a-23: zhag bdun songs par yang du brtag //
T02TD1874E:65a-24: de ltar de ru phyag rgya che //
T02TD1874E:65a-25: ji skad gsungs pa thob par 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:65a-26: de ltar byas kyang phyag rgya che //
T02TD1874E:65a-27: sgrub pos kyang ni thob ma gyur //
T02TD1874E:65a-28: sngon bzhin nyams pa sna tshogs dang //
T02TD1874E:65a-29: dbye ba'i sgo nas bsgrub par bya //
T02TD1874E:65a-30: rang gi 'dod bzhin gsol btab nas //
T02TD1874E:65a-31: bris pa'i 'khor lo gshegs su gsol //
T02TD1874E:65a-32: smon lam rnams ni byas nas su //
T02TD1874E:65a-33: byang chub chen por bsngo bar bya //
T02TD1874E:65a-34: rtog pa las byung ji snyed pa //
T02TD1874E:65a-35: rje btsun rnams kyi spyan sngar bshags //
T02TD1874E:65a-36: ci bzhin byin gyis brlabs byas nas //
T02TD1874E:65a-37: rang gi rjes su mthun pas bsgrub //
T02TD1874E:65a-38: 'khor lo gang dag gang bstan pa //
T02TD1874E:65a-39: sna tshogs phyag rgya mchod pa yis //
T02TD1874E:65a-40: slob ma'i tshogs kun de dang des //
T02TD1874E:65a-41: mchod pa byas nas de bsgrub bo //
T02TD1874E:65a-42: rang gi 'khor lo tshogs ldan pa'i //
T02TD1874E:65a-43: rang gi gla ma la sogs gzhan //
T02TD1874E:65a-44: yid dga' gnas su spyan drangs nas //
T02TD1874E:65a-46: bde bar gsheg spa'i lha rnams mchog / rin chen sna tshogs kyis sbras pa //
T02TD1874E:65a-47: dril bu rgyal mtshan mchod sogs ldan //
T02TD1874E:65a-48: bla re dam ba bres ba ru //
T02TD1874E:65a-49: rdo rje sngags dang mchod la sogs //
T02TD1874E:65b-0: glu dang sil snyan rnam @65b par 'bul //
T02TD1874E:65b-1: me tog bdug sogs rab sbyor bas //
T02TD1874E:65b-2: dag pa'i gdan chen bsham par bya //
T02TD1874E:65b-3: der ni de dag thams cad kun //
T02TD1874E:65b-4: ji lta'i gnas su ji bzhin 'dug //
T02TD1874E:65b-5: bskal bzang rang gi phyag rgya dang //
T02TD1874E:65b-6: dngos grub phyir ni rnam par rol //
T02TD1874E:65b-7: sha dad chang la sogs pa yi //
T02TD1874E:65b-8: bza' bca' btung ba'i tshogs rnams dang //
T02TD1874E:65b-9: lus dang ngag gi spyod pa yis //
T02TD1874E:65b-10: de kun mnyes par bya dgos so //
T02TD1874E:65b-11: de bzhin phyogs skyong la sgos kun //
T02TD1874E:65b-12: gzhan bzhin 'khor lor bsgrub byas la //
T02TD1874E:65b-13: gong gsungs gtor ma'i tshogs rnams kyis //
T02TD1874E:65b-14: de dag tshim par yang bya'o //
T02TD1874E:65b-16: 'khor lo yang dang yang du mchod //
T02TD1874E:65b-17: bla mas bdun du bzhag nas ni //
T02TD1874E:65b-18: nyams par dogs pa thams cad bsal //
T02TD1874E:65b-19: de ltar goms pa brtan bya zhing //
T02TD1874E:65b-20: mnyams skyon med spyod par ldan //
T02TD1874E:65b-21: mchog gi dngos grub lam la gnas /
T02TD1874E:65b-22: dam pa'i rig ma ma 'khrul pas //
T02TD1874E:65b-23: zhag bdun dang ni zla phyed dang //
T02TD1874E:65b-24: zla gcig zla ba phyed dang gnyis //
T02TD1874E:65b-25: rdo rje dam tshig bskyed byas nas //
T02TD1874E:65b-26: myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:65b-27: de ltar yang dang yang bsgoms pas //
T02TD1874E:65b-28: bde gshegs rnams kyi dngos grub mchog mi 'grub 'khrul ba'i rgyu yis ni //
T02TD1874E:65b-29: sgrub pa bo la bkag gyur na //
T02TD1874E:65b-30: de nyid du ni sgrub pa pos //
T02TD1874E:65b-31: go skabs gzhan ni med pa'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:65b-32: thugs rje che ba'i gsan ba kun //
T02TD1874E:65b-33: de la khros par rig pa yin //
T02TD1874E:65b-34: rtog pa'i dbang gis de dag rnams //
T02TD1874E:65b-35: rang rang tshogs dang rang khams dang //
T02TD1874E:65b-36: sgrub pa po la mi gzigs te //
T02TD1874E:65b-37: btang snyoms chen por gnas pa'o //
T02TD1874E:65b-39: thub pas spyan ras gzigs bya'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:65b-40: dam pa'i gzhung las gsungs pa ltar //
T02TD1874E:65b-41: de dag rnams kyi snying po bskul //
T02TD1874E:65b-42: bdag dang 'khor la dmigs byas nas //
T02TD1874E:65b-43: de dag rnams kyi spyi bo dang //
T02TD1874E:65b-44: mgrin pa de 'og thugs ka ru //
T02TD1874E:65b-45: sngon bzhin phyag rgya bzhi'i rgyas gdab //
T02TD1874E:65b-46: de bzhin phra mo'i 'khor lo la //
T02TD1874E:65b-47: sa bon sogs pas yang mtshan te //
T02TD1874E:65b-48: de nyid brjod pas de dag las //
T02TD1874E:65b-49: de dag rnams ni spro bar bya //
T02TD1874E:65b-50: spros te mdun du rab gyed pa'i //
T02TD1874E:66a-2: gnas shing khros pa bsam byas te //
T02TD1874E:66a-3: sgrub pos de la bka' yis bsgo //
T02TD1874E:66a-4: nga ni dpal ldan che ge mo //
T02TD1874E:66a-5: khyod kyi rtag tu bsgrub la gnas //
T02TD1874E:66a-6: dam sdom lam la rtag brtson pas //
T02TD1874E:66a-7: bdag la dngos grub stsal du gsol //
T02TD1874E:66a-8: aom shr'i ban rtsa kra aom shag te /
T02TD1874E:66a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa tham cad nhid da ya rtsu de a'a k'a rsha ya phat rdza /
T02TD1874E:66a-10: aom sh'i ban padma ao gu shag te /
T02TD1874E:66a-11: gong gi bsgrub bya hve da ya rtsu nyid a'a k'a rsha ya phat rdza /
T02TD1874E:66a-12: aom shr'i ban rga ao gu shag te /
T02TD1874E:66a-13: bsgrub bya nyid ya rtsu ni a'a ka' rasha ya phat rdza /
T02TD1874E:66a-14: aom shr'i ban badzra ao gu shag te /
T02TD1874E:66a-15: bsgrub bya rtsu ni k'a rasha ya pha ta rdza /
T02TD1874E:66a-16: rin chen la sogs rang sngags kyis //
T02TD1874E:66a-17: rang rang mtshan mas mtshan pa yi //
T02TD1874E:66a-18: ye shes sems dpa' la sogs pa //
T02TD1874E:66a-19: de dag kun tu spro bar bya /
T02TD1874E:66a-20: spros te phyogs bcu ba song nas kyang //
T02TD1874E:66a-21: rang gi zhing na gnas pa yi //
T02TD1874E:66a-22: bde gshegs rigs bcas btang snyoms gnas //
T02TD1874E:66a-23: lcags kyu thugs kar brdeg cing bskul //
T02TD1874E:66a-24: che ge zhes bya rdo rje la //
T02TD1874E:66a-25: khyed kyis dngos grub dam pas chol //
T02TD1874E:66a-26: gal te mas chal khyed rnams brdzun na //
T02TD1874E:66a-27: smras pas rang nyid bslus pa'o //
T02TD1874E:66a-28: de bzhin lus kyi dkyil 'khor dang //
T02TD1874E:66a-29: sku yi bu ga kun nas kyang //
T02TD1874E:66a-30: de 'dra bsam gyis mi khyab pa //
T02TD1874E:66a-31: 'phros pa'am mtshan ma rnams kyis bskul //
T02TD1874E:66a-32: mi gzhigs mngon par gyur pa'i don //
T02TD1874E:66a-33: thabs de zhag bdun bar du bya //
T02TD1874E:66a-34: de yis rgyu kun rdzogs pas na //
T02TD1874E:66a-35: de dag rnal 'byor pa la 'jug / de yi 'og 'byung mchog bzhi'o ;
T02TD1874E:66a-36: / rdo rje tshul mchog 'di brtsams pas //
T02TD1874E:66a-37: ye shes rdo rje can gyi gsang //
T02TD1874E:66a-38: mchog stsol zhing ni rnam par gzhigs //
T02TD1874E:66a-39: yid ni 'jigs shing skrag gyur nas //
T02TD1874E:66a-40: yid la mgu zhing dgar 'gyur ba'i //
T02TD1874E:66a-41: dngos grub dam pa de dus te //
T02TD1874E:66a-43: gal te gnyis kyi bdag nyid rmongs //
T02TD1874E:66a-44: de yi srog ni der zad 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:66a-45: de yis sngon du ma byas na //
T02TD1874E:66a-46: de dag chad pas gcad par bya //
T02TD1874E:66a-47: rang nyid 'khor lor bcas pa khros //
T02TD1874E:66a-48: nag po me dkyil na bzhugs //
T02TD1874E:66a-49: bsnyen pa la sogs dang ldan pas //
T02TD1874E:66b-0: phyag rgya lhan cig gnyis med @66b bya ;
T02TD1874E:66b-1: / sngon gsungs 'phros pa rnams kyis kyang //
T02TD1874E:66b-2: rang khams gnas pa'i rtag pa sogs //
T02TD1874E:66b-5: chags kyus bkug par byas nas su //
T02TD1874E:66b-6: phyag rgya'i gsang bar nyi ma'i steng //
T02TD1874E:66b-7: me yi dkyil 'khor gru gsum du //
T02TD1874E:66b-8: bzhag ste de dag dam tshig gis //
T02TD1874E:66b-10: de nas rang gi rigs can nyid //
T02TD1874E:66b-12: ldan pa'i padma kha bye ba'i //
T02TD1874E:66b-13: nang du bcug nas phan tshun dkri //
T02TD1874E:66b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs 'byung gnas //
T02TD1874E:66b-15: gshin rje mthar byed stong sngon bzhin //
T02TD1874E:66b-16: 'od ldan smad ni rtse gcig gzugs //
T02TD1874E:66b-17: rdo rje las ni dbyung bar bya //
T02TD1874E:66b-18: de yis de dag rtag pa yi //
T02TD1874E:66b-20: btab pas rlung gis thal ba ltar //
T02TD1874E:66b-21: sngags kyi lus ni mi snang byas //
T02TD1874E:66b-24: d'i pta badzra rtsa kra h'um phat /
T02TD1874E:66b-26: padma mthar byed spros nas kyang //
T02TD1874E:66b-27: sngon bzhin snang ba mtha' yas kyi //
T02TD1874E:66b-28: kha ru sngags 'dis gdab par bya //
T02TD1874E:66b-30: rdo rje rigs las byung ba yi //
T02TD1874E:66b-31: shes rab mthar byed de bzhin spro //
T02TD1874E:66b-32: de yis mi bskyod thugs ka ru //
T02TD1874E:66b-34: aom a'a: badzra rtsa h'um pha ta /
T02TD1874E:66b-35: yi ge gsum gyi bar bcug pa'i //
T02TD1874E:66b-36: sngags 'di bskul nas de yis btab //
T02TD1874E:66b-37: rtog pa las byung ji snyed pa //
T02TD1874E:66b-38: bsal shes bya'i sgrib sogs bcom //
T02TD1874E:66b-39: ta ta ku la na shva ka'i la ya h'um pha ta /
T02TD1874E:66b-40: btab pa rtsam gyis rdo rje gsum //
T02TD1874E:66b-41: sku gsum dri med las byung ba'i ;
T02TD1874E:66b-42: / dam tshig mchog gis ldang bar 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:66b-44: sku gsung phugs kyi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1874E:66b-45: chog legs par byas nas ni //
T02TD1874E:66b-46: mkha' dbyings rdo rje mtha' klas par //
T02TD1874E:66b-47: 'de bas par gyur pa gdon mi zha //
T02TD1874E:66b-48: bsgrub bya bya de dag zhi ba'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:66b-49: bsdu dang spro ba'i sgo nas kyang //
T02TD1874E:66b-50: phur bu sngags kyi phyung nas ni //
T02TD1874E:66b-51: ye shes rtsam du gnas par bya //
T02TD1874E:66b-52: aom a'am badzra dha ro a'a aud k'i la ya lh'im aom badzra dha ro a'a rdza aud ki la ya h'um /
T02TD1874E:66b-53: aom a'am sa rba ki la ya ka na te na badzra di ta aa badzra di ta aa badzra ya h'um /
T02TD1874E:67a-0: aom a'a sa rba ki la ya ka na dha rnam sa te badzra di ta aa badzra @67a * //
T02TD1874E:67a-2: aom a'a sa rba k'i la ya ka na sam chas te na badzra di ta aa badzra ya h'um /
T02TD1874E:67a-3: ye shes mar me lta bu'i tshul //
T02TD1874E:67a-4: rang gi mi shes dbyer med byas /
T02TD1874E:67a-5: dbugs 'byin mchog dang lhan cig tu //
T02TD1874E:67a-6: cho ga 'di ni ma lus brtsam //
T02TD1874E:67a-7: dpung brkyang mgul pa nas 'khyud pas ;
T02TD1874E:67a-8: / mi g-yo skra bzung brla gnyis par //
T02TD1874E:67a-9: bltas te sing sgra'i glu blangs nas //
T02TD1874E:67a-10: bung ba lta bur rtse bar bya //
T02TD1874E:67a-12: g-yon gyi spyi bo nas bzung nas //
T02TD1874E:67a-13: g-yas kyi ko sko ba ston nas ni //
T02TD1874E:67a-14: ma mchu sbrang rtsi gzhib par bya //
T02TD1874E:67a-15: gzhi bcing sid ces rab brjod pas //
T02TD1874E:67a-17: dpung pa'i bar du rab byas la //
T02TD1874E:67a-18: kha yis de la rtse bar bya //
T02TD1874E:67a-19: rna ba de bzhin mchan khung dang /
T02TD1874E:67a-20: mgrin pa'i glo dang sum mdo rnams //
T02TD1874E:67a-21: sen mos re mos gdab bya zhing //
T02TD1874E:67a-22: yang dang yang du byug par bya //
T02TD1874E:67a-23: g-yon gyis padma mnye ba dang //
T02TD1874E:67a-24: lag gnyis sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor la //
T02TD1874E:67a-25: rdo rje g-yon gyis sor mo gsum //
T02TD1874E:67a-26: chos 'byung nang du brud cing rtse //
T02TD1874E:67a-27: bsnyen dang nyer bsgrub sgrub pa yis //
T02TD1874E:67a-28: 'di ltar bskyod ba rtsam gyis ni //
T02TD1874E:67a-30: spyi po skra bkrol gos 'dor bye ;
T02TD1874E:67a-31: / dngul chu thigs pas kun du khyab //
T02TD1874E:67a-32: brtan pa'i dang tshul shor nas ni //
T02TD1874E:67a-33: ba spu rnams kyang g-yo bar byed //
T02TD1874E:67a-34: dmar ba'i mig ni phra bas ba lta //
T02TD1874E:67a-35: bdag nyid bsgrub pa la gnas na //
T02TD1874E:67a-36: zla ba lta bu'i rigs can 'char //
T02TD1874E:67a-37: rtse gcig yid kyis ma spros par //
T02TD1874E:67a-38: yang dang yang du brtag par bya //
T02TD1874E:67a-39: mkha' 'gro ma gtogs phyag rgya yis //
T02TD1874E:67a-40: lhan cig dus ni bdun ngu brtag / byin brlabs de'am de sngon du //
T02TD1874E:67a-41: mngon du byed the tshom med //
T02TD1874E:67a-42: rdo rje ni ma nub nas ni //
T02TD1874E:67a-43: bsgrub pa kun du brtsam par bya //
T02TD1874E:67a-46: / de ru sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag //
T02TD1874E:67a-48: chos rnams kun gyi chos nyid de //
T02TD1874E:67a-49: sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs byas tob //
T02TD1874E:67a-50: de ni sku gsum mchog sbyin ba //
T02TD1874E:67a-51: sangs rgyas mtshan gyis mtshan par 'gyur //
T02TD1874E:67a-52: dpag tshad bye ba'i tshad rtsam du //
T02TD1874E:67b-1: de nyid yang dag ye shas thob //
T02TD1874E:67b-2: gzugs brnyan bdag nyid spyi gzugs kyis //
T02TD1874E:67b-3: 'khor lo gsum po mtha' yas khams //
T02TD1874E:67b-5: 'khor ba ji srid gnas kyi bar //
T02TD1874E:67b-6: sbyor ba bdun ldan rdo rje sems //
T02TD1874E:67b-10: rnal 'byor pa rnam pa gnyis kyi dngos grub bsgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas par bshad zin to /
T02TD1874E:67b-12: // / gang phyir rgyu dang bcas pa yis //
T02TD1874E:67b-13: dngos po de dag ngo bo ni //
T02TD1874E:67b-14: byang chub sems yin de'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:67b-15: de yi rang bzhin brjod par rigs //
T02TD1874E:67b-16: thog dang tha med zhi ba //
T02TD1874E:67b-17: dngos po dngos med zhad pa'i gtso //
T02TD1874E:67b-18: stong nyid snying rje mi phyed pa //
T02TD1874E:67b-19: byang chub sems su gsungs pa'o //
T02TD1874E:67b-20: byang chub sems de'i nang du ni //
T02TD1874E:67b-21: bdag po 'ga' yang mi dmigs so //
T02TD1874E:67b-22: de yi gnyen po rnam gsum la //
T02TD1874E:67b-23: tha dad dbye bar rnam par rtog / de yang rang bzhin la ni dmigs //
T02TD1874E:67b-24: 'od gsal sems ni dag pa la //
T02TD1874E:67b-25: gcig dang du bral ba'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:67b-26: do na gzhan 'gyur ba yang mid dmigs //
T02TD1874E:67b-27: sgyu ma tsam gyi sems de ni //
T02TD1874E:67b-28: dag dang ma dag gnyis mi rung //
T02TD1874E:67b-29: de bas rang bzhin rnam dag pa'i //
T02TD1874E:67b-30: byang chub sems su nges pa'o //
T02TD1874E:67b-31: de yi de bzhin nyid ngo bo //
T02TD1874E:67b-32: gang dang 'brel ba ma yin no //
T02TD1874E:67b-33: ma 'brel pa yang ma yin no //
T02TD1874E:67b-34: kun rton yang ni snyam mi sems //
T02TD1874E:67b-35: nam mkha' rtag med bltar mi snang //
T02TD1874E:67b-36: chos rnams kun kyang de bzhin no //
T02TD1874E:67b-37: chos rnams sku gsum mnyam pa ste //
T02TD1874E:67b-38: gang yin sems kyi ngo bo'o //
T02TD1874E:67b-39: sems de de bzhin nyid gnas la //
T02TD1874E:67b-40: de ni khams gsum gnas ma yin //
T02TD1874E:67b-41: mi gnas de ni kun brtags kyi //
T02TD1874E:67b-42: skye med ngo bo med pa'o //
T02TD1874E:67b-43: yin yang bde gshegs thams cad kyi //
T02TD1874E:67b-44: ye shes 'byung ba'i rgyu nyid de //
T02TD1874E:67b-45: rgyu gsum mi gnas chos de ni //
T02TD1874E:67b-46: skye med ye shes 'byung ba'i gnas //
T02TD1874E:67b-47: sad dang rmi lam dbyer med pas //
T02TD1874E:67b-48: 'das pa rmi lam lta bu ste /
T02TD1874E:67b-49: da ltar byung ba rmi lam 'dra //
T02TD1874E:67b-50: ma 'ongs rmi lam las byung ba'o //
T02TD1874E:67b-51: bde gshegs byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T02TD1874E:67b-52: sems can rnams ni ji snyed pa //
T02TD1874E:68a-0: rmi lam lta bur bdag med @68a * //
T02TD1874E:68a-2: / sgyu ma lta bur de bzhin no //
T02TD1874E:68a-3: dper na yid bzhin rin che //
T02TD1874E:68a-4: rtog pa thams cad rab bral yang //
T02TD1874E:68a-5: skal pa ldan pa'i sems dbang gis //
T02TD1874E:68a-7: de bzhin byang chub sems de las //
T02TD1874E:68a-8: chos rnams thams cad 'byung bas na //
T02TD1874E:68a-9: nam mkha' rjes 'brang chos rnams la //
T02TD1874E:68a-10: sangs rgyas chos rnams rjes su 'brang //
T02TD1874E:68a-11: de bas dngos grub thams cad dang //
T02TD1874E:68a-12: sangs rgyas chos rnams thams cad kyi //
T02TD1874E:68a-13: lus dang ngag dang sems la gnas //
T02TD1874E:68a-14: de ni khams gsum mi gnas so //
T02TD1874E:68a-15: nam mkha' bzhin du dag pa'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:68a-16: de bzhin gcig la gcig mi gnas //
T02TD1874E:68a-17: de dag de bzhin nyid gnas pas //
T02TD1874E:68a-18: de ni smra brjod yul las 'das //
T02TD1874E:68a-19: de 'dra'i de bzhin nyid la nim /
T02TD1874E:68a-20: rang gi ye shes rab sbyor zhing //
T02TD1874E:68a-21: gzhan yang bdag po 'di snyam du //
T02TD1874E:68a-23: gsung dang thugs kyi bdag nyid med //
T02TD1874E:68a-24: nam mkha' rdo rje rtog las byung //
T02TD1874E:68a-25: log pa dag tu 'dzin snyam nas //
T02TD1874E:68a-26: bdag gcig ston pa mi gsung bzhugs //
T02TD1874E:68a-27: de nas 'jam pa'i dbyangs la sogs //
T02TD1874E:68a-28: de yi gnyis pa dgag pa'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:68a-29: bde bar gshegs la yang zhus pa //
T02TD1874E:68a-30: gsung la log 'byung mi brtag gsol //
T02TD1874E:68a-31: ci phyir sngon gyi rgyal ba ltar //
T02TD1874E:68a-32: rdo rje 'chad bas mdzad par rigs //
T02TD1874E:68a-33: yod de tshangs pa la sogs pa //
T02TD1874E:68a-34: yang dag mngon shes ma thob pas //
T02TD1874E:68a-35: kun rdzob rgyun la 'khrul bas na //
T02TD1874E:68a-36: bdag po 'di yis shes nas sam //
T02TD1874E:68a-37: yang na mi sems 'chad do sems ;
T02TD1874E:68a-39: skye med rdo rje mngon byang chub //
T02TD1874E:68a-40: ngo bo med pa mi 'gyur ba //
T02TD1874E:68a-41: bde gshegs rnams kyis kyang mi shes //
T02TD1874E:68a-42: des ni sems chan kun la khyab //
T02TD1874E:68a-43: des na de dag thams cad kun //
T02TD1874E:68a-44: byang chub rdo rje'i gnas thob pas //
T02TD1874E:68a-45: sangs rgyas rdo rje rdzu 'phrul che //
T02TD1874E:68a-46: de blangs de ni thob pa'o //
T02TD1874E:68a-47: de bas chos 'di thams cad kun //
T02TD1874E:68a-48: ngo bo nyid bdag gnas med la //
T02TD1874E:68a-49: chos dbyings shes rab gnas su rtog rdo rje las byung ltar smras pa //
T02TD1874E:68a-50: smra ste smras ba yang ma yin //
T02TD1874E:68a-51: sngon bzhin thams cad bzhin thams cad mkha' la gnas //
T02TD1874E:68b-1: de ni rang bzhin 'od gsal dbyings //
T02TD1874E:68b-2: de ru yang dag kun rdzob rgyan //
T02TD1874E:68b-3: dbyer med pa yis rnam par bsgom //
T02TD1874E:68b-4: de ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD1874E:68b-5: byang chub sems ni bsgom pa'o //
T02TD1874E:68b-6: byang chub sems ni bsgom pa'o //
T02TD1874E:68b-7: de ltar byang chub sems sgom pas //
T02TD1874E:68b-8: rnam dag gsang ba'i yi ge gsum ;
T02TD1874E:68b-9: / chos dang longs spyod sprul ba'i sku //
T02TD1874E:68b-11: gang phyir bud med skyes pa dang //
T02TD1874E:68b-12: ma ning gsal byed thams cad ni //
T02TD1874E:68b-13: yi ge gsum sdud de yi phyir //
T02TD1874E:68b-14: de ni kun gyi gtso bo'o //
T02TD1874E:68b-15: dngos po gzugs can thams cad dang //
T02TD1874E:68b-16: sgras grags pa ni ji snyed dang //
T02TD1874E:68b-17: bsag rtog ma lus thams cad kun //
T02TD1874E:68b-18: rdo rje gsum gyi sdud pa'o //
T02TD1874E:68b-19: de 'dri'i de nyed gsum pos ni //
T02TD1874E:68b-20: kun khyab gzhan gyi spyod yul min //
T02TD1874E:68b-21: nyag gcig rtogs pa'i spyod yul pas //
T02TD1874E:68b-22: de ni gsang ba'i yi ge'o //
T02TD1874E:68b-23: de bas rdzogs ldan la sogs par //
T02TD1874E:68b-24: de ni snod ni ma gzhigs pas //
T02TD1874E:68b-25: rdo rje 'chang ba de yi tshe //
T02TD1874E:68b-26: de 'gyur gsang ba'i don ma bshad //
T02TD1874E:68b-27: pha rol phyin pa la sogs pas //
T02TD1874E:68b-28: bskal par 'bad kyang mi brnyes pa //
T02TD1874E:68b-30: skad cig thang cig yung rtsam gyis //
T02TD1874E:68b-31: sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub che //
T02TD1874E:68b-32: sku gsum dbyer med sangs rgyas mchog / rdo rje 'chang ba kun gyi gnas //
T02TD1874E:68b-34: gong gsungs sems can de dag kun //
T02TD1874E:68b-35: 'di yi snod ma yin thos nas //
T02TD1874E:68b-36: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che //
T02TD1874E:68b-37: snying rje gar gyis de dag dus //
T02TD1874E:68b-38: don de zab mor bstan pa'i phyir //
T02TD1874E:68b-39: gsang ba'i yi ge rnam dag pas //
T02TD1874E:68b-40: thun mong gi ni sdug bsngal te //
T02TD1874E:68b-41: de bas bde gshegs rnams kyi bkag / ngus 'dir bdag chag snod du gyur //
T02TD1874E:68b-42: de yi nyid nyer blangs pas //
T02TD1874E:68b-43: sku gsum rdo rje'i chos nyid de ;
T02TD1874E:68b-45: de ltar bstan pa'i dngos po rnams //
T02TD1874E:68b-46: rnam pa bzhi ru yang dag dbye //
T02TD1874E:68b-47: skyes bu lam dang de sngon 'gro //
T02TD1874E:68b-49: skyes bu gsum de dang po dang //
T02TD1874E:68b-50: cung zhad rtsam dang ye shes thob //
T02TD1874E:69a-3: rdo rje can gyis bstan pa yi //
T02TD1874E:69a-4: lam gyi rim pa rnam gnyis te //
T02TD1874E:69a-5: bskyed pa yi ni rim pa dang //
T02TD1874E:69a-6: rdzogs pa'i rim pa kho na'o //
T02TD1874E:69a-7: bskyed pa'i rim pa bsnyen pa dang //
T02TD1874E:69a-8: thun mong thun min sgrub pa la ;
T02TD1874E:69a-9: / snod dag skye ba'i rim pa gsum //
T02TD1874E:69a-10: bsgom pa'i rim pa ji snyed pa'o //
T02TD1874E:69a-11: rdzogs pa'i rim pa rnal 'byor dang //
T02TD1874E:69a-12: phyag rgya las skyes chos thams cad //
T02TD1874E:69a-13: sgyu ma la sogs 'drar bsrub pa //
T02TD1874E:69a-14: rang bzhin gnas pa'i rnal 'byor ro //
T02TD1874E:69a-15: de yi sngon 'gro rnam gsum ste //
T02TD1874E:69a-16: dkyil 'khor dang ni dam tshig dang //
T02TD1874E:69a-17: de yi bsgrub pa'i ngo bo nyid //
T02TD1874E:69a-18: rdo rje 'chang bas rab tu gsungs //
T02TD1874E:69a-19: dkyil 'khor bzhi ste ri mo dang //
T02TD1874E:69a-20: lus dang byang sems bha ga ste //
T02TD1874E:69a-21: ye shes lang la sogs pa yi //
T02TD1874E:69a-22: thob byed gnas su yang dag bshad //
T02TD1874E:69a-23: dam tshig la ni rnam gnyis te ;
T02TD1874E:69a-24: / thon mong sdom par bstan pa dang //
T02TD1874E:69a-25: thun mong ma yin sdom pa'o //
T02TD1874E:69a-26: thun mong ma yin rnam gsum ste //
T02TD1874E:69a-27: spang pa'i dam tshig sdom pa dang //
T02TD1874E:69a-28: bzha' dang bsrung ba'i dam tshig dang //
T02TD1874E:69a-29: rnal 'byor snying po sdom pa ste //
T02TD1874E:69a-30: snod sogs rkyen du yang dag bshad //
T02TD1874E:69a-31: dbang gi rnam pa gsum dag ste //
T02TD1874E:69a-32: bum pa'i dbang gi dang po dang //
T02TD1874E:69a-33: gnyis pa la ni gsang ba'i dbang //
T02TD1874E:69a-34: shes rab ye shes gsum pa'o //
T02TD1874E:69a-35: de ltar bzhin bzhi pa yang //
T02TD1874E:69a-36: bla ma dam pa'i zhal las ni //
T02TD1874E:69a-37: thob pa yin te rnam pa gsum //
T02TD1874E:69a-38: kun la rab tu khyab pa'o //
T02TD1874E:69a-39: 'bras bu la ni rnam gnyis te //
T02TD1874E:69a-40: thun mong gi ni grub pa dang //
T02TD1874E:69a-41: phyag rgya chen po'i grub pa'o //
T02TD1874E:69a-42: thun mong grub pa rnam pa brgyad //
T02TD1874E:69a-43: rig 'dzin mngon par shes pa lang //
T02TD1874E:69a-44: ma thag gzhug sngags kyi khyad par dang //
T02TD1874E:69a-45: aa rdza las kyi dbye ba'o //
T02TD1874E:69a-46: cig shos rdo rje gsum yin te //
T02TD1874E:69a-47: de dang de ru rab bstan pa'i //
T02TD1874E:69a-48: sangs rgyas nyid grub dngos grub ni //
T02TD1874E:69a-49: yang dag ye shes dbang thob pa'o //
T02TD1874E:69a-50: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud rnams kun //
T02TD1874E:69a-52: shes rab ldan pa rnams kyi kyang //
T02TD1874E:69a-53: 'di rnams kho na bsgre bar bya //
T02TD1874E:69b-0: gsang dang rab gsang @69b shin tu gsang ba 'dus zhes khya'i rgyud //
T02TD1874E:69b-1: phra zhing shas dka' bde gshegs rnams kyi yul 'di rtog bral dpyad las 'das //
T02TD1874E:69b-2: 'on kyang sangs rgyas ye shes zhabs kyi bla med thugs rje ni zher gyis //
T02TD1874E:69b-3: bskal par 'dus byas pa yi mun pa kun bsal bde gshegs spyod yul bstan //
T02TD1874E:69b-4: bdag gis chung zhad rtogs nas dang po grogs mchog bzang po gsang ba dang //
T02TD1874E:69b-5: ko la yi grogs mchog dri med pa yi bzang po zhes bya dang //
T02TD1874E:69b-6: shes rab lha zhes bya ba'i grogs mchog pa nya la yi dur khrod gnas //
T02TD1874E:69b-7: legs pa'i tshul mang shri na le ndra yi gtsug lag khang gnas te //
T02TD1874E:69b-8: dge ba'i spun gyis gsol btab rgyud kyi rgyal po de la blo man pas //
T02TD1874E:69b-9: tshogs ni chung ngus rtogs par bya phyir nga rgyal ma yin dad pa yis //
T02TD1874E:69b-10: bsdus pa'i don dang sgrub pa'i thabs 'di 'bad pas sems khral cher byas la //
T02TD1874E:69b-11: sangs rgyas la sogs dpa' bo mkhas pa rnams kyis bdag la bzhod par mdzod //
T02TD1874E:69b-12: de ltar byas pa las byung dge ba dri med de yis 'gro ba rnams //
T02TD1874E:69b-13: 'di gzhung rim pas tshogs ni rab rtsogs rig 'dzin rig 'dzin la sogs gsum gyis ni //
T02TD1874E:69b-14: tha ma la pa yi skad cig sogs bsgres de 'gag de yis bzlog bya ste //
T02TD1874E:69b-15: rang gi phyag rgyas rdo rje 'chang ba tho ba nas bdud las rgyal gyur cig / dpal gsang ba 'dus pa sgrub pa'i thabs dngos grub 'byung ba'i gter zhes bya ba /
T02TD1874E:69b-16: slob dpon chen po bi ta pa'i das mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1874E:69b-18: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la gu hya dang /
T02TD1874E:69b-19: bod kyi lo tsa ba mnga' bdag lha ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
